NK087(shu)002:1: // dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i rgya cher bshad pa bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:3: a mri tasta tha na ma /
NK087(shu)002:5: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya /
NK087(shu)002:6: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK087(shu)002:7: bcom ldan bder gshegs thugs kyi thugs //
NK087(shu)002:8: gsang gsum don las byung ba yi //
NK087(shu)002:9: mthar phyin don la rab zab pa //
NK087(shu)002:10: rdo rje gzhon nu rab zab thugs //
NK087(shu)002:11: sprul sku'i ngo bor gnas pa'i tshe //
NK087(shu)002:12: 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid can /
NK087(shu)002:14: don dam zab mo'i sku mchog la //
NK087(shu)002:15: lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas //
NK087(shu)002:17: yang dag don chen zab mo'i 'grel //
NK087(shu)002:18: bdud rtsi'i thigs ltar bdag gis bkrol //
NK087(shu)002:19: sngags kyi sku la gsal 'jug pa //
NK087(shu)002:20: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:21: sems la dmigs pa tsam zhig ni //
NK087(shu)002:22: bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:23: de gnyis kun rdzob bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:24: zung 'jug don las gang byung dang //
NK087(shu)002:25: mthar phyin man ngag rab zab ston //
NK087(shu)002:26: don dam bden pa zhes su gsungs //
NK087(shu)002:27: sngags dang dam tshig spyod pa dang //
NK087(shu)002:29: kun rdzob bden pa'i grangs su'o //
NK087(shu)002:30: zung 'jug rim dang don dam pa //
NK087(shu)002:31: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo rgyu //
NK087(shu)002:32: don dam bden pa'i grangs su'o //
NK087(shu)002:33: bden gnyis don la rab gnas pa //
NK087(shu)002:34: rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:35: byang chub sems te kun gyi dngos //
NK087(shu)002:36: gsang ba sbas pa'i don rab gsal //
NK087(shu)002:37: dpal ldan rdor gzhan rgyud yin te //
NK087(shu)002:38: de bas rgyud rgyal kun gyi rtse //
NK087(shu)002:39: tshig nyung ba la don zab pa //
NK087(shu)002:40: rdor gzhan rgyud ni rnyed dka' zhing //
NK087(shu)002:41: zung 'jug don ni rtogs dka' bas //
NK087(shu)002:42: khams gsum sems can thams cad 'khor //
NK087(shu)002:43: de bas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis //
NK087(shu)002:44: yongs su 'bad de shes nas ni //
NK087(shu)002:45: zung 'jug don la rab gnas kyis //
NK087(shu)002:46: gleng gzhi'i don ni rgyu ru gsungs //
NK087(shu)002:47: gleng slong ba ni rkyen du gsungs //
NK087(shu)002:48: bshad pa'i tshig ni 'bras bu ste //
NK087(shu)002:49: rgyu rkyen 'bras bu gsum du gsungs //
NK087(shu)002:50: dgos 'brel rnam pa bzhir yod de //
NK087(shu)002:51: mi yis skye ba 'khrul ba'i tshe //
NK087(shu)002:52: rgyud ces brjod de brjod pa yin //
NK087(shu)002:53: btsun mo pad+ma'i nang nas byung //
NK087(shu)002:55: sngags la sdom par bstan pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:56: nges pa'i tshig te dgos pa yi //
NK087(shu)002:58: de ni 'dod chags bral chos te //
NK087(shu)002:59: yong dgos yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
NK087(shu)002:61: rigs lnga'i ngo bor bskyed pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:62: rgyud ces bya ste brjod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:63: lnga po rigs gcig gyur pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:64: gleng gzhi yin te bral ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:65: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
NK087(shu)002:66: nges pa'i tshig te dgos pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:67: btsun mo la sogs spyod pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:68: rgyud ces bya ste yang dgos so //
NK087(shu)002:69: skye bo don la 'jug pa la //
NK087(shu)002:70: yid ches phyir na dgos 'brel bstan //
NK087(shu)002:71: tshig gi tshogs la dga' ba dang //
NK087(shu)002:72: dngos po spyod la dad pa dang //
NK087(shu)002:73: rtog pa'i chos la bzlog pa'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:74: de la kun rdzob bden pa bstan //
NK087(shu)002:75: yang dag don la mos pa dang //
NK087(shu)002:76: zab mo'i chos la dad pa dang //
NK087(shu)002:77: byang chub sems kyi don la mos //
NK087(shu)002:78: de la don dam bden pa bstan //
NK087(shu)002:79: riim pa gnyis pa bstan nas ni //
NK087(shu)002:80: bshad pa'i dbye ba gsungs pa yin //
NK087(shu)002:81: 'jig rten blo rnams dpag med pas //
NK087(shu)002:82: gang zag rnam pa lngar 'dod de //
NK087(shu)002:83: ud pa la 'dra'i gang zag dang //
NK087(shu)002:84: pad dkar 'dra ba'i gang zag dang //
NK087(shu)002:87: rin po che yi gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:88: rang bzhin gcig te tha dad min //
NK087(shu)002:89: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:91: ud pal zhes bya'i gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:92: mang po thos shing ston mi nus //
NK087(shu)002:93: pad dkar zhes bya'i gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:94: dad ldan thos brtson snying rje che //
NK087(shu)002:95: pad dmar zhes bya'i gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:96: thos med nga rgyal mang du smra //
NK087(shu)002:97: rjes su gzung ba'i don med pa //
NK087(shu)002:98: tsan dan zhes bya'i gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:99: dam tshig dag cing shes rab ldan //
NK087(shu)002:100: rgyud thos legs par ston pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:101: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:102: dam tshig dag cing shes rab ldan //
NK087(shu)002:103: rgyud thos legs par ston pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:104: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:105: ud pal pad dkar pad dmar tsan dan bzhi //
NK087(shu)002:106: kun rdzob bden pa bstan pa'i gang zag go //
NK087(shu)002:107: rdzogs pa'i rim la dad pa dang //
NK087(shu)002:108: rtag tu spyod pas slob dpon 'khur //
NK087(shu)002:109: rin chen 'dra ba'i gang zag ste //
NK087(shu)002:110: de la don dam bden pa bshad //
NK087(shu)002:111: de ltar snod kyi rim brtags nas //
NK087(shu)002:112: bla ma dam pa mkhas pa yis //
NK087(shu)002:113: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:114: de ltar 'dus pa'i don bstan nas //
NK087(shu)002:115: da ni yan lag gi don rnam par dbye ba'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:116: gzhung nyid la 'jug par bya ste //
NK087(shu)002:117: 'dir sdud par byed pa rdo rje'i chos kyis ji skad du thos pa thugs la bzhag nas /
NK087(shu)002:118: gdul bya rnams la bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:119: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:121: rgyud kyi don ma lus par ston pa'i tshig ste /
NK087(shu)002:123: bdag gi zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:124: sdud pa po bdag nyid kyis ston pa las mngon sum du thos kyi /
NK087(shu)002:125: gzhan dag las brgyud cing brgyud nas thos pa ni ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:126: dus gcig nas zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:127: tshes grangs dang zla ba dang lo dang dus ni nges pa med do //
NK087(shu)002:129: sems can rnam rtog bskye ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:131: thos pa'i dus ni nges pa med do //
NK087(shu)002:132: ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i dus gcig gi tshe
NK087(shu)002:133: na bdag gis 'di thos la gzhan du ni gzhan
NK087(shu)002:134: dag thos pa'am / yang na dus gcig ste skad gcig ma la thos so zhes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:135: 'di dag gis ni bdag nyid thos pa mang ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:136: shes rab phul du byung ba yin par ston to //
NK087(shu)002:137: gang las gang du gang dang lhan cig thos zhes gleng gzhi bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:138: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:140: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:141: don zab mo phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:142: mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
NK087(shu)002:143: de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:144: don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:145: gsang ba mchog gi dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs ste /
NK087(shu)002:146: gsang ba mchog gi bdag po zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:147: sku'i 'khor lo'i sgo bzhi pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:148: gsung gi 'khor lo'i sgo brgyad pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:149: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i sgo dgu pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:150: bde ba chen po'i sgo drug pa rnams ni rnal 'byor phyi ma'i rgyud la /
NK087(shu)002:152: dkyil 'khor bzhi po 'di kun gyi mchog yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:153: bzhi po'i mchog kyang bde ba chen po'i pho brang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:154: pho brang de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin du bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:155: de'i dus na khams gsum gyi sems can kun kyang
NK087(shu)002:156: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin du gyur to
NK087(shu)002:157: // 'khor rnams la yang cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis chos ston to //
NK087(shu)002:158: de ltar bzhugs pa'i phyir bdag po'o //
NK087(shu)002:159: sku'i pho brang na bzhugs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:160: thig le byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:161: bde ba chen po'i gnas nas lha mo bzhi'i mtshan nyid bslang ste /
NK087(shu)002:163: 'od kyi gong bu thig le'i gzugs su shes te /
NK087(shu)002:165: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:166: sku de'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:167: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:168: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su /
NK087(shu)002:171: de lta bu'i sku gdos pa can du bzhugs pa ni bzhugs pa ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:172: rang bzhin gyis rnam dag pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:173: de ltar bzhugs nas kyang 'khor rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas chos ston to //
NK087(shu)002:174: gsung gi pho brang na bzhugs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:175: pad+mo chen po rnam par dag pa'i gsung zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:176: pad+mo chen po zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:177: pho brang ste pho brang de ye nas rnam par dag par 'dod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:178: 'jig rten pa'i gnas dang rten pa'i gnas dang /
NK087(shu)002:179: rten gyi gnas gzhal yas las khyad par du 'phags pas che'o //
NK087(shu)002:180: de'i gnas sprul pa'i sku mtshan nyid du bzhugs te /
NK087(shu)002:181: gsung rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes nas bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:182: de'i dus na 'gro ba rigs drug la ji ltar 'tshams pa'i chos ston to //
NK087(shu)002:183: thugs kyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:184: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:185: thugs kyi pho brang gi phyi mo nas rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i yi ge a gcig gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:186: de'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das thugs kyi rang bzhin h'u gi dbyings su bzhugs te /
NK087(shu)002:187: dran rtog thams cad de las 'byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:188: shes pa kun gyi gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:189: de la ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:190: de ni kun gyi mchog tu gyur pas rgyal po
NK087(shu)002:191: de'i mtshan nyid ni thams cad du rang bzhin gyis
NK087(shu)002:192: 'od gsal ba'i shes pa rang brjod pa'i mtha' las
NK087(shu)002:193: 'das pa'i yon tan de ltar bur bzhugs nas /
NK087(shu)002:194: mnyam pa chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad pa'i sgo nas chos ston to //
NK087(shu)002:195: thabs gang gi sgo nas kun 'dus pa'i phrin las
NK087(shu)002:196: kyis 'dul ba'i sgo yangs par kun tu mdzad do
NK087(shu)002:197: // de dag kun gyi don bsdus pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:198: sku gsung thugs yon tan dam tshig chen por las
NK087(shu)002:199: pa'i bdag nyid chen po zhes bya ba la sogs
NK087(shu)002:200: pa gsungs te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK087(shu)002:201: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo yang
NK087(shu)002:202: mnga' brnyes pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas sems can
NK087(shu)002:204: dam tshig chen po ma lus pa'i bdag por gyur pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:206: phyi dang nang du snang ba'i chos gcig gi ngo bor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:207: dus gsum gyi chos ma lus mi lus lus pa
NK087(shu)002:208: med pa'i chos thams cad ces pa la sogs pa
NK087(shu)002:209: gsungs te / dus gsum gyi sngar 'das pa dang da ltar dang phyis so //
NK087(shu)002:210: de ltar snang ba thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi gsang bar 'dus pas na /
NK087(shu)002:212: sngar 'das pa mi lus te da ltar bzhugs pa lus pa med pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:213: phyis byon pa de rnams kyi dngos po thams cad
NK087(shu)002:214: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i gnas su mngon
NK087(shu)002:216: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin las thabs mkhas pa'i
NK087(shu)002:217: rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa ji
NK087(shu)002:218: ltar 'dul ba la sgra'i tshul du sprul nas don
NK087(shu)002:219: mdzad de / de lta bu'i don la mnga' brnyes
NK087(shu)002:220: pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'o
NK087(shu)002:221: mdzad de / // de ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:223: gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:224: 'og min gnas gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:225: 'og min gnas zhes pa ni gong nas gong du gyur pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:226: 'jig rten pa'i gnas las yum lnga'i mkha' ni khyad par du 'phags so //
NK087(shu)002:227: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang rnal 'byor pa
NK087(shu)002:228: phyi la gsang ba'i gnas kun gyi thun mong ma
NK087(shu)002:229: yin pa'i mchog dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ste
NK087(shu)002:231: gsang ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:232: btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:233: btsun mo ni sangs rgyas kyi shes rab ma ste /
NK087(shu)002:234: de nyid ni nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pas na b+ha ga'o //
NK087(shu)002:235: de lta bu'i b+ha ga de ni las dag pa'i
NK087(shu)002:236: pho brang rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa de thams
NK087(shu)002:238: dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang brtsegs pa de la
NK087(shu)002:239: pad+ma sna tshogs kyis steng dang 'og med par brgyan
NK087(shu)002:240: par pad+ma de rnams kyang dbyibs sna tshogs pad+ma kha
NK087(shu)002:241: dog sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon
NK087(shu)002:242: tan lnga'i mi mthun khyad par rin po che sna
NK087(shu)002:243: tshogs kyi rnam grangs las 'das pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:244: dpe dang tshad med pa rnams kyi gzhal yas khang
NK087(shu)002:245: gi phyi dang nang med par phyogs bcur 'khrigs shing
NK087(shu)002:246: rnam par klubs par thog ma dang tha ma med
NK087(shu)002:247: par ye nas rang byung gi gnas na 'od kyi
NK087(shu)002:248: tshul du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:249: de ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:250: don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka'o //
NK087(shu)002:251: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:252: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rgyal ba sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:253: 'di nas mar 'khor rnam pa lngar shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:257: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:258: yang dag pa'i ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:259: rnal 'byor pa phyi dang nang du snang ba'i mtshan
NK087(shu)002:260: nyid la dbang bsgyur zhing thams cad kyi bdag nyid
NK087(shu)002:261: chen por gyur pa'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas brjod du
NK087(shu)002:262: med pa / bgrang ba las 'das pa yon tan
NK087(shu)002:263: chen pos klubs pa nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa 'khor
NK087(shu)002:264: ba med pa'i tshul gyis bskor nas bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:266: sku'i pho brang gi tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:267: rnal 'byor ma chen mo zhes bya ba bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:268: sa'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma chen mo sangs rgyas spyan dang /
NK087(shu)002:269: me yi mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma chen mo gos dkar mo dang /
NK087(shu)002:270: chu'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma chen mo m+aa ma k+ai dang /
NK087(shu)002:271: rlung gi mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma chen mo dam
NK087(shu)002:272: tshig sgrol ma la sogs pa grangs med pas bskor
NK087(shu)002:274: thugs kyi pho brang gi 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:275: rnal 'byor chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:276: rnal 'byor chen po zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:277: yang dag pa'i ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i
NK087(shu)002:278: rnal 'byor dam pa yang dag pa'i don la rtse
NK087(shu)002:279: gcig tu sems pa'i sems dpa' chen po btsun mo
NK087(shu)002:280: sems ma dang bcas par brjod du med pa grangs
NK087(shu)002:282: brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa'i zhing
NK087(shu)002:283: gi rdul snyed kyis bskor ba med pa'i tshul gyis
NK087(shu)002:285: thugs kyi pho brang gi 'khor ro //
NK087(shu)002:286: gsung gi pho brang 'khor bstan pa'i 'khor /
NK087(shu)002:287: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:288: gzhan yang zhes pa ni thugs kyi pho brang gi
NK087(shu)002:289: 'khor las gzhan pa ste gsung gi 'khor lo zhes
NK087(shu)002:291: he ru ka rol pa'i tshogs zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:292: te ni yang dag pa'i don la dgyes pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:293: ru ni yang dag pa'i don gyi yul de la chags pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:294: ka ni spyod par byed pa'i 'phrin las so //
NK087(shu)002:295: de lta bu'i ngang du rol pa'i tshogs kyis 'khor
NK087(shu)002:296: grangs med pa brjod du med pa rnams kyis bskor
NK087(shu)002:297: ba med pa'i tshul gyis bskor nas bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:298: gsung gi pho brang gi 'khor ro //
NK087(shu)002:299: gsang ba'i pho brang gi 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:300: sprul pa chen po sras kyi 'khor ji snyed pa la sogs pa zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:301: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs las sprul pas sprul pa chen po ste /
NK087(shu)002:302: de bzhin gshegs pa sras kyi 'khor ji snyed pa
NK087(shu)002:303: la sogs pa dang sems dang sems las byung ba
NK087(shu)002:304: ste / rig pa las bskyed pa'i sras kyi 'khor
NK087(shu)002:305: dang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las byung ba ste
NK087(shu)002:306: ste / / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs mang po'i 'khor dang /
NK087(shu)002:307: yang dag pa'i gong ma'i 'khor ji lta ba dang
NK087(shu)002:308: gsang ba'i 'di nyid kyis 'khor ji snyed pa rnams
NK087(shu)002:309: dang / bcom ldan 'das thabs gcig tu rnam par rtog pas /
NK087(shu)002:310: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar pho brang na bzhugs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:311: tshul ni dper na yungs 'bru snum gyis gang ba
NK087(shu)002:312: bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:313: zhes pa ni gnas par mdzad pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:314: bcom ldan 'das kyi btsun mo ni yum kun tu bzang mo yin te /
NK087(shu)002:315: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku la gnyis su med
NK087(shu)002:316: par 'khril ba'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi sems kyi
NK087(shu)002:317: ngo bor snyil ba mi mnga' bar thams cad dbyings
NK087(shu)002:319: de yan chad du 'khor lnga'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
NK087(shu)002:320: da ni sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:321: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi ni zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:322: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa de nyid kyi
NK087(shu)002:323: nang na sdud pa po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
NK087(shu)002:324: rgyal ba sangs rgyas nyid las mi gzhan pa'i rdo
NK087(shu)002:325: rje yid kun tu bzang po yang ston pa'i mtshan
NK087(shu)002:326: nyid btsun mo kun tu bzang mo dang gnyis su
NK087(shu)002:327: med pa'i tshul gyis ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK087(shu)002:328: spyan sngar bran rje bo la bka' nod pa'i tshul
NK087(shu)002:329: du spobs pa can du bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:330: sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa ste kun rdzob don dam gnyis so //
NK087(shu)002:331: ston pa des thams cad la rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis gzigs par bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:332: de'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:333: de nas zhes pa ni de ma thag pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:334: nyon mongs pa bzhi bcom zhing legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas na bcom ldan no //
NK087(shu)002:335: rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' la mi gnas pas 'das pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:336: de lta bu'i ngang tshul mnga' ba'i ston pa gsang
NK087(shu)002:337: ba mchog gi bdag po des phyi dang nang du
NK087(shu)002:338: snang ba la 'di ltar gzigs so //
NK087(shu)002:339: sems dang sems las byung ba ni rten can gyi
NK087(shu)002:340: rang bzhin du gzigs pa med pa'i tshul du gzigs
NK087(shu)002:341: la 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa ni
NK087(shu)002:342: rten gyi rang bzhin te yum lnga'i mkha' rang bzhin
NK087(shu)002:343: du gzigs te / dus gsum dang srid gsum gyis
NK087(shu)002:344: bsdus pa'i chos de yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid
NK087(shu)002:345: byang chub kyi sems su gzigs so //
NK087(shu)002:347: bsam gtan gsum pa'i lha'i ris la sogs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:348: snyoms par 'jug pa ste nyan thos zhi ba'i phyogs la 'jug pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:350: nyan thos tshogs drug bkag nas yul drug las 'gog pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:351: sa'i khyad par la sogs pas dang po nas bcu'i bar du ste /
NK087(shu)002:352: de ltar bye brag tu snang ba'i chos rang re
NK087(shu)002:353: ngo gang la snang bar grags la bcom ldan 'das
NK087(shu)002:354: dpal kun tu bzang pos ni rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan
NK087(shu)002:355: gyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba kun tu khyab
NK087(shu)002:356: par gnyis med pa'i ngang du gzigs so //
NK087(shu)002:357: phyin ci ma log par rnam par gzigs so //
NK087(shu)002:358: 'og ma'i chos rnams la gzigs pa de bzhin du
NK087(shu)002:359: sa bcu gcig pa la gnas pa'i phyogs bcu dus
NK087(shu)002:360: gsum gyi rgyal ba grangs med pa rnams la bcos
NK087(shu)002:362: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par gzigs nas phyi dang
NK087(shu)002:363: nang du snang ba'i chos thams cad ye nas rnam
NK087(shu)002:364: par dag cing ma bcos pa byang chub kyi sems
NK087(shu)002:365: stong pa chen por gzigs te /
NK087(shu)002:366: nyid kyang stong pa chen po'i don la brnal te
NK087(shu)002:367: smra bsam las 'das pa bcos ma ma yin pa
NK087(shu)002:368: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
NK087(shu)002:369: bzhugs so // ston pa de bzhin nyid kyi ting
NK087(shu)002:370: nge 'dzin las gnas pa de'i tshe 'khor ba ste
NK087(shu)002:371: bzhugs so // / khams gsum gyi sems can mya
NK087(shu)002:372: ngan las 'das pa ni rnam par dag pa'i chos
NK087(shu)002:373: thams cad yang dag pa'i ye shes stong pa chen
NK087(shu)002:374: bzhugs so // / por gyur te / dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid tsam du 'di yin no //
NK087(shu)002:375: bsgrub du yod pa ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:376: de ltar chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs pa des sems
NK087(shu)002:377: can gyi don mi mdzad par yum kun tu bzang
NK087(shu)002:378: mos gzigs te / de las bslang ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:379: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:380: bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings su rnal ba'i de
NK087(shu)002:381: ma thag pa de la de nas zhes bya ste
NK087(shu)002:383: sangs rgyas kyi yum kun tu bzang mo des sems
NK087(shu)002:384: can gyi don la dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das gsang
NK087(shu)002:386: dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings la brnal nas bzhugs pa
NK087(shu)002:387: la yum kun tu bzang mos glu 'di bskul lo
NK087(shu)002:388: zhes pa ste / 'og nas 'byung ba'i glu 'adi'o //
NK087(shu)002:389: e zhes pa ni chos 'byung ba'i gnas na bzhugs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:390: de'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:391: e ma'o stong nyid bdag med ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:392: e ma zhes pa ni e ma khams gsum gyi
NK087(shu)002:393: sems can la thugs rje'i spyan thag bcad nas bzhugs
NK087(shu)002:396: stong nyid bdag med rnam dag klong yangs nas zhes
NK087(shu)002:397: pa ni stong pa nyid kyang yin la bdag med
NK087(shu)002:399: stong nyid bdag med de ye nas rnam par dag
NK087(shu)002:400: pa ma bcos pa'i yang klong yangs pa de nas
NK087(shu)002:401: khams gsum gyi sems can kun la snyoms pa'i thugs
NK087(shu)002:402: rje khyod kyis 'byung ba mi dmigs kyang /
NK087(shu)002:403: bdag ni shes rab ma ste /
NK087(shu)002:404: sems can gyi don bya bar dga' ba'i ched du
NK087(shu)002:405: ye nas ma bcos pa'i chos kyi sku dag pa
NK087(shu)002:406: las ma g.yos par thabs mkhas pa'i mdzad spyod kyis
NK087(shu)002:407: khams gsum gyi sems can la snying rje nam mkha'
NK087(shu)002:408: bzhin du kun la khyab par ston /
NK087(shu)002:409: ces yum kun tu bzang mos bskul bas gsang ba
NK087(shu)002:410: mchog gi bdag po des yum kun tu bzang mos
NK087(shu)002:412: stong pa nyid kyi ngang la rnal ba de bzhin
NK087(shu)002:413: nyid de de las kun tu snang gi ting nge
NK087(shu)002:414: 'dzin 'khor ba'i chos thams cad la khyab pa chen
NK087(shu)002:415: po'i snying rje bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
NK087(shu)002:416: par bzhugs so // 'khor ba'i chos rnams la khyab
NK087(shu)002:417: pa'i snyi nga rje bskyed par g.yos pa de'i tshe
NK087(shu)002:418: phyi dang nang du snang ba'i chos thams cad khyab
NK087(shu)002:419: pa'i snying rje nam mkha' mtshan nyid tsam du gnas
NK087(shu)002:420: par bzhugs so // par gyur to // zhes pa
NK087(shu)002:421: de de bzhin nyid las ni snying rje rkyen gyis
NK087(shu)002:422: ma g.yos yi ge'i gzugs su ni ma byung byung
NK087(shu)002:423: la khad pa tsam de'i skabs su glus bskul te
NK087(shu)002:424: par bzhugs so // par gyur to // / de'i
NK087(shu)002:425: phyir de nas yang yum kun tu bzang mos zhes
NK087(shu)002:426: pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:427: de bzhin nyid las bskul pa'i de ma thag pa
NK087(shu)002:428: de nas yang bskul ba'i dus la bab po zhes
NK087(shu)002:430: yum kun tu bzang mo stong pa nyid nam mkha' tsam du gnas pa'i ngang las /
NK087(shu)002:432: e ma'o ma ltar byams pa' snying rje chen po ni /
NK087(shu)002:433: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:434: e ma'o 'di'i don ni gang du bshad zin to //
NK087(shu)002:435: ma ltar byams pa'i snying rje chen po ni zhes
NK087(shu)002:436: pas khams gsum gyi sems can la bu gcig pa
NK087(shu)002:437: la ma byams pa bzhin du khyab pa'i snying rje
NK087(shu)002:438: chen po 'ga' la byams pa lta bu ma yin
NK087(shu)002:439: no // de ltar kun la khyab pa'i mtshan nyid
NK087(shu)002:440: de la ni nam mkha' ltar go yang 'byed cing
NK087(shu)002:441: kun la khyab pa zhes gsungs pa gsungs pa yin
NK087(shu)002:442: no // te / nam mkha'i rang bzhin las rig
NK087(shu)002:443: pa'i snying rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog kun
NK087(shu)002:444: tu bzang mo bdag la bstan du gsol /
NK087(shu)002:446: yum kun tu bzang mos bskul ba de ma thag
NK087(shu)002:447: pa de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi
NK087(shu)002:448: bdag pos yum gyi bskul ba la byon nas /
NK087(shu)002:449: khams gsum gyi sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:450: nam mkha'i ngang las yang dag pa'i rig pa'i cho
NK087(shu)002:451: 'phrul yi ge h'u gi rang bzhin du rnam par
NK087(shu)002:452: sprul te yi ge de yongs su gyur pa las
NK087(shu)002:453: nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas zhes gsungs pa yin te
NK087(shu)002:454: las bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bzhengs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:455: de la ni snying rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:456: sku de las ye shes dang ldan pa'i rtags su
NK087(shu)002:457: sku las 'od zer lnga rnam par 'khrigs pa'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:458: / dper na nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas nyi ma
NK087(shu)002:459: 'bum dus gcig tu shar ba'i gzi brjid lta bu'o
NK087(shu)002:461: bcom ldan de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:462: yum kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa bskul ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:463: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:464: de nas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK087(shu)002:465: sku bzhengs pa'i de ma thag pa de nas so
NK087(shu)002:466: // yum kun tu bzang mos smin ring bsgyur te /
NK087(shu)002:467: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab thams cad chos kyi dbyings las byung yum ste /
NK087(shu)002:468: des shin tu chags pa'i smin ring bsgyur te shin
NK087(shu)002:469: tu mdzes pa'i spyan gyi bcom ldan 'das la bltas
NK087(shu)002:470: nas yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa'i phyir rmad du
NK087(shu)002:471: byung ba'i gang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang glu
NK087(shu)002:472: ste gsang gsum gyi glu dang de ma bas te
NK087(shu)002:473: glu'i bye brag mang pos rnam par bskul ba'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:475: e ma'o yid bzhin sku mchog nyi ma lta bu las /
NK087(shu)002:477: e ma'o zhes pa'i ni yang dag pa'i chos dbyings
NK087(shu)002:478: kyi ngang las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'di lta
NK087(shu)002:479: bu byung ba ni ngo mtshar ro //
NK087(shu)002:480: zhes pa ni dam pa'i tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:481: sku de lta bu las mtshan dang dpe byad kyi brgyan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:482: yid bzhin sku mchog nyi ma lta bu las zhes pa gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:483: bcom ldan 'das de yang 'gro ba mtha' dag la
NK087(shu)002:484: sprul pa'i cho 'phrul ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du
NK087(shu)002:485: ston te ston pa'i dus na yang dbyings rnam par
NK087(shu)002:486: dag pa las ma g.yos te /
NK087(shu)002:487: de'i phyir rdo rje gang mdzad cing zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:488: de lta bu'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan
NK087(shu)002:489: pa shin tu brjid pa'i sku mchog rgyan thams cad
NK087(shu)002:490: yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs
NK087(shu)002:491: pa'i sku mchog kun tu bzang mo bdag la bstan
NK087(shu)002:492: du gsol / a la la ho zhes yang nas yang du rnam par bskul bas /
NK087(shu)002:493: bcom ldan 'das kyi yum kun tu bzang mos bskul bar thugs su chud do //
NK087(shu)002:494: rol pa'i sku zhal gsum pa lta bur snang ba /
NK087(shu)002:495: zhal gsum par snang ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
NK087(shu)002:497: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba gsum mang'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:498: zhal gsum po yang g.yas dkar ba /
NK087(shu)002:500: dbus mthing nag du bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:501: g.yas dkar ba ni nyon mongs pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:502: g.yon dmar ba thugs rje'i spyang thag gis 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dren pa'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:503: dbus mthing ba ni chos nyid la rnam par rtog pa gang gis kyang ma gos pa'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:504: phyag drug ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug mnga' ba'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:505: g.yas kyi dang po na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa snams pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:506: ye shes dgu las mnga' brnyes pa'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:507: de lta bu'i sku 'bar ba lta bu'i dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzigs par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:508: de ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
NK087(shu)002:509: da ni 'khor sdud pa'i ting nge ston te /
NK087(shu)002:510: de'i phyir de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag por des /
NK087(shu)002:511: rten can gyi 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir h'u zhes lte
NK087(shu)002:512: ba'i dkyil nas drangs te brjod pas gong ma'i 'khor
NK087(shu)002:513: gyi dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi sku la bsdu
NK087(shu)002:514: ba mdzad do // bsdu ba mdzad nas bde ba chen po'i gnas na bzhugs par gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:517: 'di nas mar yab kyi glengs bslang ba bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:518: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis skus sbyor ba'i yan lag
NK087(shu)002:519: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang gsang ba'i glu
NK087(shu)002:520: dang gar steng sgo'i gar dang lag pa'i gar dang
NK087(shu)002:522: steg pa ste gnas dgu ru sen mos brung pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:523: bstim pa ste chu bzhib pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:524: sbyor ba ste dbang po gnyis sbyor ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:525: 'khyud pa ste stod smad nas bsdoms pa'i tshul gyis
NK087(shu)002:526: yum kun tu bzang mo la mdzes pa'i tshul gyis
NK087(shu)002:527: smin ring bsgyur zhing chags pa'i spyan zin bag gi
NK087(shu)002:529: spyan har har lta bu'i ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:530: shin tu mdzes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NK087(shu)002:531: gnas nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:532: de'i dus su yum kun tu bzang mos chags par mkhyen nas gleng 'dir bslang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:533: e ma'o rol mo'i cho 'phrul 'bar ba'i sku mchog
NK087(shu)002:534: las zhes pa la sogs pas gleng bslang ste shin
NK087(shu)002:536: e ma'o rol mo'i cho 'phrul 'od zer gyis 'khrigs
NK087(shu)002:537: pa'i shin tu mdzes pa'i 'bar ba'i sku mchog las
NK087(shu)002:538: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin kun la khyab pa'i
NK087(shu)002:539: byin rlabs te / gang nas ji ltar gnas pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:540: sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi
NK087(shu)002:541: pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa
NK087(shu)002:542: dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:543: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil na /
NK087(shu)002:544: byang chub sems bzhugs pa de'i mtshan nyid la rdo
NK087(shu)002:545: rje zhes bya ste gnas nas bskyed par byed pa'i
NK087(shu)002:546: rkyen phyag rgya bzhi'i gar mdzad cing zhes so //
NK087(shu)002:547: byang chub sems de gshegs pa'i gnas pa bstan pa'i
NK087(shu)002:548: phyir gsang ba'i b+ha ga zhes bya ba la sogs
NK087(shu)002:549: pa gsungs te / gsang ba'i b+ha ga ni yum gyi pad+ma ste /
NK087(shu)002:550: thabs las khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:551: bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs gnas shin tu yangs pa'i mkha' dkyil du /
NK087(shu)002:552: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag re ba bskongs pa'i yang
NK087(shu)002:553: dag pa'i bdud rtsi char chen po bcom ldan 'das
NK087(shu)002:554: kyis bdag la dbab tu gsol lo a la la
NK087(shu)002:555: ho // zhes rnam par bskul lo zhes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:557: de nas yab kyi gleng bslang ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:558: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:563: a ho bde mchog 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings nyid ni /
NK087(shu)002:564: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:565: de'i don thugs su chud cing rig pa la mnga' ba'i phyir a ho zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:566: byang chub sems kyi sems de ni bde ba yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas bde mchog go //
NK087(shu)002:567: de'i gnas 'du 'bral med pa'i yum gyi pad+ma ste dbyings nyid do //
NK087(shu)002:568: de lta bu'i gnas shin tu mdzes pa'i phyir 'dzum
NK087(shu)002:569: pa ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas 'khril pa
NK087(shu)002:570: / nyon mongs pas ma gos pas pad+ma shin tu yangs pas b+ha ga ste /
NK087(shu)002:571: de lta bu'i gnas su chags pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:573: de lta bu ru gsang ba'i rdo rje bzhugs par
NK087(shu)002:574: bya ba'i dga' mchog rdo rje gsang ba'i byang chub
NK087(shu)002:575: sems zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:576: dga' mchog ces pa ni dga' ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK087(shu)002:579: rang bzhin gyis dga' ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:580: bral ba'i dga' ba dang bzhi'o /
NK087(shu)002:581: rdo rje ste gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor phyi pa la med pas na gsang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:582: byang chub kyi sems gshegs pa'i shul dang /
NK087(shu)002:583: dga' ba bzhi nyams su myong ba'i gnas pa yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:584: khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi
NK087(shu)002:585: dga' ba'i gnas yin pas na rdo rje zhes bya'o
NK087(shu)002:586: // bde ba chen po'i gnas nas dri ma med
NK087(shu)002:587: pa'i byang chub kyi sems de dga' ba bzhi dang
NK087(shu)002:588: ldan te rdo rje'i rtsa ba dang dbus dang rin
NK087(shu)002:589: po che yi gnas nas 'ong ba dang ni sos
NK087(shu)002:590: ka'i char bzhin du rdo rje'i rtse mo nas 'bab
NK087(shu)002:593: rgyun mi chad par yum gyi pad+ma la 'bab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:594: rgyun mi chad na 'o na ci rtag par chu
NK087(shu)002:595: bo chen po'i rgyun bzhin du 'ong ngam ci zhe
NK087(shu)002:596: brgal ba dang / 'on te de ltar ni ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:597: rtag pa 'bab pa zhig yin ni rlung la sogs
NK087(shu)002:598: pa'i rkyen gyis bya rgyu med de de bas na
NK087(shu)002:599: rtag tu 'bab pa ni ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:600: brgal ba 'o na gzhung nyid las kyang sos ka'i
NK087(shu)002:601: char bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab bo zhes
NK087(shu)002:602: zer na khyod kyi de ltar ma yin na ni
NK087(shu)002:604: 'on te de ltar ma yin te sos ka zhes
NK087(shu)002:605: smon pa ni sos ka'i dus kyang nyams dga' ba'i
NK087(shu)002:606: dus te / byang chub sems kyang 'bab pa'i dus
NK087(shu)002:607: na mi dga' ba lta bu ma yin te nyams
NK087(shu)002:608: dga' ba'i phyir mthun pa'i dpes so //
NK087(shu)002:610: char bzhin du zhes pa ni sos ka'i char pa yang rgya mtsho'i rlangs bas bskyod do //
NK087(shu)002:611: bskyod nas 'bab pa ma yin pa dus rtag tu 'bab pa ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:612: de bas na byang chub sems kyang rkyen rnam pa
NK087(shu)002:613: gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i dus su 'bab dus rtag tu
NK087(shu)002:615: brgal ba 'on te khyod kyis de ltar yin rgyun mi chad zer ba dang 'gal lo //
NK087(shu)002:616: mi 'gal te rgyun mi chad zer ba ni byang
NK087(shu)002:617: chub kyi sems de'i mtshan nyid ye nas ma bcos
NK087(shu)002:619: brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i dus gsum du rtag
NK087(shu)002:620: tu gnas pa yin pas de la dgongs nas gsungs
NK087(shu)002:623: de'i don la ngam pa'i phyir ho zhes thabs mchog yab kyis gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:624: de nas yang byang chub kyi sems de la yum gyis gleng bslang ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:625: de nas chags pa yum gyi byang chub sems kyi zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:626: de nas zhes pa ni gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:627: chags pa ste yum yab kyi rjes su chags pas na chags pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:628: yum gyi byang chub kyi sems thugs su chud nas /
NK087(shu)002:629: de'i don gyi thabs mchog yab yum gyi byang chub
NK087(shu)002:630: kyi sems la bskul ba'i cho 'phrul sgra 'og nas
NK087(shu)002:632: a ho chags pa chen po yum gyi byang chub
NK087(shu)002:633: kyi sems zhes pa la a ho zhes pa ni
NK087(shu)002:634: a nyid chos nyid ye nas skye ba med pa
NK087(shu)002:635: de la ho ste chags pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:636: nyon mongs pa'i dbang la chags pa ma yin pa'i phyir chen po'o //
NK087(shu)002:637: phyi dang nang du snang ba'i chos dbang du bsdus pas dbang /
NK087(shu)002:638: gnyis med pa'i ye shes su 'gyur bas byang chub
NK087(shu)002:639: kyi sems de lta bu'i byang chub sems de las
NK087(shu)002:640: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang de
NK087(shu)002:641: las bskyed cing kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i
NK087(shu)002:643: yum gyi sems de la 'khor ba'i skyon gang gis kyang ma gos pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:644: dri med skyon bral zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:645: byang chub kyi sems kyi rten gnas de'i dbyibs pad+mara gnas pa'i phyir pad+ma /
NK087(shu)002:646: pad+ma de'i ze'u 'bru nas byang chub sems 'od zer gyi tshul du byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:647: de'i gnas su thabs mchog yab kyi byang chub kyi
NK087(shu)002:648: sems mu tig dkar po dri ma me da pa
NK087(shu)002:649: nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:650: bsil ba'i 'od zer bdag gis pad+ma'i 'od zer 'brul spro ru gsol to //
NK087(shu)002:651: zhes mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas gleng bslang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:652: yab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid la gleng bslang ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:653: yang thabs mchog yab kyi zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:656: a ho gsal zhing dag pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:657: byang chub kyi sems de rang bzhin gyis gsal bas na /
NK087(shu)002:658: gsal zhing rnam par rtog pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas dag pa /
NK087(shu)002:659: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi kha dog dkar
NK087(shu)002:660: por yod pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ni skyon
NK087(shu)002:661: gyis ma gos pa ye nas rnam par dag pa'i
NK087(shu)002:662: byang chub kyi sems de ni dus gsum gyi rgyal
NK087(shu)002:663: ba rnams kyi ji ltar gnas pa thugs su chud
NK087(shu)002:664: de / de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems de ni bsil ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:665: 'od zer gyi tshul du yum gyi pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i gnas byang chub kyi sems spro bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:666: ho zhes rnam par bskul lo //
NK087(shu)002:667: de ltar yab yum gnyis kyis gleng bslang nas byang
NK087(shu)002:668: chub kyi sems gnas su drangs nas spro ba dang
NK087(shu)002:669: bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:670: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:671: 'di skad brjod do zhes pa ni go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:672: e ma'o bde mchog bde ba'i zhes pa ni byang
NK087(shu)002:673: chub kyi sems gnas nas grangs nas bde ba rnyed
NK087(shu)002:674: pa de ni bde ba kun gyi mchog yin te
NK087(shu)002:675: / de rdo rje las bar yum gyi pad+mara spro /
NK087(shu)002:676: yum gyi ba spu'i bu ga nas phar byang chub
NK087(shu)002:677: kyi sems rab tu spros pas khams gsum gyi sems
NK087(shu)002:678: can thams cad kyi lus la phog pas nyon mongs
NK087(shu)002:679: pa thams cad dag par byas pa la ni 'gro
NK087(shu)002:680: ba kun gyi rgyud spyangs te zhes dus de nyid
NK087(shu)002:681: kyi skabs su dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kun thugs
NK087(shu)002:682: la phog pas byang chub kyi sems mchod pa phul
NK087(shu)002:683: / slar sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer bskul zhing slar
NK087(shu)002:684: yum gyi dbyings su 'dus shing thim pa las byang
NK087(shu)002:685: chub kyi sems thig le'i gzugs su yum gyi pad+ma
NK087(shu)002:687: des de nyid du thig le'i 'od kyis kun la
NK087(shu)002:688: khyab pas de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyis kun
NK087(shu)002:689: la khyab ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:690: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer des 'gro ba rnams sbyangs pa rnams de'i tshe /
NK087(shu)002:691: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK087(shu)002:692: cad byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig du gnas so
NK087(shu)002:693: // de ltar rten can gyi rgyu sgrub nas thog ma nyid du bsnyen bsgrub bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:694: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des /
NK087(shu)002:695: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:696: de nas zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
NK087(shu)002:697: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa de ma
NK087(shu)002:698: thag pa de nas rten gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de
NK087(shu)002:699: / bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhugs
NK087(shu)002:700: pa'i sku las 'od zer las yi ge a 'phros
NK087(shu)002:701: / pa las / a de yongs su gyur pa las chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgyar gsal te /
NK087(shu)002:702: yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'i rang bzhin gru gsum pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:703: steng nas steng du yongs su rgyas pa'i 'phral gting zab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:704: de'i nang du rig pa'i byin rlabs las yi ge yam sngon po 'phros pa las /
NK087(shu)002:705: yam de yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil
NK087(shu)002:706: 'khor sngon po dbyibs sbyangs kyi zhal lta bu phyogs
NK087(shu)002:707: bzhi na ba dan bzhis mtshan pa cis kyang mi
NK087(shu)002:708: shig pa'o // de'i steng du gong ma ji lta ba bzhin du ram dmar ser 'phros pa las /
NK087(shu)002:709: ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:710: de'i steng du chu'i dkyil 'khor dbyibs zlum po /
NK087(shu)002:712: de'i steng du su ser po las gser gyi sa gazhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:713: de'i steng du lam las rin po che sna lnga
NK087(shu)002:714: las grub pa'i ri rab zur brgyad pa zhig bskyed
NK087(shu)002:715: de / 'byung ba bzhi ni yum sangs spyan ma
NK087(shu)002:716: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de de'i phyir btsun mo'i
NK087(shu)002:718: de las rten gyi rang bzhin grub pa bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:719: dam tshig chen po'i pho brang gru bzhi par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:720: nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo zhes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:721: gang byung zhe na yi ge 'bru 'di ri rab
NK087(shu)002:722: kyi steng du ri rab las phyung te bzhag pa
NK087(shu)002:723: las de yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo /
NK087(shu)002:724: 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:725: rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:726: de las 'od zer 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:727: gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin kun bsdus nas slar
NK087(shu)002:728: nyid kyi sku la bzhugs pas sku nyid kyang 'od
NK087(shu)002:729: du zhu / rlung dang mes gzhu ste 'od kyi gong bu gcig tu gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:730: de las gzhal yas khang dpag cing gzhal ba las
NK087(shu)002:731: 'das pa sangs rgyas dang sems can mnyam pa'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:732: zur bzhir byung ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'og
NK087(shu)002:734: ka ba brgyad kyis bteg pa la sogs pa'i pho
NK087(shu)002:735: brang de nyid nang nas seng ge la sogs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:736: yon tan dang ldan pa'i sems can lnga'i khri stengs
NK087(shu)002:737: nas / nyi ma zla ba de'i steng na pad+ma de'i steng na rin po che /
NK087(shu)002:738: rang byung du grub pa'i gzhal yas khang /
NK087(shu)002:739: de la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:740: e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:741: sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:742: zhes pa'i bar gyi ston te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:743: de nas gzhal yas bskyed pa'i de ma thag pa
NK087(shu)002:744: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems
NK087(shu)002:746: sti ta badz+ra a zhes brjod de /
NK087(shu)002:747: dkyil 'khor chen po dbus kyi gdan stengs su bzhugs par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:748: de ltar yum kun tu bzang mo yang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis gnyis su med par bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:749: de nas yang 'khor bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan te de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:750: de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:751: thog ma byang chub kyi sems ji skad brjod pa'i de ma thag pa'i de nas 'khor bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:752: yum gyi mkha' la byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i ngo bor de gnas pa de las /
NK087(shu)002:753: phyogs dang mtshams su yi ge'i ngo bor gyur te dbus su mtha' gnyis ze'u 'bru la'o //
NK087(shu)002:758: brag po dang thung ngu gnyis te /
NK087(shu)002:760: shar phyogs su ka /lho phyogs su kha /
NK087(shu)002:763: de ni phyogs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi sa bon no //
NK087(shu)002:766: nub byang mtshams su ba thung ngu /
NK087(shu)002:767: byang shar mtshams su ba ring po ste 'di dag ni mtshams kyi sems dpa'i sa bon no //
NK087(shu)002:770: nub phyogs su dza thung ngu /
NK087(shu)002:771: byang phyogs su dza ring po ste /
NK087(shu)002:772: de la sogs pa phyogs kyi sems ma yum gyi sa bon no //
NK087(shu)002:776: byang shar mtshams su sha /steng du sel ba'i sa bon te mtshams kyi sems dpa'i yum rnams so //
NK087(shu)002:780: byang phyogs su sa ste sgo bzhi'i sa bon no //
NK087(shu)002:781: de ltar yi ge'i dngos po rnams yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:783: rin po che dang pad+ma dang /
NK087(shu)002:784: ral gri la sogs pa so so'i phyag mtshan du gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:785: phyag mtshan de yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:786: chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan du gyur te gtso
NK087(shu)002:787: bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:788: las gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod do //
NK087(shu)002:789: h'u badz+ra d+h+rig de brjod ma thag tu de bzhin
NK087(shu)002:790: gshegs pa thams cad zhe sdang chen po'i skur rjes
NK087(shu)002:791: su dran to // skur gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:792: zhes bshad pa cho ga gsum gyis don 'di nas mar bstan te de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:793: sngags kyi yi ge 'phro 'dus pa las zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:794: sngags kyi yi ge zhes pa ni tha'o //
NK087(shu)002:795: de 'phral 'dus pa'i yig 'bru las cho 'phrul gyi
NK087(shu)002:796: sgra 'og nas 'byung ba 'di skad ces bsgrags so
NK087(shu)002:797: / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
NK087(shu)002:798: rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yi ge'i gzugs su
NK087(shu)002:800: e ma'o zhes pa nas bsgrags so zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:801: rigs ni zhe sdang gi sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung ngo //
NK087(shu)002:802: de nas thugs kyi cho ga bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:803: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi ngo bo rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:804: de'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir de nas snying po
NK087(shu)002:805: yi ge de zhes pa nas thugs ni bstan pa'o
NK087(shu)002:806: // zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:807: de nas yi ge rdo rje'i bum pa'i nang na yod pa las /
NK087(shu)002:808: rdo rjer 'phros skur 'dus pa las 'od kyi gong
NK087(shu)002:809: bur gyur te de'i skabs su gang du gsungs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:810: sngags h'u badz+ra d+h+rig brjod pas sku yongs su rdzogs
NK087(shu)002:811: te / 'jig rten gyi khams su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas /
NK087(shu)002:812: 'thon te spros pas sems can zhe sdang can gyi rgyud sbyang nas slar 'dus pa las /
NK087(shu)002:813: a zhes brjod pas gtso bo nyid la thim par gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:814: de'i phyir de nas thugs de nyid ces pa nas bdag po sku gsung thugs nyid la bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:815: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:816: phung po lnga las rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:817: 'di ji ltar rgyas par bstan pa bzhin 'og ma rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:818: de nas dang po'i byang chub sems las byung ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:819: de nas gnyis su med pa'i zhes pa nas snyoms par bzhugs nas zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:820: sku yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rkyen gyis bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:821: nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhes pa nas gti mug chen po'i sku rjes su dran te /
NK087(shu)002:822: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:823: gti mug chen po'i gsung gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:824: gsung yig 'bru las zhes pa nas gsung dri ma med ces pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:825: yi ge de yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:826: thugs phyag mtshan 'khor lor gyur pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:827: snying po'i yi ge zhes pa nas zur brgyad pa lta bu zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:828: gtso bo'i yon tan gyi sgo nas ji ltar 'byung ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:829: de'i tshe 'khor zhes pa nas sku'i thugs ni bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:830: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:831: de nas 'khor lo de yongs su gyur pa las
NK087(shu)002:832: sngags gong ma brjod pa las snang mdzad chen mo'i
NK087(shu)002:833: sku mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
NK087(shu)002:834: g.yas na 'khor lo g.yon na dril bu bsnams te
NK087(shu)002:835: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'thon te 'phro ba dang
NK087(shu)002:836: 'dus pas gong ma bzhin du byas te /
NK087(shu)002:837: a zhes brjod pas shar phyogs su bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:838: sku lnga las ni phung po rnam par dag pa'i sku ste /
NK087(shu)002:839: byang chub kyi sems des phyi dang nang du snang
NK087(shu)002:840: ba thams cad la snang bar mdzad pas na rnam
NK087(shu)002:842: gtso bo'i byang chub kyi sems de las dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du bskong ba de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:843: de nas yang gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen
NK087(shu)002:844: pos rin po che dpal zhes pa na yon tan
NK087(shu)002:846: g.yas phyogs su bzhugs su zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:847: sku mdog ni sngo bas des phyag g.yas ni rin po che g.yon na dril bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:848: phung po lnga las tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:849: de nas yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid
NK087(shu)002:850: kyis phyi dang nang du snang ba las mtha' yas
NK087(shu)002:851: par khyab pas snang ba mtha' yas te de bstan
NK087(shu)002:852: pa'i phyir / gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba nas /
NK087(shu)002:853: e zhes pa brjod cing rgyab phyogs su bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:854: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:855: de yang sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas na pad+ma g.yon na dril bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:856: phung po lnga las ni 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:857: de nas yang byang chub kyi sems de'i ngang du
NK087(shu)002:858: phyi dang nang du snang ba thams cad 'dus shing
NK087(shu)002:859: ye nas rnam par dag par byas te /
NK087(shu)002:862: zhes bya ba med de thams cad kyi don gcig gi ngang du bsgrubs te /
NK087(shu)002:863: bstan pa'i phyir rdo rje 'phro ba zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:864: nas las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o zhes pa dang
NK087(shu)002:865: / g.yon phyogs su bzhugs so zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:866: sku mdog ni ljang gu phyag g.yas na ral gri g.yon na dril bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:867: phung po lnga las ni 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:868: de nas byang chub kyi sems de ni gang gi ngo bor yang ma grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:869: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas nam mkha'
NK087(shu)002:870: lta bu'o zhes pa dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku
NK087(shu)002:872: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te sku mdog yab dang
NK087(shu)002:873: mthun phyag g.yas gtso bo la 'khyud g.yon bgrang phreng
NK087(shu)002:874: ngo // 'byung ba lnga las ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:875: de nas byang chub kyi sems de nas dus gsum
NK087(shu)002:876: du rnam par rtog pa gang gis kyang bskyod pa
NK087(shu)002:877: ma yin zhing bstan par bstan pa'i phyir bstan pa
NK087(shu)002:878: zhes pa nas snang mdzad sems dpa'i sku la 'khril
NK087(shu)002:880: zhes pas bstan te sku mdog gtso bo dang mthun /
NK087(shu)002:881: g.yas dril bu g.yon phreng ba kun la shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:882: 'byung ba las ni sa'i rang bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:883: byang chub kyi sems de'i ngang du phyi dang nang
NK087(shu)002:884: du snang ba thams cad sdud pas na de'i mtshan
NK087(shu)002:885: nyid bstan pa'i phyir sdud ma rdo rje zhes pa
NK087(shu)002:886: nas / rin chen sems ma'i sku la zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:887: 'byung ba las chu yis rang bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:888: de nas yang byang chub kyi sems des nyon mongs
NK087(shu)002:889: pa sreg cing yang dag pa'i dbyings su smin pa'i
NK087(shu)002:891: 'bar ba'i zhes pa nas chos kyi sems pa'i sku la zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:892: 'byung ba lnga las me'i rang bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:893: de nas yang byang chub kyi sems 'di'i ngang du
NK087(shu)002:894: phyi dang nang du snang ba thams cad la thugs
NK087(shu)002:895: rjes g.yos shing bsdud pas na /
NK087(shu)002:896: de bstan pa'i phyir g.yo ba rdo rje zhes bya
NK087(shu)002:897: ba nas las kyi sems dpa'i sku la zhes pa'i
NK087(shu)002:899: de ltar 'byung ba rlung gi rang bzhin te de
NK087(shu)002:900: ltar 'byung ba lnga dang rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid ji
NK087(shu)002:902: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub bo //
NK087(shu)002:903: de nas byang chub kyi sems de nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du gnas pas na nam mkha'i snying po'o //
NK087(shu)002:904: byang chub kyi sems de mtha' gnyis su mi ldang
NK087(shu)002:905: zhing yang dag par ma bstan pas na sa'i snying
NK087(shu)002:906: po'o // byang chub kyi sems las sgra'i tshul du
NK087(shu)002:907: sku nyid byung nas sems can gyi don mdzad pas
NK087(shu)002:908: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
NK087(shu)002:909: byang chub kyi sems de'i ngang las bzang ngan med pas na kun tu bzang po'o //
NK087(shu)002:910: byang chub kyi sems des kun la khyab pas byams pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:911: byang chub kyi sems de'i ngang las nyon mongs pa med pas na sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:912: byang chub kyi sems de'i ngang du sdud pas na
NK087(shu)002:913: 'jam dpal dus rtag tu de dang mi 'bral bas
NK087(shu)002:915: byang chub kyi sems de dbyings rnam par dag pas na la se /
NK087(shu)002:916: de'i ngang las 'gag pa med par 'byung bas ma le'o //
NK087(shu)002:917: de'i ngang las ji lta ba'i sgo nas chos bstan pa'i gi ti'o //
NK087(shu)002:918: byang chub kyi sems de mnyes shing mnyes pa du pe /
NK087(shu)002:919: chos kyi dbyings su spros pas push+pe /
NK087(shu)002:920: dbyings gsal bar gyur pas mar me ma shin tu mnyes pas gan+de ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:921: byang chub sems kyi rkyen chos kyi dbyings pas lcag kyu ma /
NK087(shu)002:922: stod smad nas 'khyud pas zhags pa ma /
NK087(shu)002:923: rdo rje dang pad+mara yang dag par ldan pas lcags sgrog ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:924: shin tu dgyes pa'i rol stabs pas dril bu ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:925: byang chub kyi sems des 'khor ba'i skyon dag pas
NK087(shu)002:926: ya m+aan+ta krid de la 'chi ba med de 'chi
NK087(shu)002:927: bdag gi bdud bcom pas big+h+nan+ta krid byang chub kyi
NK087(shu)002:928: sems de'i ngang du gnyis su mi phyed cing lha'i
NK087(shu)002:929: bu'i bdud bcom pas pad+man+ta krid de'i ngang las nyon
NK087(shu)002:930: mongs pa rdul tsam yang mi mnga' bas pradz+ny+aan+ta krid
NK087(shu)002:931: do // de'i phyir gzhan yang sems pa dang zhes pa la sogs gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:932: gzhan yang rigs lnga yab yum las gzhan pa sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:933: de'i phyir sems dpa' ste sa'i snying po la sogs pa brgyad dang /
NK087(shu)002:934: sems ma ste la sogs pa brgyad do //
NK087(shu)002:935: khro bo dang zhes pa ni ya m+aan ta krid la sogs pa ste bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:936: khro bo sgo skyong 'dra ste lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:937: sprul sku la sogs pa ni byang chub sems las sprul pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:938: thub pa chen po drug ste de rnams bskyed pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:939: sa bon dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni sgyu
NK087(shu)002:940: 'phrul gyi rgyud las ji ltar grags pa bzhin gyi
NK087(shu)002:941: rim pa ji lta bar ro //
NK087(shu)002:942: de ltar dkyil 'khor du bkod pa de rnams kyang gang las 'byung zhe na de bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:943: gnyis med bdag po byin rlabs las zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:944: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byin gyis rlabs las byung ngo //
NK087(shu)002:945: 'og gnas dang lha dang 'di ltar gnas pas rang
NK087(shu)002:946: bzo min nam zhe na min te ji skad du
NK087(shu)002:947: / gnas dag tu ni dkyil 'khor dang //
NK087(shu)002:948: 'gro rnams dgod par ji lta bar //
NK087(shu)002:949: de ltar ston pa mchog gis mdzad ces so //
NK087(shu)002:950: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:951: de bzhin nyid kyi gnas su gshegs shing gshegs pas na /
NK087(shu)002:953: de ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku gsang ba gsung gsang ba thugs gsang ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:954: de'i ngang du thams cad gnas shing bsdud pas na dur khrod /
NK087(shu)002:955: shin tu dkon pas na khu byug /de'i ngang la rol pas na rol pa /
NK087(shu)002:956: de ston pa nyid kyi zhal nas gsung pas na mdo sde ste /
NK087(shu)002:957: de las ting nge 'dzin ni don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:958: kun rdzob rim par bkod pa'i don de /
NK087(shu)002:960: kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis ji ltar yin par shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:961: le'u zhes pa ji ltar gos kyi snal ma mang po bsdoms nas gcig tu byas te /
NK087(shu)002:962: gon na sbrang bu dang sdig pa la sogs te
NK087(shu)002:963: 'tshe ba'i rnam pa dang rlung dang grang ba la
NK087(shu)002:964: sogs pa ste / gnod pa thams cad bzlog pa de bzhin du /
NK087(shu)002:965: rgyud kyi don 'dis nyon mongs pa lnga dang 'khor ba'i skye gnas dang /
NK087(shu)002:966: phyin ci log gi 'tshe ba las yang dag pa'i
NK087(shu)002:967: dbyings su bzlog pas na gos 'dra ba'i phyir le'u'o
NK087(shu)002:968: // rgyud kyi don 'di len cing 'dzin pas ston pa'i gzhung gi tshig la'ang le'u zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:969: bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa las bden pa gnyis bshad pa'i le'u ste /
NK087(shu)002:971: de ltar le'u dang por thams cad bskyed nas /
NK087(shu)002:972: mthar phyin pa'i don gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:973: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u gnyis gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:977: bcom ldan 'das sku gsang ba gsung gsang ba thugs
NK087(shu)002:978: gsang ba kun gyi mchog dam pa'i bdag po la
NK087(shu)002:979: mchod pa dang phyag btsal nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i
NK087(shu)002:981: byang chub kyi sems don 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'di
NK087(shu)002:982: skad ces sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom
NK087(shu)002:983: ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab bo //
NK087(shu)002:984: bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:985: e ma'o bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:986: e ma'o zhes pas bstod pa las sdud pa po ngo mtshar ba'i tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:987: bder gshegs kyi don ni gong du bshad zin to //
NK087(shu)002:988: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa thams
NK087(shu)002:989: cad bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das te ston pa
NK087(shu)002:991: gsang mchog dgyes pa che zhes bya ba ni byang
NK087(shu)002:992: chub kyi sems kyi ngo bor gyur pa la dgyes
NK087(shu)002:994: rnam par dag pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni bde
NK087(shu)002:995: ba chen po'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i bdag nyid
NK087(shu)002:996: du gyur pas lam zhes brjod do //
NK087(shu)002:997: ngo mtshar 'byung ba khyod la 'dud ces bya ba
NK087(shu)002:998: ni byang chub sems nor bu'i nang du gnas pa'i
NK087(shu)002:999: skabs na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba'i
NK087(shu)002:1000: bdag por gyur pa ngo mtshar ro khyod la bdag
NK087(shu)002:1001: 'dud pas so 'khor rnams kyi don du lus ngag
NK087(shu)002:1003: btud nas ci byed ce na rten dang brten can
NK087(shu)002:1004: du snang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi don dang
NK087(shu)002:1005: / don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub
NK087(shu)002:1006: kyi sems ni don zhu ba de'i phyir dkyil 'khor
NK087(shu)002:1007: / rnams kyi don / byang chub sems kyi mtshan
NK087(shu)002:1008: nyid de sdud pa po dag dang 'khor rnams la
NK087(shu)002:1009: / rnams kyi don / bshad du gsol / zhes 'khor gyis gleng bslang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1010: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK087(shu)002:1011: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1012: de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:1013: yid kun tu bzang po la ston pas bka' stsal
NK087(shu)002:1014: pa / sems dpa' chen po zhes bos nas ngas
NK087(shu)002:1015: khyod la bshad kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo
NK087(shu)002:1016: nas nyon cig ces bka' stsal to //
NK087(shu)002:1017: sdud pa po yid kun tu bzang po khyod kyis
NK087(shu)002:1018: spobs pa bskyed nas 'khor gyi don du zhu ba
NK087(shu)002:1019: legs so legs par zhugs so zhes lan byin te
NK087(shu)002:1020: / dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi don kho na nyid dang /
NK087(shu)002:1021: byang chub sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK087(shu)002:1022: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
NK087(shu)002:1023: da ltar gyi rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
NK087(shu)002:1024: phyi ma 'byung ba'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi
NK087(shu)002:1025: don 'di la ma gsung pa gsung par 'gyur ba
NK087(shu)002:1026: yin te / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:1027: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK087(shu)002:1028: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid ni brjod du yang med la /
NK087(shu)002:1029: snod du gyur pa yang dkon pa'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:1030: sems dpa' chen po de bas na khyod nyid la dris shig ces ston pas bka' stsal te /
NK087(shu)002:1031: cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1032: zhes pa ni de kho na nyid dang sems kyi mtshan nyid ni brjod pa las 'das shing /
NK087(shu)002:1033: gang gi ngo bor ma grub pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1035: de ltar ma gsung pa'i don gyis 'khor rigs lnga dang de ma bas te /
NK087(shu)002:1036: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdud pa po
NK087(shu)002:1037: rdo rje chos la zhus shig par bskul ba bstan
NK087(shu)002:1038: pa'i phyir / de nas mi bskyod pa zhes pa
NK087(shu)002:1039: nas bka' gsal ba las zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan
NK087(shu)002:1040: pa'i phyir / to // de nas sdud pa po
NK087(shu)002:1041: rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos rigs lnga'i sangs
NK087(shu)002:1042: pa'i phyir / to // rgyas dang / byang chub
NK087(shu)002:1043: sems dpa' rnams kyis bskul bar thugs su chud nas
NK087(shu)002:1045: mang po rnams byang chub sems kyi snod du rung
NK087(shu)002:1046: bar byin gyis brlabs nas ston pa kun tu bzang
NK087(shu)002:1047: po'i zhal du bltas nas gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:1048: zhal du bltas nas gnas pa yang ston pa yang ston pas kyang thugs su chud de /
NK087(shu)002:1050: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1051: bka' stsal to zhes par 'brel to //
NK087(shu)002:1052: zhus pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1053: rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po la sogs pa
NK087(shu)002:1054: 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig ces gnad nas
NK087(shu)002:1055: bskul te ston pas gleng bslang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:1056: de nas ston pas 'di skad gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1057: zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1058: byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1059: byang chub kyi sems de'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:1060: 'di lta ste brjod dang smra bsam yum las 'das zhes bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1061: byang chub kyi sems gnas nas bskyod de nor bu'i
NK087(shu)002:1062: nang du gnas tsam na khu ba dang lhan cig
NK087(shu)002:1063: tu skye ba'i dga' ba 'byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:1064: de la yun ring du gnas pa'i dus na phyi
NK087(shu)002:1065: dang nang du snang ba 'di nyid rang bzhin gyis
NK087(shu)002:1066: stong pa'i mtshan nyid du mthong ste /
NK087(shu)002:1067: stong pa'i mtshan nyid de la ni brjod dang smra bsam yul las 'das zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1068: dus de nyid du byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid 'di yin /
NK087(shu)002:1069: 'di lta bu zhig yod do zhes bya rten dang brten pa med de /
NK087(shu)002:1071: de lta bu'i skabs su don dam pa zhes pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1072: kun rdzob ces bya ba'i tha snyad thams cad dang bral bas /
NK087(shu)002:1073: don dam kun rdzob tha mi dad ces gsung pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1074: rang lus ngag yid rdo rje ste zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1075: rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid gsum yang rang
NK087(shu)002:1076: bzhin gyi ye nas rnam par dag ste chos kyi
NK087(shu)002:1077: dbyings su gyur pas rdo rje zhes gsungs pa yin
NK087(shu)002:1078: no // gcig gis gnyis kyi las byed pa zhes
NK087(shu)002:1079: bya ba ni gcig ces te byang chub sems kyi
NK087(shu)002:1080: no // ngo bo'o // las byed pas zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1081: rten dang brten can gnyis kyis las byed cing bskyed
NK087(shu)002:1082: de lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba thams cad ni
NK087(shu)002:1083: don yod par ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1084: ji skad du sgyu 'phrul lam chen mo'i nang nas
NK087(shu)002:1085: kyang e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni
NK087(shu)002:1086: / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK087(shu)002:1087: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK087(shu)002:1088: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de //
NK087(shu)002:1089: sa chu spyan dang ma ma ki //
NK087(shu)002:1090: me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste //
NK087(shu)002:1091: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
NK087(shu)002:1092: srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag /
NK087(shu)002:1095: lus dang ngag yid ma grub par gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1096: de ltar lha'i gzugs su lus ngag yid gsum gnas kyang don dam par ma grub ste /
NK087(shu)002:1097: chos kyi dbyings su rtog pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu
NK087(shu)002:1098: gang su yod rung ba de'i don dam par byang
NK087(shu)002:1099: chub kyi sems bskyed pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das
NK087(shu)002:1100: kyis gsungs so // de ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1101: de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor rnams kyis kyang thugs su chud de /
NK087(shu)002:1102: rang rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la sems nas cad mi smra bar 'khod do //
NK087(shu)002:1103: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sdud pa po la
NK087(shu)002:1104: sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis rtog tshad dbul ba'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:1105: / de nas yid kun tu bzang po la sogs pa'i rtogs tshad 'bul te /
NK087(shu)002:1106: sngon la sdud pa pos rtogs tshad phul ba //
NK087(shu)002:1107: e ma'o bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das //
NK087(shu)002:1108: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
NK087(shu)002:1109: rtogs par dka' ba'i snying po 'di //
NK087(shu)002:1110: rab tu mi rtog gnas med do //
NK087(shu)002:1113: sdud pa pos yid kun tu bzang por de byang
NK087(shu)002:1114: chub kyi sems thugs su chud de dam pa'i tshig
NK087(shu)002:1116: zhes bya ba ni bos pa'i tshig ste /
NK087(shu)002:1117: gnyis su med pa'i gnas ni bde ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1118: de ru gshegs pa'i ngang la bzhugs pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1119: kye bcom ldan 'das zhes bos pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1120: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1121: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtha' las 'das pa ni
NK087(shu)002:1122: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub kyi sems yin te
NK087(shu)002:1123: de rab tu rtags dka' ba brjod pa thams cad
NK087(shu)002:1124: dang bral ba de la ni /
NK087(shu)002:1125: rtag par dka' ba'i snying po 'di zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1126: mtha' rnam pa gnyis dang bral te mi rtog pa'i
NK087(shu)002:1127: ye shes de la rnam par rtog pa gang gis
NK087(shu)002:1128: kyang bskyod pa ma yin pa ste rtogs par dka'
NK087(shu)002:1129: bas / rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1131: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la sems nas 'dug go //
NK087(shu)002:1132: de nas 'khor rigs lnga'i rtogs tshad phul ba ston te /
NK087(shu)002:1133: sngon la mi bskyod pa rtogs tshad phul ba /
NK087(shu)002:1134: e ma'o gzung 'dzin rnams spangs pa //
NK087(shu)002:1135: tshig dang yi ge'i spyod yul min //
NK087(shu)002:1136: chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid //
NK087(shu)002:1137: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1139: gzung 'dzin rnams spangs pa zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1140: phyi gzung bar bya ba'i yul ni nang 'dzin par
NK087(shu)002:1141: byed pa'i sems nyid snang ba las ma gtogs pa
NK087(shu)002:1142: yul logs shig na grub pa med do //
NK087(shu)002:1143: 'o na nang 'dzin par byed pa'i sems nyid yod dam zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:1144: med de nang 'dzin pa'i sems nyid kyang skad cig mas gshig par rang bzhin med do //
NK087(shu)002:1145: 'o na skad cig ma'i chos gzhigs pa ni snga
NK087(shu)002:1146: ma ni 'gags phyi ma ni ma byung da ltar
NK087(shu)002:1147: ni mi gnas pas stong pa'i rang bzhin du grub
NK087(shu)002:1148: ste / stong pa ni stong pa'i sems zhugs nas rtag pa'i skyon yin na /
NK087(shu)002:1149: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ji ltar spang du btub mi btub bo //
NK087(shu)002:1150: lan du de ltar ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1151: gzung bar bya ba dang 'dzin par byed pa gnyis ka ma grub ste /
NK087(shu)002:1152: stong zhing bdag med par grub la stong zhing bdag
NK087(shu)002:1153: med pa zhes bya ba de la yang gnas pa
NK087(shu)002:1154: ma yin te / shes pa dang brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1155: gzung 'dzin rnams spangs zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:1156: rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1157: zhes mi bskyod pas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1158: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyis rtogs tshad phul ba'i 'di skad du gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1159: e ma'o chos kun stong pa'i bdag /rang gi ngo bo brjod du med //
NK087(shu)002:1160: brjod med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i //
NK087(shu)002:1161: chos rnams kun la khyab par gnas //
NK087(shu)002:1163: chos kun stong pa'i bdag ces bya ba ni phyi nang du snang ba'i chos thams cad ni /
NK087(shu)002:1164: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
NK087(shu)002:1170: zhes pa la sogs pas rgyal ba yum chen mo las rgya cher gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1172: chos kun stong pa'i bdag ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1173: rang gi ngo bo ma skyes pa de la ni /
NK087(shu)002:1174: so so'i ngo bo 'di lta bu yin bya ba
NK087(shu)002:1175: brjod du med rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba de'i
NK087(shu)002:1176: phyir / rang gi ngo bo brjod du med ces gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1177: 'o na rang gi ngo bo ma skyes pa de
NK087(shu)002:1178: la 'di ltar snang ba la ma khyab bam zhe
NK087(shu)002:1179: na / khyab ste ma skyes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1180: stong pa gting chad pa ni ma yin te gang la yang 'gag pa med par rang 'byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:1181: 'byung ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang mar me dang 'od kyi tshul du khyab nas gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:1183: brjod med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i //
NK087(shu)002:1184: chos rnams kun la khyab par gnas //
NK087(shu)002:1185: zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1186: de nas yang rin chen sems pas rtogs tshad phul ba 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1187: e ma'o ngo bo mnyam nyid byang chub sems //
NK087(shu)002:1188: ming du btags pa'i chos rnams kun //
NK087(shu)002:1189: mnyam pa nyid la gnas bcas phyir //
NK087(shu)002:1190: mnyam pa nyid las gzhan med do //
NK087(shu)002:1192: mnyam nyid byang chub sems zhes pa ni 'di ltar
NK087(shu)002:1193: snang ba thams cad ye phyi mo nyid nas ma
NK087(shu)002:1194: skyes pa chos kyi dbyings yin la /
NK087(shu)002:1195: de'i ngang la ni sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de /
NK087(shu)002:1196: de'i ngang la dus rtag tu gnas bcas shing gnas pa na /
NK087(shu)002:1197: mnyam pa nyid las gzhan med do //
NK087(shu)002:1198: zhes rin chen sems pas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1199: de nas yang chos kyi sems pas rtogs tshad phul ba 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1200: chos su snang ba thams cad kun //
NK087(shu)002:1201: rang gi ngo bos brjod du med //
NK087(shu)002:1202: de nyid byang chub sems su ni //
NK087(shu)002:1203: mkhas pas bsgoms na rtogs par 'gyur /
NK087(shu)002:1204: zhes pa la chos su snang ba thams cad kun
NK087(shu)002:1205: zhes pa ni phyi 'byung ba lnga las grub pa
NK087(shu)002:1206: bstan pa'i rang bzhin can gyi chos dang /
NK087(shu)002:1207: nang phung po lnga las grub pa'i g.yo bar snang ba thams cad kun /
NK087(shu)002:1208: ye nas ma skyes pa yin te brjod pa las 'das pa de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1209: rang gi ngo bo brjod du med ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1210: spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral ba ni byang chub kyi sems te /
NK087(shu)002:1211: de las byang chub kyi sems yin zhes brjod pas 'bras bu mi thob ste /
NK087(shu)002:1212: de'i ngang du yang nas yang du mkhas pas nyams
NK087(shu)002:1213: su blangs nas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes gdod
NK087(shu)002:1215: de nyid byang chub sems su ni //
NK087(shu)002:1216: mkhas pas bsgoms na rtogs par 'gyur //
NK087(shu)002:1217: zhes chos kyi sems pas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1218: de nas yang las kyi sems pas rtogs tshad phul ba 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1219: chos kun byang chub sems nyid de //
NK087(shu)002:1220: nges pa med de dngos rtog bral //
NK087(shu)002:1221: de nyid dag pa'i rang bzhin bas //
NK087(shu)002:1222: mkhas pas ci dgar bsgoms nas 'grub ces bya //
NK087(shu)002:1223: chos kun byang chub sems nyid de zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1224: phyi dang nang du snang ba'i chos kun /
NK087(shu)002:1225: ye nas ma bcos pas byang chub kyi sems nyid yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1226: brtags pa'i dngos po ni gsog gsob ya ma barla yin pas des na /
NK087(shu)002:1227: nges pa med de dngos rtogs bral //
NK087(shu)002:1228: de nyid dag pa'i rang bzhin bas //
NK087(shu)002:1229: mkhas pas ci dgar bsgoms na 'grub //
NK087(shu)002:1230: ces las kyi sems pas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1231: don dam pa'i bden pa 'ba' zhig bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1232: byang chub kyi sems rab tu bsdom pa'i le'u ni byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:1233: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)002:1235: de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid bstan
NK087(shu)002:1236: pa dang las dang po'i dang po rnams la gzugs
NK087(shu)002:1238: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1239: de nas zhes pa ni sngar gyi le'u 'das pa'i de ma thag pa de nas so //
NK087(shu)002:1240: yang yid kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das gsang
NK087(shu)002:1241: ba mchog gi bdag po 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig
NK087(shu)002:1243: de nas 'dod pa'i phyir gsol ba btab ce na /
NK087(shu)002:1244: bsnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor ma 'dris par 'dod pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1245: e ma bder gshegs rgyal ba'i gtso //
NK087(shu)002:1246: zhes pa nas bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol /
NK087(shu)002:1247: a la la ho zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1248: zhus pa'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1249: de nas ston pa rgyal mchog gis //
NK087(shu)002:1250: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1251: de nas ston pa mtha' rnam pa gnyis la rgyal
NK087(shu)002:1252: ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs shing kun gyi mchog tu gyur
NK087(shu)002:1253: pa des / sdud pa po kun tu bzang pos zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas /
NK087(shu)002:1254: snyan ma'i dkyil 'khor thugs dang po'i sgo nas 'khor
NK087(shu)002:1255: rnams la rab tu bshad de phyi pa'i gang zag
NK087(shu)002:1256: las dang po'i dang po pa rnal 'byor la 'jug
NK087(shu)002:1258: de yang las dang po pa gang zag rnam pa
NK087(shu)002:1259: lnga pos kyang slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ji lta
NK087(shu)002:1260: bus bya ba brtag par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1261: slob dpon byed dang rjes 'brang pas zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1262: slob dpon byed dang zhes pa ni gang zag lnga po 'dren par byed pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1263: slob dpon byed dang zhes bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1264: sngon bde bar gshegs pas ji ltar mdzad pa'i rjes
NK087(shu)002:1265: su 'brang ba'i slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya
NK087(shu)002:1266: ste / de'i phyir blo yangs rgyud la goms pa dang zhes pa la sogs bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1267: blo yangs rgyud la goms pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1268: zhes pa ni phyi dang nang du snang ba'i chos
NK087(shu)002:1269: la rtog pa mi skye zhing blo yangs par mdzad
NK087(shu)002:1271: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud la goms shing mkhas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1272: bla ma'i nyams kyis man ngag thob cing ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1273: ston pa'i bka' phyi nang gi chos sde snod gsum la ma rmongs shing /
NK087(shu)002:1274: the tshom mi za ba dang yang dag pa'i ting
NK087(shu)002:1275: nge 'dzin la sran thub cing lta ba mi ldog
NK087(shu)002:1276: pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos la dad pa'i dad pa che ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1277: phyin ci ma log pa la yid ches pa'i dad pa che ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1278: yang dag pa'i chos la dad pa che ba dang
NK087(shu)002:1279: la sogs pa'i dad pa mnga' ba gsang ba ste
NK087(shu)002:1282: shes rab ma rab 'bring tha ma gsum la ji ltar bya ba'i thabs mchog rnams /
NK087(shu)002:1283: snod ngan pa gang zag 'phyang po gsang mi thub pa rnams la mi ster ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1284: bla ma las mthar phyin pa'i dbang mchog rnams thob pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1285: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi las kun kyang bya ba thams cad la yangs shing /
NK087(shu)002:1286: de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon
NK087(shu)002:1287: de rdo rje 'dzin pa'i snyan ma'i slob dpon no
NK087(shu)002:1288: // de nas 'khor lo can gyi slob dpon bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1289: yan lag dam tshig ma nyams dang //
NK087(shu)002:1290: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1291: yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga ma nyams shing /
NK087(shu)002:1292: mdog dang ste shin tu mdog ser la 'tsher ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1293: gzugs dang ste gzugs shin tu bzang ba stod smad phyed pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1294: stobs dang ldan te shin tu mi 'os pa'i stobs yod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1295: 'khor lo sgyur ba'i mtshan yod pa'i lag pa g.yon
NK087(shu)002:1296: pa'i srin lag gi sbab na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
NK087(shu)002:1297: yod pa / lus dri zhim po a ka ru
NK087(shu)002:1298: la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i ngad dang ldan pa
NK087(shu)002:1299: yod pa / / de lta bu'i mtshan ma yod
NK087(shu)002:1300: pa de ni sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi dkyil
NK087(shu)002:1301: 'khor gyi slob dpon yin par rab tu gsungs so
NK087(shu)002:1302: yod pa / / // de nas yang rin po
NK087(shu)002:1303: che'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid stan pa'i phyir shes
NK087(shu)002:1304: pa che zhing yon tan ldan zhes pa la sogs
NK087(shu)002:1305: yod pa / / // pa gsungs te / shes
NK087(shu)002:1306: pa che zhing yon tan ldan zhes pa ni phyi
NK087(shu)002:1307: dang nang gi chos la ma rmongs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1308: bzo dang rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1309: yon tan sgo yangs te ci la yang ma 'gags par byed pa dang spyod lam dag ste /
NK087(shu)002:1310: chos spyod rnam pa bcu spyod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1311: rdo rje slob dpon spun la gdungs te ci 'tsham
NK087(shu)002:1312: pa'i sgo nas slob dpon khur zhing mched la gdung
NK087(shu)002:1313: ba de lta bu'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa'i
NK087(shu)002:1314: gang zag de ni rin po che'i slob dpon no
NK087(shu)002:1315: // de nas yang pad+ma'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1316: rtag tu bzlas pa brtson pa dang zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:1317: pad+mo can bla mar gzung zhes pas bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1318: de nas yang las kyi rigs kyi slob kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1319: bya ba'i las la ma rmongs shing zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:1320: sna tshogs las kyi bla mar yin zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1321: de nas dkyil 'khor spyi'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1322: de dag yon tan ma lus ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1323: de dag yon tan ma lus ldan zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1324: gong ma ji snyed brjod pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1325: theg pa kun la 'byam pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1326: phyi nang gi theg pa kun la mkhas shing goms
NK087(shu)002:1327: pa ni spyi'i snyan ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon
NK087(shu)002:1328: no // de nas yang slob dpon gyi slob ma'i
NK087(shu)002:1329: mtshan nyid ma brtags na snod ngan pas gnyis ka
NK087(shu)002:1331: de'i phyir bla ma lung bstan des kyang ni /
NK087(shu)002:1332: slob ma'i mtshan nyid brtags par gces //
NK087(shu)002:1334: de ni 'di nas mar so so'i mtshan nyid bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1335: de'i phyir rkyen thub mi ldog dam tshig gnas //
