NK087(shu)002:1336: zhes pa nas rdo rje can gyi slob ma rung zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1337: 'khor lo can gyi slob ma bstan pa'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:1338: lus dang yan lag mdzes ldan dang //
NK087(shu)002:1340: sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi bshad ces bshad pa'i bar gyis bstan te mtshan nyid go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1341: rin po che'i slob ma bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1342: spyod lam rnam bzhi lhun stug cing zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:1344: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1345: pad+ma'i slob bu bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1346: ngag gi sgo nas shin tu sngar sa zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:1347: pad+ma 'dzin pa'i snod du bshad ces pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:1348: las kyi slob ma bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1349: de'i phyir las la gus shing zhes pa nas sna tshogs rdo rje lta bu yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1350: zhes pa'i tshig bzhi pas bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:1351: spyi'i dkyil 'khor slob ma bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1352: yon tan de kun ldan pa la /
NK087(shu)002:1353: kun gyi bskul zhing shin tu mdzes //
NK087(shu)002:1354: yid du 'ong zhing spyod pa bzo //
NK087(shu)002:1355: spyi yi dkyil 'khor dag la shis //
NK087(shu)002:1356: zhes pa'i tshig bzhi po des bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1357: de nas yang dkyil 'khor bya ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1360: spangs bar bya ba gnyis so //
NK087(shu)002:1361: blang bar bya ba la so so'i mtshan nyid rnams te bye brag drug go //
NK087(shu)002:1362: sngon la spang bar bya ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1363: gnod sbyin mo'i spang rjes dang /
NK087(shu)002:1364: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1365: gnod sbyin mo'i spang rjes ni brag la gcan gzan gyis brad pa 'dra ba yod pas /
NK087(shu)002:1366: grogs po shar shor mang ba /
NK087(shu)002:1367: g.yon na g.ya' mchis ris 'dra ba yod pa /
NK087(shu)002:1368: g.yas na g.ya' sngon po ral gri 'dra ba'am mdung 'dra ba'am /
NK087(shu)002:1369: dgra sta 'dra ba yod pa ni gnod sbyin mtshon cha'i bshal rjes dang zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1370: 'byung po dag gi rgyu sa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1371: zhes pa ni ri thal bar gtor ba'am /
NK087(shu)002:1372: mang po sna thug pa de lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:1373: klu gdug dag gi rgyu gsang dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1374: klu gdug pa yod pa'i chu mig 'gram mam /
NK087(shu)002:1375: rgyu gsang de btsan rgyu ba'i gong sum mo //
NK087(shu)002:1376: rten dang 'brel ba'i gnas dag dang zhes bya ba brten te /
NK087(shu)002:1377: yul gyi lha 'dre gnyen po'i rten brag gam shing
NK087(shu)002:1378: la sogs pa'i 'brel pa ni shing dang brag dang
NK087(shu)002:1379: lha 'dre 'brel ba'i gnas te de la sogs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:1381: kha na ma tho dang bcas par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:1382: nyer tshe'i 'du byed byed par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:1383: de spangs na dngos grub ci 'dod pa myur bar 'ong ngo //
NK087(shu)002:1384: da ni blang bar bya ba'i gnas rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1385: rdo rje brag chen la gtams pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1386: de yang sngon la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1387: 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1388: rdo rje brag chen gtam pa'am zhes bya ba ni shin tu brag rdo rje'am sra ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1391: ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse rnams zhes bya ba ni rin po che spung pa 'dra ba'i rtse mo'o //
NK087(shu)002:1392: mdangs bzang gangs ri brag tu zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1394: gangs ri ste brag dkar po gangs ri dkar po
NK087(shu)002:1395: rtse la yod pa dang brag dkar la lhun sdug
NK087(shu)002:1396: pa yod pa'i gnas de rnams su rdo rje 'dzin
NK087(shu)002:1397: pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sgrub pa'i gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:1398: 'khor lo can gyi gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1399: phug dang dgon pa'i ri dwags dang zhes pa la sogs bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1400: phug dang dgon pa'i ri dwags dang /
NK087(shu)002:1401: zhes pa ni spang phug bzang po kha shar du bltas pa'am /
NK087(shu)002:1402: sngon gyi rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs pa'i dgon pa'i gnas
NK087(shu)002:1403: sam spang ri zlum po shar du kha bltas pa'o
NK087(shu)002:1404: // nags tshal dra ba gtibs pa'am /
NK087(shu)002:1405: zhes bya ba ni lung pa kha shar du bltas
NK087(shu)002:1406: pa'i nang na tshal chen pos gtibs nas yod pa'am
NK087(shu)002:1407: 'on te shar phyogs kyi ngos nas gtibs nas yod
NK087(shu)002:1408: pa'o // mdangs bzang shar du gzhol ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1409: shin tu mdangs dga' ba'i gnas de lta bu'i sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:1410: rin po che'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir 'og nas 'byung ba 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1411: rin chen sna lnga'i kha dog gam //
NK087(shu)002:1413: shar dkar ba lho ser ba nub dmar ba byang ljang ba dbus sngo ba'i mtshan nyid dam /
NK087(shu)002:1414: yang na gnas de nyid nas tshon sna tshogs pa yod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1415: rin po che zur brgyad dbyibs 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1416: ri nyid rin po che zur brgyad pa lta bu yod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1417: yang brag rin po che spungs pa 'dra ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1418: yang na sa yis dbyibs su rin po che 'dra ba'i gnas /
NK087(shu)002:1419: de ni rin po che bsgrub pa'i gnas yin par bshad do //
NK087(shu)002:1420: de nas pad+ma'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1421: tsan dan zhes pa nas pad+mo bsgrub par de shis so zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1422: go sla ba ste pad+ma'i gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:1424: dur khrod ces bya ba nas sna tshogs rdo rje can gyi zhes pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1425: sna tshogs rdo rje can gyi sgrub pa'i gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:1427: ri brag mang po 'dus pa'i spyi /
NK087(shu)002:1428: ri bos bskor ba'i lhun phreng 'tshal zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1429: spyi'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:1430: yang na rigs thams cad kyi yon tan cha dang ldan pas bshad ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1431: gnas lnga'i mtshan nyid tshang ba ni spyi'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i sa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1432: bla ma dang slob ma'i gnas rnams kyi mtshan nyid
NK087(shu)002:1433: ma brtags na mi 'grub pa'i nyen dang kha na
NK087(shu)002:1434: ma tho ba'i yar khar bcas pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1435: dngos sgrub ring bas de'i phyir dngos grub ring zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1436: de'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas spang blang
NK087(shu)002:1437: gnyis bya ba'i phyir blo can gyi shes nas spang
NK087(shu)002:1438: bar bya ba yin zhes bya ba yin gsungs so
NK087(shu)002:1439: // de nas yang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan mi ldan gyi skyon te /
NK087(shu)002:1440: rnal 'byor blo mchog mi ldan na zhes pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1441: bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi gsungs zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1442: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan gnas dang /
NK087(shu)002:1443: slob ma la sogs pa gzhung dang mthun pa med kyang 'grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1444: blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:1445: 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ces pas bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:1446: ting nge 'dzin dang gnas la sogs pa gnyis char 'phrugs na dngos grub myur bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1447: 'on kyang gnas dang slob ma dang //
NK087(shu)002:1448: mtshan nyid rnams ni bshad pa yin //
NK087(shu)002:1449: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:1450: de nas gnas la sogs pa brnyes nas sa'i 'du bar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1451: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1452: mtshan mas dngos po gzhol ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1453: zhes pa ni lha'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK087(shu)002:1454: de'i dngos po rdzas su snang ba gzhol ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1455: lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa'i gnas dang /
NK087(shu)002:1456: de yang rigs rnams so so'i gnas dang sa dang bar snang dang /
NK087(shu)002:1457: de yang rigs rnams so so gnas kyi mtshan ma ltar /
NK087(shu)002:1458: brtags te rnyed nas nges par gzung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1459: de nas sa sbyangs te ting nge 'dzin bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1460: ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig pa zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1461: bdag nyid yi dam gyi lhar dran pa bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1462: ting nge 'dzin gcig go des sa sbyang ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1463: de la yang gnyis yod do //
NK087(shu)002:1464: phyis sbyang ba dang nang gi sbyang ba gnyis so //
NK087(shu)002:1465: phyi'i sbyang ba ni 'byung ba gsum gyis ji ltar sbyang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1466: nang gi sbyang ba ni sa'i dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med de stong pa bsgom mo //
NK087(shu)002:1467: sa dang po med pa des kyang /
NK087(shu)002:1468: sa sbyang ba'i las su 'gyur zhes so //
NK087(shu)002:1469: de nas yang sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs te /
NK087(shu)002:1470: de'i phyir dbang 'gyur lha mo de zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1471: sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs pa de'i tshe bdag nyid
NK087(shu)002:1472: kyi sa'i lha mo spyan drangs te thugs ka'i h'u
NK087(shu)002:1473: las 'od zer 'phros pa de las lcags kyur gyur
NK087(shu)002:1474: te / lcags kyus sa'i lha mo spyan drangs nas rnal 'byor gyi mdun na gnas par bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:1475: de la mchod pa 'bul ba'i phyir mchod pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1476: sbran pa byas na zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1477: sa'i lha mo de la mchod pa rnams dbul lo //
NK087(shu)002:1478: de'i rjes lha mo'i dga' mdangs kyis khyod dkyil 'khor gyis gsungs nas /
NK087(shu)002:1479: lha mo nyid 'od du zhu nas sa la thims
NK087(shu)002:1480: pas sa yang rin po che'i sa gzhir gyur te
NK087(shu)002:1481: de ka la sbran pa zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1482: ru tha rgol bas mi tshugs shing byin dang ldan pas der 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:1483: zhes pa ni de ltar sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa na /
NK087(shu)002:1484: rnam par rtog pa med cing bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i gzhir 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:1485: de nas sa gzhi de bslang ste /
NK087(shu)002:1486: de'i phyir byin dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi zhes pa la sogs bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1487: byin dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi de zhes pa ni
NK087(shu)002:1488: rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi rnyed pa'i byin brlabs
NK087(shu)002:1489: can gyis gnas de lta bu de snang ba dang
NK087(shu)002:1490: ste sa bdag gi rgyal po la sogs pa slang
NK087(shu)002:1491: ba'o // mi snang ba ste sa'i bdag po la ste sa bdag lha klu'o //
NK087(shu)002:1493: rgyal po la sogs pa la bden pa smra zhing ngag 'jam pas rin bcas te slang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:1494: sa bdag lha klu la gtor ma byin la bden pa bdar la sa slang ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1495: thugs thub dang ras chod ma yin par /
NK087(shu)002:1496: rin dang bden pas sgo la slang /
NK087(shu)002:1498: de nas stegs bu'i las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1499: de stegs bu gru bzhi la /
NK087(shu)002:1500: zhi ba la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1501: de nas zhes pa ni chu'i bra dang sa'i bra
NK087(shu)002:1502: rtags pa de ma thag pa de nas stegs bu
NK087(shu)002:1503: gru bzhi par brtsig go zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1504: stegs bu de la ba spu bya ste gang gi
NK087(shu)002:1505: bya zhe na bdud rtsi rnam lngas kyang nul bya
NK087(shu)002:1507: bdud rtsi lnga dang sa bzhag mo bsres la shin tu 'thas par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1508: 'thug srab pa'i ko ba tsam bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1509: de nas thig gdab pa'i las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1510: gos brgyan mdzes ma'i grogs mchog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1511: gos rgyan mdzes ma'i grogs mchog ma zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1512: shin tu mdzes ma'i grogs mchog ma des khrus byas pa /
NK087(shu)002:1513: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan te /
NK087(shu)002:1514: de la sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs la /
NK087(shu)002:1515: sa'i thig skud bkal du zhugs te /
NK087(shu)002:1516: de'i phyir gsal bar ldan nam byin brlabs la zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1517: thig skud ring thung gi tshad ni dkyil 'khor rgya nyid 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:1518: de bas tshad ldan rdo rje sred bu'i zhes brjod do //
NK087(shu)002:1519: thig gdab pa'i sbyor ba bya zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1520: ras bal dkar po la tshon rtsi lnga pos kha dog bsgyur la /
NK087(shu)002:1522: yi ge lnga bkod la 'phro 'dus so sor bskur bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:1523: de la ye shes kyi rigs lnga dgu pa dang gzhugs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1524: bcing pa dang bstan pa byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:1525: de la mchod pa 'bul bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1526: de'i rjes la 'od du zhu ste srad bu la thim mo //
NK087(shu)002:1527: srad bu de grogs po la gtad de 'gu ru
NK087(shu)002:1528: chu bdag tu 'dug cing shi sha byad du 'dug
NK087(shu)002:1530: dgongs shig rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas //
NK087(shu)002:1531: nam mkha' gang ba'i bder gshegs rnams //
NK087(shu)002:1532: thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni //
NK087(shu)002:1533: dus 'di sems can don rnams mdzod //
NK087(shu)002:1536: sngon la tshang thig gnyis gdab /
NK087(shu)002:1538: de nas shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi thig
NK087(shu)002:1539: rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du cha bgo zhing
NK087(shu)002:1540: gdab bo // de'i phyir thig gdab pa'i sbyor ba bya zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1541: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i thabs bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1542: 'gro ba blo rmongs mi shes pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1543: 'gro ba blo rmongs shing mi shes pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1545: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid lha'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1546: dang po las kyi sgor zhugs la zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1547: de nas tshon byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:1549: rab ni rin po che sna lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:1550: 'bring ni 'bras la sogs pa la tshon gyi kha dog bsgyur ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1551: tha ma ni sa la byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1552: de'i phyir kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am /
NK087(shu)002:1553: lnga'i tshon gyis bri bar bshad /
NK087(shu)002:1554: kha dog so so'i dkyil 'khor byang shar gyi mtshams
NK087(shu)002:1555: nas mdzub gang mnyam por drangs te byin gyis brlabs
NK087(shu)002:1557: h'u 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
NK087(shu)002:1558: de phyung rigs lnga'i ngo bor snang //
NK087(shu)002:1559: sems can ma lus don bya'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:1560: tshon gyi las ni bdag gis brtsams //
NK087(shu)002:1561: zhes brjod la ri mo 'di bri'o //
NK087(shu)002:1562: ri mo de mtho dman du song na dngos grub med pa'i ltas so //
NK087(shu)002:1563: yon por gyur na bgegs yod pa'i bltas so //
NK087(shu)002:1564: chad par gyur na slob dpon slob ma gnyis ka 'chi ba'i bltas so //
NK087(shu)002:1565: ri mo de log par gyur pa gang yin pa 'byung ba'i dus de na /
NK087(shu)002:1566: phur pa gdab par bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1567: de yang phur pa sgrol bdag tu byin gyis brlabs la /
NK087(shu)002:1568: h'u badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sarba sha trum phata ces brjod pas phur pa gdab bo //
NK087(shu)002:1569: de nas rnam lnga'i tshon gyis dkyil 'khor dam pa de bri bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1570: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1571: rab tu zlum po'i dkyil 'khor la zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1572: rab tu zlum po'i dkyil 'khor la zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1573: dbus kyi pho brang bstan pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1574: rab tu zlum po bri ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1575: lha rnams kyi nang rol cha chung phyed nas bskor //
NK087(shu)002:1576: de'i nang rol cha chung zhig la bskor te bsdoms
NK087(shu)002:1577: pas cha chung phyed dang gnyis la rdo rje ra
NK087(shu)002:1578: ba'o // thig bzhi gdab pas dkyil 'khor dgu zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1579: rdo rje ra ba'i dbus su cha chung ngu re re bzhag ste /
NK087(shu)002:1580: so so'i thig gzhan ma phyis pas phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi ste brgyad do //
NK087(shu)002:1582: cha chung re re bzhag de rnams la rdo rje'i gdung bzhi dang /
NK087(shu)002:1583: rdo rje ka ba brgyad gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:1584: gru chad bar khyams sgo khyud bcas //
NK087(shu)002:1585: zhes bya ba ni gru chad lha rnams kyi nang rol /
NK087(shu)002:1586: rdo rje bum pa'i phyi rol /
NK087(shu)002:1587: bar khyams ni lha rnams nyid do //
NK087(shu)002:1588: sgo khyud la sogs pa rta babs dang /
NK087(shu)002:1589: rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan
NK087(shu)002:1590: ta la'i skye shing dang bya ngang pa la sogs
NK087(shu)002:1592: de nas dkyil 'khor la phyag mtshan dgod pa ni
NK087(shu)002:1593: spyi'i dkyil 'khor du gsum pa'i rim pa ji bzhin
NK087(shu)002:1594: no // so so'i kha dog dang bzhugs thabs bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1595: dbus su sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1596: dbus su sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni
NK087(shu)002:1597: le'i tshe'i dbus ma gang yin pa'i gzhugs gnas te
NK087(shu)002:1598: / de'i gnas su nyon mongs pa thams cad spang
NK087(shu)002:1599: ba'i sangs rgyas phyin ci ma log pa'i don dam
NK087(shu)002:1600: / pa dang / dus rtag tu mi 'bral bas
NK087(shu)002:1601: rdo rje 'dzin pa de lta bu'i ngang tshul dang
NK087(shu)002:1603: nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'khril ba'i tshul zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:1604: ni stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:1606: 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa de gdan bzhugs pa zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:1607: pho brang gi dbus seng ge'i gdan steng nyi zla pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la /
NK087(shu)002:1609: rnam pa'i mchog rnams rdzogs par yang gsal zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1610: mgur chu dang dpung rgyan dang se mo do dang
NK087(shu)002:1611: do shal la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i rgyan gyis mchog
NK087(shu)002:1612: rnams yongs su rdzogs shing gsal bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1613: sku mdog ni mthing nag ste /
NK087(shu)002:1614: 'od zer lngas 'khrigs par yid kyis blta'o //
NK087(shu)002:1615: de'i spyan sngar snang mdzad sems zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1616: rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i spyan sngar ni shar phyogs kyi le'u tshe de'i gnas su bsgom par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1617: rdo rje dbyings dang thabs cig tu zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1618: rdo rje dbyings phyug ma dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis /
NK087(shu)002:1619: stobs glang po che'i gdan la yang dag par gnas pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1620: sku mdog dkar po 'od zer lngas 'khrigs pa kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1622: rin chen sems dpa' g.yas su ste //
NK087(shu)002:1623: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal shar du gzigs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1624: de'i g.yas gang yin pa ni lho phyogs kyi le'u tse ste de'i gnas su bsgom par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1625: rin chen dbyings phyug ma dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1626: sems can dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du skong ba'i rin chen dbyings phyug ma de dang /
NK087(shu)002:1627: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri la yang dag par bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1628: 'dzam bu na ta'i gser 'od 'dra zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1629: sku mdog ser po gser gyi 'od 'dra ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1630: 'od zer lngas 'khril ba'i rgyab tu chos kyi sems dpa' ste /
NK087(shu)002:1632: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyab ni nub ste /
NK087(shu)002:1633: nub kyi le'u tse la chos kyi sems pa bsam par bya ba'i gnas yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1634: de'i gnas su bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1635: chos kyi sems mar bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1636: sems can gyi don mdzad kyang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis
NK087(shu)002:1637: ma gos pa'i chos kyi sems ma de dang 'khril
NK087(shu)002:1638: ba'i tshul du dbang rma bya'i khri la yang dag
NK087(shu)002:1639: par bzhugs so // sku mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1640: de'i phyir dmar po pad+ma ra ga'i mdog ces bstan pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1641: las kyi sems pa'i g.yon du ste /
NK087(shu)002:1643: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g.yon gang yin pa de byang gi phyogs kyi le'u tse ste /
NK087(shu)002:1644: gnas de ru las kyi sems pa bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1645: las kyi dbyings phyug ma dang 'khril zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1646: chos thams cad rang gi ngo bo las skyes pa'i
NK087(shu)002:1647: ngang du mdzad pa'i las kyi dbyings phyug ma dang
NK087(shu)002:1648: 'khril ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' lding gi khri chen
NK087(shu)002:1649: la yang dag par bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1650: sku mdog ljang gu in+d+ra ni la'i mdog 'dra'o //
NK087(shu)002:1651: phyi nang sems pa sems ma rnams zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:1652: ni dkyil 'khor gyi bar gyi khyams la bsam par
NK087(shu)002:1653: bya ba ste / shar phyogs kyi khyams la pad+ma
NK087(shu)002:1654: dkar po'i gdan stengs su byang chub sems dpa' sa'i
NK087(shu)002:1655: snying po sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas na rin
NK087(shu)002:1657: g.yon pas rtsa ba bzung nas la se dkar mo dang /
NK087(shu)002:1659: lho phyogs kyi 'khyams la nam mkha'i snying po sku
NK087(shu)002:1660: mdog sngon po phyag na ral gri bsnams nas ma
NK087(shu)002:1661: le sngon mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis pad+ma sngon
NK087(shu)002:1663: nub phyogs kyi khyams la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog dmar mo /
NK087(shu)002:1664: phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa gir ti dmar mo sku
NK087(shu)002:1665: la 'khril nas pad+ma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs so
NK087(shu)002:1666: // byang phyogs khyams la byang chub sems dpa' phyag
NK087(shu)002:1667: na rdo rje sku mdog ljang gu phyag na rdo
NK087(shu)002:1668: rje rgya gram bsnams nas nir ti ljang gu'i sku
NK087(shu)002:1669: la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis pad+ma ljang gu'i gdan la
NK087(shu)002:1670: // bzhugs so // de ni nang gi sems dpa' dang sems ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:1671: shar lho mtshams kyi khyams la byang chub sems dpa'
NK087(shu)002:1672: byams pa mee tri sku mdog dkar skya phyag na
NK087(shu)002:1674: d+hu pe dkar mo sku la 'khril nas pad+ma dkar skya'i gdan la bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1675: lho nub kyi khyams la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
NK087(shu)002:1676: pa rnam par sel ba sku mdog ser po phyag
NK087(shu)002:1677: na pu ti bsnams nas push+pe ser mo'i sku la
NK087(shu)002:1678: 'khril nas pad ser gdan la bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1679: nub byang gi khyams la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po sku mdog dmar po /
NK087(shu)002:1680: phyag na rin po che bsnams nas a lo ke
NK087(shu)002:1681: dmar mo sku la 'khril nas pad+ma dmar po'i gdan
NK087(shu)002:1682: la bzhugs so // byang shar mtshams kyi khyams la
NK087(shu)002:1683: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu sku mdog
NK087(shu)002:1684: ljang gu phyag na ud pa la bsnams nas gen+de
NK087(shu)002:1685: ljang gu'i sku la 'khril te pad+ma ljang gu'i khri
NK087(shu)002:1686: la bzhugs so // la bzhugs so // de'i phyi ni sems dpa' dang sems ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:1687: de rnams bstan pa la ni phyi nang sems dpa' sems ma rnams zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1688: phyi nang gang la'ang de bzhin bri zhes pa ni
NK087(shu)002:1689: nang gi sems dpa' dang sems ma rnams kyi dkyil
NK087(shu)002:1690: 'khor 'bri ba'i dus na nang gi gru chad la
NK087(shu)002:1691: bri bar bya'o // phyi'i sems dpa' dang sems ma rnams ni phyi'i gru chad la bri bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1692: bsgom par bya ba'i gnas skabs na ni khyams thabs phyogs dang mtshams su bsgoms par bya /
NK087(shu)002:1693: bar khyams dag la sprul sku dang zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:1694: ni bar khyams kyi shar phyogs su pad+ma ser po'i
NK087(shu)002:1695: gdan la sprul sku sh+aakya thub pa sku mdog ser
NK087(shu)002:1696: po phyag na gseg pa bsnams nas bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1697: shar lho'i phyogs kyi khyams la pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la sprul sku brgya byin thub pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1698: sku mdog dkar po phyag na pi wang bsnams nas bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1699: lho'i khyams la pad+ma mthing ga'i gdan la sprul sku
NK087(shu)002:1700: dmyal ba'i thub pa ni sku mdog mthing nag gshin
NK087(shu)002:1701: rje'i zhes bya ba phyag na me chu bsnams pa'o
NK087(shu)002:1702: // nub phyogs kyi khyams la sprul sku byol song gi thub pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1703: sku mdog smug po a ba glang mgo can zhes
NK087(shu)002:1704: bya ba ni phyag na po ti bsnams nas pad+ma
NK087(shu)002:1705: smug po'i gdan la bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1706: nub byang gi khyams la sprul sku lha ma yin
NK087(shu)002:1707: gyi thub pa sku mdog sngon po thag bzangs ris
NK087(shu)002:1708: zhes bya ba phyag na ral gri bsnams nas pad+ma
NK087(shu)002:1709: sngon po'i gdan la bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1710: byang phyogs kyi khyams la sprul sku yi dwags kyi
NK087(shu)002:1711: thub pa kha 'bar ma zhes bya ba sku mdog
NK087(shu)002:1712: ljang gu phyag na rin po che'i sgrom bu bsnams
NK087(shu)002:1713: nas pad+ma ljang gu'i gdan la bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1714: shar phyogs kyi khyams dang nub phyogs gnyis kyi khyams
NK087(shu)002:1715: la kun tu bzang po yab yum gnyis bsgoms te
NK087(shu)002:1716: / sku mdog dkar po phyag na rdo rje bsnams so //
NK087(shu)002:1717: yum gyi phyag na dril bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:1718: sgor ni sgo ma dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1719: shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rnam par rgyal ba
NK087(shu)002:1720: sku mdog mthing nag phyag na mi mgo gdengs pa
NK087(shu)002:1721: bsnams nas / me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil na rta
NK087(shu)002:1722: gdong lcags kyu ma sku la 'khril nas bzhugs so
NK087(shu)002:1723: bsnams nas / // lho phyogs kyi sgor ni khro
NK087(shu)002:1724: bo gshin rje gshed sku mdog dud ka phyag na
NK087(shu)002:1726: yum phag gdong zhags pa ma dang gnyis 'khril ba'i tshul gyis me dpung gi dbus na bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1727: nub phyogs kyi sgor ni khro bo rta mgrin sku
NK087(shu)002:1728: mdog dmar po phyag na thod sbrul dang zhags pa'o
NK087(shu)002:1729: // yum nyi zla lcags sgrog ma dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis me dpung nang na bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:1730: byang phyogs kyi sgor ni khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil
NK087(shu)002:1731: pa sku mdog ljang gu phyag na rdo rje rgya
NK087(shu)002:1732: gram bsnams nas / yum thal byed dril bu ma
NK087(shu)002:1733: sku la 'khril nas me dpung nang du bzhugs so
NK087(shu)002:1734: gram bsnams nas / // 'di ji ltar rgyas par
NK087(shu)002:1735: bstan pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor phyi ma rnams la
NK087(shu)002:1736: yang de bzhin du shes par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1737: dkyil 'khor 'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:1738: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir na /
NK087(shu)002:1739: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga' dam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1741: rin po che 'bar ba'i gang zag la bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1742: de nas pad+ma dkar 'dra'i gang zag la bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1743: sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1744: gtso bo gang yin pa bsgyur bar shes par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1745: bri ba dang lha'i sku mdog la sogs pa rgyas
NK087(shu)002:1746: par gong du gsungs pas kun la shes par bya'o
NK087(shu)002:1747: // 'khor lo can gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1748: sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyis gsungs zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:1749: rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba yin zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:1750: de nas pad+ma 'dra ba'i gang zag la rin chen dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1751: rin chen dkyil 'khor dam pa ni zhes pa nas
NK087(shu)002:1752: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lho phyogs su zhes pa'i tshig
NK087(shu)002:1753: lngas bstan to // de nas tsan dan 'dra ba'i gang zag la //
NK087(shu)002:1756: zhes pa'i tshig bzhis bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:1757: de nas ud pa la 'dra ba'i gang zag la /
NK087(shu)002:1758: las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:1759: sna tshogs las kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa nas gzhan
NK087(shu)002:1760: yang de bzhin rgyas par bri zhes pa'i bar gyis
NK087(shu)002:1762: de nas dkyil 'khor de dag la rgyan bkod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1763: dkyil 'khor nyams dga' de dag la /
NK087(shu)002:1764: zhes pa la stsogs gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1765: bum pa brgyad dang brgyad nyid la zhes bya ba ni bum pa brgyad dang /
NK087(shu)002:1766: yang bcu drug tu byas la de'i nang blugs pa'i rdzas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1768: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1769: ci 'byor gtung ba bsnum po'am zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1770: 'byor pa bzang ba'i bye brag bu ram la sogs
NK087(shu)002:1771: pa ci 'byor pa blugs te che ba'i yon tan
NK087(shu)002:1773: bdud rtsi lnga'am rin chen bcas zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1774: sman lnga blugs pa de byang chub kyi sems kyi rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:1775: 'bru lnga'i lha rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:1776: rin po che lnga ni lha'i sku mdog gi rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:1777: gang ba'i rin chen bum pa ni zhes bya gong ma'i rdzas rnams kyis gang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1778: dang po gser gyi bum par yang bshad ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1779: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la brgyan par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1780: gnyis pa shel dang dngul gyi de zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1782: gsum pa bee d+aur+ya'i zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rgyan no //
NK087(shu)002:1783: bzhi pa zangs kyi bum par bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1785: lnga pa lcags kyi bum par bshad ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1786: sna tshogs las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
NK087(shu)002:1787: drug pa la ni sna tshogs pa //
NK087(shu)002:1788: bum pa gang bar bzhag par bya //
NK087(shu)002:1789: zhes bya ba ni spyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1790: gzhan yang rgyan gyi khyad par dang //
NK087(shu)002:1792: zhes bya ba ni bum par ma zad de bla
NK087(shu)002:1793: re dang phan dang gdugs rgyal mtshan dang ba dan
NK087(shu)002:1794: dang dar gyi lda ldi dang rgyan gyi khyad par
NK087(shu)002:1796: der ma zad de spos dang gar dang glu dang
NK087(shu)002:1797: rnga dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang pi
NK087(shu)002:1798: wang dang / gling bu dang cang ti'u dang cha lang dang /
NK087(shu)002:1799: dril bu la sogs pa grangs mang po thogs la dkyil 'khor la bskor ba bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1800: mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang /
NK087(shu)002:1801: gtor ma la sogs mdzes par dgram zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:1802: ni mchod pa'i yo byad de spos dang me tog
NK087(shu)002:1803: dang mar me dang dri chab dang arga la sogs
NK087(shu)002:1804: pa rim pa ma nor bkram mo //
NK087(shu)002:1805: gtor ma la sogs pa ni phyogs skyong gi gtor ma la sogs pa mang po bkram mo //
NK087(shu)002:1806: de nas rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa'i rim pas bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1807: de nas rnal 'byor can gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:1808: de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1809: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyan la sogs pa thams cad bkram pa'i de ma thag pa de nas /
NK087(shu)002:1810: rnal 'byor bas ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pa bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1811: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:1812: dang por de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1813: gnyis pa kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1814: gsum pa rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1815: rgyu yi ger gnas pa'i skabs nyid ni /
NK087(shu)002:1816: dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas bskyed pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1817: rten gyi dkyil 'khor gdan dang bcas pa'i rjes thogs su rten can gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:1818: gong ma'i rig pa ji bzhin du bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1819: rten can gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rjes thogs su sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK087(shu)002:1820: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab bo //
NK087(shu)002:1821: de nas dbang nod pa de dbu rgyan la sogs pa la rigs lnga char gyis brgyan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1822: lhag ma rnams ni rang re rigs lnga so so'i rgyan kho na'o //
NK087(shu)002:1823: de yan chad du bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi tshang ste /
NK087(shu)002:1824: gtso bo'i sku yan lag dang bcas pa rdzogs pa ni bsnyen pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1825: 'khor gyi sku bskyed pa ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1826: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsgrub pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1827: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni bsgrub pa chen po ste /
NK087(shu)002:1829: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
NK087(shu)002:1830: bdag nyid kyi thugs kar yi ge h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:1832: lha mo lcags kyu ma gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:1833: lha mo'i rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas nas ye shes
NK087(shu)002:1834: kyi dkyil 'khor pho brang dang bcas par mdun gyi
NK087(shu)002:1836: de la phyi nang mchod pas mchod do //
NK087(shu)002:1837: mchod pa'i rjes la bstod pa yang bya ste rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad brjod do //
NK087(shu)002:1839: chos sku ye nas dag pa la //
NK087(shu)002:1840: 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma med pa ste //
NK087(shu)002:1842: gzugs brnyan ston pa khyod la bstod //
NK087(shu)002:1844: zhags pa mas lhor sgor zhugs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1845: lcags sgrog mas bstim pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1846: dril bu mas dgyes par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1847: nam sems can gyi don ma 'grub kyi bar du bstan par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1848: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1849: dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod ces gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1850: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK087(shu)002:1851: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor cig tu 'gyur ba de la mchod pa dbul te /
NK087(shu)002:1852: bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:1853: 'od zer las lha mo'i tshogs la se la sogs mang po sprul te /
NK087(shu)002:1854: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la slar thim /
NK087(shu)002:1855: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas /
NK087(shu)002:1856: lha mo mang po slar 'thon nas /
NK087(shu)002:1857: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang bstod pa byed pa de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1858: mnyes nas nye bar gyur pa'i ngang zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:1859: las bzhi'i mchod pa tsam byas te /
NK087(shu)002:1862: gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1863: dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan mar bcas zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1864: dbyibs ring po dang thung ngu dang zlum po dang gru bzhi dang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:1865: kha dog dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po la sogs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1866: lha so so'i phyag na 'dod pa'i yon tan bsnams nas mchod pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1867: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yis zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1868: mchod pa'i lha mo de rnams kyis /
NK087(shu)002:1869: bdag dkyil 'khor ba rnams la mchod pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1870: mchod sbyin stobs pa'i las rnams bya zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1871: kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'ba' zhig bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:1872: de nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1873: de nas rig kyi bu mchog de zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1874: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog de zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1875: slob dpon gyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang
NK087(shu)002:1876: nos pa de'i de ma thag pa de nas gzhung
NK087(shu)002:1877: mthun pa'i slob ma de ste /
NK087(shu)002:1878: rigs so so'i mtshan nyid gang ldan pa de la dbang bskur bar brtsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1879: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1880: nyan thos las gsang ba'i phyir gsang ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:1881: brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor de bstan par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1882: ci dga' zhes dris nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1883: slob dpon gyis bris pa'i bka' lung de gnang ba gsal ba'i tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:1886: slob ma'i bdag ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la blta bar 'tshal lags so //
NK087(shu)002:1887: zhes pa ste zhus tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:1888: 'jug pa pos kyang lan du sbyin zhes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1889: gong gi tshig nyid la bsnyags so //
NK087(shu)002:1890: de nas mna' dgag pa'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:1891: bla ma lung ldan dam pa des //
NK087(shu)002:1892: mna' yi rdo rje sbyin pa'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:1893: bzlas pa'i chu ni glud par bya //
NK087(shu)002:1895: bla ma lung dang ldan pa'i dam pa des //
NK087(shu)002:1896: slob ma las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:1897: pad+ma'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga sbyar ba //
NK087(shu)002:1898: de la sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas la blud do //
NK087(shu)002:1899: sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kun da li h'u zhes brjod la /
NK087(shu)002:1900: de nas blud de rdo rje tshig tu yang 'di skad yang brjod do //
NK087(shu)002:1901: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
NK087(shu)002:1902: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
NK087(shu)002:1903: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub rgyu //
NK087(shu)002:1906: de nas dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1907: gsang ba'i dam tshig sgrags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1908: gsang ba'i dam tshig 'og nas 'byung ba 'di dag sgrags so //
NK087(shu)002:1909: skal dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu //
NK087(shu)002:1910: khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni //
NK087(shu)002:1911: chos nyan pa'i skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu
NK087(shu)002:1912: zhes slob ma la bos nas khyod kyis bsrung bar
NK087(shu)002:1913: bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di rnams bstan
NK087(shu)002:1914: to // zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:1915: lha dang bla ma spun mi spangs zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:1916: lha dang bla ma spun mi spangs zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:1917: ni yi dam gyi lha dang rtag tu 'grog par
NK087(shu)002:1918: bya ba dang / rdo rje spun rtag tu mi 'bral ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:1919: rdo rje slob dpon bla ma dam pa ste mi spang ste rtag tu rten par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1920: sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin de zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i sngags bzlas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:1921: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bca' ba dang mi 'bral bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1922: gsang ba gzhan la spel mi bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1923: gsang ba'i man ngag 'di lta bu yin zhes snod
NK087(shu)002:1924: ngan pa la bsgrags par bya ba ma yin no
NK087(shu)002:1925: // bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni rnam pa lnga rtag tu bza' zhing bca' bar bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1926: bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnam pa lnga ni /
NK087(shu)002:1927: zla ba nyi ma chu smar dri dang lnga ste /
NK087(shu)002:1928: dus rtag tu bza' zhing spyad par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1929: sha lnga dang ni chang lnga dang //
NK087(shu)002:1930: 'dod pa rnams ni rtag tu bsten //
NK087(shu)002:1932: sha lnga ni glang po che'i sha dang /
NK087(shu)002:1935: nam mkha' lding gi sha dang /
NK087(shu)002:1937: 'dod pa rnams ni 'dod chags chen po dang /
NK087(shu)002:1942: de rnams ni mi spang ste /
NK087(shu)002:1944: sbyor dang sgrol dang 'phra ma dang /
NK087(shu)002:1945: mi snyan sku dang spyad par bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:1946: sbyor ba'i yang dag pa'i don la sbyor ba bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1947: sgrol ba ni gnyis med pa'i ngang du khams gsum gyi sems can sgrol ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1948: 'phra ma de phyin ci log dang bral ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1949: mi snyan pa ni yang dag pa'i don la yid ches pa'i tshig smra'o //
NK087(shu)002:1950: sku ni gnyis su med pa'i don te gzhan gyis ma byin kyang blang bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1951: spyad par bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems de ni spyad par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1952: dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi bya //
NK087(shu)002:1953: khrims dang bsdom pas bcings pa min //
NK087(shu)002:1954: zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i don la yid
NK087(shu)002:1955: ches pa med na dka' thub khrims nyis brgya lnga
NK087(shu)002:1956: bcu bsrung bar yang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdom
NK087(shu)002:1957: pa byas kyang rnam par rtog pas bcings pa ste
NK087(shu)002:1958: / de ltar byas pa ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1959: yang dag pa'i don la yid ma ches na ni ji ltar byas pa rtog pa'i don yin no //
NK087(shu)002:1960: snying nas slob dpon smod pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:1963: snying gi gting nas zhe sdang skyes te /
NK087(shu)002:1964: slob dpon thabs g.yo yis smod na thabs kyi sgo
NK087(shu)002:1965: nas bsgrub kyang dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro
NK087(shu)002:1966: // de ni dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i rim pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:1967: dkyil 'khor dang po bsgrubs pa'i dbang zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1968: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i rjes su bum pa'i dbang bskur ba brtsam ste /
NK087(shu)002:1969: bum brgyad dam bcu drug rnams gcig tu bsdom pa'am /
NK087(shu)002:1972: rdo rje las mi bskyod pa'i skur bskyed do //
NK087(shu)002:1973: de la dgug dang bzhugs dang gtim byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:1974: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ba'i rjes la mi bskyod pa zhu nas chu'i gzugs su gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:1976: gnyis pa rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang zhes bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:1977: de nas cod pan gyis dbang bskur te /
NK087(shu)002:1978: swa las rin po che las rin chen 'byung ldan gyi skur gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:1979: de la yang dgug pa dang bstod pa yan chad bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1980: de yongs su gyur pa las cod pan gyi gzugs su gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:1981: des dbang bskur ba ni gsum pa gsang ba'i gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1982: de nas rdo rje'i dbang sbyin te /
NK087(shu)002:1983: am las pad+ma las snang ba mtha' yas kyi skur gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:1984: de la mchod bstod bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1985: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjer gyur te
NK087(shu)002:1986: des dbang bskur ba ni bzhi bar chad pa'i dbang
NK087(shu)002:1988: de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur yi ge ha las
NK087(shu)002:1989: ral gri de yongs su gyur pa las don yod
NK087(shu)002:1991: de la mchod bstod bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:1992: de yongs su gyur pa las dril bur gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:1993: des dbang bskur ba ni las kyi dbang ni lnga par sbyin zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:1994: de nas ming gi dbang bskur te /
NK087(shu)002:1995: slob dpon gyis lag pa slob ma'i mgor bzhag ste /
NK087(shu)002:1996: rdo rje tshig tu yang 'di skad brjod de /
NK087(shu)002:1997: khyod ni sangs rgyas dngos yin te //
NK087(shu)002:1998: rab tu basngagasa pa'i gsang ba'i ming //
NK087(shu)002:1999: rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba /
NK087(shu)002:2000: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2001: zhes pa ni drug pa rab 'byams rgyal po'i dbang zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2002: de nas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2003: gsang ba'i dbang dang shes rab kyi dbang dang ye shes kyi dbang ste /
NK087(shu)002:2004: de rnams la sogs pa'i dbang rnams ji snyed pa
NK087(shu)002:2005: tshang bar bskur du rung bar bshad ces gsungs so
NK087(shu)002:2006: // de nas drin la lan gyis glan pa'i phyir yon dbul bar bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2007: de'i phyir nas dbang thob bya'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
NK087(shu)002:2008: bstan de de nas dbang mchog thob bya'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2009: dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag pa de nas /
NK087(shu)002:2010: de dbang gi mchog rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2012: rigs kyi bu mchog de dag gis zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2013: rigs so so'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bu mchog gang yin pa de dag gis /
NK087(shu)002:2014: yon gyi mchog rang gi bye brag gi dbul te /
NK087(shu)002:2015: de yang srog lus lam 'jungs pa'i sems kyis dbul te /
NK087(shu)002:2016: de'i phyir yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges /
NK087(shu)002:2017: srog lus man chad rdzas kyi rnams //
NK087(shu)002:2018: ma 'jungs pa'i sems kyis dbul te //
NK087(shu)002:2019: zhes pa la sogs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2020: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i yon bshad pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2021: rang gi lus dang sems dag dang zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2022: rang gi lus dang sems dga' dang zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:2023: ni rang gi lus dbul gyis bzhes shig bdag gi
NK087(shu)002:2024: sems dbul gyis bzhes shig pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2025: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas slob dpon dam pa mnyes par byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2026: snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te //
NK087(shu)002:2028: snying brtse zhing gdung ba yin gyi mchog dam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2029: sems kyi dgongs pa gang dang gang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2030: slob dpon dam pa de'i thugs dang ji ltar 'tshams pa gang dang gang ste /
NK087(shu)002:2031: de dang de ru dbul bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2032: gong du bstan pa'i yon rnams ni //
NK087(shu)002:2033: rdo rje 'dzin gyi yon du bshad do //
NK087(shu)002:2034: de nas sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi yon bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2035: mi chen dag ni 'dod pa bzhin //
NK087(shu)002:2036: yon tan sna tshogs dbul ba ni //
NK087(shu)002:2037: zhes bya ba ni mi chen ni bran gyi nang nas snying nye dbul ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2038: rdzas sdug pa dbul ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2039: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs pa dbul ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2040: sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2041: de nas rin po che'i yon bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2042: rin po che dang nor gyi dbyig /ji snyed yod pa thams cad ni //
NK087(shu)002:2044: rin po che sna lnga la sogs pa thams cad dang /
NK087(shu)002:2045: nor gyi dbyig phangs pa thams cad dang /
NK087(shu)002:2046: ci 'os shing 'tshams pa'i nor ji snyed yod pa thams cad ni /
NK087(shu)002:2047: rin chen 'dzin gyi yon yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2048: de nas pad+ma'i yon bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2049: ma dang bu mo chung ma dang /
NK087(shu)002:2050: zhes bya ba ni ma las zhes pa med de
NK087(shu)002:2051: bu mo dang chung ma dang snying du sdug pa
NK087(shu)002:2052: dbul lo // sring mo shin tu brgyan pa dang
NK087(shu)002:2053: zhes bya ba sring mo la gzi g.yu la sogs
NK087(shu)002:2054: pa rin po che sna pas brgyan la dbul bar
NK087(shu)002:2055: dbul lo // bya'o // mi'i ming dang mtshan ma can zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2056: ta la sogs pa mi'i mtshan ma yod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2057: dud 'gro'i rigs mo'i mtshan ma yod pa de rnams pad+ma can gyi yon yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2058: de nas las kyi yon bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2059: glang po rta dang shing rta dang //
NK087(shu)002:2061: glang po che dang rta bzang po dang /
NK087(shu)002:2063: der ma zad de byol song ji ltar 'degs che ba rnams dbul ba'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:2064: tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
NK087(shu)002:2065: theg pa'i bye brag sna tshogs kun zhes pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2066: sna tshogs rdo rje'i yon yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2067: de nas spyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi yon ni sangs rgyas kun la zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:2068: spyi'i dkyil 'khor dag tu dbul zhes pa tshig lngas bstan go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:2069: de nas yon de rnams slob dpon la phul bar ma zad de /
NK087(shu)002:2070: shes rab ma la yang dbul bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2071: dkyil 'khor dag gi de dag tu zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2072: gong du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag du sbas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2074: de'i rkyen gzugs med dang de dag la yang gong
NK087(shu)002:2075: du gsungs pa'i yon gyi bye brag de dang de
NK087(shu)002:2076: dag dbul lo // de nas dbang rtags sbyin pa
NK087(shu)002:2077: bstan pa'i phyir dbang mchog thob pa'i bu mchog la
NK087(shu)002:2078: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2079: dbang mchog thob pa'i rigs kyi bu mchog de la
NK087(shu)002:2080: ni dang po kho nar sems bskyed pa rdzogs par
NK087(shu)002:2081: bya zhing 'di lta ba'i rgyu des 'bras bu 'di
NK087(shu)002:2082: lta bu thob pa'i gtan tshigs sbyin de de'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:2083: dang po sems kyi gtan tshigs sbyin zhes gsungs so
NK087(shu)002:2084: // gnyis pa phyag rgya bsgom pa gtad ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2085: dbang gnyis pa thob pa'i rtags ni rten dang brten du snang bsgom pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2086: gsum pa gsang ba'i nges don bshad /
NK087(shu)002:2088: dbang gsum pa'i rtags su yon tan gyi cha rnams te /
NK087(shu)002:2089: rten gyi yon tan dang brten can gyi yon tan bsgrags pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2090: bzhi pa chos kyi glegs bam bshad ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2091: dbang bzhi pa thob pa'i rtags ni gsung rnam par dag pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2092: gzhan dang gzhan dag la rgyu chos bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2093: lnga par las bzhi'i rgya rtags sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2094: dbang rdzogs pa'i rtags su 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi pa'i rtags sbyin pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2095: drug par rin chen bdun nam /
NK087(shu)002:2096: rdzas kyi khyad par can dag dang /
NK087(shu)002:2097: yang na sna tshogs tshang bar sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2098: dbang drug pa rdzogs pa'i rtags su rdo rje la sogs drangs ba'i ming te /
NK087(shu)002:2099: rin po che sna bdun gyis mjug bsdus pa'i ming gdags pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2101: der ma zad de rdzas kyi khyad par rin po che sna bdun nyid du yang sbyin par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2102: der ma zad de yang sna tshogs pa'i rtags sbyin par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2103: de nas dbang ji ltar thob pa'i rmi bltas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2104: dbang mchog thob pa'i rmi bltas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2105: slob ma sta gon la gnas nas ku sha'i stan
NK087(shu)002:2106: la seng ge'i nyal thabs kyis nyal ba'i dus na
NK087(shu)002:2107: / dbang ji ltar thob par 'dod pa'i rmi bltas dag dang 'byung bar nges te /
NK087(shu)002:2108: de yang 'og nas 'byung ba 'di rnams te /
NK087(shu)002:2109: de la yang sngon la yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang thob pa'i rmi bltas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2110: rang gi sems la dbang thob dang zhes bya ba nas /
NK087(shu)002:2111: mthong nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang thob pa'i snga bltas yin par nges zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2112: dgrol mi dgos dkyus nyid na gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:2113: de nas sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi dbang thob nas 'ong ba'i snga ltas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2114: lus kyi rdzu 'phrul thob pa dang zhes pa nas
NK087(shu)002:2115: 'khor lo can gyi dbang thob ltas zhes pa'i bar
NK087(shu)002:2116: gyis bstan te / dkyus nyid gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:2118: de nas rin po che'i dbang thob pa'i snga ltas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2119: rin chen sna tshogs spyod pa dang zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:2120: rin chen rigs kyi dbang thob ltas /
NK087(shu)002:2121: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:2122: de nas pad+ma'i dbang thob nas 'od ba'i snga ltas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2123: pad+ma'i rdzing na rtse ba dang zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:2124: rdo rje chos kyi dbang thob yin //
NK087(shu)002:2125: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:2126: de nas phyi'i dbang thob pa'i snga ltas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2127: rmi lam mtshan ma ji snyed pa la sogs pa gsungs /
NK087(shu)002:2128: gong du bstan pa'i rmi ltas dang mtshan ma dang
NK087(shu)002:2129: ji ltar rmis shing mthong ba de rnams spyi'i dbang
NK087(shu)002:2131: yang na ci yang ma mthong ba'am zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa'i ltas rnams med do //
NK087(shu)002:2132: rmi lam chos nyid stong pa 'di lta bu yin
NK087(shu)002:2133: no zhes ston cing bdag gi kyang bstan pa'i rmi
NK087(shu)002:2135: mngon sum gsang ba thams cad kun zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:2136: ni rmi lam du mngon sum dang 'dra bar khyod
NK087(shu)002:2137: kyis lus la ni 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi yod
NK087(shu)002:2138: do // zhes ston pa dang rang gis kyang yid
NK087(shu)002:2139: kyi yul du gsang ba mthong ba de ni ci'i
NK087(shu)002:2140: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang thob pa'i snga ltas su rung
NK087(shu)002:2141: do // bar bshad do // de nas dbang thob pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2143: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2144: gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di dag tu zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:2145: ni rigs kyi bu gang su rung ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK087(shu)002:2146: gong du gsungs pa'i bye brag de dag tu zhugs
NK087(shu)002:2147: nas dbang thob pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan ni
NK087(shu)002:2149: 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bskur zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2150: 'jig rten 'di na dbang che ba'i gtso bo dang /
NK087(shu)002:2151: de'i 'khor rnams kyis bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2152: tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs par zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2153: 'jig rten 'di ru tshe ring zhing longs spyod phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2154: kun gyi bstod cing bkur ba da nga zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2155: 'jig rten pa kun gyis bstod pa dbul zhing thams cad kyis bkur sti byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2156: sdug cing basngagasa pa brjod pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2157: kun gyi yid du 'ong zhing yon tan gyi bye brag brjod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2158: nad med lang tsho bde ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2159: nad med cing shin tu gzhon par gyur pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2160: shes rab phul du phyung ba'i lang tsho ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2161: lus yang zhing bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2164: 'jig rten 'di na mthu che ba'i gnod sbyin la sogs pa 'dul ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:2165: sangs rgyas kun gyi sras su dgongs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2166: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang dus dam par thugs kyis dgongs so //
NK087(shu)002:2167: rgyal sras rnams kyi grogs mthong zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2168: rgyal ba'i sras po rnams kyis spun dang grogs su mthong ngo //
NK087(shu)002:2169: de la sogs te bsam gyis mi khyab ces pa la sogs pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2170: 'jig rten 'di'i yon tan mang po 'byung zhing /
NK087(shu)002:2171: mi dang lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas kyang bkur bsti byed do //
NK087(shu)002:2172: de nas sku'i dkyil 'khor dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
NK087(shu)002:2173: dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang gsum po gang yang
NK087(shu)002:2174: rung ste / zhugs pa'i yon tan 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2175: sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi /
NK087(shu)002:2176: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2177: gong du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug kyi nang nas /
NK087(shu)002:2178: sku'i dkyil 'khor tsa ka li bkod pa las /
NK087(shu)002:2180: rnam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2181: ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du 'grub bo //
NK087(shu)002:2182: gsung gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2183: gzhan yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2184: gong du gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor yi ger bkod pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2185: yi ge gsung gi dkyil 'khor bris pa las zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2186: so so'i gdan stengs su so so'i yi ger gsal bar bkod pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2187: yi ge gsung gi phyag rgya tshogs /
NK087(shu)002:2188: ji bzhin gsal bar bkod pa'o zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2189: de ltar bkod pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor der zhugs
NK087(shu)002:2190: pa'i yon tan yang gong ma dang 'dra ba'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:2191: / dkyil 'khor dag tu slob ma rnams //
NK087(shu)002:2192: zhugs pa yang ni de bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:2194: de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i yon tan kun 'dra bar bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2195: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de ni phyag mtshan dgod pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2196: de bstan pa'i phyir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2197: bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor sku'i 'khor lo dgod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2199: thugs phyag mtshan dgod pa gsum gyi dam par gyur pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2200: 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2201: brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor so so'i bzhugs gnas su so so phyag mtshan bri ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2202: so so'i rang rtags phyag mtshan rnams /
NK087(shu)002:2203: ji bzhin gnas su dgod pa ru /
NK087(shu)002:2204: zhugs pa la sogs byas pa na //
NK087(shu)002:2205: yon tan de dang 'dra ba thob /
NK087(shu)002:2207: de nas dkyil 'khor gsum du nges pa med par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2208: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnams zhes pa la sogs te /
NK087(shu)002:2210: gsung gi dkyil 'khor la yang gsum /
NK087(shu)002:2211: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la yang gsum ste de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2212: gcig la yang gsum gsum yod pa yin zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:2213: gsum po re re yang gsum du 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2214: de bas na rnal 'byor pa blo dang ldan pas
NK087(shu)002:2215: ni dkyil 'khor la nges pa med par shes par
NK087(shu)002:2216: bya'o // zhes ston pas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:2217: sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pas na gzugs kyii dkyil 'khor gyi le'u /
NK087(shu)002:2218: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba rgya cher 'grel pa las /
NK087(shu)002:2219: kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'ba' zhig gi bshad pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2220: le'u ste gsum pa'o ////de ltar gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor
NK087(shu)002:2221: bstan kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ma shes
NK087(shu)002:2222: na / rtag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa de gsal ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2223: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2224: gzugs kyi le'u bshad pa de ma thag pa de
NK087(shu)002:2225: nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bshad de gsungs
NK087(shu)002:2227: de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2228: ston pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang dag pa'i don
NK087(shu)002:2229: dang gnyis mi 'bral bas rdo rje 'dzin zhes brjod
NK087(shu)002:2230: do // thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2231: ston pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
NK087(shu)002:2232: phyi nang du snang ba'i chos thams cad sku gsung
NK087(shu)002:2233: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor de yang don dam par yod
NK087(shu)002:2235: de snang la rang bzhin med pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2236: rang bzhin med pa de nas gsum du 'gyur ba med de /
NK087(shu)002:2237: brjod pa dang bral ba nam mkha' bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:2238: de ltar gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gsum du gsungs pa
NK087(shu)002:2239: don dam pa dang rang bzhin med par bstan pa
NK087(shu)002:2240: ni / gsum rnam par dag ste de'i phyir rnam par dag gsung mchog rgyal po des /
NK087(shu)002:2241: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
NK087(shu)002:2242: mgo nas 'byung ba'i 'di skad bka' stsal te /
NK087(shu)002:2243: de yang ting nge 'dzin gyis ma zin na ji
NK087(shu)002:2244: ltar byas pa de thams cad skyon du 'gyur ba
NK087(shu)002:2246: rdo rje thig ni btab pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2247: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2248: rdo rje thig ni btab pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2249: dang po brtag pa da nga mjug thig gdab pa'i bar du ji ltar byas pa las so //
NK087(shu)002:2250: tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba'i brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor
NK087(shu)002:2251: te zhes bya ba ni tshon gyi dgye ba'i las
NK087(shu)002:2252: dang phyag mtshan dang yig 'bru dang /
NK087(shu)002:2253: sku la sogs pa dgod pa'i brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor de /
NK087(shu)002:2254: rnal 'byor pa yang dag pa'i don la sems mi bya'o byas na skyon ci yod ce na /
NK087(shu)002:2255: yod de bsnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor byas na dngos po
NK087(shu)002:2256: la mngon par zhen pa'i skyon yod pas gnyis su
NK087(shu)002:2257: med pa'i dngos grub rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2258: byas na dngos grub brnyed par dka' zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2259: de nas ting nge 'dzin gtso blang ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2260: de bas ting nge 'dzin nan tan bsgom zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:2261: de nas so so'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2262: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2263: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2264: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus dbyings te /
NK087(shu)002:2265: yi ge e las grub pa'i chos 'byung ba'i gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:2266: de'i dbus su bsgom par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2268: dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
NK087(shu)002:2270: chos 'byung ba'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor e las grub pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2271: me'i dkyil 'khor yi ge ram las grub pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2272: chu'i dkyil 'khor yi ge bam las grub pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2273: sa'i dkyil 'khor yi ge sum las grub pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2274: rin po che'i ri rab yi ge lam las grub pa de rnams bsgom par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2275: gzhal yas khang me 'bar ba bsgom zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2276: dpag cing gzhal ba las zhes pas gzhal yas te /
NK087(shu)002:2277: yi ge b+h+rum las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang /
NK087(shu)002:2278: rta babs la sogs pa rgyan sna tshogs pas 'khrigs
NK087(shu)002:2279: shing gzhal yas de'i phyi rol na h'u las grub
NK087(shu)002:2280: pa'i rdo rje gur la me 'od 'bar ba ste
NK087(shu)002:2282: 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor los brgyan pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2284: rta babs kyi steng du brgyan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2285: rol mo ni 'dod pa'i lha mo ste /
NK087(shu)002:2286: gzugs kyi lha mo gar mkhan ma la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2287: gang du brgyan na rmang gi phyag la brgyan no //
NK087(shu)002:2288: de ni rang sngags bdag po bsgom zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2289: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa der ni rang
NK087(shu)002:2290: gi sngags kyi bdag mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bsgom
NK087(shu)002:2291: mo // 'dir ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:2292: spyi'i tshig de kun la khyab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2293: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2294: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2295: chos 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya de ni nam mkha' ste de'i dbus su gzhal yas khang bsgom pa de /
NK087(shu)002:2296: de'i nang du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2297: rang sngags rdo rje can gyis gzugs zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:2298: ni rang gi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rdo
NK087(shu)002:2300: 'phags pa'i gnas thob pa'i dus su gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje can du 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2302: de nas 'khor lo can gyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2303: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2304: bsgom na 'khor lo can du 'gyur zhes bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:2305: de nas rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2306: rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya zhes pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2308: pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2309: pad+mo zhes pa nas pad+mo can du 'gyur zhes pas bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:2310: las kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2312: las kyi sems par 'gyur zhes pas bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:2313: de nas spyi'i dkyil 'khor du bstan cing ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2314: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes pa nas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2315: ye shes drug pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
NK087(shu)002:2316: de nas ting nge 'dzin de bsgom par bya ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2317: rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag gam zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2318: rab tu dben pa'i nas ni dur khrod de la ma mo'i dben pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2319: ri bo ni sbrul gdug pa yod pas dben pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2320: chu gling gi chu srin gyis dben pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2321: nags 'dabs ni stag dang dom gyis 'jigs pa mi
NK087(shu)002:2322: 'ong bas de lta bu'i gnas su ting nge 'dzin
NK087(shu)002:2323: bsgoms na ni / rnal 'byor pa nyid ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2324: de ci tsam du bsgoms na thob pa'i tshad bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2325: rnal 'byor can gyi zla drug tu /
NK087(shu)002:2326: bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2327: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK087(shu)002:2328: 'byor pa'i rnal 'byor pas zla ba drug tu bsgoms
NK087(shu)002:2329: na nges par ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur
NK087(shu)002:2330: ro // de nas rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i dus su /
NK087(shu)002:2331: nang gi sbyin sreg bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2332: glang po'i sha la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2333: a las b+han+da dkar po sgo nga bcas pa 'dra ba zhig bskyed do //
NK087(shu)002:2334: de'i 'og tu ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa zhig bskyed do //
NK087(shu)002:2335: de'i 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu
NK087(shu)002:2336: dbyibs 'dra ba sngon po ba dan bzhis mtshan pa
NK087(shu)002:2337: zhig bskyed do // de nas b+han+da'i nang du glang
NK087(shu)002:2338: po'i sha dang rta sha dang nam mkha' lding gi
NK087(shu)002:2339: sha dang khyi'i sha dang bya'i sha ste lnga bsam
NK087(shu)002:2340: zhig bskyed do // mo // de'i steng du dri chen dang dri chu dang /
NK087(shu)002:2343: byang chub kyi sems dang lnga bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2344: de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2345: de'i steng du am dang h'u swa dang ha rnams so //
NK087(shu)002:2346: sa'i phyogs su bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2347: b+han+da de'i nam mkha' la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'u las rdo rje /
NK087(shu)002:2348: rdo rje'i bum pa'i nang du yang h'u ngo //
NK087(shu)002:2349: yig 'bru lnga pa de las 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:2350: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs la phog pas /
NK087(shu)002:2351: thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul te /
NK087(shu)002:2353: yi ge dang bdud rtsi lnga rnams yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:2354: rigs lnga'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang rgyan rnams shin tu gsal bar blta'o //
NK087(shu)002:2355: sha lnga las ni glang po che'i sha glang po che'i gdan la sogs pa'i gdan lngar gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2356: glang po che'i sha las ni glang po che'i gdan du gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2357: rta sha las ni rta'i gdan nyid du 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2358: bya sha las ni bya'i gdan du 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2359: nam mkha' lding gi sha las ni shang shang gi gdan du 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2360: khyi sha las ni seng ge'i gdan du 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2361: de nas rdo rje bum pa'i nang na gnas pa'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:2362: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid du mdzad de /
NK087(shu)002:2363: de spyan drangs nas bstim nas de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2364: de'i rjes la so so rang rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:2365: de dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud rtsi'i ngo bor spyan drangs te /
NK087(shu)002:2366: rigs lnga la thim pas rigs lnga gdan dang bcas par bdud rtsi'i ngo bor zhu bar gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:2367: de'i skabs nyid du rdo rje'i h'u las 'od zer
NK087(shu)002:2368: gong ma bzhin du 'phros pas bdud rtsi yang dgug
NK087(shu)002:2370: h'u gis 'od zer gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed do //
NK087(shu)002:2374: rdo rje yang lhung ste bdud rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2375: b+han d+ha dang rdo rje gnyis thabs dang shes rab bo //
NK087(shu)002:2376: de las bdud rtsi dkar lhung lhung gnas pa de las yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
NK087(shu)002:2377: +aa h'u gsum gyis b+han d+ha kha gcod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2378: de ni bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2379: de nas bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2380: bdag nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar dkyil
NK087(shu)002:2381: 'khor 'khor lo skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK087(shu)002:2382: bskyed la / bdag nyid kyi lce la h'u las
NK087(shu)002:2383: rdo rje'i bum pa'i nang na h'u gnas pa de'i
NK087(shu)002:2384: 'od zer gyis drangs nas bza' bar bsam /
NK087(shu)002:2385: las kyi rdo rje byin la bza' ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2387: de ltar rnal 'byor pas bza' bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2388: sha lnga dag la byin gyis brlabs /
NK087(shu)002:2389: zas phyir 'di dag bza' bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:2390: kha zas gzhan la chags mi bya /
NK087(shu)002:2391: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2392: bdud rtsi'i zas bza' ba las ma rtags par zas
NK087(shu)002:2393: phal pa la chags par bya ba ni ma yin
NK087(shu)002:2394: no // bdud rtsi des bdag nyid kyi thugs ka'i 'khor lo tshim par bsam pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2395: nang gi sbyin sreg bya zhes bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:2397: de nas yang sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2398: de yang sngon la sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2399: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
NK087(shu)002:2400: rang sngags sku ni rnam pa kun //
NK087(shu)002:2402: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2403: chos 'byung ba'i dbus su gong gi rim pa ji bzhin pa'i gnas su sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms na /
NK087(shu)002:2404: 'phags pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i dus na /
NK087(shu)002:2405: mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2406: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
NK087(shu)002:2407: de nas gsung gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2408: de'i phyir nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par /
NK087(shu)002:2409: rang sngags yi ge rnam pa kun //
NK087(shu)002:2412: 'phags pa'i dus na gsung 'gag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2413: chos kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2414: de nas yang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2415: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes pa nas 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ces pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2416: las dang po pas ting nge 'dzin goms pas lan cig /
NK087(shu)002:2417: 'phags pa'i sku thob pa'i dus na thugs spros pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang bsgyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2418: de nas ting nge 'dzin bsgom la snyan la sogs pa'i rdzas dang /
NK087(shu)002:2419: yo byad la sogs pa med kyang 'gal ba med cing bsgrub par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2420: rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2421: gong du gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gzhan du mi g.yo bas rtse gcig pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2422: de la gnas shing bsgoms na /
NK087(shu)002:2423: gong 'dod pa las byed pas na de la ni cho ga ste bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2424: rdzas dang yo byad rnams tshogs na yang ni gtso bor bshad do //
NK087(shu)002:2425: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan na nges par 'grub pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2426: de bas ting nge 'dzin la nan tan cher bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:2427: yang nas yang du ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2428: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sems 'dul ba'i thabs dpe bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2429: dper na glang chen smyon pa dag /gdul thabs lcags kyus 'dul ba ltar zhes bya bas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2430: dper na glang po che smyon pa dag 'dul ba'i dus na /
NK087(shu)002:2431: skyes bu rtsal po ches lcags kyus dpral ba nas gzung nas 'dul ba ltar /
NK087(shu)002:2432: byang chub kyi sems kyang 'dul bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2433: rang sems rmu rgod 'dul dka' yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2434: rang sems rmu rgod 'dul dka' yang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2435: rang gi sems ni rlung la zhon nas kun nas 'gro ste shin tu 'dul bar dka' ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:2436: 'on te gang gis thub par 'gyur zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:2437: mnyam bzhag ting 'dzin rtse gcig gis /
NK087(shu)002:2438: btul nas dngos grub ya mtshan 'gyur //
NK087(shu)002:2440: dang po rang gi sems dbugs kyi rta la zhon nas mi thub par yul phyin pa'i dus su /
NK087(shu)002:2441: rten gyi rigs thams cad gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin du bstan /
NK087(shu)002:2442: brten gyi rigs thams cad lha'i skur bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2443: des sems brtas par bya ba'i las te /
NK087(shu)002:2445: sems de bskyed pa'i rim pa la bstan par gyur tsam na /
NK087(shu)002:2446: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:2447: lta ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang snang la rang bzhin med de /
NK087(shu)002:2448: byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2449: byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig tu gyur tsam na
NK087(shu)002:2450: sems 'phro bar gyur pa'i bya ba'i yul med de
NK087(shu)002:2452: de'i phyir mnyam bzhag ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig gi zhes bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:2453: de'i ngang la gnas shing gnas pa'i dus na /
NK087(shu)002:2454: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2455: de la ni btul nas dngos grub ya mtshan du 'gyur zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2456: de nas mtshan ma la sogs pa bsgom nas gnyis
NK087(shu)002:2457: su med pa'i ye shes mi 'byung ngam zhe na
NK087(shu)002:2459: mtshan ma dag gi gzugs brnyan dang zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2460: mtshan ma dag gi gzugs brnyan dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2461: mtshan ma'i gzugs brnyan lha'i sku ru bsgom pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2462: gsung gi mtshan ma yig 'bru bsgom pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2463: thugs kyi mtshan ma phyag mtshan du bsgom pa la
NK087(shu)002:2464: sogs pa byas kyang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK087(shu)002:2465: mi 'byung ste / rtag pa'i skyon gyis bcing pa'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:2466: der ma zad de lugs ma la sogs pa phyag
NK087(shu)002:2467: rgya la sogs pas kyang gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK087(shu)002:2469: de'i phyir mtshan ma'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom byas nas kyang /
NK087(shu)002:2470: rang gi rnal 'byor mi 'byung ste zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2471: 'o na rnal 'byor gang las byung zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:2473: byang chub sems la gzhol ba'i mis zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2474: byang chub kyi sems la yang gnyis las don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK087(shu)002:2475: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi don dam pa byang chub kyi sems mtshon pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:2476: byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i gnas nas drangs pa'i dus na /
NK087(shu)002:2477: nor bu'i nang du rin po che'i gnas su gzung ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2478: ye shes bskyed de de la ni /
NK087(shu)002:2479: rang gi rnal 'byor ldan 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2480: bde ba chen po'i lha zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2481: ye shes la ni khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2482: de'i ngang las yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2483: dus nam zhig na rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2484: de'i phyir de bas nan tan rtse gcig gis /
NK087(shu)002:2485: mtshan ma med la brtson par 'bad ces gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:2486: zhes pas bstan te don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2487: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dngos su ston pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2488: le'u ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u'o
NK087(shu)002:2489: // bdud rtsi thigs pa rgya cher bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)002:2490: bden pa gnyis kyi bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o
NK087(shu)002:2491: ////de ltar gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ting nge
NK087(shu)002:2493: sngags dang phyag rgya ma gsungs na /
NK087(shu)002:2494: sems can gyi don mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2495: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2496: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la
NK087(shu)002:2497: sdud pa pos sngags dang phyag rgya'i don zhus pa
NK087(shu)002:2498: bstan pa'i phyir / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
NK087(shu)002:2499: gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la rdo rje yis
NK087(shu)002:2500: kun tu bzang po la gsol ba zhes pa ni
NK087(shu)002:2501: bshad par bya ba'i tshig phrad do //
NK087(shu)002:2502: ci zhig gsol zhe na 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig 'di dag rnams so //
NK087(shu)002:2503: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngags dang
NK087(shu)002:2504: phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid sems can thams cad
NK087(shu)002:2505: la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol zhes pas
NK087(shu)002:2508: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngags bzlas pas ci ltar 'gyur /
NK087(shu)002:2509: phyag rgya bcas pas ji ltar 'gyur /
NK087(shu)002:2510: sngags dang phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid de phyi rabs kyi
NK087(shu)002:2511: rnal 'byor pa dang sems can rnams la sman pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2512: slad du bcos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
NK087(shu)002:2513: gsol zhes sdud pa pos zhus pa'i tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:2514: de zhus pa'i tshig de la lan glan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2515: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag bshad do //
NK087(shu)002:2516: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2517: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes pa'i tshig gi 'phrad do //
NK087(shu)002:2518: sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces bya ba ni bod pa'i tshig ste /
NK087(shu)002:2519: sems dpa' chen po zhes sdud pa po la bos nas /
NK087(shu)002:2520: sngags dang phyag rgya'i don 'di bshad kyis lus ngag
NK087(shu)002:2521: yid gsum gyi sgo nas tshur nyon cig ces pa'o
NK087(shu)002:2522: // de nas sngags dang phyag rgya'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2523: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2524: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes 'byung ba
NK087(shu)002:2525: 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
NK087(shu)002:2526: cad kyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa bsgom zhing sems
NK087(shu)002:2527: brtag par byas te sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgyas
NK087(shu)002:2528: bcas na ji ltar yang 'grub par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2529: de'i phyir las gang bsgrub pa'i snying po yin zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:2530: 'di la gang zhig dad mos pa //
NK087(shu)002:2532: zhes bya ba ni sngags dang phyag rgya 'di la
NK087(shu)002:2533: mos pa'i gang zag des dang po lha'i rnal 'byor
NK087(shu)002:2534: la sems bstan par byas la /
NK087(shu)002:2535: de nas bdag nyid kyi snying kha nas pad+ma 'dab
NK087(shu)002:2536: ma brgyad pa'i steng na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i
NK087(shu)002:2537: steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyi bar
NK087(shu)002:2538: na 'khor lo'i lte ba'i nang na zla ba'i dkyil
NK087(shu)002:2539: 'khor de'i dbus na gnas te lhag ma yi ge
NK087(shu)002:2540: rnams kyis langs pa'i thabs su g.yas nas bskor bar
NK087(shu)002:2541: gnas te / de nas dbugs 'byung ba'i dus na rtsa g.yas nas zhugs te /
NK087(shu)002:2542: sna bug g.yas nas byung nas ji tsam du dbugs byung ba'i yi ge'i phreng ba de lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2543: nang du dbugs 'jug pa'i dus na yang sna bug g.yon nas 'jug ste /
NK087(shu)002:2544: rtsa g.yon pa'i gnas nas yang bzhi po la thim
NK087(shu)002:2545: ste ci srid nang na gnas pa'i bar du gzung
NK087(shu)002:2546: bar bya'o // de ltar byas shing yang nas yang du goms pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2547: 'jug ji srid 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub ste /
NK087(shu)002:2548: bde bar gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pa'i dus na
NK087(shu)002:2549: bde bar gshegs pa la dmigs nas phyag rgya bcas
NK087(shu)002:2550: sngags bzlas pas sngags dang phyag rgya las mchod pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2551: lha mo mang po 'thon nas mnyes pa dbul bar
NK087(shu)002:2552: 'gyur ro // sems can gyi don byed par 'dod
NK087(shu)002:2553: na gang yin pa'i sems can de la phyag rgya
NK087(shu)002:2554: gtad nas sngags bzlas pas bla na med pa'i ye
NK087(shu)002:2555: shes kyi sa thob par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2556: sngags dang phyag rgya de las rnam pa gnyis gnyis su grub pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2557: b+hud d+ha bee ro tsa na zhes pa nas byang
NK087(shu)002:2558: chub mchog tu gdon mi za'i zhes pa'i bar gyis
NK087(shu)002:2559: bstan te / bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu ji lta
NK087(shu)002:2560: bu thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u las bstan
NK087(shu)002:2561: bstan te / te / 'dir ma bkod do //
NK087(shu)002:2562: las gnyis ni 'phags pa mchod pa'i las dang /
NK087(shu)002:2563: sems can gyi las bya ba'i las gnyis las /
NK087(shu)002:2564: mnyes shing mnyes pa zhes pas 'phags pa mchod pa'i las so //
NK087(shu)002:2565: byang chub mchog tu gdon mi za'o //
NK087(shu)002:2566: zhes pas sems can gyi don no //
NK087(shu)002:2567: ji ltar 'dir rgyas par bstan pa bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2568: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni dkyus nyid gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:2569: de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2570: gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyi zhes pa na rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa phyag rgyar bshad /
NK087(shu)002:2572: bsgom pa'i rim pa ni gong du gsal bar bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2573: dbus kyi snying po ni h'u de so so'i snying po dang phyag mtshan nyid do //
NK087(shu)002:2574: las nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:2575: sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
NK087(shu)002:2576: sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2577: grub pa'i dus na phyag rgya gtad /
NK087(shu)002:2579: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyang bskrag cing 'dar bar gyur na /
NK087(shu)002:2580: bdud rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2581: de nas rin chen 'dzin pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2582: gzhan yang rin chen 'dzin pa'i zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:2583: rin chen 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin zhes pas bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:2584: las gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2585: sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis ni bde ba mchog rnams sbyin par byed ces pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2586: gong du gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis grub pa'i dus na /
NK087(shu)002:2587: phyag rgya gtad sngags bzlas pas 'chi ba'i dus las bzlog pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2588: shin tu bde ba'i mchog rtsa rgyas par byed pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2589: gang dga' ba yang rab 'gengs na zhes gsungs pa yin te /
