NK087(shu)002:2590: tshe zad pa yang 'gengs na bgegs las phyung ba smos ci dgos zhes so //
NK087(shu)002:2591: de nas yang chos kyi sems dpa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2592: gzhan yang chos kyi sems dpa'i zhes pa nas pad+ma
NK087(shu)002:2593: sems dpa'i phyag rgya bstan pa yin zhes pa'i bar
NK087(shu)002:2594: gyis bstan te / dkyus nyid gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:2595: las nyid bstan pa'i phyir sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2596: gong du gsungs pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni /
NK087(shu)002:2597: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun
NK087(shu)002:2598: kyang phyag rgya gtang basngagasa bzlas pas dbang du gyur
NK087(shu)002:2599: par gdon mi za bar khams gsum gyi skye bo
NK087(shu)002:2601: mi dgos so zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:2602: de nas yang las kyi sems dpa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bshad pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2603: gzhan yang las kyi sems dpa'i zhes pa nas las
NK087(shu)002:2604: kyi yin zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o
NK087(shu)002:2606: sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
NK087(shu)002:2607: las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2608: sngags 'grub pa'i dus na phyag rgya dang sngags bzlas
NK087(shu)002:2609: pas 'phags pa mchod pa dang sems can gyi don
NK087(shu)002:2611: grub pa thob pa'i dus su'o //
NK087(shu)002:2612: de nas yang yum rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2613: de yang sngon la dbyings phyug ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2614: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2615: thabs las ni gzhan pa shes rab mi bshad pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2616: dbyings phyug ma'i sngags 'di yin zhes bya ba ni
NK087(shu)002:2617: dbyings phyug ma'i gsang ba'i sngags ni 'og nas 'byung
NK087(shu)002:2619: de yang thabs la ji skad gsungs pa bzhin 'di yang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:2620: b+hud d+ha lo tsa na zhes bya ba'i sngags gang yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2622: phyag rgya ni go sla ste ma bkrol lo //
NK087(shu)002:2623: de nas mchod par bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2624: sems can gso bar bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2625: rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2626: sems can thams cad bsrung bar bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2627: ma ma ki'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2628: de nas yang chos kyi gsung rnam par dag pa
NK087(shu)002:2629: sems can gyi don thob par bya ba pad+ma'i dbyings
NK087(shu)002:2630: phyug ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:2631: de nas yangs sangs rgyas dang sems can gnyis dbang du bya ba de bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2632: las kyi dbyings phyug ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:2633: de nas yang sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2634: de yang sngon la sku'i phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2635: sems can gang la byin gyis brlabs pa de sku'i
NK087(shu)002:2636: gnas su yi ge dkar po la rnam par snang
NK087(shu)002:2637: mdzad kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par bskyed nas byin
NK087(shu)002:2638: gyis brlabs te / sku'i sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2639: de nas yang gsung gi byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2640: gsung gi gnas rta mgrin gyi 'khor lo'i dbus yi ge dmar po las /
NK087(shu)002:2641: snang ba mtha' yas kyi skur byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2642: gsung gi sngags dang phyag rgyas bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:2643: de nas yang thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2644: de yang thugs kyi gnas snying gi rtsa gsum gyi
NK087(shu)002:2645: g.yas pa'i nang du yi ge h'u las mi bskyod
NK087(shu)002:2646: pa'i skur bskyed la byin gyis brlabs te /
NK087(shu)002:2647: thugs kyi yang sngags dang phyag rgyas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2648: de nas yang sngags dang phyag rgya brjod pa las 'das pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2649: de'i phyir de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog pas la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2650: gong du gsung pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya de la
NK087(shu)002:2651: sogs pa bgrangs ba las bsam yas pa gang gis
NK087(shu)002:2652: yang bgrangs zhing dpag pa las 'das pa las ni
NK087(shu)002:2653: mchog ste / de ni chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam zhes brjod pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2654: 'di ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa yin la /
NK087(shu)002:2655: 'di ni mi mnyam pa yin zhes brjod par bya ba dang bral te /
NK087(shu)002:2656: de'i phyir nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:2657: nam mkha' ni dpag pa las 'das pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:2658: de'i dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yin pas /
NK087(shu)002:2659: brjod med brjod du med pa'i zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2660: nam mkha' dbyings ni brjod med de las 'das te /
NK087(shu)002:2661: shes pa dang brjod pa las 'das pa ni brjod du med pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:2662: de'i yon tan mtha' klas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung zhes ston pas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:2663: sngags dang phyag rgya spro ba ston pa la /
NK087(shu)002:2664: sngags dang phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:2665: bdud rtsi thigs pa las zhes bya ba rgya cher
NK087(shu)002:2666: bshad pa las bden pa gnyis bshad pa'i le'u lnga
NK087(shu)002:2667: pa'o ////de nas yang rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK087(shu)002:2668: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams ni ston pas gsungs pa yin la /
NK087(shu)002:2669: de las gzhan ni ma gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:2670: snyom ma'i blo 'khor rnams la skye ste /
NK087(shu)002:2672: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2673: sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i de ma thag pa
NK087(shu)002:2674: de nas sdud pa po rdo rje yid kun tu
NK087(shu)002:2675: bzang pos ston pa bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
NK087(shu)002:2676: gi bdag po la 'og nas 'byung ba 'di skad
NK087(shu)002:2677: bshad do // e ma'o rnam dag stong pa'i lam zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2678: e ma'o rnam dag stong pa'i lam zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2679: e ma'o ni ngo mtshar ba'i cho ga ste /
NK087(shu)002:2680: gang la ngo mtshar rang gi lus la stong pa'i lam yod pa ngo mtshar ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:2681: rnam dag ni ye nas ma bcos pa stong pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2682: lam 'di ni rang la rang chas su yod pa
NK087(shu)002:2683: 'di lta bu'o // zhes pa'i stong pa'i lam ni byang chub kyi sems kyi lam ste /
NK087(shu)002:2684: de yang ji ltar yin zhe na 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK087(shu)002:2685: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2686: chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2687: longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2688: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2689: 'on te de rnams gang na gnas zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:2690: dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las kyang /
NK087(shu)002:2691: kun rjob brjod pa ma yin te //
NK087(shu)002:2692: lto ba mtha' zad shes rab la //
NK087(shu)002:2693: thabs ni ze'u 'bru'i rtser zhes bya //
NK087(shu)002:2694: rtsa ba 'dab ma drug cu bzhi //
NK087(shu)002:2695: ma skyes pa yi snying po can //
NK087(shu)002:2696: sa dbus chos su bstan pa ste //
NK087(shu)002:2697: kun 'byung lam chen brgyad yod pa //
NK087(shu)002:2698: sngon la brgyad cha gnyis yod pa //
NK087(shu)002:2699: rtsa bzhi nang gi ma mo bzhi //
NK087(shu)002:2700: phyogs bzhi rtsa bzhi thabs bzhi ste //
NK087(shu)002:2701: bcud ni phung por 'byung bar bshad //
NK087(shu)002:2702: rtag par chos su 'di bstan te //
NK087(shu)002:2703: snying po'am chos kyi sku zhes bya //
NK087(shu)002:2704: de nyid ye shes snying po yin //
NK087(shu)002:2706: thams cad kun la khyab chen po //
NK087(shu)002:2707: de gnyis steng du longs spyod de //
NK087(shu)002:2708: sngon las brgyad cha gnyis yod pa //
NK087(shu)002:2710: ye shes lnga yi snying po can //
NK087(shu)002:2711: chags pa rtag tu sgral bar dga' //
NK087(shu)002:2713: bde chen mtshan ldan pad+ma mdzes //
NK087(shu)002:2714: rtag par gzhol med yi ge h'u //
NK087(shu)002:2715: rang bzhin chos skur mang zhes bya //
NK087(shu)002:2716: ting 'dzin goms pa'i ye shes kyis //
NK087(shu)002:2717: sa gnas kun tu bde ba che //
NK087(shu)002:2718: bde chen mgo bor gnas phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:2719: dkyil 'khor yan lag bcas sprul sku //
NK087(shu)002:2720: de gnyis bde ba bsdu byas ste //
NK087(shu)002:2721: g.yas dang g.yon dang dbus dang gsum //
NK087(shu)002:2722: rim gyis stong par 'jug pa ste //
NK087(shu)002:2723: ye shes skye ba nges pa med //
NK087(shu)002:2724: sems nyid bde la gang gnas pa //
NK087(shu)002:2725: goms pa'i 'od kyang mi dmigs shing //
NK087(shu)002:2726: skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags bya //
NK087(shu)002:2727: mthar ni dmigs par mi 'gyur te //
NK087(shu)002:2728: bde ba yid kyi mi bya zhing //
NK087(shu)002:2729: mtha' ni ci la'ang mi gnas te //
NK087(shu)002:2731: sgra yis tshul las thos pa med //
NK087(shu)002:2732: ra bzhin dang ba'i ye shes ni //
NK087(shu)002:2733: snang stong gnyis su ma yin pas //
NK087(shu)002:2734: rtag tu thig le chen po gsungs //
NK087(shu)002:2735: stong pa'i lam zhes de la bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:2737: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku mchog zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2738: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mchog ni chos sku ste /
NK087(shu)002:2739: chos sku de la thams cad 'byung ba'i bdag por gyur pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2740: sna tshogs las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK087(shu)002:2742: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog ces bya ba
NK087(shu)002:2743: ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
NK087(shu)002:2744: rnam par dag par 'byung ba'i don gsal ba'i sgra
NK087(shu)002:2746: ces gsung gi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2747: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2748: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rnam
NK087(shu)002:2749: par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mnga' bdag gi
NK087(shu)002:2750: gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces thugs kyi
NK087(shu)002:2752: sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje can zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2753: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2754: ye shes mnga' ba'i rtags su rdo rje 'dzin pa
NK087(shu)002:2755: bstod de ston pa'i ngo bor rdo rje 'dzin pa
NK087(shu)002:2756: khyod la 'dud ces pas bstod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2757: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2758: ston pa'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis phyi
NK087(shu)002:2759: dang nang du snang ba thams cad la gsal zhing
NK087(shu)002:2760: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas de'i phyir sangs rgyas
NK087(shu)002:2761: 'khor lo khyod la 'dud ces bstod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2762: nor bu 'dzin pa khyod la 'dud ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2763: ston pa'i thugs ye shes kyi sems can gyi dgos
NK087(shu)002:2764: 'dod re ba yid bzhin skong bas nor bu 'dzin
NK087(shu)002:2765: zhes brjod pa'o // de ltar ston pas sems can
NK087(shu)002:2766: gyi don mdzad kyang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos
NK087(shu)002:2767: pas de'i phyir pad+mo 'chang la 'dud ces pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2768: de ltar phyi nang gi don gang la yang ma 'gags pas don yongs su grub ste /
NK087(shu)002:2769: sna tshogs las la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces sdud pa pos ston pa la gsol ba btab bo //
NK087(shu)002:2771: 'khor gyi rtog pa de gsal ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2772: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2773: ston pa thugs spros pa med pa'i dbyings su sku
NK087(shu)002:2774: gnas sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa bsam yas par
NK087(shu)002:2775: dgyes pa'i phyir / de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas cang mi smra bar bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:2778: de ltar ston pas sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa dgye ba de'i tshe /
NK087(shu)002:2779: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams kyis /
NK087(shu)002:2780: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa dgye ba la 'di ltar gzigs pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2781: 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2782: 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2783: 'gro ba rigs drug la sogs pa'i 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs pas 'dul te de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2784: 'gro rnams tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2785: la las sku'i don mdzad 'gyur zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2787: sku yis don mdzad par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2788: 'gro rnams kun la sdig spang gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2789: 'gro ba rigs drug char la don mdzad kyang log pa'i spyod pas don ma mdzad de /
NK087(shu)002:2790: phyin ci ma log cing sdig pa thams cad spangs nas /
NK087(shu)002:2791: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i sgo nas don mdzad do //
NK087(shu)002:2792: sprul pas so sor 'dul ba rnams ni zhes pa
NK087(shu)002:2793: ni so sor las kyi mthong ba bzhin du 'dul
NK087(shu)002:2794: lo // de yang skus so sor 'dul ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2795: dmyal ba rnams la gshegs pos 'dul zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:2796: 'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs 'dul zhes bya bas bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:2797: de nas gsung spros pa med pa'i sgo nas don mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2798: chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs ni zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:2799: de snyed sgra skad tha dad bstan zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:2800: de nas yang sku ltams pa la sogs pas 'dul bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2801: la lar lhums su gshigs pa'i tshul zhes pa nas
NK087(shu)002:2802: byin brlabs cho 'phrul de ltar bstan zhes pa'i bar
NK087(shu)002:2804: de nas yang so sor 'dul zhing chos kyi 'khor
NK087(shu)002:2805: lo bskor ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi sems can rnams
NK087(shu)002:2806: ji ltar mos par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir ro
NK087(shu)002:2807: // de tshe 'gro rnams thams cad dang zhes pa la sogs bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2808: de yang ston pas sku gsung gi cho 'phrul rnam pa'i bye brag gis /
NK087(shu)002:2809: 'gro ba rnams la so sor chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe /
NK087(shu)002:2810: 'gro ba rigs drug thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i byang chub la ngang par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2811: 'o na ma dad pa gang yin zhe na de bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2812: las kyi stobs kyis dbang bsgyur ba /
NK087(shu)002:2813: log pa can gyi ru tra rnams /
NK087(shu)002:2814: log lta'i mthu bsnyem ma rtogs pa zhes pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2815: sngon gsang ba'i zab mo ni sgros yang dag pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2816: lta ba ni ma shes pa'i las kyi stobs kyis
NK087(shu)002:2817: dbang gis tshe 'di nyid la ldog pa la dga'
NK087(shu)002:2818: ba yang dag pa'i don la smod pa'i ru tra
NK087(shu)002:2819: rnams ni log par blta ba 'jig rten 'dir ni
NK087(shu)002:2820: mthu che ba ngag gtum tshig tu smra ba de
NK087(shu)002:2822: tshogs par bstan par 'khor rnams kyis gzigs pas gong gi the tshom skyes pa'i rtogs pa gsal /
NK087(shu)002:2823: lhag pa'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:2824: byang chub spyod pa'i sgo ji snyed pa'i sgo nas
NK087(shu)002:2825: spyod pa khams gsum gyi sems can de snyed 'bras
NK087(shu)002:2827: yang dag pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:2828: de ltar so so'i sgo nas 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul
NK087(shu)002:2829: sna tshogs par bstan par 'khor rnams kyis gzigs pa
NK087(shu)002:2830: gong gi the tshom skyes pa'i rtog pa gsal te
NK087(shu)002:2831: / gnyis su med pa'i don la sems nas gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:2832: de nas 'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis sdud pa po la bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2833: de nas 'khor lo der 'dus pa'i zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:2834: ston pa'i cho 'phrul 'khor rnams la bstan zin pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2835: de ma thag pa de nas ston pa'i 'khor der
NK087(shu)002:2836: 'dus pa rnams sdud po yid kun tu bzang pos
NK087(shu)002:2837: ston pa las bskul nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna
NK087(shu)002:2838: tshogs pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa de la ngo
NK087(shu)002:2840: sdud pa pos rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po
NK087(shu)002:2841: la 'khor rnams kyis 'og nas 'byung ba'i don 'di
NK087(shu)002:2843: e ma'o zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba'i tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:2844: e ma'o rdo rje kun tu bzang po zhes bya
NK087(shu)002:2845: ba ni ston pa'i sprul par gyur cing ston pa
NK087(shu)002:2846: nyid sdud pa po yin 'khor rnams kyang rtogs te
NK087(shu)002:2847: de'i phyir kun bzang zhes bos pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2848: ngo mtshar khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2849: ston pa las tha mi dad par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te /
NK087(shu)002:2850: khyod la nged 'khor rnams kyang phyag 'tshal lo zhes so //
NK087(shu)002:2851: e ma gsang sngags ya mtshan che zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2852: gsang ba'i sngags ni gsang sngags te /
NK087(shu)002:2853: yang dag pa'i ye shes so //
NK087(shu)002:2854: e ma'o ston pa cho 'phrul che zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:2855: the tshom skye ba bsam pas ngo mtshar ro //
NK087(shu)002:2856: e ma'o sngags kyi mi 'dul med ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2857: nyon mongs pa lnga'i gnyen por mdzad pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2858: 'di ni ngo mtshar ya mtshan no //
NK087(shu)002:2859: zhes bya ba ni gong du ston pas mdzad pa 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar lags so //
NK087(shu)002:2860: zhes 'khor rnams kyis sdud pa po la gsol ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:2861: de nas sdud pa pos 'khor gyi byang chub sems
NK087(shu)002:2862: dpa' thos pa'i the tshom skyes pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2863: phyir / rdo rje yid kyis bka' rtsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:2864: rigs kyi bu khyod tshur nyon cig ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2865: 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs yang dag par byang chub kyi
NK087(shu)002:2866: sems kyi rigs kyi bu rnams nyon cig ces bskul
NK087(shu)002:2867: ba'i tshig go // gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid
NK087(shu)002:2868: la su zhig mos pa'i skyes bu des zhes bya
NK087(shu)002:2869: ba'i tshig go // ba ni / gsang ba'i theg
NK087(shu)002:2870: pa bla na med pa de la rnal 'byor pa
NK087(shu)002:2871: gang su yang rung pa zhig mos pas 'jug na
NK087(shu)002:2872: rnal 'byor pa des mi bya ba ni gang yang
NK087(shu)002:2873: ba'i tshig go // ba ni / med do //
NK087(shu)002:2874: mi 'grub pa ni gang yang med ces bya ba
NK087(shu)002:2875: ni gsang ba'i rdo rje theg pa 'di la zhugs
NK087(shu)002:2876: pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i las
NK087(shu)002:2877: ba'i tshig go // ba ni / med do //
NK087(shu)002:2878: 'di rnams bya'o // de yang ldem po ngag gi
NK087(shu)002:2880: don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:2881: rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:2882: de yang ji ltar zhe na rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2883: bdag nyid kyi snying la rtsa'i dngas ma brgyad gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:2884: de yang gsung chos kyi rtsa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2887: gcig ni yon tan gyi rtsa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2888: de ltar rtsa phra mo brgyad yod do //
NK087(shu)002:2892: tshul ni dngul chu zhun mar gzhol mar gyi zol song ba dang 'dra'o //
NK087(shu)002:2894: sa bon ni su dang tri'o //
NK087(shu)002:2895: de gsum gyi kha dog ni za 'og gur phub pa 'dra'o //
NK087(shu)002:2896: ye shes kyi rtsa la ni 'od mthing ga zhig gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:2897: dbyibs ci 'dra zhe na zhags pa'am sbrul 'khyil ba lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2898: tshul ni dar skud le brgan la shel sgong brgyud pa lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2900: sa bon ni a dang n+ri'o //
NK087(shu)002:2901: rang rgyud kyi rtsa la ni 'od dmar po gcig gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:2902: dbyibs ni zla gam dmar po lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2903: tshul ni sos ka'i chu la smig rgyu ba'am /
NK087(shu)002:2904: rtsi skya ba'i kha la zil pa chags pa lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2905: kha dog ni zangs ma'i zhun ma la ra gan gyi zol song ba lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2906: snying po ni a'i sa bon n+ri pre dang du'o //
NK087(shu)002:2907: de yang ma rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor ba'i rgyu ste /
NK087(shu)002:2908: a dang ni la sogs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2909: rtogs pa'i dus na ye shes te /
NK087(shu)002:2911: de yang ji ltar srog ce na /
NK087(shu)002:2912: 'od ser po la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2913: 'od mthing ga la yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2914: 'od dmar po la nyon mongs pa can gyi yig gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:2915: dmar nag la sgo lnga'i rnam par gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:2916: de yang lha mi gnyis su skye ba'i kha 'dzin
NK087(shu)002:2917: ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas byas a dang
NK087(shu)002:2919: lha ma yin dang byol song du skye ba'i kha
NK087(shu)002:2920: 'dzin ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pas byas nas
NK087(shu)002:2921: sa bon su dang tri gnyis la sog go //
NK087(shu)002:2922: yi dwags dmyal bar skye ba'i kha 'dzin ni sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2923: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyis byas nas pre dang du la sog go //
NK087(shu)002:2924: de ltar gnas pa 'di 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can la rang chas su yod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2925: de lta bur rtsa phra mo brgyad po de yang thag pa khug pa gzhan gnas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2926: de lta bu brgyad 'dom pa'i dbus na rtsa'i dngas
NK087(shu)002:2927: ma'i yang dngas ma dar gyi skud pa lta bu
NK087(shu)002:2928: la dbyibs pa thag khug pa 'dra ba gcig yod
NK087(shu)002:2929: do // de'i sbom phra ni rta rnga bcu ru
NK087(shu)002:2930: bshags pa tsam gyis 'brel dar dkar gyi skud pa
NK087(shu)002:2932: dbugs kyi dngas ma gser sa 'og na gon pa'i rlangs pa tsam cig rgyu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2933: dbugs kyi dngas ma de la kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:2934: de'i dkyil na byang chub kyi sems thig le chen por bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:2935: de'i dpe ji lta bu zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:2936: gser zhun ma'i sbubs kyi nang nor bu rin po che ke ke ru bya bcug pa lta bu'o //
NK087(shu)002:2937: kha dog ni nyi ma shar ba'i dkyil 'dra ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:2938: de ni chos kyi dbyings so //
NK087(shu)002:2939: rtsa'i dngas ma'i yang dngas ma dar dkar gyi skud
NK087(shu)002:2940: pa lta bu la gdod ma nas phung po rten
NK087(shu)002:2941: byed pas na 'byung ba'i dngas ma des lhar snang
NK087(shu)002:2942: ba yum sangs rgyas spyan du gsol ba yod pa'o
NK087(shu)002:2943: // de'i stong pa chen po'i ye shes te /
NK087(shu)002:2944: khams thams cad dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang du gyur pa med pa'i rten byed pa'i /
NK087(shu)002:2945: dar dkar gyi skud pa lta bu de la khrag
NK087(shu)002:2946: gi dngas ma lta bu gnas pa'i gdod ma nas
NK087(shu)002:2947: phung po long 'dog pas 'byung ba'i mdangs ma chu
NK087(shu)002:2949: yum m+aa ma ki'i de nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
NK087(shu)002:2950: thams cad bkol ba med pa'i dbyings cig tu bsdus pas so //
NK087(shu)002:2951: de nyid la dbugs kyi dngas ma sa le sbram
NK087(shu)002:2952: sa 'og na gnas pa'i rlangs pa tsam zhig gnas
NK087(shu)002:2953: pa'i gdod ma nas phung po yang zhing g.yo ba'i
NK087(shu)002:2954: rgyu byed pas 'byung ba rlung du snang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:2955: de ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te /
NK087(shu)002:2956: bya ba thams cad la g.yo bas na'o //
NK087(shu)002:2957: byang chub kyi sems de ni thabs dang shes rab snyom pa yang yod la /
NK087(shu)002:2958: khams gsum par yang yod de /
NK087(shu)002:2959: thig le de a ni la sogs pa'i yi ge
NK087(shu)002:2960: rnams bsdus shing byang chub kyi sems thig le'i ngo
NK087(shu)002:2961: bor brtags pas sangs rgyas ye shes nam mkha'i rang
NK087(shu)002:2962: bzhin lta bu skye zhing 'gro ba rigs drug rgyun
NK087(shu)002:2963: gcod pa'o // de yang ji ltar gcad ce na /
NK087(shu)002:2964: thig le byang chub kyi sems las su rung nas /
NK087(shu)002:2965: 'od dang ldang ba'i ngo bor gyur tsam na /
NK087(shu)002:2966: a gi gang dang 'og nas su dang tri gnas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2967: h'u gi gang dang 'og na a dang n+ri gnas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:2968: a'i gang 'og na pre du gnyis gnas pa 'od du 'bar te /
NK087(shu)002:2969: thig le la rang bzhin med par thim zhing song bas /
NK087(shu)002:2970: thig le yang rang bzhin med par dar gyi skud
NK087(shu)002:2971: pa lta bur rta rnga bcu ru bshags pa tsam
NK087(shu)002:2972: la thim nas mtshal co ga la ma'i mdangs ma
NK087(shu)002:2974: bde ba chen po chags par byed pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:2975: de yang 'od du 'bar zhing 'bar bas dbugs kyi
NK087(shu)002:2976: dngas ma gser sa 'og na gnas pa'i rlangs pa
NK087(shu)002:2977: tsam zhig gnas pa de bde ba chen por g.yo
NK087(shu)002:2979: de'i 'og tu 'bar bas der drod kyi dngas ma
NK087(shu)002:2980: me long nyi ma la bzhag pa'i ngad tsam zhig
NK087(shu)002:2981: gnas pa de gdod ma med pa nas phung po
NK087(shu)002:2982: smin par byed pa'i rang bzhin 'byung ba me ltar
NK087(shu)002:2983: snang ba'i rang bzhin ta 'od kha dog lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:2984: de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
NK087(shu)002:2985: thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings su rtogs pa'i sgron ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:2986: 'od de'i dkyil na yi ge med pa'i thig le
NK087(shu)002:2987: chen po'i byang chub kyi sems bzhugs pa de ni
NK087(shu)002:2989: de'i gdod ma nas phung po gsal bar byed pa'i
NK087(shu)002:2990: rten byed pa'i 'byung ba'i dngas ma de rtsa bug
NK087(shu)002:2991: rnams dang / nam mkha' ltar snang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:2992: de ni khyab pa chen po'i ye shes yum kun tu bzang mor gsal ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:2993: thams cad yang dag pa'i dbyings su gsal ba'i sgo nas go skabs 'byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:2994: de ltar thig le gser zhun ma lta bu ni shes rab ste /
NK087(shu)002:2995: yum thams cad kyi ngo bo'o //
NK087(shu)002:2996: der rin po che ke ke ru bcug pa dang 'dra ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:2998: kun tu bzang mo la sogs pa yab rnams kyi'o //
NK087(shu)002:2999: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes byang chub
NK087(shu)002:3000: kyi sems thig le chen po 'di la me long
NK087(shu)002:3002: lta ba ni mthong ba med pa'i tshul du mthong ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3003: de'i yab gang yin pa yum yin la yum gang yin pa yab yin zhing /
NK087(shu)002:3004: 'od kyi gong bu der tha dad pa ma yin mthong ngo //
NK087(shu)002:3005: dang ma chen po'i thig le nyid kyang rang bzhin med par song ste /
NK087(shu)002:3006: ye nas lhun gyis grub pa nam mkha'i gzugs su
NK087(shu)002:3007: byung ba de nyid ni thig le chen po byang
NK087(shu)002:3008: chub kyi sems zhes bya ba chos nyid kyi sku'o
NK087(shu)002:3009: // de ltar gyur pa'i ngang la ni 'gro ba
NK087(shu)002:3010: rigs drug gi sems can rtsad gcod pa zhes bya'o
NK087(shu)002:3011: // // de la rtag par ting nge 'dzin gnas pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3012: rtag tu bsod la brtson pa dang zhes gsungs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3013: ma byin len dang mi tshangs spyod ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3014: byang chub kyi sems de ni ma byin par yang dag par blang ba po bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3015: yang dag pa'i don de dus rtag tu spyad par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3016: rdzun dang tshig rtsub smra ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3018: rdzun yang smra bar bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3019: brjod dang bral ba'i don 'di lta bu yin no /
NK087(shu)002:3020: zhes ston pa ni rdzun du smra ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3021: ngag rtsub smra ba gang yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3022: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa med pas ngag rtsub smra ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3023: de nas bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3026: rnag khrag dron mo 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3027: sha chen dang bshad pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3028: dri chen dang gci ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:3030: byang chub kyi sems khrag ste /
NK087(shu)002:3031: pad+ma rak+ta te bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo ru bza' zhing btung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3032: ngan zos ngan spyad thams cad kyis //
NK087(shu)002:3035: bdud rtsi lnga ni zos shig spyad pas gsang ba'i don 'di nyid 'grub par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3037: pha dang khu bo mes po dang //
NK087(shu)002:3038: bu dang spun dang tsha bo rnams //
NK087(shu)002:3041: khu bo ste zhe sdang dang /
NK087(shu)002:3042: mes po ste gti mug dang /
NK087(shu)002:3044: spun ste phrag dog dang lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:3045: tsha bo rnams ni de kun gyi spyi'i mtshan nyid do //
NK087(shu)002:3046: zhe sdang sems kyis gsang byas nas //
NK087(shu)002:3047: rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du 'khrus //
NK087(shu)002:3048: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa lnga /
NK087(shu)002:3050: drug po ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la
NK087(shu)002:3051: sogs pa lnga stong pa chen po'i ye shes dang
NK087(shu)002:3052: drug gi ngang du zhe sdang chen po'i ting nge
NK087(shu)002:3053: 'dzin gyis gsad na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK087(shu)002:3054: med pa'i ye shes ma bcos pa rdo rje rigs
NK087(shu)002:3055: su 'gyur ro // don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3056: de nas byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po pho brang nas bskyod pa la rkyen gnyis te /
NK087(shu)002:3057: ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa dang shes rab ma'i rkyen gyis bskyod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3058: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon gyis bskyod pa'i le'u 'di nyid kyi stod nas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:3059: shes rab ma'i rkyen gyis dbab pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3060: ma dang bu mo sring mo dang gdol pa mo phyal pa la zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3061: ma ni rdo rje rigs ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:3063: sring mo ni rin po che'i rigs ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:3064: gdol pa mo ste las kyi rigs ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:3065: phyal pa ste pad+ma'i rigs rnams la byang chub kyi
NK087(shu)002:3066: sems rtogs par 'dod pa'i rigs kyis spyan na 'byung
NK087(shu)002:3067: ba bzhi'i rkyen gyis drangs nas /
NK087(shu)002:3068: dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3069: bral ba'i dga' rnams ni nyams su blang bar bya ba ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3070: khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bya
NK087(shu)002:3071: ba rang bzhin dga' ba dang nyams su blang bar
NK087(shu)002:3072: bya'o // de yang gnas gang du nyams su blang zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3073: rdo rje bum pa'i dbus su ste yi ge bzhi'i dbus su'o //
NK087(shu)002:3074: 'o na yi ge bzhi'i dbus su ni bzung la
NK087(shu)002:3075: gzhan du mi gzung ba ci ste na yi ge
NK087(shu)002:3076: bzhi'i dbus su gzung ste yi ge gsum phar ma
NK087(shu)002:3077: 'das na ni khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3078: ye shes mi skye ba yi ge bzhi la slobs
NK087(shu)002:3079: na ni mi zin pa'i skyon yod pas dbus su
NK087(shu)002:3080: bzung bar bya ba kho na yin no //
NK087(shu)002:3081: 'o na yi ge bzhi rang gang yin zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3083: amh'u phata ces pa rnams so //
NK087(shu)002:3084: 'o na yi ge lnga 'dug na bzhi zhes bya ba mi 'gal lam zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3087: ni sa'i rang bzhin yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3088: h'u ni me'i rang bzhin yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3089: am ni chu'i rang bzhin yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3090: phata ni rlung gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems
NK087(shu)002:3091: ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin pa'i phyir mi 'gal ba'i
NK087(shu)002:3092: phyir ro // 'o na 'byung ba lnga de ru smos na ci dgos zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3093: dgos pa med pa ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3094: rdo rje rtse mo'i nang nas kyang /
NK087(shu)002:3095: byang chub sems ni rab zab pa //
NK087(shu)002:3096: bde ba'i gnas nas spyan drangs nas //
NK087(shu)002:3097: rin po che yi gnas su ni //
NK087(shu)002:3098: 'byung ba gsum gyis bzung bar bya //
NK087(shu)002:3100: de ltar byang chub kyi sems nyams su len pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3101: dus na yang dag pa'i ye shes su 'gyur te
NK087(shu)002:3102: / 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pas pad+ma'i rigs su nges par skye zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:3103: de lta bu'i don la dgongs te gsungs pa'i tshig
NK087(shu)002:3104: de la 'khor byang chub tu sems bskye ba rnams
NK087(shu)002:3105: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa smra
NK087(shu)002:3106: ba snyam nas / byang chub sems dpa' rnams skrag ste /
NK087(shu)002:3107: rab tu brgyal nas sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:3108: de nas yang 'khor de rnams kyi the tshom gsal ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3109: de nas yang rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos /
NK087(shu)002:3110: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la bltas te /
NK087(shu)002:3111: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams sngon
NK087(shu)002:3112: gyi 'du shes ngan pa yid la dran nas brgyal
NK087(shu)002:3113: nas 'gyel na 'di dag slar gso bar gsol zhes
NK087(shu)002:3116: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi 'od zer gyi zhing 'khyil bas 'khor de dag bstims te /
NK087(shu)002:3117: byang chub kyi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs mdzad do //
NK087(shu)002:3118: byang chub kyi sems bstims shing byin gyis brlabs pa des /
NK087(shu)002:3119: byang chub sems dpa' rnams slar dran ba rnyed de /
NK087(shu)002:3120: sa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
NK087(shu)002:3121: gi bdag po'i zhal du mig mi 'dzum par lta
NK087(shu)002:3122: ste 'khod do // de nas 'khor gyi the tshom de bsal ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3123: de nas bka' stsal to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
NK087(shu)002:3124: de nas yang lung sgo ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3125: rigs kyi bu rnams rang rang gi 'du byed ngan pa de rnams thong zhig ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3126: thong zhes pa ni zlog pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3127: khyed rnams kyi bsam pa mang pos ci zhig bya /
NK087(shu)002:3128: bcom ldan 'das ngas dgongs pa bshad pa'i tshig la
NK087(shu)002:3129: khyed rnams kyis drang por bzung bas tshig ngan par
NK087(shu)002:3130: 'gro ste / de'i bsam pa ngan pa rnams ma smra bar mthong zhig pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3131: byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin zhes pa la sogs pa ston pa yi /
NK087(shu)002:3132: 'khor rnams kyi the tshom bsal ba'i tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:3133: byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3134: byang chub spyod pa de'i gnas na bde ba chen po'i gnas de nyid yin no //
NK087(shu)002:3135: thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin te zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3136: bde ba chen po'i don de thams cad nam mkha' mtshan nyid yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3137: mtshan nyid de la yang ma gnas pa'i phyir te /
NK087(shu)002:3138: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med ces brjod pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:3139: de nyid 'jig rten sna tshogs sogs te zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3140: mtshan nyid med pa de nyid 'di ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa snang ste /
NK087(shu)002:3141: snang ba de nyid kyang gzugs su snang ba thams cad de /
NK087(shu)002:3142: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rang bzhin yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3143: sgra ru grags pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
NK087(shu)002:3144: phyag rgya'i tshogs chen de nyid do //
NK087(shu)002:3146: de ltar phyi dang nang du snang ba yang sgyu
NK087(shu)002:3147: ma tsam du snang la don dam par de bzhin
NK087(shu)002:3148: gshegs pa'i thugs spros pa med pa yin pa'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:3149: / chos sku sgyu mar dbang bsgyur ba /
NK087(shu)002:3150: de la dngos po ga la yod /
NK087(shu)002:3152: ci spyod ci bsgrub ci bsgoms kyang /
NK087(shu)002:3153: byang chub nyid de lhung gnas med ces bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3154: sgom bsgrub la sogs pa ji ltar spyod kyang don
NK087(shu)002:3155: dam pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos par shes na byang
NK087(shu)002:3156: chub nyid de lhung gnas med do //
NK087(shu)002:3157: lhung gnas nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3158: dmyal ba'i gnas nyid bla med gnas zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3159: dmyal ba'i gnas su gdag pa'i gnas med de /
NK087(shu)002:3160: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:3161: de nas yang khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3162: sdug bsngal nyid ni byang chub la /
NK087(shu)002:3164: sgrib pa nyid na mngon sangs rgyas zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3165: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal ni yang dag pa'i ye shes yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3166: ma bcos pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
NK087(shu)002:3167: de ltar ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas pa'i rang
NK087(shu)002:3168: bzhin 'khor ba zhes bya ba ga la yod de
NK087(shu)002:3170: de ltar nges pa'i don de la sems rtse gcig tu gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3171: nges don de la 'dud par sbyor zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas /
NK087(shu)002:3172: byang chub sems dpa' de som nyid dang bral nas rang rang gi de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas /
NK087(shu)002:3175: zhes don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3176: thugs rjes 'dul ba'i ston pa'i le'u la thugs rjes 'dul ba'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:3177: bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)002:3178: bden pa gnyis kyis bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o
NK087(shu)002:3179: ////de ltar thugs rjes 'dul ba bstan kyang log pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3180: lam la dregs pas myos pa de zhi bas mi
NK087(shu)002:3181: 'dul te / de la khros pa'i tshul gyis 'dul
NK087(shu)002:3182: bar 'khor rnams kyis ston pa la bskul ba bstan
NK087(shu)002:3183: 'dul te / pa'i phyir / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3184: de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs
NK087(shu)002:3185: pa la sogs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu
NK087(shu)002:3186: gyur te zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga'i bde bar
NK087(shu)002:3187: gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
NK087(shu)002:3188: dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings gcig tu gyur te so
NK087(shu)002:3190: log pa'i lam pa dngos po la mngon par 'chel ba /
NK087(shu)002:3191: sngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi mthu bsnyems nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pas /
NK087(shu)002:3192: 'jig rten phung bar byed pa rnams zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3193: sngon gsang sngags zab mo'i don dang lta spyod la
NK087(shu)002:3194: sogs pa thob kyang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis
NK087(shu)002:3195: ma zin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang
NK087(shu)002:3196: phyag mtshan rang rgyud du gzung bas skye ba phyi
NK087(shu)002:3197: ma la gzugs 'jigs pa lag cha gdug pa'i ru
NK087(shu)002:3198: trar gyur te / shin tu nga rgyal gyi mthu bsnyems nas gnas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3199: sngags h'u h'u phata phata la sogs pa'i don gsung rnam par dag pa ma rtogs pas /
NK087(shu)002:3200: ngag gtum tshig sod chod la sogs pa'i sgras sems can brgya la bar byed pa sgrog pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3201: thugs spros pa med pa'i ma rtogs pas /
NK087(shu)002:3202: zhe sdang mnar sems dang ldan pa'i ru trar dregs
NK087(shu)002:3203: pas myos pas dngos po la 'chel ba sangs rgyas
NK087(shu)002:3204: kyi bstan pa la shin tu yang ma dad pa
NK087(shu)002:3205: de la zhi bas 'dul ba'i skabs la ma bab
NK087(shu)002:3206: ste / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod kyis 'dul bar 'khor rnams kyang gzigs nas /
NK087(shu)002:3207: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la
NK087(shu)002:3208: 'og nas 'byung ba'i don 'di skad ces 'khor rnams
NK087(shu)002:3210: e ma'o log pa'i lam gyis mnar ba la //
NK087(shu)002:3211: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
NK087(shu)002:3212: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3213: log par lta bas mnar ba de la zhi bas phan par 'di nyid la mi 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3214: phyis kyang ngu 'bod kyi gnas su lhung ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3215: 'o dod 'bod pa lhung bar 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3216: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas khro zhing gtum par gnas pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3217: shin tu khro gtum gtum pa la zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3218: de la ni gang gis kyang 'dul bar mi 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3219: ye shes khros pas 'dul bar 'gyur pa de bas na /
NK087(shu)002:3220: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams mngon par
NK087(shu)002:3221: 'du bar mdzad par rigs zhes 'khor rnams kyis gsol
NK087(shu)002:3222: ba dang / gdug pa can de khro bos 'dul
NK087(shu)002:3223: bar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud nas 'khor
NK087(shu)002:3224: rnams la spyan gyis gzigs te /
NK087(shu)002:3225: h'u h'u h'u zhes brjod pas rigs lnga bde bar
NK087(shu)002:3226: gshegs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad stong pa
NK087(shu)002:3227: nyid kyi ba spu'i bu ga nas thugs kar thim
NK087(shu)002:3228: bsdus te gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su mi snang
NK087(shu)002:3229: bar mdzad do // de nas gnas kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad /
NK087(shu)002:3230: bcom ldan nyid kyi sku'i dbyibs la bsdus te dngos po mi snang bar mdzad do //
NK087(shu)002:3231: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yang dag pa'i dbyings su thim te /
NK087(shu)002:3232: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gnas par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:3233: de yang ci mngon zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3237: ting 'dzin gsum la rab gnas nas //
NK087(shu)002:3238: de byung khros pas gzugs rtag go zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:3239: ting nge 'dzin gsum ni ji ltar yin zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3240: ji skad bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
NK087(shu)002:3241: rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod //
NK087(shu)002:3242: mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba ni //
NK087(shu)002:3243: nam mkha'i dkyil nas thig pa shar //
NK087(shu)002:3245: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i dus na rdo rje ste /
NK087(shu)002:3246: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin te rgyu'i rnam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3247: de la dregs pa can 'dul bar dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis g.yos pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3248: kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
NK087(shu)002:3249: rkyen ni de la khros pas zhe sdang gcod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3250: de nas 'bras bu'i ting nge 'dzin te khros pas bskul ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3251: yi ge h'u sngon po 'bar ba 'byung ste de
NK087(shu)002:3252: ni khros pa'i rgyal po'i thugs mtshon pas chen po
NK087(shu)002:3253: ste / yi ge la 'od rnam pa lnga 'phros /
NK087(shu)002:3254: yi ge yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:3255: nyid kyi sku khro bor 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:3256: h'u mdzad kro ta ma ha ra tsa phata ces
NK087(shu)002:3257: sgra brjod cing rdo rje khro bo ting nge 'dzin
NK087(shu)002:3258: la snyoms par bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni sngags
NK087(shu)002:3259: kyi sgra grags pa ni shin tu khros pas bskul
NK087(shu)002:3260: te rdo rje skur gyur pa de /
NK087(shu)002:3261: ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa can la ni snyoms par bzhugs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3262: rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las sngags kyi bskul te bslang bas /
NK087(shu)002:3263: khros pa'i sku mngon par 'du mdzad de /
NK087(shu)002:3264: dbu dang zhabs dang phyag stong khams kyi rdul snyed
NK087(shu)002:3265: rab tu 'jigs pa mtha' yas par snang bar mi
NK087(shu)002:3267: de yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
NK087(shu)002:3268: de nas gzhal yas khang byin gyis brlabs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3269: de'i phyir thugs ka nas zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3270: khros pa'i rgyal po'i thugs ka nas /
NK087(shu)002:3271: h'u 'phros te h'u las rdo rjer gyur te phyogs
NK087(shu)002:3272: dang mtshams kun rdo rjer gtams pa'i steng dang 'og
NK087(shu)002:3273: dang rdo rje sa gzhi dang gur ro //
NK087(shu)002:3274: de'i dbus su yi ge e las /
NK087(shu)002:3275: chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' gru gsum pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3276: yongs su brtag par bya ba'i de'i dbus su yum
NK087(shu)002:3277: bzhi'i ngo bor ji ltar rgyas par gzhan nas bstan
NK087(shu)002:3278: pa ste / rim pa ji ltar sbyor /
NK087(shu)002:3279: de na keng rus kyi ri rab kyi steng du
NK087(shu)002:3280: rig pa'i b+h+r+aum smug nag yongs su gyur pa las
NK087(shu)002:3282: de yang rlung nag rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la brten
NK087(shu)002:3283: pa dang khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil na
NK087(shu)002:3284: / keng rus chen po ri rab 'bar ba'i steng
NK087(shu)002:3285: na drag po e'i gzhal yas khang b+h+r+aum gyi dbus
NK087(shu)002:3286: / su byung ste / de yang rgyan nam mkha'i
NK087(shu)002:3287: rgya dang mnyam pa rdo rje'i gur las kyang 'bar
NK087(shu)002:3288: ba'i 'phro bas 'khrug pa gzhal yas khang las kyang
NK087(shu)002:3290: de nas khros pa'i rgyal po'i yum bskyed pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3291: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3292: badz+ra ma h+aa kro ti zhes khros pa'i rgyal po brjod pas /
NK087(shu)002:3293: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug ma mngon par phyung ste /
NK087(shu)002:3294: thabs dang shes rab 'jug pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3295: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a nu ra ga badz+ra swa b+ha ba +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK087(shu)002:3299: rdo rje yang dag par ldan pa la /
NK087(shu)002:3300: gnyis su med pa byang chub kyi sems byung ba las /
NK087(shu)002:3301: h'u h'u h'u h'u b+hi shwa krot+ta dz+wa la man+dala
NK087(shu)002:3302: la phata phata phata ha la ha la h'u phata
NK087(shu)002:3303: ces khros pa'i rgyal pos brjod pas /
NK087(shu)002:3304: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi smon lam bskul ba yis /
NK087(shu)002:3305: zhe sdang rdo rje sku rjes su dran nas dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3306: spyan stong mnga' ba phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha kha tam ga la sogs pa bsnams nas /
NK087(shu)002:3308: khro bo rnams kyi zhal nas kyang /
NK087(shu)002:3309: h'u h'u phata phata da ha da ha la sogs pa'i sgra mang po brjod pa de'i tshe /
NK087(shu)002:3310: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos so //
NK087(shu)002:3311: kun tu rab tu g.yos par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:3312: zhabs sa la brdabs pas kyang /
NK087(shu)002:3314: spyan gyi 'od zer gyis kyang tshig rab tu tshig kun tu tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:3315: shangs kyi rlung gis kyang 'thor rab tu 'thor ro //
NK087(shu)002:3317: de ltar khro bo'i byin rlabs byung ba de'i tshe /
NK087(shu)002:3318: 'jig rten phung bar byed pa'i dregs pa chen po dang /
NK087(shu)002:3319: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang 'jig rten gyi mes po tshangs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3320: lha ma h+aa de ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3322: rang rang mthu dang stobs dang che ba ston cing shin tu khro gtum mo //
NK087(shu)002:3323: de nas yang las kyi lha sras mchog rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:3324: gzhon nus dregs pa ji lta bsgral ba bstan pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3325: phyir / de nas zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3326: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams g.yos pa'i de ma
NK087(shu)002:3327: thag pa de nas 'jigs byed chen pos h'u h'u
NK087(shu)002:3328: h'u badz+ra krot+ta sarba big nan phata h'u zhes gong
NK087(shu)002:3329: du spros pa'i khro bo dbu dang phyag stong mnga'
NK087(shu)002:3330: ba'i khro bo 'a chol pa de dag gis phyogs
NK087(shu)002:3331: bcu nas gnas pa'i dregs pa bsgral lo //
NK087(shu)002:3332: de nas yang h'u h'u zhes 'jigs byed chen pos
NK087(shu)002:3333: brjod pas khro bo de dag slar 'dus te khrag
NK087(shu)002:3334: 'thung chen po'i mdun du sras mchog rdo rje gzhon
NK087(shu)002:3335: nu'i sku mthing nag dmar nag de dbus mthing nag
NK087(shu)002:3336: g.yas ljang nag g.yon dmar nag gi tshul gyis zhal
NK087(shu)002:3337: rngam pa pha rol du phyin pa drug gi rtags
NK087(shu)002:3338: su phyag drug zhabs bzhi shin tu bgrad pas stang
NK087(shu)002:3340: rdo rje gshogs pas gtam pas sangs rgyas lnga dbu
NK087(shu)002:3341: la rdzogs shing skra khams nag gyen du 'khyil zhing
NK087(shu)002:3342: sku la dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
NK087(shu)002:3343: stod rdo rje'i cha lag pa smad rdo rje'i phur
NK087(shu)002:3344: pas gtams pas dur khrod kyi me 'bar ba'i dkyil
NK087(shu)002:3345: na yum ral gcig ma dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis
NK087(shu)002:3346: gnas pa gcig tu gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3347: bka' nod pa'i tshul du khrag 'thung chen po la phyogs nas /
NK087(shu)002:3348: gnas shing dregs pa kun zhabs 'og tu bardzisa te gnas pa las /
NK087(shu)002:3349: khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos phyogs bcu nas /
NK087(shu)002:3350: sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu la //
NK087(shu)002:3351: dbang bskur ba'i phyir byang chub sems kyi 'od zer
NK087(shu)002:3352: gyi phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad
NK087(shu)002:3353: zhe sdang rdo rjes bskul te bkug nas mdun gyi
NK087(shu)002:3355: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
NK087(shu)002:3356: rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams //
NK087(shu)002:3357: srid pa'i phur bu grub mdzad cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
NK087(shu)002:3358: ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las //
NK087(shu)002:3359: 'bar ba'i khro bo mi zad pa //
NK087(shu)002:3360: sku yi dbyings su rdzogs gyur cig /thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du //
NK087(shu)002:3361: byams dang snying rje gang 'dul ba //
NK087(shu)002:3362: sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs byas nas //
NK087(shu)002:3363: dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig /ces pas dbang bskur bar mdzad do //
NK087(shu)002:3364: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur te /
NK087(shu)002:3365: phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rdzogs par bskur te de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3366: khros pa'i rgyal po dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3368: dbang thos pa'i rtags su h'u badz+ra kro ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra zhes brjod nas /
NK087(shu)002:3369: las kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa ni phyag g.yas dang por byin /
NK087(shu)002:3370: ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3372: dbang ste rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas su gshegs so //
NK087(shu)002:3373: de nas sras rdo rje gzhon nu nyid kyis gong
NK087(shu)002:3374: du btul ba'i dregs pa de dag la kha tam
NK087(shu)002:3375: ga phyag g.yon gyis bar mar 'phros nas /
NK087(shu)002:3376: log pa'i lam pa las rgyal ba'i rtags su bsnams pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3377: de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos sras phur pa lnga bskyed nas dregs pa can /
NK087(shu)002:3378: nyon mongs pa lnga bsgral ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3379: de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3381: thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros te dus gsum gyi
NK087(shu)002:3382: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhe sdang rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:3383: gzhon nu dang / nga rgyal rdo rje gzhon nu dang /
NK087(shu)002:3384: 'dod chags rdo rje gzhon nu dang /
NK087(shu)002:3385: phrag dog rdo rje gzhon nu dang /
NK087(shu)002:3386: gti mug rdo rje gzhon nu la sogs pa bkug ste /
NK087(shu)002:3387: byang chub sems kyi lam nas phyung nas de nas h'u lngar 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3388: yongs su gyur pa las sras phur pa lngar gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3390: rdo rje las 'thon te zhes pa nas thugs ka
NK087(shu)002:3391: nas ye shes sems dpa' dang ldan pa zhes pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3394: de nas yum gyi mkha' la gdon pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3396: zhes pa nas thugs ka nas ye shes sems dpa'
NK087(shu)002:3397: dang ldan pa'i zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te dkyus
NK087(shu)002:3398: nyid gsal lo // de nas yum gyi mkha' la gdon pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3399: e'i gdan la zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3400: shes rab ma la 'byung ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3401: e'i gdan la sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i spyan mnga' na /
NK087(shu)002:3402: bka' nang pa'i tshul du bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:3403: de nas mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i zhabs 'og nas gzir ba'i dregs pa can de rnams /
NK087(shu)002:3404: bsgral ba'i khrag 'thung chen pos bskul ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3405: h'u mthing nag gru gsum zhes pa'i tshig bzhis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3407: de nas sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nus kyang /
NK087(shu)002:3409: khro bo las kyi skye gnas bzung /
NK087(shu)002:3410: de zhes pa nas rim pa ji lta bar khyab 'jug pho mo 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral lo //
NK087(shu)002:3411: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te dkyus nyid gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:3412: de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos sras mchog rdo
NK087(shu)002:3413: rje gzhon nu la sku za byed chen pos dbang
NK087(shu)002:3414: bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3415: khrag 'thung chen pos dz+wa la ram zhes brjod pas
NK087(shu)002:3416: me dpung dud kha 'bar zhing 'phro ba sras mchog
NK087(shu)002:3417: rdo rje gzhon nu phyag g.yas dang por phul te
NK087(shu)002:3419: dregs pa can bsgral ba'o nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs sbyangs /
NK087(shu)002:3420: snying dang nang grol dang phung po rnams ha ha
NK087(shu)002:3421: zhes zhal du gsol nas phung po lhag ma dang
NK087(shu)002:3423: de nas yang sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nus phyogs bcu'i khro bo dang /
NK087(shu)002:3424: khro mo bcu mthon nas khro mos bsgral ba dang bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3425: de'i tshe zhes pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3426: khrag 'thung chen pos sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nus dbang bskur ba de'i tshe /
NK087(shu)002:3427: sras mchog rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum gnyis su
NK087(shu)002:3428: med pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las gsang ba'i
NK087(shu)002:3429: pad+ma la 'od zer du 'phros 'od zer la yi
NK087(shu)002:3430: ge h'u h'u la sogs pa bcu ru gyur dzahmh'u
NK087(shu)002:3431: dang bam dang ho rnams gsal bar 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3432: yi ge rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dril bu dang /
NK087(shu)002:3433: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dang dril bu rnams su gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:3434: phyag mtshan de rnams yongs su gyur pa las gtso bo'i sngags kyi le'u nas byung ba'i /
NK087(shu)002:3435: badz+ra kro ta h'u ka ra h'u zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3436: la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu'i bskyed pa'i sngags brjod
NK087(shu)002:3437: pas so // so so'i sku yongs su rdzogs par
NK087(shu)002:3438: bskyed de yang ji ltar zhe na khro bo h'u
NK087(shu)002:3439: ka ra zhes bya ba ni khro bo chen po
NK087(shu)002:3440: h'u ka ra dbu gsum phyag drug pa dbu gsum
NK087(shu)002:3441: pa sku dang zhal dbus ma sngo skya g.yas dkar
NK087(shu)002:3442: pas so // g.yon dmar ba'i / phyag drug la
NK087(shu)002:3443: g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis rdo rje dung chen dmar
NK087(shu)002:3444: gyis bskang ba 'khrug cing gsol ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3445: bar ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3446: tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3447: rnam par rgyal ba dang zhes pa'i zhal dbus dkar ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3448: g.yas sngon po g.yon ljang ser phyag bar ma gnyis rdo rje dang 'khor lo'o //
NK087(shu)002:3449: dbyug pa sngon po zhes bya ba ni sku dang zhabs dbus sngo skya g.yas dkar g.yon dmar skya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3450: phyag bar ma gnyis na dbyug pa rin po che dang /
NK087(shu)002:3452: gshin rje gshed po dang zhes pa ni sku dang
NK087(shu)002:3453: zhal dbus sngon po g.yas sngo skya g.yon ljang nag
NK087(shu)002:3454: /phyag bar ma gnyis na dbyug pa mi mgo can
NK087(shu)002:3456: mi g.yo mgon po dang zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3457: sku dang zhal dbus ljang g.yas sngon po /
NK087(shu)002:3458: g.yon smug nag phyag bar ma gnyis na rdo rje dang zhags pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3459: rta mgrin dang zhes pa ni sku dang zhal dbus
NK087(shu)002:3460: dmar nag /g.yas dkar g.yon sngon po phyag bar ma
NK087(shu)002:3461: gnyis na ral gri dang sbrul gyi zhags pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3462: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3463: sku dang zhabs dbus dmar skya g.yas ser po g.yon
NK087(shu)002:3464: ljang gu phyag bar ma gnyis na b+han d+ha dang
NK087(shu)002:3465: rnga yab bo // bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3466: sku dang zhal dbus ma ljang nag g.yas ser po
NK087(shu)002:3467: g.yon dud ka phyag bar ma gnyis na rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:3468: rgya gram dang rin po che dbyug pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3469: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3470: sku zhal dbus ser po g.yas dkar /
NK087(shu)002:3471: g.yon ljang gu phyag bar ma gnyis na 'khor lo dang mda' gazhu'o //
NK087(shu)002:3473: zhes bya ba ni sku dang zhal dbus dud ka
NK087(shu)002:3474: g.yas nag po g.yon dmar po phyag bar ma gnyis
NK087(shu)002:3475: na zhags pa dang tho ba bsnams pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3476: khro mo rdo rje sgra 'byin ma rnams dang /
NK087(shu)002:3477: zhes pa la sogs pa sku mdog yab dang 'dra
NK087(shu)002:3478: khyad par ni phyag gnyis ni dril bu thogs nas
NK087(shu)002:3479: mgul pa nas 'khyud nas gnas pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3483: phyogs bcur sems can gyi don la skye ste /
NK087(shu)002:3484: phyogs skyong 'og nas 'byung ba yang skabs 'di nyid du bsgral bar rig par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3485: slar 'dus nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du rang
NK087(shu)002:3486: rang so so'i gdan 'og nas gsungs pa rnams la
NK087(shu)002:3487: bzhugs so // tshul ji ltar bzhugs she na de bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3488: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs thur du gtams pa gdug pa'i zhe sa la sogs pa sha stag ste /
NK087(shu)002:3489: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te de ltar te de ltar bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)002:3490: de nas 'khor gyi 'phra men ma skyed par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:3491: phyogs bcu'i khro bo yab yum gnyis su med pa
NK087(shu)002:3492: byang chub kyi sems las sprul pa lcam dral bskyed
NK087(shu)002:3493: de / thabs dang shes rab kyi cha so sor smin par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3496: de ltar sprul pa lcam dral bskyed nas 'khor gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3497: de dag gi 'khor na zhes pa nas rlung yang
NK087(shu)002:3498: mi shor bar gtams nas zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
NK087(shu)002:3499: bstan to // khro bo rnams kyi gdan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3500: nyi zla dang zhes pa nas gong ma ltar bsgral lo //
NK087(shu)002:3501: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3502: nyi ma dang zla ba ni thabs kyis shes rab rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:3503: phyogs skyong ba bcu yis ni gdan mdzad pa ni
NK087(shu)002:3504: mi dge ba bcu rnam par dag nas dge ba
NK087(shu)002:3505: bcu la gnas pa'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:3506: de yan chad du ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:3507: skra ka'i mgo can la sogs bzhi yan chad do //
NK087(shu)002:3508: da ni las la btang ba'i lha bskyed par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:3509: de'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3510: dpal khrag 'thung chen pos gsang ba rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NK087(shu)002:3512: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3513: ngang tshul can de ni dpal de'i ngang du khams
NK087(shu)002:3514: gsum gyi nyon mongs bsdud pa'i rtags su /
NK087(shu)002:3515: khrag 'thung bas khrag 'thung gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa chen po //
NK087(shu)002:3516: de'i thabs dang shes rab kyi rjes su chags pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3517: gsang ba gnyis su med par rol pa'i ting nge
NK087(shu)002:3519: de nyid du yang khams gsum thams cad mnyam nyid kyis rgyas btab par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:3520: de nas dregs pa chen po'i ma dang bu mo dang /
NK087(shu)002:3521: chung ma rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3522: 'od zer lcags kyu 'phros pas spro zhing h'u h'u
NK087(shu)002:3523: e a ra li ru lu ru lu h'u dza
NK087(shu)002:3524: / zhes khrag 'thung chen pos brjod pas dregs pa
NK087(shu)002:3525: chen po'i ma dang bu mo dang chung ma'i tshogs
NK087(shu)002:3526: kyi gtso mo ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor grangs
NK087(shu)002:3528: khrag 'thung chen po'i thad du yud tsam gyis 'das par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:3529: de nas yang khrag 'thung chen pos e a ra li ho /
NK087(shu)002:3530: zhes brjod pas 'dus pa rnams gnyis kyi sku la 'khyil te /
NK087(shu)002:3532: zhes brjod pa rdzogs pa'i tshul du skad cig re re la sal sal bskyed do //
NK087(shu)002:3533: sku mdog phyag mtshan ni sgyu 'phrul las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:3534: de nas yang seng gdong ma la sogs pa bskyed do /
NK087(shu)002:3535: dgyes pa'i sprin las he he zhes brjod pas brjod
NK087(shu)002:3536: pa'i de ma thag pa de nyid du sku rdzogs
NK087(shu)002:3538: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi mtshams su 'khod do //
NK087(shu)002:3539: de nas yang de 'dren par byed pa la sogs pa'i pho nya 'byed pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3540: yang dgyes pa'i sprin las phata ces brjod pas skad
NK087(shu)002:3541: cig ma re re la gsal bar byas la sgo
NK087(shu)002:3542: sgor 'khod do // de rnams ni las kyi lha yin par shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3543: de nas yang ma mo de rnams rang gi gnas su bskrad pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3544: khrag 'thung chen po rab tu 'phros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phata ces pas bskrad de /
NK087(shu)002:3545: ma mo de rnams rang rang gi gnas ga la ba de yud tsam gyis phyin par dagye'o //
NK087(shu)002:3546: de nas sngar gyi dregs pa rnams myos nas yod pa de rnams slar myos par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3547: de nas khro bo rnams phyag brang la bsnol te
NK087(shu)002:3548: btsir bas mi gtsang ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtshor 'khyil
NK087(shu)002:3549: te / dran pa med par byas so //
NK087(shu)002:3550: de nas yang dran pa med pa de rnams gso bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3551: khrag 'thung chen pos thugs rjes bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
NK087(shu)002:3552: snams nas khro mo sme sha 'thon te /
NK087(shu)002:3553: des mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho brdubs pas rgya mtsho
NK087(shu)002:3554: de dregs pa de dag slar dran pa thob ste
NK087(shu)002:3555: / kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong /
NK087(shu)002:3556: de nas phyogs skyong de dag gis kyang dpal chen po 'bangs su mna' bor te khas blangs so //
NK087(shu)002:3557: de nas yang lus khro bo rnams kyi gdan khrir phul te /
NK087(shu)002:3558: bdag gi lus nyon mongs pa 'di khro bo rnams
NK087(shu)002:3559: la gdan du dbul gyis bzhes su gsol bdag gi
NK087(shu)002:3560: sems can kyis ni phyi rab kyi rnal 'byor pa
NK087(shu)002:3561: phyogs skyong bar bgyid lags so //
NK087(shu)002:3562: zhes khas blang zhing dam bcas so //
NK087(shu)002:3563: de ltar btus shing dbang du bsdus pas /
NK087(shu)002:3564: de'i tshe gdan phyogs skyong ba rnams khro bo rnams kyi zhabs 'og tu bzhag pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:3565: de'i dus na ma dang bu mo dang chung ma rnams kyang dpal chen po'i 'khor du 'phul te /
NK087(shu)002:3566: dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos kyang ma dang bu mo rnams la lce la bdud rtsi bzhag ste /
NK087(shu)002:3567: dam tshig phog ste phyi rab kyi rnal 'byor pas
NK087(shu)002:3568: ci ba sgo ba'i las bya bar khas blangs nas
NK087(shu)002:3569: dam yang baca'o // de nas las kyi lha ru dbang bskur te /
NK087(shu)002:3570: gzhal yas khang gi mu ran la bzhag go //
NK087(shu)002:3571: dregs pa can btul ba'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:3572: bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad
NK087(shu)002:3573: pa las kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'ba' zhig gis
NK087(shu)002:3574: bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////de ltar gdug pa
NK087(shu)002:3576: ji ltar phur pa gdab pa bstan pa yang las
NK087(shu)002:3577: dang pos bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsten nas btub
NK087(shu)002:3578: dgos pa'i phyir de nas zhes pa la sogs pa
NK087(shu)002:3579: gsungs te / de nas bcom ldan 'das las phyung
NK087(shu)002:3580: zhes par bya bar 'brel te ci byung zhe na
NK087(shu)002:3583: sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3584: ci'i phyir na gdug pa can bsgral ba'i phyir phyung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3585: de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3586: dur khrod dang ni ngan grogs gnas //
NK087(shu)002:3587: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3588: dur khrod ni ma mo 'dus pa'i gnas yin pas /
NK087(shu)002:3589: drag po bsgrub pa'i las la shis pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3590: ngam grog gi gnas ni klu btsan gdug pa can gnas pa der bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3591: skad gcig shing ni rkang gcig ste /
NK087(shu)002:3592: the'u rang gi 'du ba'i gnas yin pas /
NK087(shu)002:3594: sum mdo ni lam gyi sum mdo ste /
NK087(shu)002:3595: the'u rang gi lha 'dre thams cad rgyu ba'i srang ste der bsgrub pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3596: khang stong ni bud med 'du ba'i gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:3598: gnas de rnams su rdo rje drag po'i dkyil 'khor bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3599: de'i dbyibs ji ltar bya zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3602: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3603: dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i thugs las /
NK087(shu)002:3604: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi sgo nas nyon mongs pa bsgral ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3605: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad par phyung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3606: gru chad bzhi ni 'khor lo'i phyi rol khyams kyi nang gang yin pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3607: gru bzhi'i sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan zhes bya ba ni khyams te /
NK087(shu)002:3609: sgo khyud bzhi ni phyogs bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:3610: 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3611: ni sgo'i phyi rol du khyams gnyis bya ba ste
NK087(shu)002:3612: / der yang me ri bri ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3613: dbus kyi lte ba zlum po la zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i lte ba zlum po ste /
NK087(shu)002:3614: de la thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe brgyad du 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3615: de'i le'u tshe dbus dang phyogs gnyis te /
NK087(shu)002:3616: shar phyogs nub phyogs dbus dang phyogs gsum po de
NK087(shu)002:3617: dag la ni mthing nag gi gru gsum pa mtha'
NK087(shu)002:3618: me ri 'od 'bar ba bri ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:3619: 'khor lo rtsibs rnams la yang bri bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3620: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa ni rin po
NK087(shu)002:3621: che pha gu la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad rgyas
NK087(shu)002:3623: rgyud gzhan dag las ji ltar rgyas par bstan pa bzhin bri bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3624: de nas lha dgod pa'i rim pa bstan pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3625: de'i phyir dbus su dregs pa'i gdan dag la /
NK087(shu)002:3626: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3627: dbus su dregs pa'i gdan la rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum dgod ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3628: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dgod par bya ba yin la /
NK087(shu)002:3629: dregs pa bsgral ba'i 'og dus su yang gnas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3630: spyan snga nyid du phyogs bzhi ru //
NK087(shu)002:3632: sras mchog phur pa lnga po dgod ces bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3633: ni spyan snga'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i
NK087(shu)002:3634: mdun nyid do // phyogs ni shar phyogs la sogs pa bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:3635: de'i gnas rnams su gru gsum pa'i phyi rol na
NK087(shu)002:3636: me 'bar bas bskor ba des sras mchog phur pa
NK087(shu)002:3638: sngon dregs pa can bsgral ba'i dus su bkod la /
NK087(shu)002:3639: bsgrub pa'i skabs su bgegs bskrad pa'i ched du bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:3640: rdo rje gur byas pa'i de ma thag par ro //
NK087(shu)002:3641: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la ni /
NK087(shu)002:3642: rnam rgyal zhes pa nas gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du gnas zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3644: nang dang phyi'i gra rnams su /
NK087(shu)002:3645: zhes pa ni nang gi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du /
NK087(shu)002:3646: phyi ni lha rnams la ji ltar dkyus nas gsal
NK087(shu)002:3647: bar bstan pa'i lha rnams las gtong ba'i lha ste
NK087(shu)002:3648: las kyi dus su shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3649: phyi rol me 'khyams dang po la zhes bya ba ni sgo'i phyi rol gyi khyams dang po la /
NK087(shu)002:3650: pho nya drug cu gnas par rtag pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3651: de yang las kyi dus su spyod cing bsgrub pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3652: dus nyid du thabs kyis g.yas shes rab g.yon gang
NK087(shu)002:3653: yin pa nas las byed pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3654: zhor las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
NK087(shu)002:3655: sgo bzhi dag du sgo srungs kyis dgod ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3656: sgo ni shar phyogs la sogs pa bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:3657: sgo srungs ni lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:3658: phyi rol me khyams bar ma la zhes pa ni sgo'i phyi rol gyi khyams gnyis pa la /
NK087(shu)002:3659: slas dang byi mo'i tshogs kyis gtso bo bcu dang brgyad kyis sgor zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3660: bcu pa gnyis la nyi shu tham pa /
NK087(shu)002:3661: de'i steng du brgyad kyis bsnan pas nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3662: de yang las kyi dus so //
NK087(shu)002:3663: de'i phyi rol gyi khyams la dam can lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3664: bdag nyid chen mo yang sho na mu ka yang bsam par bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:3665: las dus su de nas yang dkyil 'khor la rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3666: dur khrod thod pa dgu nang du zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3667: dur khrod thod pa dgu nang du zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3668: thod pa'i le dgu'i nang tshil chen gyi me mar
NK087(shu)002:3669: dgu byas la dur khrod kyi ras la sdong bu
NK087(shu)002:3670: byas la / me mar kha dgu gtang ste /
NK087(shu)002:3671: thod pa ni nang dang bdag med pa'i rtags la /
NK087(shu)002:3672: mar me ye shes kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i rtags so //
NK087(shu)002:3673: rdo rje sha chen thang mal brdal dmar gyi rag
NK087(shu)002:3674: ta rgya mtsho dkyil zhes bya ba la sogs pa
NK087(shu)002:3675: gsungs pa / sha chen thang mal brdal ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3676: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i dam rdzas te /
NK087(shu)002:3677: dmar la sogs pa'i yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3679: brgyad du yang rtag gi rgyal mtshan dang shun chen bse'i rgyal mtshan te /
NK087(shu)002:3680: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan zhing gi rgyal mtshan te
NK087(shu)002:3681: de re re la gnyis gnyis te brgyad zug par
NK087(shu)002:3682: bya'o // zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sprin ltar gtibs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3683: bla bre zhing gi g.yang gzhis bre bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3684: de la sogs pa rgyan gyi rnams //
NK087(shu)002:3685: ci rigs par ni bre bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3686: zhes bya ba ni dar mthing nag gi yol ba bre ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3687: zhing gi phran phyogs gnas gdag pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3688: b+han+da bgegs pa phyogs nas bzhag pa yang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:3689: de nas yang dkyil 'khor la lha rnams kyi rang
NK087(shu)002:3690: rang mtshan mar rdzas bzhag pas bstan par bya ba'i
NK087(shu)002:3692: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3693: 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi bdag po rnams //
NK087(shu)002:3694: rang rang skos so bzhag par bya //
NK087(shu)002:3696: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi rang rang rdzas su bzhag par bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3698: mtshan ldan b+han+da lcang lo can //
NK087(shu)002:3699: dbang po lnga dang ldan pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:3700: gtso bo yab 'am mtshan mar bzhag /ces bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3701: ni mtshan dang ldan pa'i ban da gling gsum pa'am
NK087(shu)002:3703: de'i nang du dbang po lnga blugs la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3704: dur khrod sgang gi phung po lnga /
NK087(shu)002:3705: sras mchog phur pa'i mtshan mar dgod ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3707: dur khrod kyi phur pa lnga la sras mchog tu
NK087(shu)002:3708: byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa phul phyogs bzhi dang
NK087(shu)002:3709: dbus dang lngar gzugs par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:3710: bsgrub pa 'di ma thon gyi bar du /
NK087(shu)002:3711: bar chad kyi bgegs ma btang zhes brjod la mtshams bcad do //
NK087(shu)002:3712: thod pa'i dum bu bcu drug gi //
NK087(shu)002:3713: zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i le'u tshe bcu drug ni /
NK087(shu)002:3714: 'phra men ma bcu drug ni mtshan mar dgod pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3716: yan lag ni sems can thams cad ni /
NK087(shu)002:3717: khro bo khro mo rnams kyi rdzas zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3718: sor mo nyi shu na khro bo dang khro mo rnams kyi rdzas so //
NK087(shu)002:3719: so dang ne'u rtseg 'bar ba rnams pho nya rnams kyi mtshan mar bzhag ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3720: rus pa'i mgo kun bzhag par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3721: sgal tshigs la sogs rnams kyi rdzas //
NK087(shu)002:3722: ci bgyi tshogs kyi rdzas su bzhag ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3723: sgal tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni //
NK087(shu)002:3724: slas dang byi mo'i rdzas su'o //
NK087(shu)002:3725: yan lag bzhi'i mtshan ma ni //
NK087(shu)002:3727: lag gnyis rkang pa gnyis bzhi ni sgo bzhir bzhag pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:3728: de yang rdzas rnams la bri bar bya ba'i thabs bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3729: so so gsung gi yi ge 'bru rnams ni /
NK087(shu)002:3730: rang rang rigs kyi mtshan ma la //
NK087(shu)002:3731: yab yum byang chub sems kyi bri zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3732: yig 'bru h'u la sogs pa'i so so rang rang
NK087(shu)002:3733: gi mtshan ma gang yin pa la byang chub sems
NK087(shu)002:3735: dur khrod kyi snyug gus so //
NK087(shu)002:3736: de nas yang ting nge 'dzin bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3737: bla ma lung ldan des kyang ni /
NK087(shu)002:3738: khros pas drag po'i rnal 'byor bya zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3739: ni bsgrub par bya ba dang las gnyis ka'i dus
NK087(shu)002:3740: su shin tu khros pa'i ting nge 'dzin bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3741: yin gyi / bsnyen pa'i dus su ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:3742: de nas drag po'i dkyil 'khor bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3743: dbang ldan phyogs kyi grwa la yang /
NK087(shu)002:3745: sras phur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar gyi mtshams su bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3747: 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor ni zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3748: gang bzas pa po de brlag par bya ba'i gnas la /
NK087(shu)002:3750: dbyibs ji ltar bya zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3751: drag po'i hom khung dbyibs 'dra la zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3752: zur gsum bskor ba bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:3753: phyogs re re la sor nyi shu'o //
NK087(shu)002:3754: zabs su sor bcu bskor ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3755: de'i phyogs re re la sor nyi shu'o //
NK087(shu)002:3756: zabs su sor bcu bskor ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3757: de'i phyogs ji ltar bsgo zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3758: rtse mo lho phyogs ston zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3759: rtse mo ni lho phyogs su bstan la basko'o //
NK087(shu)002:3760: 'o na de la brgyan par bya ba med dam zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:3761: h'u h'u dang phata gyis bskor bar bya zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3762: gru gsum nyid nag pos phyag pa'i mkha' la /
NK087(shu)002:3763: h'u dang phata kyis spel la bri bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3764: de'i nang du bzhugs par bya ba'i rdzas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3765: dus la bab cing zhes pa la sogs pas bstan /
NK087(shu)002:3766: dus la bab pa'i sems can ni /
NK087(shu)002:3767: las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK087(shu)002:3768: mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya //
NK087(shu)002:3770: bsgral bar bya ba'i dus la bab pa'i sems can de nyams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa des /
NK087(shu)002:3771: mtshan ma dang bcas par bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3772: de'i rgyu ni srub mo'i lo ma dang grog mkhar gyi sa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3773: khre dang chu me'i phub ma dang /
NK087(shu)002:3776: rta ru mig rnams ni bong bu'i bdud rtsi'i sprus la gzugs byas te /
NK087(shu)002:3777: zhing gi ras ma'am shun la zhing gi bam khrag
NK087(shu)002:3778: gis badz+ra k+ai la ya che ge mo m+aa ra
NK087(shu)002:3779: ya phata ces bya ba bris la snying gar blan
NK087(shu)002:3780: pa de'i phyir mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya
NK087(shu)002:3781: zhes gsungs so // 'o na de la ji ltar bzhag ce na /
NK087(shu)002:3783: mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bzhag /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan //
NK087(shu)002:3784: hom khung nang du bzhag par bya zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:3785: mgo lho nub mtshams su bstan pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3786: srin po yod pa'i gnas yin pas so //
NK087(shu)002:3787: rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan pa'i phyir sgrol
NK087(shu)002:3788: ba las kyi bdag mo'i gnas yod pa'i phyir bstan
NK087(shu)002:3789: pa'o // hom khung gi gnas gan du bzhag pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3790: bsgral ba'i gnas yin pas gzhug pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3791: 'o na hom khung gru gsum ni bsgral ba'i gnas
NK087(shu)002:3792: yin la gzhan ni ma yin pa ci zhe na
NK087(shu)002:3793: / lan du hom khung gru gsum ni bsgral bar bya ba kho na'i gnas yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3795: log par lta ba sgrol ba'i rtags su 'byung ba drag po'i gnas so //
NK087(shu)002:3796: 'o na ci zur gsum du bya ba thams cad bsgral ba'i gnas yin /
NK087(shu)002:3797: chos 'byung ba'i nang du rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa de yang 'gal te /
NK087(shu)002:3798: chos 'byung ba sgral ba'i gnas su 'gro ba'i skyon yod 'gal lo //
NK087(shu)002:3799: lan du mi 'gal te chos 'byung nyid du bsgral ba'i gnas yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3801: chos 'byung ba'i dbyings yin pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3802: khams gsum gyi sems can de'i dbyings su bsgral bas /
NK087(shu)002:3803: chos 'byung ba'i bsgral bar bya ba'i gnas kho na yin zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:3804: de nas rnal 'byor pas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3805: de nas zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3806: gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor des zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3807: bdag nyid dam tshig sems pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa des so //
NK087(shu)002:3808: rdo rje sprugs pa blangs nas ni zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3809: ni h'u ring po ni rdo rje spyugs pa ni
NK087(shu)002:3810: / thugs ka'i h'u las h'u byung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3811: khrag 'thung tshogs kyis sprin phung rnams zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3812: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad bcom ldan 'das
NK087(shu)002:3813: rdo rje gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor rten dang rten du
NK087(shu)002:3815: rdo rje'i g.yab mos spyan drangs te /
NK087(shu)002:3817: rdo rje bum pa'i nang na h'u gnas pa de
NK087(shu)002:3818: las 'od zer 'byung ba ni rdo rje'i g.yab mo'o
NK087(shu)002:3819: // de las lha mo lcags kyu mar gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3820: des rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
NK087(shu)002:3821: mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par lta'o //
NK087(shu)002:3822: de nas yang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la bstim par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3823: gnyis med brtan par gtim nas ni zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3824: zhags pa ma dang lcags sgrog ma dang /
NK087(shu)002:3825: dril bu mas rim pa ji ltar bar bstan pa byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:3826: de nas yang lha la dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3827: bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:3828: 'od zer lha mo'i tshogs su gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3829: sku la thim nas gsang ba'i mchod pa phul /
NK087(shu)002:3831: slar la phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas lha mo'i tshogs mang po byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:3833: la la ni byug pa byed /
NK087(shu)002:3834: la la ni tsan dan gyi char 'bebs /
NK087(shu)002:3835: la la ni gdug dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin /
NK087(shu)002:3836: la la ni bum pa thogs te spyi bor blugs pa ni dbang gi rgyu'o //
NK087(shu)002:3837: dbang gi 'bras bu ni so so rigs kyi dbu brgyan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:3838: slob dpon la la ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
NK087(shu)002:3839: bstim pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas des chog
NK087(shu)002:3840: gsungs so // de nas yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3841: dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa dbul ba bstan pa'i
NK087(shu)002:3842: gsungs so // phyir / rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa brtsam /
NK087(shu)002:3843: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis mchod ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3844: rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3845: bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:3846: 'od zer lnga las lha mo'i tshogs mang po 'byung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:3847: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku la bzhugs pas mchod pa'i rgyud bskul /
NK087(shu)002:3848: bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas lha mo mang po slar 'thon te /
NK087(shu)002:3849: bdag gi dkyil 'khor la bskor nas phyi'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3850: nang gi mchod pa'i rnam pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3851: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa rnams //
NK087(shu)002:3852: bdag la gnas phul bstod pa'i 'di skad brjod do //
NK087(shu)002:3853: h'u bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yis //
NK087(shu)002:3855: khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa //
NK087(shu)002:3856: sku ni cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs //
NK087(shu)002:3857: h'u dbu skra khams nag ral pa can //
NK087(shu)002:3859: mi nyams khro gnyer sdang mig ni //
NK087(shu)002:3860: log par lta ba 'dul ba'i spyan //
NK087(shu)002:3861: h'u mche ba zangs yag brtsigs pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:3862: skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshul //
NK087(shu)002:3863: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs las //
NK087(shu)002:3864: phyag mtshan sna tshogs cir yang snang //
NK087(shu)002:3865: h'u thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprin ltar gtibs //
NK087(shu)002:3866: byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'khyug /rngams pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs //
NK087(shu)002:3867: sprul pa'i thog thog char ltar 'bebs //
NK087(shu)002:3868: h'u thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis //
NK087(shu)002:3869: bdag la byin gyis brlabs mdzad cing //
NK087(shu)002:3870: bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams //
NK087(shu)002:3871: grub par byin gyis rlabs du gsol //
NK087(shu)002:3872: h'u 'khyil cing rgyun dang 'khyil ba yi //
NK087(shu)002:3873: sems la brjod med sku mi mnga' //sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste //
NK087(shu)002:3874: bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lag /h'u srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK087(shu)002:3875: mnyam nyid ngang gi khros la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK087(shu)002:3876: khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK087(shu)002:3877: rdo rje 'du 'phro tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK087(shu)002:3879: de nas sgra'i tshul du lha mo'i tshogs rnams mi snang bar gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:3880: de nas yang nas yang du bsgrub pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3883: bsnyen pa gsum ni lha'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3885: de lta bu'i mtshan ma mthong na gdod bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3886: bsgrub pa'i rtags gsum ni phur pa las 'od 'byed pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:3887: phur bu ldeg pa dang 'phar ba gsum mo //
NK087(shu)002:3888: de ltar rtags 'byung zhing las su rung ba ni mnyes nas nye bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3890: de nas grub pa'i rtags byung ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3891: drag po'i las la 'jug par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:3892: de gang la dmigs par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3893: rdo rje slob dpon brnyas byed dang /
NK087(shu)002:3896: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
