NK087(shu)002:3898: de nas dmigs par bya ba de gnas nas dus ci ltar dgug pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3899: brnag pa'i nan thur bya ba zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:3900: khro bo gsum pa'i sbyor ba'am /
NK087(shu)002:3901: zhes pa'i khro bo lcags kyu thogs pas gzas pa
NK087(shu)002:3902: po gang yin pa de rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
NK087(shu)002:3903: steng du bzhag nas rlung gi lcags kyus gzung nas
NK087(shu)002:3904: drangs / khro bo la la phyag na rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:3905: dang tho ba thogs nas rang dbang med par rtog
NK087(shu)002:3906: drangs / cing 'dod de / rnal 'byor pas kyang sngags bzlas pas bya ba'i sngags ni 'adi'o //
NK087(shu)002:3907: h'u sam b+ha ne sum b+ha ne h'u /
NK087(shu)002:3909: gri h+na pa ya gri h+na pa ya h'u /
NK087(shu)002:3910: +aa na ya ho b+ha ga ban bid+yara tsa ya h'u phata ces brjod cing /
NK087(shu)002:3911: bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi sems
NK087(shu)002:3912: dpa'i thugs ka nas rdo rje rdo rje'i nang na
NK087(shu)002:3913: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la h'u gnas pa de las
NK087(shu)002:3914: khro bo dmar po rgyud dmar phyung la dgug pa
NK087(shu)002:3915: bya ste / gzugs la bstim pa'i las bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3916: yang lcags kyus rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni
NK087(shu)002:3917: 'on te khro bo sum b+ha ni'i sbyor ba mi
NK087(shu)002:3918: byed na yang 'di yis dgug ste /
NK087(shu)002:3919: bdag nyid kyi h'u las dza brtsegs mar phyung ste /
NK087(shu)002:3920: de las lha mo lcags kyu can du gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3921: pho yin na kha nas sbubs la zhon nas snying
NK087(shu)002:3922: dkar nag mtshams nas shes pa de dgug /mo yin
NK087(shu)002:3923: na mtshan ma nas yar rtsa'i bu gu nas zhugs
NK087(shu)002:3924: nas / mas dgug pa bya ba ste bstims la bsgral ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3925: yang na yum gyi pad+ma la dza brtsegs gcig bzhag la /
NK087(shu)002:3926: yab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyis bskul bas /
NK087(shu)002:3927: dza las 'od 'phros 'od la 'phra men mas lcags kyu nan tan du gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:3928: rtsa'i bu ga nas shes pa drangs te bstim par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3929: dgug pa'i dus bstan pa'i phyir //
NK087(shu)002:3930: nyin mtshan gung la rab bkug ste //
NK087(shu)002:3932: nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i gung la shes pa nyams nas yod pas der dgug par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3933: yang na nam stong dang nyi ma dros 'byams tsam na /
NK087(shu)002:3934: shes pa nyams nas yod pas dus de ru su bzlas pa ni shig la bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3936: mtshan ma'i ming du bcas pa la //
NK087(shu)002:3937: srin bu me khyer 'drar bcug ste //
NK087(shu)002:3938: gzugs la phab cing sgrog gis bcing zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:3939: de bzas pa po gang yin pa de'i rnam par
NK087(shu)002:3940: shes pa snying gi dbugs rtsa gsum pa'i dbus gang
NK087(shu)002:3941: yin pa de na shes pa gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:3942: shes pa de'i brda' ni rlung yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3943: rlung de la bskyod pa bkug ste de'i dus nyid
NK087(shu)002:3944: na yang thogs pa med pa'i gzugs dang dbang po
NK087(shu)002:3945: tshang ba ste / mtshan ma ming du bcas par dgug go //
NK087(shu)002:3946: de yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon te /
NK087(shu)002:3947: thogs pa med par dgug pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3948: srin bu me khyer ba bzhin du dgug ste /
NK087(shu)002:3949: gzugs la phab ste de yang bdag nyid kyis sngags bzla zhing zhags pa'i sgrog gis bcing bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3950: de nas ri rab la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas gdab par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:3951: ting nge 'dzin nang sngags kyi sbyor ba bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:3952: bla ma'i bka' las shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3953: de nas 'go ba'i lha dang dbral ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:3954: lce po gnag po'i dud pas dgug /
NK087(shu)002:3955: 'go ba'i lha dang dbral bar bya zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:3956: lce pa gnag po'i ni gu gul nag po'i dud pas 'go ba'i lha yang yin pa de /
NK087(shu)002:3957: dud pas bdug cing des brgyal bar 'gyur te bral nas 'agre'o //
NK087(shu)002:3958: de yang sngags kyi sbyor ba bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:3959: de'i lus tsha ba bskyed pa'i phyir lus ngan ske
NK087(shu)002:3960: tshe tsha ba dug gis dag pa zhes gsungs te
NK087(shu)002:3961: / bzas pa po de'i lus kyi nang du tsha ba bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:3962: dug gi gtor mar byin gyis brlabs la khong du 'thung du gzhug par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3963: dug de 'gyang pas rtsa'i bu gu nas rgyas te
NK087(shu)002:3964: shes pas ma nyams kyi bar du tsha ba dang
NK087(shu)002:3965: na ba'i sdug bsngal bsam par 'byung bar bsam ste
NK087(shu)002:3966: / de nas shes pa nyams na rang gis mi
NK087(shu)002:3967: rigs pa'i las byas dran nas 'gyod pa drag po
NK087(shu)002:3969: dug gis bsgral zhing shes par bya ba ji ltar bsdu ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3970: gab pa'i 'khor lo las shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3971: de nas phur pa rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor las bskyed de gdab par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3972: de nas phur pa rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK087(shu)002:3973: grub pa'i rtags byung ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:3974: phur pa rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol bar bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:3975: de yang dbus kyi pho brang nas gru gsum mthing nag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bri bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:3978: byang shar gyi mtshams rdo rje gur gyi nang du
NK087(shu)002:3979: drag po'i dkyil 'khor gang du gsungs pa bri bar
NK087(shu)002:3980: bya ba ste / drag po'i dkyil 'khor de'i grwa'i
NK087(shu)002:3981: phyogs su spungs te bzhag ces gong nas gsungs te
NK087(shu)002:3982: bya ba ste / / khro bo'i phur pa mang po kun zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3983: sras phur pa so so'i rigs te /
NK087(shu)002:3984: sku gsung thugs kyi rigs las byung ba nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
NK087(shu)002:3985: de la mang po kun zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:3986: grwa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:3988: spungs te bzhag ces pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:3989: las kyi bzlas pa'i dus su phur pa gzi byin bskyed par ste /
NK087(shu)002:3990: phur pa de re re la ki li ki li
NK087(shu)002:3991: zhes bya ba'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par
NK087(shu)002:3992: bya ba ste / de bzlas shing phur pa 'dril
NK087(shu)002:3993: bas bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer mthing
NK087(shu)002:3994: nag tu 'phros phur pa las kyang 'od zer 'phros
NK087(shu)002:3995: pas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la drag
NK087(shu)002:3996: po'i dus la bab bo bar bskul bas /
NK087(shu)002:3997: de dag gi thugs zhe sdang rjes su dran thugs
NK087(shu)002:3998: ka nas khro bo gdug pa can dang bcas pa
NK087(shu)002:3999: mang po 'phro zhing phur pa la thim pas /
NK087(shu)002:4000: phur pa shin tu drag po'i 'od zer 'bar zhing bsgral ba'i mthu dang ldan par gyur pa de /
NK087(shu)002:4001: phur pa kun la bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4002: rang re las kyi sngags dang bsgrags shing /
NK087(shu)002:4003: de'i phur pa gzi byin bskyed pa de phur pa gso ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4004: de nas gdab pa'i gnas kyi gtso bo rnams bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4005: rdo rje drag po'i phur pa yis //
NK087(shu)002:4006: lte ba snying mgrin dpung mgo dang //
NK087(shu)002:4007: gsang gnas yan lag lnga la gdab //
NK087(shu)002:4009: lte ba snying ga dang mgrin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4010: dpung mgo dang gsang gnas lnga rnams ni gnas kyi gtso bo lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:4011: yan lag ni rnam par shes pa ni tshogs gzhan dag go //
NK087(shu)002:4012: gdab pa ni mgo nas gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:4013: yungs dkar mtshon cha'i char gyis dbab ces pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4014: 'phra men drug pa'i sngags kyis yungs dkar brgyab pas /
NK087(shu)002:4015: yungs dkar las mtshon cha gdug pa mang por gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:4016: gzas pa po'i lus la lhag par yang gzer nas bsgral bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4017: de nas mtshan ma'i dngos po bzhi ste /
NK087(shu)002:4018: mtshon cha'i rab tu brtson pa yis //
NK087(shu)002:4019: rkang pa g.yas g.yon gang yin nas //
NK087(shu)002:4020: rdul du gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4023: phur pa gdab pa'i mtshan ma'i dngos po zhig de
NK087(shu)002:4024: la khro bo rab tu 'bar bas mtshon cha'i char
NK087(shu)002:4025: brtson par rab tu phab ste /
NK087(shu)002:4026: pho yin na g.yas nas gtubs /
NK087(shu)002:4027: mo yin na g.yon rdul du gtub par bsams pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4028: gtub pa'i dum bu de bsreg par bstan te de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4029: drag po'i hom gyi dkyil 'khor du /
NK087(shu)002:4030: tsher ma can gyi me sbar te /
NK087(shu)002:4031: lha'i tshogs la thim par dbul zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4032: drag po hom gyi nang du tsher ma can gyi shing la me sbar te /
NK087(shu)002:4033: der drag po'i skabs nas 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin byas te lha la phul na /
NK087(shu)002:4034: sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jigs par 'gyur na /
NK087(shu)002:4035: sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te mi dgos so //
NK087(shu)002:4037: drag po'i dkyil 'khor ston pa'i le'u la ni /
NK087(shu)002:4038: drag po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:4039: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)002:4040: kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'ba' zhig bshad pa'i le'u
NK087(shu)002:4041: brgyad pa'o ////de ltar drag po'i dkyil 'khor bstan kyang
NK087(shu)002:4042: sngags dang phyag rgya ma bstan par mi 'grub pas
NK087(shu)002:4044: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4045: bcom ldan 'das des bshad do zhes sbyar ro //
NK087(shu)002:4046: de nas yang sngon la khraga'athunga chen po'i sngags dang /
NK087(shu)002:4047: phyag rgya bstan te de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4048: sh+ri badz+ra ku ma ra yak+sha h'u /
NK087(shu)002:4049: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4050: bdag nyid kyi thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i rdo
NK087(shu)002:4051: rje'i nang na zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar gyi
NK087(shu)002:4052: dbus na / h'u las sngags kyi phreng ba g.yon bskor du bskor nas /
NK087(shu)002:4054: zla ba dang nyi ma ni 'byung ba bzhi yin pas des bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:4056: ji ltar spro ba dang bsdu ba bstan pa'i rim par 'gyur ba'am /
NK087(shu)002:4057: yang na sngags mang po bzlas pas yi ge mngon par mthong ba'am /
NK087(shu)002:4058: yang na yi ge 'phro 'du byas shing sngags bzlas pas /
NK087(shu)002:4059: grub pa'i tshad me tog la sngags bzlas nas nam
NK087(shu)002:4060: mkha' bsgyur ba dang slar la mi lhung ba nam
NK087(shu)002:4065: phyag rgya bcas nas gang yin pa la gdod nas
NK087(shu)002:4066: sngags bzlas pa dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
NK087(shu)002:4067: 'grub ste / sngags kyi 'grub ste mthar phyin pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4068: ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin /
NK087(shu)002:4069: 'og ma rnams la'ang shis par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4070: khros pa'i steng du gnas nas kyang zhes bya ba ni rab tu spyan bzlog pa la bya'o /
NK087(shu)002:4071: g.yas pa rdo rje gdengs pa'i sa zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4072: lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gzung ste phyar ba'o /
NK087(shu)002:4073: lag pa g.yon pa phur pa 'debs tshul du zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4074: lag pa g.yon pas phur pa 'debs tshul du khu tshur bcangs la phar gtad pa'i tshul du bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4075: zhabs gnyis ni g.yas pa bskyang g.yon pa bskum pa'i tshul du gnas par bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4076: dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya yin par bshad do //
NK087(shu)002:4077: gong du gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya grub pa'i dus 'di yis ni /
NK087(shu)002:4078: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yang rab tu bsgral te /
NK087(shu)002:4080: khams kyi skye bo smos kyang ci dgos te /
NK087(shu)002:4081: 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:4082: de yang khros pa'i rgyal mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4083: badz+ra kro ta e ka badz+ra h'u ya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4085: phyag rgya nyid dkyus nyid gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:4086: dbang du 'gyur bar nges zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsang ba bka' nod pa'i nang nas kyang /
NK087(shu)002:4087: mo gzugs 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4088: mo'i gzugs des sems can 'dod chags can dbang du 'du ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4089: de nas sras phur pa'i sngags dang /
NK087(shu)002:4091: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la zhes pa nas /
NK087(shu)002:4092: khams gsum skye bo smos ci dgos zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:4093: de nas h'u ka ra'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4094: badz+ra kro ta h'u ka ra h'u zhes bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4096: ces pa ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4097: sngags 'di las kyi dus su rtsa'i sngags dang 'grogs te /
NK087(shu)002:4098: bzlas pa las khro bo h'u ka ra'i h'u las
NK087(shu)002:4099: sku gsung thugs kyi khro mo mang po rgyud par
NK087(shu)002:4100: byung nas lag na lcags kyu thogs nas dgug par
NK087(shu)002:4101: byed pa'o // de'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
NK087(shu)002:4102: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4103: badz+ra kro ta bi dza ya h'u zhes pa ni bskyed pa'i rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4104: ha na ha na h'u phata ces pa ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4105: basngagasa shing bzlas shing gnas na grub pa'i dus na ci yang bzlog par byed do //
NK087(shu)002:4106: drag po'i dus su sngags bzlas pas gzas pa po
NK087(shu)002:4107: la grogs byed pa'i lha klu gang yin pa de
NK087(shu)002:4110: de nas dbyug pa sngon pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4111: badz+ra kro ta n+ai la dan+da h'u zhes bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4112: da ha da ha h'u phata ces pa ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags te /
NK087(shu)002:4113: sngags 'di bzlas pa'i dus na dbyug pa sngon po las khro bo 'chol ba mang po 'thon te /
NK087(shu)002:4114: gzas pa po gang yin te gsod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4115: phyag rgya dkyus nyid gsal lo //
NK087(shu)002:4116: de gshin rje gshed pa'i sngags phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4117: badz+ra ya m+aan+ta ka h'u zhes pa ni bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4118: pa tsa pa tsa h'u phata ces pa bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4119: sngags 'di bzlas shing phyag rgya bcings pa'i dgug par
NK087(shu)002:4120: bya ba'i dus na lcags kyu can du 'phro ba
NK087(shu)002:4121: dang bsad par bya ba'i dus na mtshon chas gdug
NK087(shu)002:4122: pa can thog pa 'phro ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:4123: dbye ba'i dus na gdug pa la sogs pa spro ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:4124: skrad pa'i dus na rnga mo la bskyon nas 'gro ba'i las byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4125: de nas yang mi g.yo mgon po'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4126: badz+ra kro ta ar+ya a tsa le h'u zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4127: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4128: ban+d+ha ban+d+ha h'u phata ces pa bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4129: sngags 'di bzlas shing phyag rgyas bcas pas lha dang
NK087(shu)002:4130: klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad ci bsgo ba'i las
NK087(shu)002:4132: bgegs gsal breg cing brgyal bar 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:4133: de nas yang rdo rje rta'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4134: badz+ra kro ta ha ya grwi ba h'u bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4135: hu lu hu lu h'u phata ces pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4136: bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4137: sngags bzlas phyag rgya bcings te /
NK087(shu)002:4138: gtad pas dug 'joms par 'dod pa'i dus na rta
NK087(shu)002:4139: mgrin yab yum gyi bdud rtsi dug gi zin pa'i
NK087(shu)002:4140: bu gar drangs zhing bstim pas dug sel bar gyur
NK087(shu)002:4141: to // ser ba bzlog pa'i dus na ba spu'i
NK087(shu)002:4142: bu ga nas kyang khro bo ral gri thog pa
NK087(shu)002:4145: bdag nyid kyis kyang mig bzlog la sngags bzlas so //
NK087(shu)002:4147: bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun seng ge'i sgo nas drangs la
NK087(shu)002:4148: nad pa la bstim ste nad thams cad byang dkrus
NK087(shu)002:4149: par bsam mo // yang gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4150: badz+ra kro ta a pa ra tsi ta h'u /
NK087(shu)002:4151: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4152: tista tista h'u phata ces pa ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4153: sngags bzlas phyag rgya bcings nas gtad pas gdon la sogs pa thams cad gzir byed pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4154: de nas yang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4155: badz+ra kro ta h'u a mri ta kun+da li h'u zhes pa ni bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4156: tshi na tshi na h'u phata ces pa ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4157: sngags bzlas phyag rgya gtad pas sangs rgyas dang byang
NK087(shu)002:4158: chub sems dpa' yang bskyod par nus na gzhan bskrad
NK087(shu)002:4159: pa lta smos kyang ci dgos so //
NK087(shu)002:4160: de nas yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4161: badz+ra kro ta tri lo kya bi tsa ya h'u zhes bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4162: bin+d+ha bin+d+ha h'u phata ces pa ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4163: sngags bzlas phyag rgya bcings te /
NK087(shu)002:4164: bdag gi thugs ka nas khro bo'i zhags pa thogs pa bcing bar byed do //
NK087(shu)002:4165: de nas stobs po che'i sngags dang phyag rgya bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4166: badz+ra kro ta h'u ma ha ba la h'u zhes pa bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4167: s+pho ta ya s+pho ta ya h'u phata ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags so //
NK087(shu)002:4168: sngags bzlas phyag rgya gtad pas than pa byung ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4169: dus na klu thams cad breg cing brgyal nas char
NK087(shu)002:4171: ha cang yang char ches na dur khrod kyi ras la 'dug nas /
NK087(shu)002:4172: sngags 'jug nas bzlog ste bzlas na char pa chad par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:4173: de nas yang khro mo rnams kyi mtshan nyid thabs
NK087(shu)002:4174: kyi las ji ltar yin pa ltar shes par bya'o
NK087(shu)002:4175: // dkyus ni sgrol mi dgos so //
NK087(shu)002:4176: gzhan yang sprul pa'i pho nya dang zhes pa la sogs pa rnams ni /
NK087(shu)002:4177: nges pa med pa rgyal bas gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:4178: sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u las ni sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:4179: bdud rtsi thigs pa'i rgya cher bshad pa las kun
NK087(shu)002:4180: rdzob kyi bden pa 'ba' zhig gis bshad ba'i le'u
NK087(shu)002:4181: ste dgu pa'o ////de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya la
NK087(shu)002:4182: sogs gsungs kyang sras bskyed pa la sogs pa'i ting
NK087(shu)002:4183: nge 'dzin gyi rim par che ba med na las
NK087(shu)002:4184: kyi sgo skabs kyi mi phyed pas /
NK087(shu)002:4185: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4186: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4191: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par /
NK087(shu)002:4192: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4193: nam mkha'i dbyings ni chos kyi 'byung gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:4194: de'i nang du yi ge bsams la de yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom mo //
NK087(shu)002:4195: de dbus bdag po'i gzugs bsam ste /
NK087(shu)002:4196: las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:4197: ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su yi ge
NK087(shu)002:4198: h'u h'u de las rdo rje rtse dgu pa de
NK087(shu)002:4199: las bdag po'i gzugs su bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:4200: sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4201: las thams cad brtsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4202: nam mkha' 'khor lo dbang bsgyur bas zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4203: nam mkha'i gnyis med ye shes stong pa nyid yin la /
NK087(shu)002:4204: de'i 'khor bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nus bsgyur
NK087(shu)002:4205: ba las rnam pa thams cad byed par 'gyur te
NK087(shu)002:4206: / mi bya ba gang yang med do //
NK087(shu)002:4207: don dam pa byang chub kyi sems /
NK087(shu)002:4208: de nas sras phur pa bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4209: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4210: phur pa kun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:4211: zhes bya ba mgo nas 'byung ba 'di rnams so //
NK087(shu)002:4212: gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
NK087(shu)002:4213: zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang dus rtag tu mi 'bral zhing /
NK087(shu)002:4214: sems bde ba'i nyams yod pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4215: gdeng dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
NK087(shu)002:4216: des bsgom par bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4217: 'di lta ste dang po dngos med byang chub sems /
NK087(shu)002:4218: stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin las //
NK087(shu)002:4220: dang po chos kyi dbyings spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral ba de nyams su blangs nas bsgoms te /
NK087(shu)002:4221: dngos po ci yang med pa'i ngang la rdzas kyi phur pa khro bo'i gzugs su bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4222: de yang ji ltar rtag ce na /
NK087(shu)002:4223: rgya mdud steng du gzhal yas khang //
NK087(shu)002:4224: khrag 'thung tshogs kyis rnam par bsgom //
NK087(shu)002:4225: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4226: rgya mdud dbu ma'i steng rin po che zur brgyad pa'i nang du gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4227: rgyan la sogs pa gzhung gzhan las gsungs pa ji bzhin pa'i rim pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4228: gzhal yas khang de'i nang du zhing rnams kyi gdan stengs su gsal ba'i steng ste /
NK087(shu)002:4229: nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis brtsegs pa'i steng du
NK087(shu)002:4230: khrag 'thung gi tshogs 'od zer gyis spyan drangs nas
NK087(shu)002:4231: / gzhal yas khang gi nang du rgyas par bsgom mo //
NK087(shu)002:4232: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa dbul lo //
NK087(shu)002:4233: de las sras mchog la yang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4234: rten dang brten can du de las sras mchog ki la ya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4235: rten dang brten can du bcas pa'i phur pa de
NK087(shu)002:4236: las rten dang brten can du bcas pa'i bdag gi
NK087(shu)002:4237: zhal du thim nas lte ba'i dbus su ye shes
NK087(shu)002:4239: yum gyi pad+ma la gsang ba rdo rje yis 'phros
NK087(shu)002:4240: pa sras phur bu bsnyen bsgrub gnyis la ni gcig
NK087(shu)002:4241: tu 'gyur / las kyi dus su nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
NK087(shu)002:4242: de yang 'od dpung las phyag mtshan las skur bskyed do //
NK087(shu)002:4244: dbu skra khams nag gyen du 'bar ba spyan gsum pa can /
NK087(shu)002:4245: de las sras mchog ki la ya zhes bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4246: rgya mdud man chad khro bo'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4248: phur pa'i lha nyid gsal bar bsgom zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4249: phur pa'i thugs ka nas h'u las yi ge'i phreng bas bskor bar gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:4250: yid kyi gsal bar bris lta bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4251: de nyid byin dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4252: sras phur pa de nyid byin dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4253: hri phata ces yig 'bru gsum zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4255: yongs su bsam par bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4256: de gang du bsam zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:4257: spyi bo rked pa rtse mo la zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4260: rtse la phata mthing nag po /
NK087(shu)002:4261: de ltar bkod pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:4262: sku gsung thugs su bsgom par bya zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4263: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sku'i rdo rje bsgom mo //
NK087(shu)002:4264: hri las pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa'i steng du gsung gi rdo rje bsgom mo //
NK087(shu)002:4265: phata las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom ste /
NK087(shu)002:4266: sku'i sku rnam par dag cing brjod par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4267: gsung gis gsung rnam par dag cing drag po'i gdangs sgra dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4268: thugs kyi thugs rnam par dag cing zhe sdang chen pos sgrol ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4269: de nas ye shes lnga dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs te /
NK087(shu)002:4270: ye shes lnga'i yi ge lnga zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4271: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa las
NK087(shu)002:4272: byung ba'i yi ge 'og nas 'byung ba 'di lnga'o
NK087(shu)002:4275: de gang du bsgom zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:4276: spyi bo lce dang snying ga dang rked pa yan lag dag la ste /
NK087(shu)002:4280: de'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las byung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4281: de dang ldan par byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4282: lce la a ste so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las byung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4283: de dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4284: rked pa swa ste mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las 'byung /
NK087(shu)002:4285: de dang ldan par byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4286: snying gar h'u ste me long lta bu'i ye shes las byung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4287: de dang ldan par byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4288: yan lag gi rked mtshan du ha ste /
NK087(shu)002:4289: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes las byung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4290: de dang ldan par byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4291: de ltar ye shes lnga dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK087(shu)002:4292: da ni spro bsdus yi ge thugs ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlabs te /
NK087(shu)002:4294: spro dang bsdu ba'i yi ge ste /
NK087(shu)002:4295: h'u gsum dang ni phata gsum gyis /
NK087(shu)002:4296: gsungs te spro bar bya ba ste phata to //
NK087(shu)002:4297: bsdu ba'i yi ge h'u ngo //
NK087(shu)002:4298: de lta bu'i yi ge drug po gang du bkod ce na /
NK087(shu)002:4299: ngos gsum dang zur gsum la rtse mo gcig tu bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4303: thugs kyi rang bzhin la rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
NK087(shu)002:4305: rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba gsum mnga' bas h'u gsum ste /
NK087(shu)002:4306: des nyon mongs 'joms pa'i rtags su /
NK087(shu)002:4307: zur gsum la phata gsum du bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4308: de nas gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni /
NK087(shu)002:4309: sku shin tu brtas pa de'i phyi rol gyi e'i gdan la gdon par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4310: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya ti ba ta tsa kra h'u dza zhes brjod pas /
NK087(shu)002:4311: gsang ba'i gnas nas e'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol lo //
NK087(shu)002:4312: bzhugs pa de la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4313: de bstan pa'i phyir rigs kyi dbang mchog thob bya'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4314: zhes pa la sogs gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4315: rang gi rigs kyi dbang bskur te //
NK087(shu)002:4316: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rigs so so'i dbang bskur te /
NK087(shu)002:4317: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:4318: 'chol bar spros la so sor bstan //
NK087(shu)002:4320: 'chol bar spros pa ni sku'i rigs la yang sku gsung thugs spros la /
NK087(shu)002:4321: sku gsung thugs la yang de bzhin no //
NK087(shu)002:4322: de ltar 'chol bar spros pas dus gsum gyi sangs
NK087(shu)002:4323: rgyas thams cad la mchod pa phul nas sku gsung
NK087(shu)002:4324: thugs su dbang bskur cig par bskur /
NK087(shu)002:4325: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa sbyangs slar la rang
NK087(shu)002:4326: rang gi rigs ma 'chol bar bsdus nas bstims pas
NK087(shu)002:4329: de nas yang byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur zhing /
NK087(shu)002:4330: byin dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4331: g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las /
NK087(shu)002:4332: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4333: lag pa g.yas pa thabs kyi rang bzhin te /
NK087(shu)002:4334: de'i mthil du ma bsam la /
NK087(shu)002:4335: de las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /
NK087(shu)002:4336: a bsam a las kun tu bzang po'i sku bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:4337: lag pa g.yon pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
NK087(shu)002:4339: de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /
NK087(shu)002:4340: a bsam de las kun tu bzang mo'i skur bskyed do //
NK087(shu)002:4341: de'i rjes las g.yas g.yon gnyis ka'i sor mo'i mthil bcu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4342: de nas thal mo mnyam por sbyar ba la su
NK087(shu)002:4343: ra ta sdom zhes brjod pas kun tu bzang po
NK087(shu)002:4344: yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pas /
NK087(shu)002:4345: byang chub sems 'od zer du 'phros te /
NK087(shu)002:4346: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag gi steng du gnas par gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:4347: g.yas pa'i lnga la gung mo la am the bong la h'u mdzub mo la tra /
NK087(shu)002:4349: mthe chung la ha bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4350: g.yon pa rnams la yang de rnams bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4351: de las sku yongs su rdzogs par bskyed de las sor mo yab yum bcur sgom zhes gsungs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4352: yab yum bcu po sbyor ba'i brda' bskul te /
NK087(shu)002:4353: badz+ra a tsa la h'u zhes brjod pas /
NK087(shu)002:4354: yab yum rdo rje dang pad+ma phrad pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4355: sor mo cung zad bsnol la badz+ra ba na h'u
NK087(shu)002:4356: zhes brjod pas yab yum stod smad 'khyud pa ste
NK087(shu)002:4357: / sor mo rgyab tu bsnol te bsdam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4358: de nas byang chub kyi sems yum gyi mkha' la gnas pa la /
NK087(shu)002:4359: sarba ta tha ga ta pu tsa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra so b+ha ba at+ma ko ham zhes brjod pas /
NK087(shu)002:4360: yum gyi ba spu'i bu ga nas byang chub kyi sems 'phros te /
NK087(shu)002:4361: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa la mchod pa phul /
NK087(shu)002:4362: sras phur pa 'di la byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur cig pa'i byin rlabs 'od 'phros pas /
NK087(shu)002:4364: de nas phur pa lag pas blangs la sa ma ya stam zhes brjod la blang /
NK087(shu)002:4365: mthe bong dang srin lag gung mo ni sku gsung
NK087(shu)002:4366: thugs gsum gyi dbus su btsug lag pa'i rting pa
NK087(shu)002:4367: phye ste / sor mo rnams kyis phur pa dril zhing /
NK087(shu)002:4368: badz+ra a be sha ya a zhes brjod pas dus
NK087(shu)002:4369: gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa yab yum gyi byang
NK087(shu)002:4370: chub kyi sems mu tig dkar po dri ma med
NK087(shu)002:4371: pa ltar / sras phur la thim ste /
NK087(shu)002:4372: thim pas byang chub sems kyi dbang thob nas shin tu 'od 'phro bar 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:4373: de la ni 'du byed las kyis byin gyis brlabs zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4374: lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi thabs shes rab gnyis kyi 'du byed kyis bskul te /
NK087(shu)002:4376: phyogs bcu rgyal ba yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sras des bstims pas de la ni /
NK087(shu)002:4377: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4378: byang chub sems bar ma chad par de la bstims
NK087(shu)002:4380: sras phur pa de la bar ma chad par bstims zhing dbang bskur ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4381: des kyang byin chen 'dus par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4382: byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba des kyang dus
NK087(shu)002:4383: gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems
NK087(shu)002:4384: kyis byin brlabs thams cad sras phur pa la 'dus
NK087(shu)002:4385: par gyur to // de nas yang sku gsung thugs dbang ste /
NK087(shu)002:4386: de'i phyir de nas sku gsung thugs nyid du /
NK087(shu)002:4387: byin gyis brlabs shing bstan bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4389: sngon la thugs su byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur ba bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4390: bdag nyid las thugs phyag mtshan mang po spros pas
NK087(shu)002:4391: las gnyis byas te sems can gyi kun gzhi la
NK087(shu)002:4393: bde bar gshegs pas sgras phur pa la /
NK087(shu)002:4394: thugs rjes byin gyis rlobs shig pas bskul nas /
NK087(shu)002:4395: phar 'phros pas slar 'dus pa dang dus gsum gyi
NK087(shu)002:4396: bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas kyang phyag mtshan
NK087(shu)002:4397: mang po sras phur pa la gnyis su med par
NK087(shu)002:4398: bstims pas sras phur pa'i thugs ka'i h'u la thim
NK087(shu)002:4399: pas shin tu thugs bstan zhing 'od 'phro bar 'gyur
NK087(shu)002:4401: badz+ra swa ta ra tsa h'u zhes brjod cing bstim pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4402: des na thugs nyid rdo rje 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4404: de nas gsung gis dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs
NK087(shu)002:4405: te lag gnyis sor mo rtse sprad de zhes bya
NK087(shu)002:4406: ba ni / lag pa'i sor mo kun sprad cing ma sprad pa khad pa tsam bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4407: pad+ma lta bur byas pa'i phur pa lag pa'i rting pa'i bar du bcug ste /
NK087(shu)002:4408: rting pas phur bu dril bar bya zhing /
NK087(shu)002:4409: rnal 'byor rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod pa'i sngags 'di yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4411: ces brjod pas bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas h'u /
NK087(shu)002:4412: mang po 'phros te las gnyis byas te /
NK087(shu)002:4413: sems can dag gi mi dge ba thams cad sbyangs
NK087(shu)002:4414: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs pa thams
NK087(shu)002:4415: cad la sras phur pa la gsung gis dbang bskur
NK087(shu)002:4416: zhing byin gyis rlobs shig par bskul bas /
NK087(shu)002:4417: h'u 'phros pa nyid dang bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs
NK087(shu)002:4418: ka nas gsung yig 'bru mang po slar 'dus nas
NK087(shu)002:4419: sras po'i gsung gi gnas su byin gyis brlabs cing
NK087(shu)002:4420: bstim mo // de ni gsung nyid rdo rjer gyur zhes te /
NK087(shu)002:4421: dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pas gsung brtan zhing khros pa'i gdangs dang ldan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4422: de nas yang sku'i dbang bskur zhing byin brlab pa ston te /
NK087(shu)002:4423: lag gnyis sor mo rgyab bsnol te /
NK087(shu)002:4424: mthe bong gshibs pa'i chang ba ru zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4425: lag pa gnyis bsnol thal mo sbyar la sor mo rnams brgyab tu bsnol te /
NK087(shu)002:4427: de'i bar du phur pa bcug la rdo rje bcug
NK087(shu)002:4428: la rdo rje phur bu de 'dril bar byas shing
NK087(shu)002:4430: rdo rje tshig tu brjod pa'i sngags 'og nas 'byung ba 'adi'o //
NK087(shu)002:4431: ha na ha na sti sta tsakra h'u phata ces
NK087(shu)002:4432: brjod pas bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas sku mang
NK087(shu)002:4433: po spros pa las gnyis byas te /
NK087(shu)002:4434: sems kyi lus kyi mi dge ba thams cad sbyangs /
NK087(shu)002:4435: bde bar gshegs pas sras phur pa la dbang bskur
NK087(shu)002:4436: cig par bskul bas sku 'phros pa de nyid dang
NK087(shu)002:4437: bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs nas /
NK087(shu)002:4438: sku mang po byung nas sras phur pa las thim
NK087(shu)002:4439: pas sku'i gnas gang yin pa de la byin gyis
NK087(shu)002:4440: brlabs shing dbang bskur bas des ni lus nyid rdo
NK087(shu)002:4441: rjer 'gyur / de nas sras phur pa de la mchod pa bya ba bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4442: de'i phyir de nas phur bu rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:4444: sras phur pa la dbang bskur ba'i de ma thag
NK087(shu)002:4445: pa de nas mchod pa bya ba 'og nas 'byung
NK087(shu)002:4447: e yi gdan la bzhugs pa yi //
NK087(shu)002:4448: khros pa'i rgyal po de nyid la /
NK087(shu)002:4450: e'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni shes rab las byung ba'i rtags te /
NK087(shu)002:4451: khros pa'i rgyal po de nyid la mchod pa dbul bar bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4452: bdag nyid kyi thugs ka nas di be la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams bstan nas /
NK087(shu)002:4453: des phyi'i mchod pa dbul ba'o /
NK087(shu)002:4454: la se la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa dbul ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4455: yungs dkar rgyal pos brdeg bya zhing /
NK087(shu)002:4457: lag mthil gnyis la nyi ma dang zla ba bsams la /
NK087(shu)002:4458: nyi ma dang zla ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
NK087(shu)002:4459: gnyis kyi dbus su yungs dkar bzhag pas thabs dang
NK087(shu)002:4460: shes rab kyi mthus yungs dkar khro chung du gyur
NK087(shu)002:4461: te / des phur pa la brdeg pas khro chung
NK087(shu)002:4462: phur pa la thim pas shin tu rno zhing dpal
NK087(shu)002:4463: dang ldan de 'od zer 'bar bar gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:4464: rtse gcig rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:4465: lag mthil g.yas su sbyar ba yi //
NK087(shu)002:4466: gu gul dud pa sprin phung gis //
NK087(shu)002:4467: gtug chen mchod pas mchod par bsgom //
NK087(shu)002:4469: lag mthil g.yas su yi ge ho bsam la /
NK087(shu)002:4470: yi ge yongs su gyur pa las me dpung 'bar bar bsam pa de la gu gul bsreg de /
NK087(shu)002:4471: sras phur pa la gtugs pas gu gul gyi dud pas mchod pa phul bar bsam /
NK087(shu)002:4472: ho las 'byung ba me'i dur khrod kyi me dpung gi dkyil na bzhugs par bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:4473: phyi nang mchod pa ci 'byor pas //
NK087(shu)002:4474: mchod de las gang bsgom par bya //
NK087(shu)002:4476: phyi nang gi mchod pa gang du gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:4477: de ltar mchod pa byas pa'i rjes la /
NK087(shu)002:4479: h'u bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
NK087(shu)002:4480: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:4481: badz+ra 'dus pa'i sras mchog ki la ya //
NK087(shu)002:4482: thugs rje mnyam pa'i dbyings nas sprul pa 'gyed //
NK087(shu)002:4483: zhe sdang bdud 'dul sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK087(shu)002:4484: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
NK087(shu)002:4485: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:4486: b+hud ta 'dul ba'i sras mchog k+ai la ya //
NK087(shu)002:4487: sku mchog rdzogs pa'i sku la 'od zer 'phro //
NK087(shu)002:4488: gti mug bdud 'dul sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK087(shu)002:4489: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
NK087(shu)002:4490: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:4491: rata na 'dul ba'i sras mchog ki la ya //
NK087(shu)002:4492: yon tan rgya mtsho 'khyil zhing dbyings nas gsal //
NK087(shu)002:4493: nga rgyal bdud 'dul sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK087(shu)002:4494: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
NK087(shu)002:4495: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:4496: pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog k+ai la ya //
NK087(shu)002:4497: gsung mchog sgrag pas 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul //
NK087(shu)002:4498: 'dod chags bdud 'dul sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK087(shu)002:4499: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
NK087(shu)002:4500: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:4501: karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog ki la ya //
NK087(shu)002:4502: 'phrin las drag pos log lta 'dul mdzad cing //
NK087(shu)002:4503: phrag dog bdud 'dul sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK087(shu)002:4504: zhes bstod nas bdag gi bsnag pa'i las 'di lta bu grub par mdzod cig /ces basgo'o //
NK087(shu)002:4505: de nas yang ston pas bzlas mchog rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:4506: bdag nyid dang po rnal 'byor du 'dug ste /
NK087(shu)002:4507: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
NK087(shu)002:4509: bdag nyid dang po bdag la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas pa'i de ma thag par /
NK087(shu)002:4511: bdag nya da kyi ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka
NK087(shu)002:4512: nas rdo rje'i nang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
NK087(shu)002:4513: mo // de'i steng du mthing nag 'bar ba'i h'u bsgom mo //
NK087(shu)002:4514: h'u de la badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya /
NK087(shu)002:4516: ces pa ni bsnyen pa'i dus su bskor la bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4517: bsgrub pa'i dus su shar la 'byung ba bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4518: las kyi dus su zhar la 'byung ba bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4519: las kyi dus su gang gi spro ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4520: de la bskor ba la ni /
NK087(shu)002:4521: sngags kyi yi ge rab bskor zhes gsungs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4522: phur pa la yang de bzhin te /
NK087(shu)002:4524: phur pa la yang gong du bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4525: rang sngags tshigs su brjod pa la zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4526: yi ge bskul ba dang spro ba'i sngags te /
NK087(shu)002:4527: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u phata /
NK087(shu)002:4528: ces rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod pas /
NK087(shu)002:4529: h'u yan chad ni bskul ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4530: phata kyis bskul ba ni spro ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4531: de ltar sngags drag dal byed par bzlas pas /
NK087(shu)002:4533: 'od de rtsa g.yas na zhugs sna'i bu gu g.yas nas 'thon /
NK087(shu)002:4534: sras phur pa'i sna g.yon nas snying ga'i yi ge
NK087(shu)002:4535: rnams bskul sras phur pa nyid shin tu 'od zer
NK087(shu)002:4536: 'phro ba byas / rtsa dbus ma nas mar zhugs
NK087(shu)002:4537: lte ba'i dbus nas 'byung bdag nyid kyi lte ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4538: sbu gu nang zhugs bdag gi lus 'od zer can
NK087(shu)002:4539: du byas snying ga'i yi ge bskul rtsa g.yas pa
NK087(shu)002:4540: nas 'od du 'bar de bzhin du mgal me chad
NK087(shu)002:4541: pa la bskor ba ji bzhin te /
NK087(shu)002:4542: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i yi ge'i las kyi skabs kyis 'khor ro //
NK087(shu)002:4543: de'i zhar la byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsnyen pa'i dus su 'od zer phar 'phro ba tsam na /
NK087(shu)002:4544: de las 'od zer mgar me'i tsha tsha bzhin du phyogs bcur 'phros pa de'i las gnyis byas te /
NK087(shu)002:4545: khams gsum gyi sems can log par lta ba rnams
NK087(shu)002:4546: bsgral bde bar gshegs pa rnams la drag po'i phur
NK087(shu)002:4547: pa 'di byin gyis rlob shig par bskul bas /
NK087(shu)002:4548: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas phur pa phra mo'i skur 'phros te /
NK087(shu)002:4549: sras phur bu rab tu khros pa'i snying gar bstims
NK087(shu)002:4550: la byas nas gzi byin bskyed cing mthu bskyed par
NK087(shu)002:4551: bya'o // sgrub pa'i dus su zhor las byung ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4552: ting nge 'dzin 'di las khro chung lcags kyu can
NK087(shu)002:4553: bya'o // du gyur te / des gzas pa po
NK087(shu)002:4554: gang yin pa'i rnam shes de bkug nas sras phur
NK087(shu)002:4555: bu'i 'og tu chud par bsam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4556: las kyi dus ni bdag dang phur bu gnyis dang /
NK087(shu)002:4557: phyogs bcu'i khro bo mdun gyi thugs ka nas spro zhing dgug par bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4558: grangs kyi bsnyen pa'i dus su ni sa ya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4559: bsgrub pa'i dus su ni 'bum mam nyis 'bum mam /
NK087(shu)002:4561: las kyi dus su ni re re la brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad do //
NK087(shu)002:4562: de lta bu'i grangs kyi bsnyen pa tshang ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4563: mtshan ma dbyung bar gdon mi za zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma rnam pa lnga ste /
NK087(shu)002:4564: dang po du ba 'dra ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:4565: gnyis pa mar me 'dra ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:4566: zhes pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
NK087(shu)002:4567: mdor na rtags sku'i mtshan ma byung na'o //
NK087(shu)002:4568: drag po'i rtags su gsum ni /
NK087(shu)002:4569: rab kyi mngon du 'khrug pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4570: 'bring gis ling gar khugs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4571: tha mas mtshan ma rtag tu 'ong ste /
NK087(shu)002:4572: de lta bu'i mtshan ma byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:4574: dus kyi mtshan ma ni zla grangs lo grangs dang zhag grangs kyi dus su'o //
NK087(shu)002:4575: mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa ni mtshan ma nam byung gi bar du ste /
NK087(shu)002:4576: mtshan ma mthong ba na bsnyen pa tshang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4577: de ltar bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa dang las kyi mtshan ma byung ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:4578: gdod las 'og nas 'byung ba la sbyar ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4579: de nas phur pa gdab pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4580: de'i phyir de nas gdab par rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:4581: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4582: ti ba ta tsakra phur pa'i lha /
NK087(shu)002:4584: sras phur pa nyid la bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4586: khros pa mi zad 'bar ba yi /
NK087(shu)002:4587: sras phur pa de shin tu yang khros pa mi zad pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4588: rked nas lag g.yon 'debs tshul du zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4589: phur pa'i rked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste /
NK087(shu)002:4590: 'debs pa'i tshul du gzas pa po'i g.yas pa'i tho bas rdeg tshul du bya zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4591: g.yas pa'i tho bas 'byar tshul gyis brdeg pa ste 'byor pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4592: rdo rje sder mo'i sngags 'di yis /
NK087(shu)002:4593: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4595: so so'i sngags dang sgrogs la grangs ni bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas gdab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4597: na ma sa man+ta ka ya bkru t+ta nan /
NK087(shu)002:4598: g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya sarba dustana m+aa ra ya
NK087(shu)002:4599: phata k+ai li k+ai la ya sarba p+aa pam phata
NK087(shu)002:4600: h'u h'u h'u badz+ra ki la ya ta rod +aa
NK087(shu)002:4601: dz+nya pa ya ti ka ya bak+ka tsit+ta badz+ra ki
NK087(shu)002:4603: drag tu brjod cing gab par bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4604: sngags so so dang sgrogs pa ste ci drag tu brjod la gnas su gdab pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4605: sngon la snying la gdab pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4606: skabs de ru tshe lung khrus lung gnyis bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4608: de nas gzugs de nyid bkug cing bstan par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4609: bstan par bya zhing gdab pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4610: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4611: gzugs la bsdu zhing mtshan mar gdab par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4612: rdo rje tshig tu 'og nas 'byung ba 'di brjod do //
NK087(shu)002:4613: dam tshig can gyi dus la bab ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4614: bdag nyid chen mo'i sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
NK087(shu)002:4615: sngar du rang gi srog gi snying po mdong gsol
NK087(shu)002:4616: du phul nas rnal 'byor pa'i grogs bya bar khas
NK087(shu)002:4617: blangs shing dam bcas pa'i dam tshig can dang /
NK087(shu)002:4618: sho na mu ka sngon gdug pa can 'joms pa'i
NK087(shu)002:4619: dus na zangs kyi wa mo la zangs kyi mi
NK087(shu)002:4620: mo zhon nas lcags kyi spyang ki brgyad ni g.yon
NK087(shu)002:4621: na khrid dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni g.yas na khrid
NK087(shu)002:4622: nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal po ci bgyi bka' stsal
NK087(shu)002:4623: du gsol zhes zhing 'ong ba'i dus su dam tshig
NK087(shu)002:4624: pho gcig dam la btags pa'i dam tshig can dang
NK087(shu)002:4625: / sa bdag chen mo'i phur bu'i srung mar khas blangs shing dam bcas te /
NK087(shu)002:4626: dbang bskur bas mos pa'i sa la dbang pas bdag
NK087(shu)002:4627: ste de'i dus su dam tshig pho cig su dam
NK087(shu)002:4628: la btags pa'i dam tshig can dang /
NK087(shu)002:4629: de rnams kyi srog gi snying po'i dam la ma 'da' bar las kyis shig pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4630: dgug pa'i las bskul zhing btang ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4631: de yang ji ltar btang zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:4632: bdag nyid chen mo ni mthu'i bdag nyid du gyur pa re ma ti bskul te /
NK087(shu)002:4633: bsgrub pa'i dus su sha chen dang gsur chen gla
NK087(shu)002:4634: ba shing kun tsan dan dkar dmar rnams kyis mchod
NK087(shu)002:4635: pa dbul zhing / gzhung gzhan nas byung ba'i tshig
NK087(shu)002:4636: bshad kyis bcol ba bya zhing srog gi snying po
NK087(shu)002:4637: nas drang zhing las la btang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:4638: de nas yang sho na mu ka'i bskul ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4639: nyi ma'i mchod pa phul la las bcol ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4640: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas /
NK087(shu)002:4641: sho na mu ka bskul pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4642: nyi ma'i mchod pa phul te bskul zhes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4643: de yang srog gi snying po nas drangs shing las bcol lo //
NK087(shu)002:4644: de nas yang sa bdag chen mo la las bcol te /
NK087(shu)002:4645: snod kyi khrag snod kyi sha las gzhi blang ba'i gtor ma byin la sngon gyi lo rgyus dang /
NK087(shu)002:4646: dam ji ltar gsal ba yang brjod la srog gi snying po nas drangs la las bcol lo //
NK087(shu)002:4647: de nas phra men la las bskul te /
NK087(shu)002:4651: ming nas bos la phra men ma bcu drug las la btang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:4652: de nas yang srin mo'i tshogs la las bcol te /
NK087(shu)002:4653: snying gi rtsa ba ni srog pa rtsa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4654: de las gzhi blangs te gtor ma byas la mtshan
NK087(shu)002:4655: tshig nas bos la gtor ma byin la las bcol
NK087(shu)002:4656: ba ste / gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa ste bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4657: gong nas gsungs pa'i rim pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4658: de ni bsgrub pa'i dus su sbyor cig /drag po'i
NK087(shu)002:4659: dus su ni las kyi sngags bzlas shing khrag spungs
NK087(shu)002:4660: kyi brdeg pa'o // bsnyen pa'i dus su na gtor
NK087(shu)002:4661: ma byin gyi las bcol ba ni ma yin no
NK087(shu)002:4662: kyi brdeg pa'o // // de ltar gtor ma byin nas las bcol ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4665: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4666: de yang chos kyi dbyings su bsgom pa'i don dam pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4667: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du sku phyag rgya
NK087(shu)002:4668: chen por bsgom kun rdzob kyang byang chub mchog tu
NK087(shu)002:4669: sems bskyed cing / dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sangs
NK087(shu)002:4670: rgyas thams cad kyi gdung tsho ba cing bde bar
NK087(shu)002:4674: rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag yid gsum gyis 'dzin cing
NK087(shu)002:4675: bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa bdag cag rnams la ni
NK087(shu)002:4676: / bdag gi sgom la gnod cing lus dang tshe
NK087(shu)002:4677: la gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs sam gang yin pa
NK087(shu)002:4678: / dang / 'on te bdud dang ste srog gi bar du gcod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4679: dgra ste dge ba la bar du gcod pa rnams ni /
NK087(shu)002:4680: bsgral ba'i gnas de'i bdud kyi sa ni dngos grub 'phrog par byed la /
NK087(shu)002:4681: dgras ni rnam par 'tshe bar byed de /
NK087(shu)002:4682: de rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4683: khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK087(shu)002:4684: yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas //
NK087(shu)002:4685: mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang //
NK087(shu)002:4686: lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang //
NK087(shu)002:4687: sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod //
NK087(shu)002:4689: khro mo chen mo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i byin brlabs kyis bdag nyid chen mo dang /
NK087(shu)002:4695: gshog pa can la sogs pa'i pho nya'i tshogs kyis
NK087(shu)002:4696: se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis 'dul bar bya ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4697: zhing gang yin pa de gnas nas 'dir bkug nas
NK087(shu)002:4698: / dbang po'i mngon sum du drag po'i las kyi mngon spyod kyi tshul bzhin du bsgral nas /
NK087(shu)002:4699: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgyal ba'i sras su bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:4700: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags nye bar len pa'i phung
NK087(shu)002:4701: po bshig pa'i phyir 'byung ba bzhi'i bskyed pa'i lus
NK087(shu)002:4702: ngag yid gsum gyis rdul du bshig nas kyang /
NK087(shu)002:4703: las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sbyangs pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4704: mnan cing gzir ba'i sdug bsngal gzas pa po gang
NK087(shu)002:4705: yin pa'i lus ngag yid gsum gyis nyams su myong
NK087(shu)002:4706: bar mdzod cig /ces pa las bcol te /
NK087(shu)002:4707: 'on te las byed du ma 'dod na bdag nyid
NK087(shu)002:4708: kyis bsnyen phur dril zhing bdag nyid kyi lce la
NK087(shu)002:4709: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'u de las
NK087(shu)002:4710: rdo rje bum pa'i nang na h'u gnas pa de'i
NK087(shu)002:4711: 'od zer gdug pa de bdag nyid chen mo la
NK087(shu)002:4712: sogs pa'i steng gi sgo nas rtsa'i bu ga kun
NK087(shu)002:4714: 'od zer des bdag nyid chen mo la sogs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:4715: snying khrag zhal du rngubs pas bdag nyid chen mo
NK087(shu)002:4716: la sogs par rab tu myos nas 'gyel bar bsam
NK087(shu)002:4717: mo // de'i phur pa dang gnyi ga las 'od 'phro ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4718: de nas yang phur pa'i rtse mo dam can rnams
NK087(shu)002:4719: la gtad de dril zhing bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'byung
NK087(shu)002:4720: ba'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te /
NK087(shu)002:4721: dam can rnams gan rkyal du 'gyel ba'i snying kar
NK087(shu)002:4722: gtad pas phur pa las bdud rtsi dkar la dag
NK087(shu)002:4723: pa'i chu rgyun 'byung bas ma mo rnams kyi lus
NK087(shu)002:4724: bsos te / gzi mdangs can du byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:4725: bdag gi dam tshig ni gang lags las ni ci bgyis zhes zer zhing 'dug par smra ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4726: de las bdag nyid kyi las ni dam can rnams kyis kha ru bdud rtsi blud de /
NK087(shu)002:4727: a mri ta sa ma ya ha ha na na
NK087(shu)002:4728: ra ga na zhes blud pas sngon ji ltar dam
NK087(shu)002:4729: bcas shing khas blangs pa de rjes su dran nas
NK087(shu)002:4730: rnal 'byor pa ji ltar 'dod pa'i las byed par
NK087(shu)002:4731: 'gyur ro // de ni dam can rnams thugs dam
NK087(shu)002:4732: gnas la phab la drag po'i las la bskul ba'o
NK087(shu)002:4733: 'gyur ro // // de nas mnan par bya ba'i snying po gsung ste de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4734: lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4735: de'i lam zhes gsungs pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4736: gzas pa po gang yin pa'i spyi bo yi steng du lam bsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4737: lam de yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:4738: gser gyi ri rab shin tu brjid che zhing lci ba zhig bskyed pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4739: de ni lam ste dngos po ri rab bo //
NK087(shu)002:4740: dngos po de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rnam
NK087(shu)002:4741: par mi rtog pa las ma g.yos pa'i phyir h'u
NK087(shu)002:4742: lam mo // de lta bu dang ldan pa'i ri
NK087(shu)002:4743: rab des gzir ba'i phyir na bstan pa ni zhes
NK087(shu)002:4745: dngos po ri rab des dngos snang lhang nge snang ba'i sku'i rang bzhin /
NK087(shu)002:4746: de las 'od zer 'phros pa gsung gi rang bzhin /
NK087(shu)002:4747: de las don dam par rang bzhin med pa thugs
NK087(shu)002:4748: kyi rang bzhin de'i phyir mo ha b+ha ga ban
NK087(shu)002:4749: da na zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4750: mo ha na sku dang ldan pa'i ri rab /
NK087(shu)002:4751: g.yon gsung 'od zer dang ldan pa'i ri rab /
NK087(shu)002:4752: b+ha ga na b+aan da na thugs spros pa dang
NK087(shu)002:4753: bral ba bcom ldan 'das dang ldan pa'i ri rab
NK087(shu)002:4754: bo // sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa'i ri rab
NK087(shu)002:4755: des gzas pa po las dang nyon mongs gzir ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4756: bo // phyir / sh+ri kri b+hi kri zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4757: las gzir ba ni sh+ri kri /
NK087(shu)002:4758: las kyis bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa gzir ba ni bi kri'o //
NK087(shu)002:4759: de yang gzir ba'i las la byin can du bya ba'i phyir badz+ra h'u ka ra te /
NK087(shu)002:4760: ri rab de'i steng du ma bsam ste de yongs
NK087(shu)002:4761: su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
NK087(shu)002:4764: rdo rje rgya gram du gyur /
NK087(shu)002:4765: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'u yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:4767: h'u ka ra'i sku yongs su gyur par bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:4768: bskyed pa'i sngags badz+ra h'u ka ra zhes pas sku gsal bar bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:4769: de'i zhal nas gdug pa'i sngags h'u h'u h'u phata phata phata ces sgrogs shing /
NK087(shu)002:4770: gzas pa po gang yin pa des /
NK087(shu)002:4771: 'bros su mi gnang bar zil gyis gnon pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4772: de nas yang 'dren par byed pa'i sngags sgras bstan te de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4773: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya dzah h'u bam hohzhesa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4774: 'khor ba'i gnas nas drang ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod pas /
NK087(shu)002:4775: bdag gi thugs ka nas ye shes sems dpa'i h'u las rdo rje /
NK087(shu)002:4776: rtseg mar byung ste de las phra men ma lcags kyu thogs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4777: rgyud mar byung nas dgug pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4778: le'u brgyad pa nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ro //
NK087(shu)002:4779: de nas yang tshe lung dang khrus lung bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4780: de'i phyir rdo rje'i tshig tu brjod nas ni /
NK087(shu)002:4781: bkrag dang gzi mdangs bdag la bstim zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4782: rdo rje'i tshig tu 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags 'di
NK087(shu)002:4783: brjod nas kho'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs phrogs nas bdag
NK087(shu)002:4785: de yang bsnyen phur gdab pas phur pa'i 'od zer
NK087(shu)002:4786: gyis gzas pa po'i snying dkar nag gi mtshams su
NK087(shu)002:4787: btab pas tshe rabs thogs ma med pa'i dus nas
NK087(shu)002:4788: kun gzhi la bag chags ngan pa bsags pa ste
NK087(shu)002:4789: phur pa'i 'od zer gyis bsregs par bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:4790: de'i skabs las ni rnam par byang ba'i byang chub sems zhes bya ste khrus lung ngo //
NK087(shu)002:4791: de nas kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa shel dag pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4792: phur pa'i 'od zer gyis bzhu nas dngul chu zhun ma bzhin du gnas pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4793: phur pa'i rtse mo la 'ubs kyis 'dus nas a'i rang bzhin gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:4794: de'i dus su ri rab kyi steng na bzhugs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:4795: khro bo h'u ka ra bzhengs nas gnas pa de
NK087(shu)002:4796: la bdag nyid kyi phur pa dam tshig gi phyag
NK087(shu)002:4797: rgyas bstan nas / sarba big+ha nan ki la ya
NK087(shu)002:4798: h'u h'u phata phata ces pa ni gzhan du man
NK087(shu)002:4800: badz+ra h'u ka ra h'u a zhes brjod nas /
NK087(shu)002:4801: h'u ka ra la gtad pas h'u ka ra bzhengs pa des /
NK087(shu)002:4802: blangs nas bdag nyid kyi steng gi sgo nas mar thim par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4803: gzas pa pho'i tshe phrogs nas /
NK087(shu)002:4804: bdag gi tsher gyur par bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:4805: de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4806: don dam pa byang chub kyi sems so //
NK087(shu)002:4807: lung las ni tshe lung zhes bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4809: a nyid byang chub sems kyi khrus //
NK087(shu)002:4810: phur pa nyid kyang gzi byin bskyed //
NK087(shu)002:4811: 'od dang mthu dpung lhag par bskyed //
NK087(shu)002:4813: bdag nyid kyi snying gi dkyil nas ye phyi mo
NK087(shu)002:4814: nas grub pa'i ye shes a ni kun gzhi'i rang
NK087(shu)002:4815: bzhin te ye nas rnam par dag par gnas pa
NK087(shu)002:4816: nyid byang chub kyi sems kyi khrus yin par bstan
NK087(shu)002:4817: te / der phur pa la 'dus pa ni byang chub sems dbang du bsdu ste /
NK087(shu)002:4818: phur pa nyid kyang gzi byin can du gyur pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4819: de nas yang dbu zhabs kyi tshig gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4820: de nas phyogs bcu'i khro bo la zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4821: rdo rje'i tshig gis 'og nas 'byung ba 'di skad bskul lo //
NK087(shu)002:4822: dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs //
NK087(shu)002:4823: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams //
NK087(shu)002:4825: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la /
NK087(shu)002:4826: gnas shing mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i dngos
NK087(shu)002:4827: grub bsgrub pa'i bar du gcod pa'i bgegs dang yang
NK087(shu)002:4828: dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i zhe sdang
NK087(shu)002:4829: gi sems kyis gdug cing phrag dog gi sems kyi
NK087(shu)002:4830: sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i gzas pa po de
NK087(shu)002:4831: 'khor ba'i gnas nas drangs pa'i phyir zung zhig pa
NK087(shu)002:4832: de / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i byin rlabs las bskul ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4834: gzas pa po de rang gi bde ba'i gnas nas bskul ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4835: rgyob cig pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i rigs dbyug
NK087(shu)002:4836: pa sngon po can gyis rgyab nas rgyob cig /dbang
NK087(shu)002:4837: po'i yul la mi gtang ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:4838: yan lag 'khum mi nus par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4839: rnam par chings shig ces pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4840: khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i byin gyis brlabs las bskul ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4841: h+aum dang sbyar de nas yang bag chags kyi phung
NK087(shu)002:4842: po phur pa btab nas yang dag gi shes pa
NK087(shu)002:4843: dang ni phral log pa'i shes pa bsgral ba de
NK087(shu)002:4844: mtshon gyis btub pa'i las byas nas gnas pa de
NK087(shu)002:4847: gshin rje gshed po'i rigs can /
NK087(shu)002:4848: khro bo mi g.yo mgon po yis /
NK087(shu)002:4849: phung po gtum zhing 'phrag gis brdungs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4851: gzas po de la steng pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4852: grogs byed srog la skyob pa'i lha 'dre gang yin pa de dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4853: grogs dang 'bral bar gyi zhes gsungs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4854: rta mgrin gyi rigs gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i grogs dang bral ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4855: ha sa ya ra na dang sbyar ro //
NK087(shu)002:4856: myur du bsgral zhing dbang du 'dus 'dus nas rigs
NK087(shu)002:4857: gang yin min smra tu gzhugs pa'i phyir rengs par
NK087(shu)002:4858: khugs la smra chug cig /ces pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4859: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i byin gyis brlabs las smra gzhug pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4860: dza la pa ya dang sbyar /
NK087(shu)002:4861: gzas pa po'i shes pa srin bu me khyer bzhin du bkug pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4862: gzugs dang ri mo la dbab pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4864: khro bo rta mgrin gyis byin gyis brlabs las phyung ba'i bam ste /
NK087(shu)002:4866: gzas pa po'i las dang nyon mongs pa gzir ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4867: rnam par gzir bar byos gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4868: h'u ka ra'i byin brlabs las byung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4870: gzas pa po de'i dkyil 'khor du chud nges par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4871: de'i dbang du gyur nas zhes gsungs te rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:4872: rigs khro bo stobs po che'i dbang du byas nas
NK087(shu)002:4873: / de'i rigs khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi /
NK087(shu)002:4874: bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis /
NK087(shu)002:4875: zhes pa la sogs bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4877: de nas bsod pa'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4878: h'u bar bid dan zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:4879: h'u par bid tan zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4880: rdo rje gzhon nus bsod pa'i las kyi sngags te /
NK087(shu)002:4881: k+ai la ya bco brgyad dang sbyar te /
NK087(shu)002:4882: kun gzhi rtsad nas phyung ba'i dus su sbyar bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4883: tshin d+ha tshin d+ha badz+ra h'u phata ces bdud rtsi
NK087(shu)002:4884: 'khyil pa'i bsod pa'i las kyi sngags te sngags 'di
NK087(shu)002:4885: brjod cing lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du brgyab pas bdud
NK087(shu)002:4887: de yang ye shes su byas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4888: bin+da bin+da badz+ra phata ces pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4889: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi bsad pa'i las kyi sngags te /
NK087(shu)002:4890: sngags 'di bzlos shing khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4891: cha las byung ba'i phur pas pus mo'i lha nga'i
NK087(shu)002:4892: ltag na stobs bskyed pa'i rtsa yongs la btab ste
NK087(shu)002:4895: de nas yang gri na g+h+ri na badz+ra h'u phata
NK087(shu)002:4896: ces bya ba rdo rje ta'i gsod pa las kyi
NK087(shu)002:4897: sngags te / sngags 'di brjod cing rdo rje rta'i cha las byung ba'i phur pa des /
NK087(shu)002:4898: mgrin pa ngag gi gnas su btab pas /
NK087(shu)002:4899: ro'i longs spyod thams cad phrog nas ye shes su byas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4900: de nas yang ha na ha na badz+ra h'u phata
NK087(shu)002:4901: rnam par rgyal ba'i cha las byung ba'i phur pa
NK087(shu)002:4902: des sngags 'di brjod cing mig la btab pas mig
NK087(shu)002:4903: gi rnam par shes pa dbang du bsdus ye shes
NK087(shu)002:4904: su bya'o // de'i rnam par rgyal ba'i srid pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4905: de nas yang mi g.yo mgon po'i gsod pa'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4906: ban+da ban+da badz+ra h'u phata ces gsungs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4907: sngags 'di bzlas shing mi g.yo mgon pa'i cha las
NK087(shu)002:4908: byung ba'i phur pa blangs nas lce'i dbus zla ba
NK087(shu)002:4909: kham pa 'dra ba'i dbus su btab pas lce'i rnam
NK087(shu)002:4910: par shes pa phrogs te ye shes su bskyed pa'o
NK087(shu)002:4911: // de nas yang stobs po che'i bsod pa'i las kyis basngagasa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4912: tad+ya th+aa badz+ra h'u phata ces pa yin te sngags
NK087(shu)002:4913: 'di zos shing stobs po che'i cha las byung ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4914: phur pa rkang mthil nas bskyed par byed pa'i rtsa
NK087(shu)002:4915: la stobs bskyed pa'i stobs phrogs nas ye shes su
NK087(shu)002:4916: bskyed pa'o // de nas dbye ba byed pa'i las
NK087(shu)002:4917: kyis sngags bstan pa'i phyir ha sa ya ra ni
NK087(shu)002:4918: hri da na h'u phata ces bya ba yin te
NK087(shu)002:4919: bskyed pa'o // / stongs grogs dang bral bar bya
NK087(shu)002:4920: ba'i dus su sbyor cig /de nas bcing bar byed
NK087(shu)002:4921: pa las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4922: sh+ri kri na a na ya h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4923: 'ching bar byed pa'i skabs gang yin pa'i dus su
NK087(shu)002:4924: sbyor cig /de nas smra bar byed pa'i snying po
NK087(shu)002:4925: bstan pa'i phyir / dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya h'u phata /
NK087(shu)002:4927: yungs kar la sngags la rdo rje spyan dmigs rno
NK087(shu)002:4928: la gtong la gong du gsungs pa'i rigs la sogs
NK087(shu)002:4930: de nas 'bebs par byed pa'i snying po bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4931: a be sha ya a be sha ya h'u phata /
NK087(shu)002:4932: ces bya ba ni 'beb pa'i skabs gang yin par sbyar ro //
NK087(shu)002:4933: gzugs dang gnyis su med par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4934: de nas dbye ba'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4935: bi da ya bi da ya h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4936: gtung ba'i phung po de zhal du btabs pa'i phyir zhal phye zhig pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4938: de nas yang rdo rje phra men tshogs rnams la bskul bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4939: rdo rje phra men tshogs rnams la /
NK087(shu)002:4940: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:4941: rdo rje las byung ba rdo rje phra men ma'o //
NK087(shu)002:4942: mngag pa'i phyir tshogs rnams la rdo rje'i tshig gis bskul bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4943: thabs dang shes rab las byung zhing /
NK087(shu)002:4944: thabs kyi bcol zhing sems can gyi don la brtson par 'bad pa'i phyir na bran zhes bya ba /
NK087(shu)002:4945: theg chen chos kyi dbyings las 'byung zhing rim pa
NK087(shu)002:4946: nas sprul zhing mngag par bya ba'i phyir gnas su
NK087(shu)002:4948: pho nya gtso bo rnams kyis ji ltar bcol zhing bka' stsal nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:4951: bsad par bya ba dang bsgo ba nyan pas bka' nyan te /
NK087(shu)002:4952: las kyi lha rnams kyis mngon spyod kyi 'phrin las bya ba'i dus la bab ces bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:4953: khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab ces pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:4954: las kyi lha khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab ces pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:4955: tha tshig ji ltar bcas pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:4956: sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ru ji ltar
NK087(shu)002:4957: dam bcas shing khas blang bzhin du drag po'i 'phrin
NK087(shu)002:4958: las myur du byos zhes bcol ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:4959: gal te'am 'on te las byed du mi 'dod cing tha tshig las 'das par gyur na /
NK087(shu)002:4960: rdo rje chu yis brdeg par nges zhes bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:4961: las kyi lha la phur pa gtad cing dril la gnad la dbab pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:4963: de nas yang gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4964: ha na ha na badz+ra h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4965: sngags 'di bzlas shing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i cha
NK087(shu)002:4966: las byung ba'i phur pa ste de blang ste dril
NK087(shu)002:4967: nas bud pa'i rtsal gyen du 'greng ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:4968: g.yas kyi rtsa dang g.yon gyi rtsa gnyis la btab pas thabs shes rab rgyu ba rgyun gcad de /
NK087(shu)002:4970: de nas yang dbyug pa sngon po'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4971: da ha da ha badz+ra h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4972: 'di bzlos shing dbyug pa sngon po'i cha las byung ba'i phur pa blangs te /
NK087(shu)002:4973: dril nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las btab
NK087(shu)002:4974: pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dbang du bsdus
NK087(shu)002:4976: de nas yang gshin rje gshed kyi gsod pa las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4977: pa tsa pa tsa h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4978: sngags 'di bzlos shing gshin rje gshed kyi cha las
NK087(shu)002:4979: byung ba'i phur pa blangs te dril bas rna ba'i
NK087(shu)002:4980: rnam par shes pa dbang du bsdus nas btab pas
NK087(shu)002:4981: sna'i rnam par shes pa dbang du 'dus nas ye
NK087(shu)002:4983: de nas yang bdag nyid chen mo gsod pa'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4984: ma ta ma ta badz+ra h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4985: bdag nyid sku la sngags 'di bzlas shing khrag dang
NK087(shu)002:4986: nyung nag gis brgyab nas gzugs dang dpung thal bar
NK087(shu)002:4989: de nas yang sho na mu ka'i gsod pa'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4990: dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra h'u phata /
NK087(shu)002:4992: sho na mu ka bskul la sngags 'di bzlos shing yungs nag gi brgyab pas /
NK087(shu)002:4993: gzugs kyi phung po de la 'phar spyang la sogs pa mang po stod cing za bar bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:4994: de nas mche ba can gyi gsod pa'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:4995: su ru su ru badz+ra h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:4996: sngags 'di bzlos shing mche ba can bskul nas /
NK087(shu)002:4997: yungs nag gzugs la brgyab pas mche ba can gyi
NK087(shu)002:4998: tshogs grangs med pas gzugs la stod cing za ba'o
NK087(shu)002:4999: // de nas yang gshog pa can gyi gsod pa'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5000: mu ru mu ru badz+ra h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5001: bskul la sngags 'di bzlos shing yungs nag brgyab pas
NK087(shu)002:5002: gzugs kyi phung po de la gshog pa can gyi
NK087(shu)002:5003: tshogs stod cing za bar bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:5004: de nas yang dpal lha mo dbang gi gsod pa las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5005: ka ta ka te zhes pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5006: dpal lha mo dbang bskur la sngags bzlos shing yungs
NK087(shu)002:5007: nag gi brgyab pas gzugs kyi phung po de la
NK087(shu)002:5008: tho ba'i char phab par bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:5009: de nas yang lha mo dbang gi gsod pa las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5010: dza ya bi dza ya zhes gsungs pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5011: lha mo dbang bskur la sngags 'di bzlas shing yungs
NK087(shu)002:5012: nag gi brgyab pas gzugs kyi phung po de yang
NK087(shu)002:5013: lhag par yang dum bu dum bur gyur par bsam
NK087(shu)002:5014: mo // de nas yang klu mo dbang gi gsod pa las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5016: a pa ra tsi ta ma ra sa na zhes pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5017: klu mo dabnga bskur la sngags 'di bzlos shing yungs
NK087(shu)002:5018: nag gis 'phangs pas gzugs kyi phung po de lhag
NK087(shu)002:5019: par yang thal bar 'gyur bar bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:5020: de nas yang legs mo dbang gis gsod pa las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5021: bra ma ra ta na ya h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5022: legs mo dbang bskur la sngags 'di bzlas shing yungs
NK087(shu)002:5023: nag gis brgyab pas gzugs kyi phung po de lhag
NK087(shu)002:5024: par chu srin byed pas gnyis par bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:5025: des kyang bstan pa'i las su 'gyur zhes bya ba ni phur pa btab pa'i las kyi bsgral nas /
NK087(shu)002:5026: de'i steng la khrag dang yungs nag dang /
NK087(shu)002:5027: las kyi lha'i sgrol sngags kyis brgyab pas lhag par yang gsod pa'i las te brtan pa 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:5028: de nas yang gzugs de gdab par bya ba'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:5029: de nas sras mchog bskul bar bya zhes pa sogs
NK087(shu)002:5031: de nas sras mchog bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5032: sras mchog sprul pa bskul bar bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5033: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs ka nas /
NK087(shu)002:5035: de rnams kyi lag na ral gri dang /
NK087(shu)002:5038: be con la sogs pa'i mtshon cha gdug pa mang
NK087(shu)002:5039: po thogs te lus dum bur dum bur btub par
NK087(shu)002:5040: bya ba'i phyir / rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni /
NK087(shu)002:5041: sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa //
NK087(shu)002:5042: stobs chen khro bo chen po yis //
NK087(shu)002:5043: klad pa tshar ba brgya ru khos //
NK087(shu)002:5045: rdo rje gzhon nu'i gsang ba'i bka' las ni mi dge bcu byed pa'i sdig can dang /
NK087(shu)002:5046: mtshams med lnga byed pa'i pha gsod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5048: rnal 'byor gyi sku la tshar 'dod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5049: lag khang gi sku 'khor la rku ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5050: mthun pa'i bar du dbyen 'jug pa la sogs pa'i
NK087(shu)002:5051: las byed cing thugs rje spyang thag chad cing ngan
NK087(shu)002:5052: song gsum du skye nges pa'i sdig can gang zhig
NK087(shu)002:5054: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi stobs dang /
NK087(shu)002:5055: dbyings kyi don chen po dang ldan pa'i khro bo
NK087(shu)002:5056: chen po las nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyangs shing
NK087(shu)002:5057: ma rig pa'i rgya mo bral ba'i phyir ye shes
NK087(shu)002:5058: lnga'i mtshon cha'i char phab nas /
NK087(shu)002:5059: klad pa tshar pa rgya ru bkas pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5060: lus dum bu stong du gtubs shig pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5061: nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5062: rdo rje bka' las 'da' ma byed ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5063: rdo rje gzhon nu'i byin gyis brlabs kyis las dang
NK087(shu)002:5064: nyon mongs pa'i bag chags byang nas chos thos pa'i
NK087(shu)002:5065: skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5066: rna ba'i dbang pos nyon cig dge ba dang srog gi bar du gcod pa'i bgegs dang /
NK087(shu)002:5067: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa la rnam
NK087(shu)002:5068: par 'tshe bar byed cing log par 'dren pa'i tshogs
NK087(shu)002:5069: rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i bka' la
NK087(shu)002:5070: 'da' bar ma byed cig ces brjod cing /
NK087(shu)002:5071: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang phyag tu ral gri thogs nas sngags 'di brjod cing btub bo //
NK087(shu)002:5072: h'u ma ma ba shi ku ru ma tam dz+ny+aa
NK087(shu)002:5073: na ka ra i dan de ma ma ka ra
NK087(shu)002:5074: ma sh+ri kra re swa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5075: zhes pa ni ma mo rnams kyi gdug pa'i sngags te /
NK087(shu)002:5076: sngags 'di brjod cing ling ga dum bu dum bur btub par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5077: de nas stong grogs byed pa'i lha dang dpral ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5078: de nas dbye ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5079: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5080: gsung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5082: gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi //
NK087(shu)002:5084: de yi mthu dpung byed pa rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5085: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod //
NK087(shu)002:5086: log par lta ba'i sems can de'i //
NK087(shu)002:5087: lus kyi sgo dang ngag gi sgo nas gdug cing yid kyi sgo nas /
NK087(shu)002:5088: zhe sdang gi sems byed pa'i gdug pa can gyi tshogs tshangs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5089: brgya byin dbang phyug chen mo ma ha de ba dang khyab 'jug chen mo dang /
NK087(shu)002:5090: srin po lang ka mgrin bcu la sogs pa'i 'jig
NK087(shu)002:5091: rten pa'i bdud dam 'on te lha yang rung ba'am
NK087(shu)002:5092: / 'jig rten 'di na mthu che ba ston pa
NK087(shu)002:5093: su yang rung ba sgrub pa po'i bka' gzhung bzhin
NK087(shu)002:5094: du byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bar chad byed
NK087(shu)002:5096: gzhan la gnod par byed pa de'i mthu dpung byed
NK087(shu)002:5097: pa rnams kyi pha rol pos nyams su blangs du
NK087(shu)002:5098: mi 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston pa de gnyis med
NK087(shu)002:5099: par gyis shig ces pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5100: ha sa ra hri na zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
NK087(shu)002:5102: tad+ya tha h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5103: sngags 'di brjod cing gong du gsungs pa'i bdug pas gdug pa'o /
NK087(shu)002:5104: de nas yang h'u ka ra'i gsod pa'i las kyi sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5105: sarba na ma ya badz+ra h'u phata ces pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5106: h'u ka ra'i cha las byung ba'i phur pa blangs te dril te /
NK087(shu)002:5107: sngags 'di brjod cing tshang ba'i bu gar gdab pas
NK087(shu)002:5108: lus mgo mjug bcu dang bral nas yang dag pa'i
NK087(shu)002:5110: de nas yang btubs pa'i phung po btung ba'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:5111: de nas btung ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5112: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5113: gsung ngo zhes bya ba 'og ma 'adi'o //
NK087(shu)002:5114: khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5115: khro mo rnams kyi mkha' gru gsum pa'i nang du'o //
NK087(shu)002:5116: rdo rje tho ba bskom bya zhing zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:5117: ni rdo rje tho ba ni thabs kyi gsal ba'i
NK087(shu)002:5118: rdo rje'o // dngos por gyur pa'i gnas chen kun
NK087(shu)002:5119: zhes bya ba ni btub pa'i dngos po ma lus
NK087(shu)002:5120: rdo rje'o // pa kun / rdul phran bzhin du brdung bar bya zhes gsungs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5121: rdo rje tshig gi bskul bar bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5123: brdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:5124: ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa mang po 'byongs par
NK087(shu)002:5125: yod pa de sbyangs shing bag chags kyi phung po
NK087(shu)002:5126: gshig pa'i phyir / gang yin pa'i phung po de /
NK087(shu)002:5127: rdo rje tho bas brdungs shing /
NK087(shu)002:5128: ye shes kyi rdo rje de la'o //
NK087(shu)002:5129: 'bar ba dang khro bo'i dbyings la 'od 'bar ba'i gtun du /
NK087(shu)002:5131: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'da'
NK087(shu)002:5132: bar byed cing lus ngag yid gsum gyis mi dge
NK087(shu)002:5133: ba byed pa'i sdig can rnams yang dag pa'i gsang
NK087(shu)002:5134: ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'i me dbal dang chas
NK087(shu)002:5135: pa'i rdo rje gzas pa po gang yin pa'i gdug
NK087(shu)002:5136: pa'i snying bsregs nas rnam par rtog pa rtags pa'i
NK087(shu)002:5137: sgyu ma'i lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du brdungs shig
NK087(shu)002:5138: pa'o // 'on te gang du brdung zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:5140: khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du /
NK087(shu)002:5141: rdo rje tho bas brdung byas ste /
NK087(shu)002:5143: khro mo khams gsum gyi gtun du /
NK087(shu)002:5144: thabs khro bo gsang ba'i rdo rje tho bas brdung bar byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:5145: lha yang rung ste brlag par byed ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5146: 'jig rten gyi tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa yang brlag par 'gyur na /
NK087(shu)002:5147: gzhan sems can lta smos ci dgos te brlag par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:5148: zhes pa 'di brdung bar byed pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5149: kha tham kha tham kha tham h'u h'u h'u phata phata phata ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5150: sngags de yang gsum gdebs su byas nas bzlas shing /
NK087(shu)002:5151: rnal 'byor pas dngos su yang gtun gru gsum du tho bas brdung bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5152: de nas yang brdung ba'i lhag rol de khro mo rnams kyi zhal du btab pas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5153: bstabs pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5154: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5155: rdo rje khro bo 'bar ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5157: rdo rje ni yang dag pa'i rdo rje ste /
NK087(shu)002:5158: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
NK087(shu)002:5159: de las byung ba'i khro bo ni /
NK087(shu)002:5160: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la 'od 'bar ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5162: rdo rje za byed srin mo dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5163: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i byin rlabs las byung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5164: khro bo rab tu rngam pa'i mi zad pa mche
NK087(shu)002:5165: ba gtsig pa log par lta ba za bar byed
NK087(shu)002:5166: pa de yi zhal du btabs par bya ba ste
NK087(shu)002:5167: / de yang khro mo dang za byed pho nya
NK087(shu)002:5168: bcu sprul pa dang lcam dral rnams la bstabs par
NK087(shu)002:5169: / bya'o // de rdo rje gnod sbyin zhal gdangs par zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5170: gnyis med pa'i ye shes las ma g.yos pa ni rdo rje ste /
NK087(shu)002:5171: de las 'byung ba'i bdag nyid chen mo dang /
NK087(shu)002:5172: sa bdag chen mo la sogs pa'i zhal du bstabs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5173: mtshan ma'i dngos po bstims par bsgom zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5174: mtshon gyis gtubs pa'i dum bu mtshan mar snang ba'i
NK087(shu)002:5175: dngos po de khro bo dang khro mo dang 'phra
NK087(shu)002:5176: men ma'i bdag nyid chen mo'i zhal du bstabs pas
NK087(shu)002:5177: / de rnams kyis thim par gsol bar bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:5178: de yang zhal du bstabs pa'i dus su /
NK087(shu)002:5179: rdo rje'i tshig 'og nas 'byung ba 'dis bskul bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5180: nam mkha'i khro mo zhal gdangs su zhes bya ba
NK087(shu)002:5181: ni chos nyid ma bcos pa'i don gyis ngo bo
NK087(shu)002:5183: de las byung ba'i khro bo mi zad pa zhal
NK087(shu)002:5184: sdang pa ru khams gsum gyi sems can nyon mongs
NK087(shu)002:5185: pa lnga yis bcings nas ngan song gsum du 'khor
NK087(shu)002:5186: ba de thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs kyis
NK087(shu)002:5187: / thang gcig yud tsam gcig la 'gro ba kun zhal du phra men ma ngas bstabs pas /
NK087(shu)002:5188: khro bo rol pa'i tshogs khyod kyi zhal du yud tsam la gtim par mdzod cig pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5189: de nas zhal du 'khor ba mtha' dag gsol ba'i gting la /
NK087(shu)002:5190: dgyes nas dkyil du bcas pa dus gcig tu bzhad pa de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5191: rol pas dgyes pa'i gad rgyangs sgrogs zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5192: sdus shing bsreg la myur du zo bya ba ni
NK087(shu)002:5193: khams gsum gyi 'khor ba ma lus par bsdus shing
NK087(shu)002:5194: / 'od zer gyi bsregs la nyung ngu za'o //
NK087(shu)002:5196: stabs par bya ba'i basngagasa ni 'di yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5197: bi da ya'i sngags brjod pa'i rjes la badz+ra kro
NK087(shu)002:5198: ta ya ga sha raka sha kro ta kha hi
NK087(shu)002:5199: kha hi / zhes pas zhal du gsol nas /
