NK087(shu)002:5200: gsol ba'i gting la dgyes pa'i gad mo 'di yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5201: ha ha ha zhes bzhad nas /
NK087(shu)002:5202: de nas gnas phyi mo dang phrad pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5203: h'u h'u h'u zhes pas rnam par shes pa h'u
NK087(shu)002:5204: du bsdus nas lte ba'i dbus su ye shes kyi
NK087(shu)002:5205: mes bzhu nas phata phata phata ces pas yum gyi
NK087(shu)002:5206: pad+ma la spros pas yum gyi pad+ma de ni gnas
NK087(shu)002:5207: phyi mo ste / de ni gnas phyi mo dang phrad pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5208: de'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:5209: de la dbang tshad mar bskul nas 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi don la btang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:5210: de ni las bya ba la 'bras bu yod pa zhes bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5212: de ltar byas pa'i gnas kyi man ngag ste /
NK087(shu)002:5213: las ma 'grub bar du bya ba ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5214: byas na skyon ci yod ce na /
NK087(shu)002:5215: byang chub sems kyi 'khor la dbang bskur bas /
NK087(shu)002:5216: rnal 'byor dam pa yin pa'i gral du 'gro bas rnal 'byor pa nyid dam tshig nyams pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5217: las mi 'grub pa'i skyon yod do //
NK087(shu)002:5218: 'grub nges pa dang gnas kyi man ngag de ltar las mthar phyin par bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5219: de nas yang de ltar ma yin nas phung po lhag rol de sreg pa zhig yin na /
NK087(shu)002:5220: hom gyi las bstan pa'i phyir de nas /
NK087(shu)002:5221: bsreg rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5222: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5224: zhes pa mi bsreg par bya ba'i don ston pa'i zhal nas 'og nas 'byung ba 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5225: klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du //
NK087(shu)002:5227: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i hom khung du /
NK087(shu)002:5229: dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang du 'khyil pa'i hom khung du /
NK087(shu)002:5230: 'bar ba rab tu 'khrug pa gdug pa can gyi me spar te /
NK087(shu)002:5231: bskyed pa me lha dang ye shes dang dbyer med
NK087(shu)002:5232: par byas pa'i 'bar ba'i me dpung gi dngos por
NK087(shu)002:5233: gyur pa gzugs dum bu rnams ye shes kyi me'i
NK087(shu)002:5234: nang du bsreg par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5235: rdo rje tshig tu bsgral bar bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5237: ram me dpung 'bar pa'i klong dkyil du //
NK087(shu)002:5238: mtshan mar gyur pa'i dngos po 'di //
NK087(shu)002:5239: bsreg pas dngos po kun brlag ste //
NK087(shu)002:5240: slar mi ldog par bsreg par 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5241: ram zhes pa ni dang po me lha'i sa bon no //
NK087(shu)002:5242: de la yang sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus na /
NK087(shu)002:5243: sku las 'od zer 'bar bas me dpung 'bar ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5244: de lta bu'i me lha'i klong dkyil du /
NK087(shu)002:5245: brdungs pa'i phye mar snang ba'i dngos po 'di /
NK087(shu)002:5246: bsregs sam phye mar snang ba kun brlag nas slar
NK087(shu)002:5247: mi ldog par bsregs pas thal bar gyur pa rtag
NK087(shu)002:5248: go // mi spar bar bya ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5249: ram dz+wa la dz+wa la pa ra na h'u phata ces pas me sbar la /
NK087(shu)002:5250: tsher ma can gyi sreg shing gi nang du bzhugs par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5251: de nas bsreg pa'i thal ba de gtad khram bya zhing mnan par bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5252: de nas mnan pa rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5253: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5254: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5257: de lha'am klu'am gnod sbyin nam the'u rang mam /
NK087(shu)002:5258: ma mo la sogs pa gang la 'dod pa'i gnas
NK087(shu)002:5259: su chos 'byung ba dgos pa de'i nang du bzhug
NK087(shu)002:5260: pa'o // de gang gzhug ce na gzas pa po de gzhugs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5262: gang la gtod pa'i gzhug gi rgyab tu na la gzugs byas la gzhug pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5263: de yang re ba ni drag po'i las la shes
NK087(shu)002:5264: pa yin pas de'i nang du gtums la ra rog
NK087(shu)002:5265: dang khyi dkar po'i sbu la bsgril ba yi dkar
NK087(shu)002:5267: rdo rje rgya gram gyis ni drag po'i las kyi rgya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5268: des rgyas btab la hom khung du gzhugs par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5269: de'i steng du g.yam pa sngon po la yang rdo
NK087(shu)002:5270: rje rgya gram bris la kha bcad pa bzhag par
NK087(shu)002:5271: bya ste / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rtag par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5272: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor rtag par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5273: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor brtag go //
NK087(shu)002:5274: de'i steng du su las sa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de'i
NK087(shu)002:5275: phyir dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya zhes gsungs
NK087(shu)002:5276: so // dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du lam las
NK087(shu)002:5277: ri rab zur brgyad pa shin tu mdzes cing brtan
NK087(shu)002:5279: de'i steng du ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du
NK087(shu)002:5280: gyur pa'i steng du yi ge h'u las rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:5282: rdo rje rgya gram gyi lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5283: de'i mtha' ma yang me lce'i phreng bas bskor nas gnas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5284: de'i phyi ri rab steng du rdo rje bskyed /
NK087(shu)002:5285: rgya gram steng du bsam pa ni zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5286: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su h'u bsam h'u yongs su gyur pa las /
NK087(shu)002:5288: las kyi rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las
NK087(shu)002:5289: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa de ba skyed
NK087(shu)002:5290: par bya'o // bcom ldan 'das de'i 'khor na yang
NK087(shu)002:5291: gdug pa'i 'khor grangs med pa me dpung gi nang
NK087(shu)002:5293: de ltar bsgom pa'i des skye 'gro gdug pa can gyi las dang nyon mongs pa mnan nam /
NK087(shu)002:5294: bskal pa mtha'i bar du thar ba'i dus med par brtag pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5295: las kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom //
NK087(shu)002:5296: skye 'gro thams cad mnan par bsam //
NK087(shu)002:5298: de nas gnod pa'i dus de nyid du /
NK087(shu)002:5299: rdo rje tshig tu brjod pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:5301: h'u las kyi rdo rje 'khor dang bcas /
NK087(shu)002:5303: log par lta ba'i sems can rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5304: skad cig yud la mnan par shog /ces brjod par bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5305: las kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bcas pa yis /
NK087(shu)002:5306: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad thang cig yud la gnon cig pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5307: de yang ri rab bskyed pa'i sngags ni 'adi'o //
NK087(shu)002:5308: badz+ra su me trum zhes pas bskyed pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5309: las kyi rdo rje bskyed pa'i sngags 'adi'o //
NK087(shu)002:5310: h'u sa ma ya t+wam zhes pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5311: las kyi rdo rje bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:5312: de nas ting nge 'dzin yongs su gsal zhing goms pa'i nus mthu bstan /
NK087(shu)002:5314: dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad du //
NK087(shu)002:5315: ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /las su rung ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK087(shu)002:5316: de yis mi 'grub gang yang med //
NK087(shu)002:5317: mi bya ba ni gcig kyang med //
NK087(shu)002:5319: brnyan pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la //
NK087(shu)002:5320: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa med na don mi 'grub ste /
NK087(shu)002:5322: ting nge 'dzin te dkyil 'khor de'i dang du yang
NK087(shu)002:5323: nas yang du 'dris sems las su rung ba'i rnal
NK087(shu)002:5324: 'byor pa de las ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
NK087(shu)002:5326: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang gi las dang /
NK087(shu)002:5327: bskrad pa dang bsad pa'i las mi bya ba ni gcig kyang med do //
NK087(shu)002:5328: de nas yang ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal
NK087(shu)002:5329: 'byor pa de bde bar gshegs pa yin par bstan
NK087(shu)002:5330: pa'i phyir / ting nge 'dzin klong du 'dris pa yis //
NK087(shu)002:5331: mi zhes bya ba bder gshegs yin //
NK087(shu)002:5332: sangs rgyas zhes ni gud na med //
NK087(shu)002:5334: ting nge 'dzin la dus rtag tu gnas shing klong du gyur pa'i me de ni /
NK087(shu)002:5335: bde bar gshegs pa nyid yin te //
NK087(shu)002:5337: bde ba'i gnas ni chos kyi dbyings //
NK087(shu)002:5338: spros pa dang bral ba yin la //
NK087(shu)002:5339: ting nge 'dzin ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
NK087(shu)002:5340: de la gnas pa ni spros pa dang bral ba'i
NK087(shu)002:5341: ye shes kyi rgyu las bzhugs pa de'i phyir bde
NK087(shu)002:5342: bar gshegs pa'o // de ltar gnyis su med pa'i shes pa de la gnas shing gnas pas /
NK087(shu)002:5343: dus nam zhig na spros pa dang bral ba mngon du rtogs par 'gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:5344: de'i dus na nyon mongs pa thams cad ni /
NK087(shu)002:5345: ye shes kyi ngo bor gyur /
NK087(shu)002:5346: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni yongs su rgyas pa de nyid la /
NK087(shu)002:5347: sangs rgyas zhes ni gud na med ces ston pa dpal kun tu bzang pos gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5348: de ni don dam pa'ii bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5349: rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin rim par phye bas so sor bstan pa'i le'u la ni /
NK087(shu)002:5350: rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin rim pa phye ba'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:5351: bdud brtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)002:5352: don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5353: kun rdzob kyi bden pa gnyis bshad pa'i le'u ste
NK087(shu)002:5354: bcu pa'o ////de nas rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la
NK087(shu)002:5356: 'phrin las bzhi'i bye brag 'di ma bstan na /
NK087(shu)002:5357: sems can gyi don mi 'grub pas de bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5358: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des /
NK087(shu)002:5359: lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las kyis rnam par sbyong ba 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5361: gsungs pa'i don ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di kun
NK087(shu)002:5362: tu sna tshogs las kyi rnams zhes bya ba ni
NK087(shu)002:5364: sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi bsgrub pa'i gzhung gang yin pa bsgrubs zhi ba'i las bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5365: rin po che'i bsgrub pa byas la /
NK087(shu)002:5366: rgyas pa'i las bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5368: dbang gi las bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5369: gdon mi za'i bsgrub pa byas la /
NK087(shu)002:5370: drag po'i las bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5371: kun tu sna tshogs rnal 'byor dang gyis bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5372: kun tu sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor spyi'i kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du /
NK087(shu)002:5373: ting nge 'dzin du bdag gnas nas /
NK087(shu)002:5374: sems can gyi don du zhi ba dang dbang dang
NK087(shu)002:5375: mngon spyod la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi sems can
NK087(shu)002:5376: gyi don bya'o // de ltar spyi'i tshig bstan nas /
NK087(shu)002:5377: 'di nas mar ni 'phrin las so so'i gzhung bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5378: sngon la phyi nang du snang ba'i rnam par rtogs pa sbyang zhing zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5379: zhi ba'i las sngon las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5380: 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5381: 'jig rten khams gsum gyi sems can rab tu rmugs
NK087(shu)002:5382: shing yid thim par yod pa dang gal te pha
NK087(shu)002:5383: rol gnod pa byed cing rmugs par byed pa'i sems
NK087(shu)002:5384: can la / de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5385: sna tshogs las kyis zhi ba sbyar bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5386: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:5387: bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu //
NK087(shu)002:5389: le'u gsum pa las gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor lo
NK087(shu)002:5390: can gyi gnas gang yin de ru bsgrub par bya'o
NK087(shu)002:5391: // bkra shis mtshan ldan yum mchog gzungs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5392: dang po bsgrub pa'i dus su bkra shis pa'i yum
NK087(shu)002:5393: ni sha dkar la srab pa rked pa phra la
NK087(shu)002:5394: / mig dkyus ring la smin ma bar ma chad pa sor mo phra la ring ba /
NK087(shu)002:5395: smang zhing che ba ring thung gnyis sprangs pa'i yum mchog de /
NK087(shu)002:5397: las kyi dus su ni g.yon phyogs su bzhag pa las brtsam par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5398: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ram /
NK087(shu)002:5399: mi bskyod phyag rgya bdag gnas la zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5400: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrub pa'am /
NK087(shu)002:5401: yang na mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgrubs la /
NK087(shu)002:5402: 'od zer dkar po bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab cing sems can gang yin pa la bstims pas /
NK087(shu)002:5403: de'i bag chags ngan pa sbyang nas so so'i las gang yin pa de gsal bar 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:5404: dkar la zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor la zhes bya ni /
NK087(shu)002:5405: zhi ba'i thab khung ni kha dog dkar por byug pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5407: che chung ni khru gang du byas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5408: zabs su ni khru phyed brko ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5409: kha khyer sor bzhi bskor bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5413: rdo rje ra ba gtad par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5414: de'i phyi rol gyi sor bzhi yod pa la dpang
NK087(shu)002:5415: du sor gcig yod pa'i cha de la 'khor los
NK087(shu)002:5416: bskor bar bya'o // de ni ma thab bca' thabs so //
NK087(shu)002:5417: de nas yang phur pa dgod pa'i rim pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:5418: zhi ba'i phur pa gzhung du byed na /
NK087(shu)002:5419: lha'i mtshan nyid kun kyang sku mdog dkar po zhal
NK087(shu)002:5420: gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgrub pa'i dus su bsnyen pa
NK087(shu)002:5421: yang dkar po la bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5423: rin chen kha dog dkar po'o //
NK087(shu)002:5424: dkar po shel las byas pa'i zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:5425: rin chen kha dog dkar po dngul la byas pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5426: de la phur pa bya ba'am yang na de med
NK087(shu)002:5427: na 'o ma can gyi shing dkar po la bya
NK087(shu)002:5428: ste / de la phur pa byas la 'od zer yang dkar po spro bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5429: de ni bsgrub pa'i dus su ni phur pa zlum po drug gdab ste /
NK087(shu)002:5431: sras phur pa zlum po'i rtse mo zlum po drug gdab ste las bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5433: bde bar gshegs pa'i sgo drug tu'o //
NK087(shu)002:5434: der gtab pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:5435: phur pa'i 'od zer dkar po yis khang pa chen po'i sgo drug nas zhugs nas /
NK087(shu)002:5436: sems can nyon mongs pas 'thibs nas rmugs pa de deng /
NK087(shu)002:5437: nad pa la sogs pa nad rnam pa mang po gang yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5438: sems can gdug pa can yin na sems la gdug pa'i zhe sdang yod pa de /
NK087(shu)002:5439: ye shes kyis chus bkrus nas /
NK087(shu)002:5440: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan par byas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5441: de ni las kyi dus su sbyar ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5442: de nas me lha bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa te /
NK087(shu)002:5443: de la yang gnyis las thab khung nyid gzhal yas khang du byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:5444: 'jig rten pa'i me de me lha'i skur bskyed nas /
NK087(shu)002:5445: de la rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas nas ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs te bstims nas /
NK087(shu)002:5446: mchod pa phul nas zhi ba'i las bcol lo //
NK087(shu)002:5447: ye shes kyi me lha gshegs su gsol la /
NK087(shu)002:5448: dam tshig gi me lha'i thugs kar zhi ba'i lha nyid kyi gzhung gang yin pa bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:5449: de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la bstims pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5450: zhi ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5451: yang thab khung gong ma 'dra bar gzhal yas su
NK087(shu)002:5452: byas la de'i nang du dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil
NK087(shu)002:5453: 'khor gzhung gnyis gang yin pa bskyed pa la /
NK087(shu)002:5454: lha rnams kyi zhal nyid 'jig rten pa'i me yin par bsam la /
NK087(shu)002:5455: de ni me lha zhal du bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5456: de las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
NK087(shu)002:5457: bstims la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5458: snying rje byams pa'i mchod sbyin bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5459: khams gsum gyi sems can rmugs pa la sogs pa snying rje bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:5460: de la byams pas mchod par bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5461: mi dge ba bcu spangs nas dge ba bcu la
NK087(shu)002:5462: gnas pa'i phyogs skyongs bcu la las bcol ba'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:5464: yam shing dkar po sbar ba'i me zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5465: yam shing gi rim pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5466: rlon la sbom dang bcas rtse mo cha las byung ba chur 'dzub gang yod pa /
NK087(shu)002:5467: sbams su chag pa gang yod pa /
NK087(shu)002:5468: mngar zhing 'o ma yod pa'i shing la bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5469: shing de ma gas mi 'khyog pa 'bus ma zos pa la bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5470: 'o na gas pa la sogs byung na skyon ci yod ce na /
NK087(shu)002:5471: yod de gas par gyur na sha bkra can du skye ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5472: yon por song na dbang po ma tshang bar skye ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:5473: 'bus zos na yan lag ma tshang bar skye bas skyon yod pas /
NK087(shu)002:5475: 'on te 'khyogs pa las ma brnyed pa zhing yin na /
NK087(shu)002:5476: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5477: dkar la sbyar ba'i me zhes pa ni dngul lam
NK087(shu)002:5478: dkar po'i gnod sar par shing dkar po legs mo
NK087(shu)002:5479: blugs btsugs pa'am / dkon pa'i gnas nas me blangs nas /
NK087(shu)002:5480: shong ba'i shing nang du blugs la gong du gsungs pa'i sngags kyis me sbar bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5481: rlung yab kyis bud par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5482: de ltar migs par sbar nas bud shing gi nang du mar blugs par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5483: dkar la mngar ba'i rdzas rnams kyis //
NK087(shu)002:5484: zhi ba'i tshul du sbyin bsreg bya //
NK087(shu)002:5486: zhi ba la sngon la mar dbul bar bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5487: badz+ra ki li ki la ya shan ting ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5489: gzhung gcig tu bya ba yin na /
NK087(shu)002:5490: na ma sa man+ta bud+d+ha nam ru ru pu ru
NK087(shu)002:5491: dz+w+aa la ni t+ai ta lo tsa ni sarba a
NK087(shu)002:5492: ho na ye shin+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5493: zhes pas mar dbul bar bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5495: sarba sam ba de s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5497: sarba ga ga da ha ni badz+ra ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5501: badz+ra pu sha ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5503: pra ti ha na ya badz+ra s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5504: zhes pa ni ku sha dbul ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5505: badz+ra bi dza ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5507: ma ha be ga ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5509: ma h+aa ba la ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5513: badz+ra a dz+nya pra da ya she na ga ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK087(shu)002:5515: rdzas rnams thams cad g.yas su dgram /
NK087(shu)002:5516: mchod rdzas rnams ni g.yon du'o //
NK087(shu)002:5517: rdzas dang mchod rdzas kun la mngar gsum blugs par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5518: kha dog kun kyang dkar por byug /dngul phye 'bras
NK087(shu)002:5519: can dkar po la gtor ma byas te sbyin par
NK087(shu)002:5522: 'bras can dang 'o ma mar dkar la gtor ma
NK087(shu)002:5523: byas te las kyi lha la byin la las bcol
NK087(shu)002:5524: te / bsgrub pa'i dus su yang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:5525: bam gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du /
NK087(shu)002:5526: gti mug las kyis 'chal ba rnams zhi bas gyur par dbyings su rol zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5527: bam ni zlum por te zlum por byas pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhi ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs shing /
NK087(shu)002:5528: mchod pa phul zhing lo ser gyis gti mug las kyis 'chal pa rnams /
NK087(shu)002:5529: bsang zhing sbyangs pa rmugs pa la sogs pa'i sems can nyon mongs pa'i sbyangs shing /
NK087(shu)002:5530: zhi bar gyur pa yang dag pa'i don rtogs shing rnam par rtog pa med par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:5531: de ni zhi ba'i 'bras bu ste don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5532: yam shing la sogs pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5533: don dam pa'i 'bras bu skye ba mi slu ba'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5534: de ni zhi ba'i las so //
NK087(shu)002:5535: de nas rgyas pa'i las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5537: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5538: 'jig rten khams ni khams gsum gyi sems can log 'phongs par gyur pa gnyis yod pa las /
NK087(shu)002:5539: chos 'phongs pa dang zas nor gyis 'phongs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5540: chos 'phongs pa la gnyis rang gi chos 'phongs pa dang bu tsha'i chos 'phongs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5541: de ltar 'phangs pa yod pa de la ni 'phangs
NK087(shu)002:5542: par 'gyur pa'i 'gro gang la zhes pa gsungs pa
NK087(shu)002:5543: yin te / de lta bu'i ched du /
NK087(shu)002:5544: sna tshogs las kyi sa rgyas par sgyur bar bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5545: de yang gang du bya zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:5546: tsan dan nags tshal me tog dang /
NK087(shu)002:5547: nyams dga' skyid mo tshal du zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5548: tsan dan gyi nags tshal de dri zhim po sna tshogs pa yod pa'i gnas sam /
NK087(shu)002:5549: me tog dri zhim pa yod pa'i gnas sam /
NK087(shu)002:5550: nyams dga' zhing skyes mos tshal mang po yod pa'i gnas su bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5551: gnas kyi dam pa der lcag phran ma yum mchog gzungs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5552: lo bcu drug ma'i yum mchog gzung la bsgrub par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5553: las kyi dus su g.yon du bzhag par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5554: rin chen sems par bdag gnas par /
NK087(shu)002:5556: rin chen sems ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar brtag cing rgyas pa'i las bsgrub par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5557: de yang 'od zer yang ser po 'phros pa tshe'i gnas su bstan pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5559: sa'i gnas su bstim par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5560: ser po gru bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5561: me thab bya ba bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5562: kha dog ser por byug /khru do gru bzhi pa ste khru gang zabs su brko ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5563: brkos pa'i sa las 'phang sor bzhir bskyed la /
NK087(shu)002:5564: kha khyer sor bzhi par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5565: zheng dang dpangs gnyis ga sor bzhi bzhir bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5566: rin chen chu skyes dag gis brgyan //
NK087(shu)002:5568: dbus kyi kha khyer la rin po che btang bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5570: phyi rol gyi sor bzhi la pad+mas bskor bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5571: slob dpon kha gcig gi gzhung nas rgyas par byed pa yin la /
NK087(shu)002:5572: dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje ra ba gtang par bya ba yin na /
NK087(shu)002:5573: phyi rol sor bzhi la yang 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba btang bar bya ba yin zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5574: de las kyi bye brag gis brgyan pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5575: de nas yang las gnyis pa'i gzhung bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5576: rin chen kha dog ser po'am zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5577: rin po che gser te de la phur pa'i rgyu byas te /
NK087(shu)002:5578: bsgrub pa'i dus su lha rnams kyang kha dog ser por bya ba yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5579: 'od zer yang ser por spros pa de las gang yin pa de bya ba yi /
NK087(shu)002:5580: ser po'i las byas pa'i phur pa bzhi pa bzhi
NK087(shu)002:5581: btab ste zhes bya ba ni las kyi dus su
NK087(shu)002:5583: sras phur pa'i shing las byung ba bzhin ni cha las 'byung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5584: bde ba chen po'i gnas kyi sgor bzhir btab pas /
NK087(shu)002:5585: phur pa las 'od ser po 'phros de'i tshe'i gnas
NK087(shu)002:5586: gang yin pa de ru zla ba dang nyi ma
NK087(shu)002:5587: ga bur gnas pa'i nang du tshe bstim zhing bstan
NK087(shu)002:5588: par byas shing rgyas par lta'o //
NK087(shu)002:5589: spyod pa rgyas par 'dod na phur pa las 'od
NK087(shu)002:5590: 'phros pas 'jig rten gyi khams khengs pa'i nor phyugs
NK087(shu)002:5591: kun bkug cing rang rang gi gnas kyi nor phyug
NK087(shu)002:5592: la bstims te / phur pa yang khang pa'i phyogs bzhir gdab bo //
NK087(shu)002:5594: phur pa las 'od 'phros pa las tshangs rigs man ni gdab kyi pho'i mtshan thams cad 'gugs te /
NK087(shu)002:5595: pho'i skye gnas la bstims pa bu tsha 'phel bar 'dod do //
NK087(shu)002:5596: rgyas pa'i lha tshogs spyan drangs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5597: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa'i rim pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5598: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5599: dam tshig gi me lha bskyed pa'i gzhung gnyis ka gang du gsungs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5600: las kha dog ser por yod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5601: de nas ye shes kyi me lha dang /
NK087(shu)002:5602: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la bstims la mchod pa phul la /
NK087(shu)002:5603: de'i rjes la dad pa'i sems kyis mchod do //
NK087(shu)002:5606: phyogs skyongs la sbyin par byas nas rgyas pa'i las bcol ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5607: ser po'i shing las sbyar ba'i me zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5608: ser po'i shing la yam shing la bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5609: gru bzhi pa chur khru gang pa sgom du chag
NK087(shu)002:5610: pa gang yod pa dbus kyi cha las byung ba'o
NK087(shu)002:5611: // me sbar ba'i me zhes bya ba ni gser
NK087(shu)002:5612: ram ser po'i shing snod sar par ser po'i shing
NK087(shu)002:5614: shar rgyal po'i khyim nas ma blangs te /
NK087(shu)002:5615: spar bar bya ba'i me de bud shing gi nang du blugs par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5616: kha pa'i ro ldan ser po'i rdzas rgyas pa'i tshul du sbyin bsregs bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5617: ro khang pa yod pa kha dog rdzas thams cad ser por byas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5618: rgyas pa'i tshul du sbyin bsreg bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5619: rgyas pa'i sna drangs pa'i ni zho'i sa drangs la lhag ma rnams ni rim bzhin du dbul ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5620: sngags ni badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya b+aa b+h+yo
NK087(shu)002:5621: swa che ge mo rgyas par gyur cig /ha thams
NK087(shu)002:5623: gzhungs gcig gi na ma sa man ta bud+d+ha nan
NK087(shu)002:5624: b+aa b+h+yo swa che ge mo rgyas par gyur cig
NK087(shu)002:5625: ces dbul te / rdzas lhag ma rnams ni gong
NK087(shu)002:5626: du ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas dbul bar bya'o
NK087(shu)002:5627: ces dbul te / // de nas gtor ma bya ba'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5628: gser phye 'bru rnams ser po la //
NK087(shu)002:5629: gtor ma byas te rgyas par bya //
NK087(shu)002:5631: bsgrub pa'i dus su bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5632: gser phye dang 'bru las byas pa'i gtor ma byas pa thams cad kha dog ser por byas la /
NK087(shu)002:5633: gtor ma 'di las kyi lha la bsngo ste /
NK087(shu)002:5634: byin la rgyas pa'i las bcol lo //
NK087(shu)002:5635: de nas yang dkyil 'khor du ji ltar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5636: ma mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:5637: nga rgyal las kyi che ba rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5638: rgyas par gyur ba gdon mi za //
NK087(shu)002:5640: ma ni gru bzhi ste de'i dkyil 'khor du rgyas
NK087(shu)002:5641: pa'i lha tshogs gzhung gnyis pa'i lha rnams gsal bar
NK087(shu)002:5642: bsgom zhing / rgyas pa'i don gang yin pa bsgrub
NK087(shu)002:5643: na 'grub pa dang nga rgyal gyis 'chel ba'i sems
NK087(shu)002:5644: can rnams kyi 'dod pa rgyas par gyur te /
NK087(shu)002:5645: bsam pa rang ma nas yang dag pa'i dbyings su rol par gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:5646: dbyings las ma g.yos par te yang dag pa'i dbyings su gnyis med pa'i ye shes kyi pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5647: bden pa gnyis su shes par bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5649: de nas yang dbang gi las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5650: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad kun //
NK087(shu)002:5651: zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5652: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dang gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i sems can de'i don du /
NK087(shu)002:5653: dbang du bya ba 'di sbyar bar bya'o gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5654: de nas gang du bya zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:5656: zla mtshan can gyi chu gling du zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5658: srub ma'i 'bras bu yod pa'i chu gling du bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5660: sdong cig ma'i gzungs ma gzungs zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5661: sdong cig ma ni zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5662: rabs chad mo de dbang du bya ba'i sku mchog tu shes pas /
NK087(shu)002:5663: de dang grogs la bsgrub par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5664: las kyi dus su ni g.yon du bzhag par bya ba yin /
NK087(shu)002:5665: snang ba mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5666: snang ba mtha' yas rnal 'byor ram //
NK087(shu)002:5668: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgoms la /
NK087(shu)002:5669: bsgrubs te 'od zer 'phro zhing gang yin pa'i las bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5670: gzhung gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5671: rdo rje ltar ni rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5672: dbang gi bsgrub pa byed pa'i dus su dbus kyi
NK087(shu)002:5673: gtso bo ni rta ste de'i mgo gang yin pa
NK087(shu)002:5674: ru bcom ldan 'das nyid bzhugs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5675: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi sku mdog dang kun dmar por bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5676: 'od zer yang dmar por 'phros shing gang yin pa dbang du bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5677: de nas yang dbang gi me thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5678: zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK087(shu)002:5681: de dbang gi thab khung ni dbyibs zla gam du 'dug pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5682: zla gam gyi mkha' la sor nyi shu yod pa /
NK087(shu)002:5683: rgyab la sor bzhi bcu yod pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5684: zabs su sor bcu bskor ba bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5685: kha dog ni dmar po'i kha khyer ni sor gsum gtang zhes pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5687: dbus kyi kha khyer la mda' gzhu dang lcogs las shin tu 'od zer 'phros pas brgyan par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5688: de'i phyi rol gyi sor gsum la zhags pas brgyan par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5689: zangs la sogs pa'i rin chen nam /
NK087(shu)002:5690: dmar ba'i shing las byas pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5691: gzhung gnyis pa bsgrub pa'i dus su zangs sam dmar
NK087(shu)002:5692: po'i shing las bsnyen phur la 'od du 'phro ba'i
NK087(shu)002:5694: las gang dbang du bya ba de 'dus par bsam mo //
NK087(shu)002:5695: las kyi dus su ni phur pa zla gam lnga btab ste /
NK087(shu)002:5696: dmar po rgyud las byas pa'i phur pa rtse mo
NK087(shu)002:5697: zla gam du 'dug pa rim pa lnga'i cha las
NK087(shu)002:5698: byung ba'i phur pa de gang dbang du byas pa'i
NK087(shu)002:5699: gnas lnga ru gtubs shing btab pas /
NK087(shu)002:5700: gang gi gnas lnga nas bskul te dbang du 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:5701: de nas yang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5702: dmar smug 'phro ba'i lha mchog rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5703: rdo rje spyugs pas spyan drangs te //
NK087(shu)002:5706: gong du rgyas par gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5707: dam tshig gi me lha ni /
NK087(shu)002:5708: gsum pa ldir ba ral pa mchod phyir phyang ba
NK087(shu)002:5709: phyag na 'gun de la sogs pa bsnams pa ste
NK087(shu)002:5710: / mdog ni las kyi bye brag dang sbyar bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5711: de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ye shes
NK087(shu)002:5712: kyi me lha dmar la smug pa'i mdangs ston pa'i
NK087(shu)002:5713: sku mdog dang 'od zer 'phro ba des rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:5715: bstims te de la mchod pa bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5716: de yang shin tu dga' zhing chags pa'i yid kyis mchod par bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5717: dkyil 'khor gyi lhas sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5718: phyogs skyong bkug la bsreg rdzas byin la las bcol ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5719: de nas yam shing dang me sbar ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5720: dmar po'i shing las spar ba'i me zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5721: dmar po'i shing las zhes bya ba ni yam shing la bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5722: dmar po'i shing la dbyibs zla gam du byas pa /
NK087(shu)002:5723: mchur sor lnga sboms su chag gang yod pa de lta bu bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5724: sbar ba'i me zhes bya ba ni zangs gzhong song
NK087(shu)002:5725: ba'i nang du dmar ba'i shing legs par bardzangasa la
NK087(shu)002:5726: tshos ma'i khyim nas me bslangs te /
NK087(shu)002:5727: sbar ba'i me de bud shing gi nang du blugs par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5728: de nas yang rdzas dbul ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5729: skyur zhing dmar ba'i rdzas rnams kyis //
NK087(shu)002:5730: dbang gi tshul du sbyin bsreg bya zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5731: rdzas kun kyang kha dog dmar por bsgyur zhing /
NK087(shu)002:5732: yung ba las sna drangs la dbul bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5734: badz+ra ki li ki la ya pu ti h'u che
NK087(shu)002:5735: ge mo dbang du 'dus par gyur cig h'u zhes
NK087(shu)002:5736: pas dbul lo // gzhung gong ma'i sngags ni na
NK087(shu)002:5737: ma sa man+ta bu ta nan pu ti h'u che
NK087(shu)002:5738: ge mo dbang du 'dus par gyur cig h'u zhes
NK087(shu)002:5739: pas dbul lo // pas dbul lo // gzhan gong du bstan pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5740: de nas yang gtor ma'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5741: zangs phye 'bru rnams dmar po la //
NK087(shu)002:5742: gtor ma bya ste dbang du bsdu ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5744: bsgrub pa'i dus su zangs phye dang 'bru rnams la sogs pa'i gtor ma kun dmar por byas te /
NK087(shu)002:5745: las kyi lha la byin la dbang gi las 'di khyod kyis grub par gyis shig ces bago'o //
NK087(shu)002:5746: gang dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'adu'o //
NK087(shu)002:5747: de nas yang dkyil 'khor du ji ltar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5748: ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:5749: 'dod chags las kyi che ba rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5750: dbang du bsdus pas dbyings su rol zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5751: me'i dkyil 'khor ni zla gam ste /
NK087(shu)002:5753: dbang gi lha rnams gsal bsgom zhing /
NK087(shu)002:5754: de'i 'od zer gyis 'dod chags la dad pa'i sems
NK087(shu)002:5755: can bsdus nas dbang du byas te byang chub sems
NK087(shu)002:5756: kyi rgyas btab pa de ni dbyings su rol la
NK087(shu)002:5757: ste / don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5758: rdzas la sogs pa'i bye brag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5760: de nas yang drag po'i las bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5761: 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5763: shin tu gdug pa'i sems can la drag shul gyi
NK087(shu)002:5764: spyod pa sbyar byas nas zhes bya ba ni shin
NK087(shu)002:5765: tu gdug cing log par ltar ba'i sems can de
NK087(shu)002:5766: la zhi bas 'dul ba ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5767: drag shul spyod pa sbyar byas nas 'dul bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5768: de yang gnas gang du bya zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:5769: rkang gcig can nam dur khrod du zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5770: mtshan nyid gong du gsungs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5771: rigs ngan dme sha can la sogs //
NK087(shu)002:5772: mi reg ma'i gzung ma gzungs zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5773: bsgrub pa'i dus su ni rigs ngan dme sha can ni gsod byed bshan pa'i rigs te /
NK087(shu)002:5774: drag po'i las byed pa'i bsgrub pa'i dus su bston par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5775: mi reg ma ni yugs sa ma ste /
NK087(shu)002:5776: de ni gdug pa'i gzungs ma ste /
NK087(shu)002:5777: las kyi dus su g.yon du bzhag pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5778: rdo rje khro bor bdag gnas la //
NK087(shu)002:5780: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu nyid du bdag gnas par byas la /
NK087(shu)002:5781: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyang sku mdog mthing nag khros pa'i zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5782: de nas me thab kyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5783: nag po gru gsum dkyil 'khor la /
NK087(shu)002:5784: rtsang thod rgyan gyis brgyan par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5785: drag po'i me thab ni zur gsum pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5786: kha dog nag por byug pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5787: ngos re la sor nyi shu nyi shu'o //
NK087(shu)002:5788: zabs su sor bcu bskor sor gsum gyi dgye /
NK087(shu)002:5789: zheng du dpangs gnyis sor gsum mo //
NK087(shu)002:5790: de'i phyi rol du sor gsum du btab par bya ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5791: dbus kyi kha khyer la thod pas bskor /
NK087(shu)002:5792: de'i phyi rol du rdo rje rtse dgu pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5793: mda' gzhu dang mdung rtse gsum pa pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5795: kha tam ga dang gdug pa'i mtshon cha kun ka sti la la yang btang /
NK087(shu)002:5796: de'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor phyi myur na la rtsang dmar pos bskol bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5797: de nas srog chags gsod pa'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5798: lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la //
NK087(shu)002:5799: tsher ma can gyi shing rnams sam //
NK087(shu)002:5800: mi'i rus pa'i phur pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5801: lcags snal phur pa byas te /
NK087(shu)002:5802: gnam lcags dang khro chung dang sgo gser dang /
NK087(shu)002:5803: srog chag gsod pa'i mdung rtse dang /
NK087(shu)002:5804: srog chags gsod pa'i dgra sta dang /
NK087(shu)002:5806: yang na nag po'i shing ni dug shing ste /
NK087(shu)002:5807: dur tsher yod pa'i shing la phur pa bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5808: de med na tsher ma gdug pa yod pa'i shing la phur pa bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5809: mi rkang gi phur pa la sogs pa'i rnams kyi
NK087(shu)002:5810: rtse mo zur gsum byas la bsnyen phur gyi dus
NK087(shu)002:5811: su ni gcig gi bya ba yin la /
NK087(shu)002:5812: las kyi dus su ni gsum du gdab ste zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5813: sku gsung thugs kyi cha las phyung ba'i phur pa rnams so //
NK087(shu)002:5814: gdab pa'i gnas dang ji ltar gdab pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5815: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa phye ba la sogs pa gsung pa ji ltar ro //
NK087(shu)002:5816: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK087(shu)002:5817: ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5818: mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i lha tshogs rnams /
NK087(shu)002:5819: dreg pa gdul phyir spyan drangs te //
NK087(shu)002:5821: mthing nag 'khrugs pa'i ye shes kyi lha tshogs rnams
NK087(shu)002:5822: gdug pa can bsgral zhing zhal du gsol ba'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:5824: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ba bstims la btang snyoms
NK087(shu)002:5825: khros pa'i mchod pa bya'o sbyin pa'i las kyi lha
NK087(shu)002:5826: rnams dang / phyogs skyong la byin la las bcol lo //
NK087(shu)002:5827: de las yang me sbar ba dang yam shing gi go rim bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5828: tsher ma'i shing las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5829: tsher ma can gyi shing la byas te /
NK087(shu)002:5830: chu ru sor bzhi sboms su chag pa phyed yod pa /
NK087(shu)002:5831: rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba'i gdug pa'i shing las bya ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:5832: sbar pa'i me zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5833: lcags gang sar pa'i nang bshan pa'i khyim nas me
NK087(shu)002:5834: blangs nas sbar pa de bsreg shing gi nang du
NK087(shu)002:5835: blugs pa'o // de nas yang rdzas rtsub pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5836: nag po'i tshi shing rtsub pa yis //
NK087(shu)002:5837: drag po'i tshul du sbyin bsreg bya zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5838: drag po'i rdzas kun kyang kha dog nag por bya ba yi /
NK087(shu)002:5839: rdzas kyi ro kun kyang rtsa bzhi rtsub par bsam yod par bsam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5840: sna drangs pa ni gdug pa'i tsher ma can gyi sna drangs la /
NK087(shu)002:5841: dbul ba ste dbul ba'i sngags ni /
NK087(shu)002:5842: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sum pa h'u che
NK087(shu)002:5843: ge mo ma ra ya phata ces pas dbul ba'o
NK087(shu)002:5844: // de nas yang drag po gtor ma'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5845: lcags phye 'bru nag sha khrag las /
NK087(shu)002:5846: sbyar ba'i gtor mas drag shul spyod //
NK087(shu)002:5848: lcags phye dang 'bru nag po las byas pa'i gtor
NK087(shu)002:5849: ma de drag po'i dus su phra men ma dang
NK087(shu)002:5850: sring mo'i tshogs dang bdag nyid chen mo dang /
NK087(shu)002:5851: sa bdag chen mo la sogs bskul la gtor ma de gzugs la brteg cing gsad pa'i las bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5852: sha khrag sna tshogs las byas pa'i gtor ma ni
NK087(shu)002:5853: las kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngosa la
NK087(shu)002:5854: btang ngo // de nas yang dkyil 'khor du ji ltar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5855: e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK087(shu)002:5856: zhe sdang las kyi 'tshe ba rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5857: brlag par 'gyur ba'i dbyings su rol zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5858: e ni chos 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor te de'i gnas
NK087(shu)002:5859: su bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi tshogs gsal bar
NK087(shu)002:5860: bsgoms la / de'i nang du stong khams kyi sems
NK087(shu)002:5861: can zhe sdang las kyis 'chel ba rnams zhal du
NK087(shu)002:5862: bsgoms la / gsol nas / dngos po phung por rags par byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:5863: yang dag pa'i ye shes ni dbyings su gsal bar bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5864: bzhugs pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5865: rdzas la sogs pa ni 'bras bu longs spyod mi bslu bas bden pa ste kun rdzob bo //
NK087(shu)002:5866: de nas bskrad pa yang bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5867: dur khrod kyi ras ma la /
NK087(shu)002:5868: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la de'i dbus su rnga mo'i gzugs shig bris la /
NK087(shu)002:5869: de la gzas pa po gang yin pa bskyon la
NK087(shu)002:5870: dbang gi dgos pa ji ltar bzhin du bya ste
NK087(shu)002:5871: / gzugs de la bstims nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la yang /
NK087(shu)002:5872: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u dza dza zhes
NK087(shu)002:5873: pa bris te 'og gi thad dkar nas g.yon bskor
NK087(shu)002:5876: bzlas pa'i sngags pa'i sde nyid yin te /
NK087(shu)002:5877: ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang kho'i khang phyi khyim gyi 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
NK087(shu)002:5878: de'i ba dan bzhi bskyod pas rnga mo'i rmig bzhi
NK087(shu)002:5879: rang dbang med par bskyed nas khro bo'i las la
NK087(shu)002:5880: ni sngags te / khrid la las ni tho ba
NK087(shu)002:5881: dang ral gri dang dgra sta dang thogs nas ded
NK087(shu)002:5883: brtan pa yang thon pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5885: 'dzab grangs thon pa dang las la sbyar te /
NK087(shu)002:5886: las kyi dus su stong thon pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5887: dur khrod kyi ras ma btags la /
NK087(shu)002:5888: dbang gi tshul gi tshul du sbyin bsreg byas la /
NK087(shu)002:5889: bskul ba'i sngags bskrad pa'i sngags nyid kyis bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:5890: sbyin bsreg zin pa dang sgo'i them pa'i 'og tu sbas la bzhag go //
NK087(shu)002:5891: de'i rjes la lho phyogs kyi gshin rje gshed po'i yul du bskyal bar bsam ste /
NK087(shu)002:5892: gnas bskyod pa'i man ngag go //
NK087(shu)002:5893: de nas rtags thon pa dang rdzas lhar la dbyung bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5894: de ni bskrad pa'i man ngag go //
NK087(shu)002:5895: de nas 'phrin las bsam yas pa yod par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5896: ji snyed 'phrin las bsam yas kun //
NK087(shu)002:5897: 'gro ba bsam yas bsam pa rnams //
NK087(shu)002:5898: ji snyed 'dul ba'i thabs tshul du //
NK087(shu)002:5899: bsams yas 'phrin las rnam par spros zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5900: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs las phrin las bsam yas phar kun gsungs shing mdzad pa yang /
NK087(shu)002:5901: 'gro ba rigs drug gi bsam pa bsam yas par yod pa de /
NK087(shu)002:5902: de rnams gdug pa'i thabs sam mthun pa'i tshul du
NK087(shu)002:5903: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs las 'phrin las bsam
NK087(shu)002:5905: de nas yang 'phrin las spro ba de rnams yang
NK087(shu)002:5906: dag pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'i
NK087(shu)002:5907: phyir / mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang nyid las /
NK087(shu)002:5908: las kyi bye brag rtsis las 'das //
NK087(shu)002:5909: bya med ngang du lhun gyis grub ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5910: mnyam nyid gnyis su med pa'i ngang nyid las /
NK087(shu)002:5911: phyi dang nang du snang ba thams cad 'byung yang /
NK087(shu)002:5912: las kyi bye brag bgrang las 'das te /
NK087(shu)002:5913: de thams cad kyang ye nas ma bcos pa brjod
NK087(shu)002:5914: pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba'i ngang du ye nas
NK087(shu)002:5916: ma bcos pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5918: kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par gnyis su 'du
NK087(shu)002:5919: shes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos de
NK087(shu)002:5921: las kyi rim par phye nas bstan pa la ni las kyi rim pa phye ba'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:5922: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes rgya cher bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)002:5923: bden pa gnyis kyi bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
NK087(shu)002:5924: pa'o ////de nas yang las kyi rim pa phye ba
NK087(shu)002:5925: la sogs pa gsungs kyang dam tshig 'di ma bsrung
NK087(shu)002:5926: na 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de bstan
NK087(shu)002:5927: pa'i phyir / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5928: dam tshig gsang ba 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:5930: mi 'da' ba'i phyir dam tshig ste /
NK087(shu)002:5931: rtogs 'dul dam tshig de skad spros //
NK087(shu)002:5932: spros med dbyings la g.yos pa med //
NK087(shu)002:5934: 'di nas mar spyi'i dam tshig gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5935: e ma'o zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba'i tshig ste /
NK087(shu)002:5936: gang la ngo mtshar na sku gsung thugs kyi dam
NK087(shu)002:5937: tshig rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa la
NK087(shu)002:5938: ngo mtshar ba'o // sna tshogs log rtog bsam yas la zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5939: sems can gyi bsam pa log par rtog pa mi mthun bsam yas pa la /
NK087(shu)002:5940: de rnams kyi rtog pa 'dul ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5941: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i dam tshig de snyed cig spros te /
NK087(shu)002:5942: chos nyid kyi don gyi ngo bo la ni spros pa med de /
NK087(shu)002:5943: yang dag pa'i dbyings la g.yos pa med do //
NK087(shu)002:5944: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes de ni sngags kyis 'dul ba chen po ste /
NK087(shu)002:5945: bsrung ba med pa'i bsrung ba chen po'i 'o //
NK087(shu)002:5946: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste /
NK087(shu)002:5947: zhes bya ba ni gong du gnyis med pa'i ye shes 'di nyid dam tshig ste /
NK087(shu)002:5949: rnam par rto ga par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:5950: de nyid rdo rje ste dngos po mtshan mas mi shigs pa'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:5951: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni //
NK087(shu)002:5952: grub nas 'jig pa'i dus mtha' med //
NK087(shu)002:5954: sku'i dam tshig ni skur snang thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ste /
NK087(shu)002:5955: bzang ba dang ngan pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5956: ring ba dang thung ba la tha snyad btags na
NK087(shu)002:5957: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la smad pas sku'i dam
NK087(shu)002:5959: de ltar bya ba ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5960: gsung gi dam tshig ni sgrar grags pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5961: sgra snyan pa dang mi snyan pa la sogs pa la tha snyad btags na /
NK087(shu)002:5962: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la smad pas na /
NK087(shu)002:5963: gsung gi dam tshig nyams pas /
NK087(shu)002:5964: de ltar bya ba ma yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5965: thugs kyi dam tshig ni gnyis su med pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5967: de la yod med du brtags na sgro skur btab pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:5968: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pas ye nas ma bcos pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:5969: brjod pa las 'das pa'i ngang las ma g.yos par bzhag pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5970: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig de ltar 'grub pa la ni /
NK087(shu)002:5972: de'i phyir 'grub na 'jig pa'i dus mtha' med ces gsungs pa yin no //
NK087(shu)002:5973: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig de dus gsum du ye nas gnas pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5974: rdo rje dam tshig lu gu rgyud ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5976: sku gsung thugs las rnal 'byor pa dus rtag tu mi 'da' bas /
NK087(shu)002:5977: rnal 'byor dka' thub dam tshig ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5978: rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdom pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5979: rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dang bral na /
NK087(shu)002:5980: srog dang 'dra ba'i gnyis med pa'i ye shes mi 'grub pa de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5981: du ma gcig tu bsdus pa'i srog ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5982: spros pa dang bral ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:5983: bcos ma ma yin pa'i don dam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:5984: yan lag dam tshig 'da' bar dka' zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5985: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na yan lag dam tshig nyams kyang mi nyams pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5989: rtsa ba'i dam tshig rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5990: rdo rje bla ma slob dpon zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:5991: rdo rje bla ma slob dpon la zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:5993: slob dpon ni bka' gzhan gyi bcag par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5994: rdo rje spyi gtsug bskur ba'i phyir bla ma'i man ngag bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5995: slob dpon de la slob mas srog la bab kyang bkur bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:5996: de nas yang slob dpon gyi rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:5997: dam tshig dbang dang shes rgyud dang /
NK087(shu)002:5998: man ngag 'bras bu slob dpon la zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:5999: dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon ni /
NK087(shu)002:6000: dang po bdag la dbang bskur zhing dam tshig sgrog pa'i slob dpon no //
NK087(shu)002:6001: shes rab rgyud kyi slob dpon ni bdag gi rigs la sogs pa chos ston pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6002: chos ston pa'i slob dpon no //
NK087(shu)002:6003: man ngag 'bras bu'i slob dpon ni /
NK087(shu)002:6004: shes rab kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas khu ba dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bstan cing /
NK087(shu)002:6005: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa rtogs par byed pa'i
NK087(shu)002:6006: slob dpon gsum gyi bye brag de la ji bkur
NK087(shu)002:6008: gcig gi mtshan nyid yin mnyam pa la de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6009: lta zhing bkur bar bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6010: pha dang ma dang mig 'bras ltar //
NK087(shu)002:6011: bkur zhing gces par bya ba yin //
NK087(shu)002:6013: dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon la //
NK087(shu)002:6014: bkur bar bya ba'i rim pa ni //
NK087(shu)002:6015: 'jig rten pha las gces pa med pas pha bzhin du bkur bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6016: shes rab kyi rgyud kyi slob dpon la ni 'jig
NK087(shu)002:6017: rten na pha las gces shing gnyen pa med pas
NK087(shu)002:6018: na / pha bzhin du bkur bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6019: man ngag 'bras bu'i slob dpon la ni /
NK087(shu)002:6020: mig gi 'bras bu ltar bkur bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6021: ci'i sgo nas kyang bkur zhing gces par bya ba yin no //
NK087(shu)002:6022: de'i phyi bzhin be'u ltar 'brang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6023: slob dpon gsum ga la yang ste /
NK087(shu)002:6024: lhag par yang man ngag ston pa'i slob dpon de'i
NK087(shu)002:6025: phyi nas be'u bzhin 'brang pa ste mthun pa'i dape'o
NK087(shu)002:6026: // sna tshogs sna tshogs ci bsgo nas //
NK087(shu)002:6027: mnyes shing dgongs pa bskang ba yin zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6028: slob dpon gyi thugs ka dang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin bya ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6029: mnyes par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:6030: bla ma spun dang ming sring la //
NK087(shu)002:6031: man ngag bya ba'i sems bor te //
NK087(shu)002:6032: rdo rje theg pa'i spun yin pas //
NK087(shu)002:6033: gcig la gcig ni mig bzhin lta //
NK087(shu)002:6035: bla ma'i spun zla dang rang gi nyal rog pho
NK087(shu)002:6036: mo gang yin pa de la mngan bya ba ma
NK087(shu)002:6037: yin te / phyin ci log gi sems dor bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6038: de la mngan mi bya ba ci phyir zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:6039: rdo rje theg pa'i spun yin pas /
NK087(shu)002:6040: zhes gsungs te gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa spun yin pas /
NK087(shu)002:6041: de la ni mngan bya ba yang spang bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6042: 'o na ji ltar blta zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:6043: gcig la gcig ni mig bzhin blta zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6044: gcig la gcig ni mig gi nang du rdul song
NK087(shu)002:6045: na mi bzod pa de la rdul song gi dogs
NK087(shu)002:6047: gcig la gcig nyes pas bsrung zhing lta bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6050: 'or gsungs pa de ni sku'i dam tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:6051: de nas yang gsung gi dam tshig ni /
NK087(shu)002:6052: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sum b+ha ni h'u
NK087(shu)002:6053: che ge mo ma ra ya phata ces dbul bar
NK087(shu)002:6054: bya ba'o // de nas yang drag po'i gtor ma bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6055: lcags phye dang 'bru nag po la byas pa'i gtor
NK087(shu)002:6056: ma de drag po'i dus su phra men ma brgyad
NK087(shu)002:6059: sa bdag chen mo la sogs pa bskul la gtor ma de gzugs la brdeg cing /
NK087(shu)002:6061: sha khrag sna tshogs la byas pa'i gtor ma ni
NK087(shu)002:6062: las kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa ni bsngosa pas
NK087(shu)002:6064: de nas yang dkyil 'khor du ji ltar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6065: e'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhes las kyis 'chel
NK087(shu)002:6066: ba rnams brlag par gyur pas dbyings su rol zhes
NK087(shu)002:6068: e ni chos 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
NK087(shu)002:6069: de'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi tshogs gsal bar bsgoms nas /
NK087(shu)002:6070: de'i ngang du khams gsum gyi sems can zhe sdang las kyis 'chel ba rnams /
NK087(shu)002:6072: dngos po'i phung po brlag par bya ba nas yang
NK087(shu)002:6073: dag pa'i shes pa ni ye shes kyi dbyings su
NK087(shu)002:6075: bzhugs pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6076: rdzas la sogs pas 'bras bu longs spyod mi bslu bas bden pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6078: de nas yang bkrad pa yang bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:6079: dur khrod kyi ras ma la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris pa de'i dbus su /
NK087(shu)002:6080: rnga mo'i gzugs gcig bris pa de la gzas pa po gang yin pa skyon la /
NK087(shu)002:6081: dbang gis dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
NK087(shu)002:6083: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnams la yang /
NK087(shu)002:6084: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u dza dza zhes pa bris te /
NK087(shu)002:6085: 'og gi thod ka nas g.yon bskor du bskor nas te /
NK087(shu)002:6086: rnal 'byor pa nyid kyis bzlas pa'i sngags de yin no //
NK087(shu)002:6087: ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang kho'i khang khyim gyi 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
NK087(shu)002:6088: de'i mnar bzhi bskyed pa'i rnga mo'i mig bzhi rang dbang med par bskyod nas /
NK087(shu)002:6089: khro bo la las ni rnga mo'i sna nas drangs
NK087(shu)002:6090: te khrid la las ni tho ba dang ral gri
NK087(shu)002:6091: dang dgra sta thogs nas ded nas 'gro bar dmigs
NK087(shu)002:6092: la bsnyen pa thon pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6094: 'dzab grangs khri thon pa dang las la sbyar te /
NK087(shu)002:6095: las kyi dus su stong thon pa yang dur khrod kyis ma yal btub la /
NK087(shu)002:6096: dbang gi tshul du sbyin sreg bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:6097: bskul ba'i sngags bskrad pa'i sngags nyid kyis bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:6099: sgo'i thon pa'i 'og tu sbas la bzhag go //
NK087(shu)002:6100: de'i rjes la lho phyogs kyi khams gshin rje rgyal po'i yul du bskyal bar bsam ste /
NK087(shu)002:6101: gnas bskyod pa'i man ngag go //
NK087(shu)002:6102: de nas sngags thon pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6103: rdzas de slar la dbyung bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6104: de ni bskrad pa'i man ngag go //
NK087(shu)002:6105: de nas yang 'phrin las bsam yas par yod par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6106: ji snyed phrin las bsam yas kun //
NK087(shu)002:6107: 'gro ba bsam yas bsam pa rnams //
NK087(shu)002:6108: ji snyed 'dul ba'i thabs tshul du //
NK087(shu)002:6109: bsam yas phrin las rnam par spro //
NK087(shu)002:6111: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las bsam
NK087(shu)002:6112: yas pa gsungs shing mdzad pa yang 'gro ba rigs
NK087(shu)002:6113: drug gi bsam yas yod pa de rnams 'dul ba'i
NK087(shu)002:6114: thabs sam mthun pa'i tshul du /
NK087(shu)002:6115: sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs las phrin las bsam yas par spros pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6116: de nas yang 'phrin las spros pa de rnams yang
NK087(shu)002:6117: dag pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'i
NK087(shu)002:6118: phyir / mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang nyid las /
NK087(shu)002:6119: las kyi bye brag rtsis las 'das //
NK087(shu)002:6120: bya med ngang du lhun gyis grub ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6121: mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings gnyis su med pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6122: dang po tha tshig bcas pa ltar /
NK087(shu)002:6123: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6124: dang po tha tshig bcas pa ltar zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6125: dang po dbang bskur ba'i dus su ji ltar dam
NK087(shu)002:6126: bzhin du sngags rnams dus rtag tu rgyun mi chad
NK087(shu)002:6127: pa dang lha'i sku phyag rgya dus rtag tu bcas
NK087(shu)002:6128: pa ni thun mong dang bcas thun mong ma yin
NK087(shu)002:6129: pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas sngags dang
NK087(shu)002:6130: phyag rgya 'di dag lus ngag yid gsum gyis sgo
NK087(shu)002:6131: nas dus rtag tu brtan por gzung nas mi 'bral
NK087(shu)002:6132: ba ni gsung gi sa ma ya ru ston pas
NK087(shu)002:6133: bshad do // de ni gsung gi dam tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:6134: de nas yang thugs kyi dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6135: phyi gsang bzhi dang bar gsang bzhi //
NK087(shu)002:6136: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6137: phyi gsang bzhi dang bar gsang bzhi zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6138: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK087(shu)002:6139: lha'i de kho na nyid phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rnams ni phyi gsang bzhi'o //
NK087(shu)002:6141: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang /
NK087(shu)002:6145: yang gsang bar 'os pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6146: dga' ba bzhi yis mtshan nas yang dag pa'i ye shes nyams su len pa'i gsang bar 'os pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6147: de lta bu'i don gzhan la ma smra zhig ces
NK087(shu)002:6148: dang slob dpon gyi gnyer ba'i gsang ba'i man ngag
NK087(shu)002:6149: 'bras bu rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag 'di lta bu
NK087(shu)002:6150: yin no // zhes snod ngan pa phal la mi spel ba 'di ni thugs kyi sa ma ya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6151: de lta bu sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig 'di ni /
NK087(shu)002:6152: khams gsum du 'jig pa'i dus mtha' med de /
NK087(shu)002:6154: spyir sa ma ya ni rdo rje ste zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:6155: de dag nyams par gyur na ni //
NK087(shu)002:6156: rtsa ba nyams te rigs rlag 'gyur //
NK087(shu)002:6157: zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig de nyams par gyur na /
NK087(shu)002:6158: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams te /
NK087(shu)002:6159: 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brlag par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:6160: de ni nyams pa'i skyon no //
NK087(shu)002:6161: de nas yang pha rol pa'i dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i skyon bstan par bya ste /
NK087(shu)002:6162: de'i phyir nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi long zhes bya ba gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6163: pha rol pos sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams na de'i nyes pa brjod kyis mi lang ste /
NK087(shu)002:6164: de ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pa yin pas
NK087(shu)002:6165: dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa de dang nyams
NK087(shu)002:6166: pa gnyis skad cig tsam yang yud tsam yang smra
NK087(shu)002:6167: bar mi bya'o // smras na skyon ci yod ce na /
NK087(shu)002:6168: de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6169: smras na 'bras bu nyams par 'gyur zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6170: smras pas nyid kyis rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:6171: de nas yang yan lag gi dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6172: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /
NK087(shu)002:6173: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6174: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //
NK087(shu)002:6175: nga rgyal phrag dog chen po ni //
NK087(shu)002:6176: bder gshegs lnga'i rang bzhin pas zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6177: 'dod chags ni 'dod cing chags pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6178: de spangs na grol ba ma yin /
NK087(shu)002:6180: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dod cing /
NK087(shu)002:6181: chos nyid la chags pas rnam par dag ste /
NK087(shu)002:6182: 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin pas mi spang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:6183: zhe sdang ni pha rol zhe sdang ba de /
NK087(shu)002:6184: de spangs pas grol ba ni ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6185: zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid ni /
NK087(shu)002:6186: phyin ci log gi nyon mongs pa la zhe sdang
NK087(shu)002:6187: zhing med par byed pas zhe sdang rnam par dag
NK087(shu)002:6188: pa ste / mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin pas mi spang ngo //
NK087(shu)002:6189: gti mug ni mi shes shing tshor ba med pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6190: de spangs nas grol ba ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6191: gti mug gi mtshan nyid ni phyin ci log gi rtog pa gang yang 'byung ba ma yin zhing /
NK087(shu)002:6192: shes pa dang brjod pa las 'das shing bral bas na gti mug rnam par dag pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6193: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin pas mi spang ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6194: nga rgyal ni ma rigs pas smra ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:6195: de yang spang nas grol ba ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6196: nga rgyal gyi mtshan nyid de ni /
NK087(shu)002:6197: chos nyid gnyis su med pa'i don la gnas shing /
NK087(shu)002:6198: phyi ci log gi don la nyon mongs pa ni mi gnas pas nga rgyal ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:6199: nga rgyal rnam par dag pa ste rin chen 'byung ldan kyi rang bzhin pas mi spang ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6200: phrag ni gzhan gyi yon tan phrag dog ste /
NK087(shu)002:6201: de spang nas grol ba ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6203: chos kyi dbyings spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral bas /
NK087(shu)002:6204: spros pa med par phrag dog ste /
NK087(shu)002:6205: phrag don rnam par dag pas gdon mi za bar 'grub pa'i rang bzhin bas mi spang ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:6206: de'i phyir chen po zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6207: chung ngu rnam par dkar ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:6208: de ni mi spang ba'i dam tshig lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:6209: de nas yang dor bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6210: sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag /dbang ba'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi spos /
NK087(shu)002:6211: dor bar mi bya sa ma ya ho //
NK087(shu)002:6213: sha chen dang bshang ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6214: gci ba dang khu ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6215: khrag lnga ni rnam par rtog pas mi gtsang ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6216: sogs pas bdud rtsi ste de las zlog pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6217: dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi dngos zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6218: sha chen la sogs pa lnga ni ye nas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes lnga'i dngos po ste /
NK087(shu)002:6219: de rnam par rtog pa'i bdud las zlog nas bdud rtsi ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin te /
NK087(shu)002:6220: mi gtsang ba de nas dor bar bya ba ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6221: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin pas dor bar mi bya ba'i sa ma ya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6222: de ni dor bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:6223: de nas spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6224: rdzun dang tshig rtsub smra ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6225: sbyor dang sgrol ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK087(shu)002:6226: bder gshegs lnga'i mdzod spyod pas //
NK087(shu)002:6227: rtag tu spyod pa'i dam tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:6229: brdzun ni chos nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin la /
NK087(shu)002:6230: 'di lta bu yin no zhes drang ba'i don du ston pa'i rdzun te /
NK087(shu)002:6231: mi spyod pa'i mdzad pa yin pas rnal 'byor pas kyang spyod par bya ba yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6232: tshig rtsub pa ni 'di ltar snang ba thams cad 'khrul pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6235: tshig rtsub mo ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdzad spyod yin pas /
NK087(shu)002:6236: rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad par bya ba yin pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6237: rku ba ni 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad
NK087(shu)002:6238: ye nas ma bcos pa'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba
NK087(shu)002:6239: de ni rin po che 'dra ba yin pa 'di
NK087(shu)002:6240: ni rtogs pa bya ba yin zhing 'di ni nyams
NK087(shu)002:6241: su blang ba'o // zhes phyin ci log thams cad yang dag pa'i dbyings su rku ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6242: rin chen 'byung ldan gi mdzad spyod de /
NK087(shu)002:6243: rtag tu rnal 'byor pas spyod par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6244: sbyor ba ni 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun
NK087(shu)002:6245: rdzob tu lha dang lha mo'i ngang du 'byor la
NK087(shu)002:6246: / don dam par skye ba med pa'i ngang du 'byor pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:6247: 'od dpag tu med pa'i mdzad spyod do //
NK087(shu)002:6248: rnal 'byor pas rtag tu spyad par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6249: sgrol ba ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad
NK087(shu)002:6250: rnam par rtog pas bcings pa thams cad skye ba
NK087(shu)002:6251: med pa'i ngang du sgrol la /
NK087(shu)002:6252: skye ba med ces bya ba de yang mi gnas par sgrol ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6253: gdon mi za bar 'grub pa'i mdzad spyod do //
NK087(shu)002:6254: rnal 'byor pas dus rtag tu spyad par bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6255: bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i mdzad spyod pas rtag tu spyad pa'i dam tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:6257: de ni spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:6258: mi spang mi dor spyod par bya zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6259: nyon mongs pa lnga bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin pas /
NK087(shu)002:6261: bdud rtsi lnga ye shes kyi rang bzhin pas mi dor ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6262: brdzun dang tshig rtsub la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod yin pas /
NK087(shu)002:6264: yan lag bco lnga'i dam tshig ni //
NK087(shu)002:6266: mi spang bar bya ba'i dam tshig lnga dang /
NK087(shu)002:6267: mi dor bar bya ba'i dam tshig lnga dang /
NK087(shu)002:6268: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga ste bco lnga'o //
NK087(shu)002:6269: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6270: rang la phan pa'i srog yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6271: srog ma chad na mi 'chi ba dang 'dra bar gnyis med pa'i ye shes te /
NK087(shu)002:6272: rtog shing khong du chud nas skye ba med pa'i dbyings rnam par dag ste /
NK087(shu)002:6273: de la 'chi ba ga la yod de /
NK087(shu)002:6274: 'bras bu de thob pa bya ba'i phyir mi btong /
NK087(shu)002:6276: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i dam tshig
NK087(shu)002:6277: tu ni gnyis med pa'i ye shes thob par bya
NK087(shu)002:6278: ba'i gazhi'am rmang yin pa'i phyir na mi btang ba'o
NK087(shu)002:6281: btang na 'bras bu ga la 'byung zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6282: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i dam tshig med cing ma bsrungs na /
NK087(shu)002:6283: srog dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu ga la 'byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:6284: mi 'byung ste brlag par 'gyur ba'i tha tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:6285: de'i nyes pa brjod las 'das zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:6286: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:6287: brjod pa las 'das te brlag par 'gyur ba'i tha tshig go //
NK087(shu)002:6288: de nas yang dam tshig nyams pa de thugs rjes ma gzung na dmyal bar 'gro bas /
NK087(shu)002:6289: de thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6290: snying nas slob dpon smod pa dang //
NK087(shu)002:6291: zhes pa la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6292: snying nas slob dpon smod pa dang //
NK087(shu)002:6294: dang po shes pa slob bu'i dus na slob dpon de la kha 'jam dang /
NK087(shu)002:6295: spyod pa legs mos 'dris par byed cing /
NK087(shu)002:6296: shes pa lobs nas slob dpon de yis bya ba med pa'i spyod pa byed cing /
NK087(shu)002:6297: chos dang slob dpon de las ma 'ongs bar gzhan
NK087(shu)002:6298: la 'ong ba bskur zer zhing rang gi shes pa
NK087(shu)002:6299: las slob dpon gyis mi shes pa skad zer ba
NK087(shu)002:6300: ni / snying nas slob dpon smod pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6301: de ma bsgral na mnar med du lhung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:6302: sangs rgyas bstan pa la gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6303: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas par byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:6304: spyod pa phyin ci log bzhi byed cing rdzun dang
NK087(shu)002:6305: rku ba dang sgyu dang g.yo la sogs pa de
NK087(shu)002:6306: ni thugs rjes ma gzung na /
NK087(shu)002:6307: mnar med par ni lhung ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:6308: theg pa chen po smod pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6309: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa theg pa chung ngu la gnas par byas nas /
NK087(shu)002:6310: theg pa chen po'i nang nas kyang /
NK087(shu)002:6311: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i theg pa smod pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:6312: mnar med pa'i dmyal bar 'gro bas /
NK087(shu)002:6314: sems can yongs la gnod dang zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6315: dang po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad cing zhugs nas /
NK087(shu)002:6316: phyis de las ni log nas /
NK087(shu)002:6317: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yang smad sems can yongs la 'tshe bar byed pa'i gang zag de /
NK087(shu)002:6318: mnar med par lhung ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:6320: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dgrar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6321: chos 'khor gnyen po bshig pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6322: dben ris gnyen po 'joms pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6323: gtsug lag khang gi dkor rku ba dge 'dun pa'i bar du dbyen 'dzud pa la sogs pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6324: de ni rnal 'byor spyi dgra yin /
NK087(shu)002:6325: de lta bu'i rigs rnams la myur du bsgrim ste ma bsgral na /
NK087(shu)002:6326: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i rdo rje'i tshig nyams pas na /
NK087(shu)002:6327: rnal 'byor pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas /
NK087(shu)002:6328: grims phyung las sngags dang phyag rgya'i shugs kyis bsgral bar bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6329: de ltar bsgral na yang dag pa'i gnas dang 'phrad pa de ni /
NK087(shu)002:6331: de nas yang dam tshig gi yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6332: dam tshig 'di ni smad po che zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6333: dam tshig 'di ni smad po che zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6334: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i dam tshig
NK087(shu)002:6335: 'di ni yang dag pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i gzhi
NK087(shu)002:6336: yin pa'i phyir na smad bo che ste /
NK087(shu)002:6337: de'i phyir sangs rgyas bsgrub pa'i rgyu dang bzhi /
NK087(shu)002:6339: de nas yang dam tshig gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6340: yid bzhin nor bu rin po che zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6341: dam tshig gi ngo bo ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ste /
NK087(shu)002:6342: ma bcos pa'i don dam pa byang chub kyi sems ni /
NK087(shu)002:6344: de nas yang dam tshig bsrungs ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6345: dam tshig nas rnams ma btang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6346: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i dam tshig
NK087(shu)002:6347: gi gnas rnams bsrung zhing mi gtong ba'i rnal 'byor
NK087(shu)002:6348: pa de ni / legs pa'i yon tan brjod kyi mi lang ba 'byung ste /
NK087(shu)002:6349: sangs rgyas kyi rgyu la gnas pas na /
NK087(shu)002:6352: dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos dgos zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6353: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i dam tshig
NK087(shu)002:6354: bsrungs na sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'gyur na gzhan
NK087(shu)002:6355: gyis dngos grub smos kyang ci dgos te /
NK087(shu)002:6356: de ltar thob pa'i phyir ye nas nan tan bskyed de /
NK087(shu)002:6357: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig bsrung /
NK087(shu)002:6358: zhes ston pa dang dpal kun tu bzang po gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:6359: dam tshig rim par phye nas ston pa la dam tshig rim par phye ba'i le'u'o //
NK087(shu)002:6360: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba rgya cher bshad pa las /
NK087(shu)002:6361: bden pa gnyis kyis bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
NK087(shu)002:6362: pa'o ////de ltar dam tshig la sogs pa bstan kyang
NK087(shu)002:6363: don bsdus nas so so'i don re re la gol
NK087(shu)002:6365: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6366: de yang sngon la gong du gsungs pa'i le'u bcu
NK087(shu)002:6367: gnyis yan chad kyi don la ngam shing ston pa
NK087(shu)002:6368: la yi rang bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6369: yid kun tu bzang po la sogs pa 'dus pa'i
NK087(shu)002:6370: 'khor tshogs ma lus pa rnams rang rang gi bsam
NK087(shu)002:6372: zhes bya ba ni 'khor thams cad gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems su mngon du gyur nas /
NK087(shu)002:6373: ston pa la 'khor rnams kyis gtsug gi 'dus pas
NK087(shu)002:6374: rnal 'byor mchog gi tshul du phyag bya ba ste
NK087(shu)002:6375: / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsang ba gsung gsang
NK087(shu)002:6376: ba thugs gsang bar bzhugs pa'i bdag po la 'khor
NK087(shu)002:6377: rnams kyis mdun gyis ltas te /
NK087(shu)002:6378: ston pa la ngo mtshar nas rmad du byung ba'i
NK087(shu)002:6379: tshig gis 'og nas 'byung ba 'di skad ces bsgrags
NK087(shu)002:6380: so // e ma'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mnyam nyid dbyings mchog nas /
NK087(shu)002:6381: thugs rje chen po gsal la ma 'dres pa kun tu khyab par brdal zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6382: rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid ma bcos pa'i dbyings
NK087(shu)002:6383: nyid nas khams gsum gyi sems can gyis dag pa'i
NK087(shu)002:6384: chos nyid ma rtogs pa las thugs rje chen pos
NK087(shu)002:6385: lta ba dang spyod pa dang dam tshig la sogs
NK087(shu)002:6386: pa so sor gsal zhing ma 'dres par bstan cing
NK087(shu)002:6387: kun tu khyab brdal ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6388: sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan 'phrin las /
NK087(shu)002:6389: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6391: gsung gi dkyil 'khor la yang gsum /
NK087(shu)002:6392: de bzhin du thugs dang yon tan phrin las la yang gsum gsum ste /
NK087(shu)002:6393: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor brjod mi long ba zhig gsungs
NK087(shu)002:6394: pa yang 'gro ba rigs drug gi bsam pa mi
NK087(shu)002:6395: mthun pa bsam yas pa yod pa'i ched du ste
NK087(shu)002:6396: / de'i bsam pa rnams rlog pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6397: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsam yas pa zhig gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:6398: de ltar thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba rnams gzung ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6399: 'gro ba bsam yas rnam rtog de snyed /
NK087(shu)002:6403: de nas yang ston pa'i byin rlabs las don dam
NK087(shu)002:6404: kun rdzob gnyis la ngo mtshar bar bstan pa'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:6405: / e ma'o rmad du byung ba'i chos /
NK087(shu)002:6406: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa las /
NK087(shu)002:6408: kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mthar zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6409: ston pa'i thugs rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de las /
NK087(shu)002:6410: sku'i dkyil 'khor la sogs sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba bsam yas pa rnams /
NK087(shu)002:6411: don dam pa chos nyid las ma g.yos kun rdzob
NK087(shu)002:6412: tu sgyu ma tsam du bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o
NK087(shu)002:6413: zhes 'khor rnams kyis ston pa la ched du glengs
NK087(shu)002:6414: so // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po ni /
NK087(shu)002:6415: brjod du med pa'i dgongs pa dus bzhi mnyam pa
NK087(shu)002:6416: nyid kyi dbyings la dgongs nas cang mi gsungs par
NK087(shu)002:6417: bzhugs so // de nas yang sdud pa po ston
NK087(shu)002:6418: pa la don bsdus par gsol ba btab par bstan
NK087(shu)002:6419: bzhugs so // pa'i phyir / de nas rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:6420: yid kun tu bzang pos gsol ba btab bo zhes
NK087(shu)002:6422: gsol ba btab pa'i tshig ni /
NK087(shu)002:6424: bsgo bar gsol ba btab pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6425: de nas yang ston pas gong du gsungs pa'i don
NK087(shu)002:6426: kun mdor bsdus nas bshad par gnang bar bstan pa'i
NK087(shu)002:6427: phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6428: gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
NK087(shu)002:6431: sems dpa' chen po zhes bos nas lus ngag yid gsum gyis nyon cig ces gnang ba gsol to //
NK087(shu)002:6432: rgyud kyi rgyal po chos kyi don 'di nyid ston
NK087(shu)002:6433: pa ngas gsungs don bsdus te khyod la bshad par
NK087(shu)002:6436: e ma'o chos rnams thams cad sems kyi 'khrul pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6437: sems las ma rtogs chos 'ga' tsam yang yod dam yin zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6438: phyi dang nang du snang ba'i chos thams cad ni /
NK087(shu)002:6439: tshe rabs thog ma med pa'i dus nas rtog pa'i dbang gis /
NK087(shu)002:6440: brtag pa'i ngo la 'khrul bar snang ba ste /
NK087(shu)002:6441: chos su snang ba yang nang gi shes pa nyid snang ba las ma gtogs pa /
NK087(shu)002:6442: yul log zhig na grub pa med do //
NK087(shu)002:6444: sems las ma gtogs chos 'ga' tsam yang yod ma yin zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:6445: de nas yang ston pas dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsungs pa /
NK087(shu)002:6446: de yang 'khrul pa'i ngo la snang gi yang dag
NK087(shu)002:6447: pa'i blo can la mi snang bar bstan pa'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:6448: / 'khrul pa bzlog phyir rgyal bas chos ston pa /
NK087(shu)002:6451: khams gsum gyi sems can gyi ye nas med pa'i rang bzhin pa la /
NK087(shu)002:6452: sems 'khrul pa'i dbang gis mtshan mar gzung ba de la bzlog pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6453: lha'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma tsam du bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6454: rags pa'i mtshan ma mi gnas par bya ba'i phyir bstan to //
NK087(shu)002:6455: lha'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma 'dra ba ston pa'i de
NK087(shu)002:6456: nyid kyang 'khrul ba la snang bar zad kyi yang
NK087(shu)002:6457: dag pa'i shes pa ni snang ba med do //
NK087(shu)002:6458: 'khrul dang 'khrul la snang ba'i chos rnams kun /
NK087(shu)002:6459: rang gi sems yin snang bar zad ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6460: phyi'i yul med pa la 'khrul pa yod pas bzungs bas 'khrul ba /
NK087(shu)002:6461: de las zlog na lha'i dkyil 'khor du ston pa de yang 'khrul pa la snang ba yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6462: de ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun rang gi sems
NK087(shu)002:6463: nyid yin te sems nyid snang ba la ma gtogs
NK087(shu)002:6464: pa yul log zhig na snang rgyu med pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6465: de nas yang sems nyid ma grub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6466: sems kyi rang bzhin dngos po ma grub ste /
NK087(shu)002:6467: snga phyi gses nas rang ba zhin yongs kyis med ces gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6468: sems kyi rang bzhin de dngos por grub pa ma yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6469: skad cig ma snga phyis gses pas snga ma ni 'gags /
NK087(shu)002:6471: da lta ni mi gnas pas /
NK087(shu)002:6472: rang bzhin med par gyur pas nang gi sems dngos por ma grub pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6473: de nas yang sems ma grub ces bya ba de la mi gnas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6474: gzod nas ma skyes ye nas rnam par dag /yi
NK087(shu)002:6475: ge med cing sgra dang tha snyad bral zhes gsungs
NK087(shu)002:6476: pa yin te / sems ma grub pa de yang
NK087(shu)002:6477: sems yod pa las rkyen gyis byas nas med pa
NK087(shu)002:6478: ni ma yin gzod ma nas ma skyes shing ye
NK087(shu)002:6479: phyi mo nas rnam par dag pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6480: rnam par dag pa de la yi ges brjod pa med cing /
NK087(shu)002:6481: tshig gi sgra dang tha snyad dang bral ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:6482: de nas yang sgra dang tha snyad dang bral zhes pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:6483: stong pa nyid de stong pa nyid ces pa de nyid brtags pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6484: de las kyang 'das par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6485: stong pa'i spyod pa'i spyod pa nyid de stong pa'i yul las 'das /
NK087(shu)002:6487: stong pa'i stong pa ni stong pa'i yul te de la yang mi gnas te /
NK087(shu)002:6488: mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po mthar phyin pa'i man ngag ste /
NK087(shu)002:6489: bcos ma ma yin pa'i don dam pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6490: de ltar 'khrul pa dang yang dag pa gnyis ka
NK087(shu)002:6491: sems las byung ba'i phyir sems ni chos kyi rtsa
NK087(shu)002:6492: ba ste / rtsa ba de nyid srid pa dang grol bar snang zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6493: 'khrul par snang ba ni rang gi sems snang bas sems nyid yin la /
NK087(shu)002:6494: sems de nyid yid ye nas ma bcos par gnas pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6496: rtsa ba de nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba
NK087(shu)002:6497: srid pa dang grol bar snang zhes ston pas 'khor
NK087(shu)002:6499: dgyes pa med pa dgyes pa'i tshul gyis dgyes par bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6501: de nas yang gong du gsungs pa'i don kun mi
NK087(shu)002:6502: gnas pa'i ye shes chen po nyid kyi ngang du
NK087(shu)002:6503: bstan la mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po de
NK087(shu)002:6504: la ci yang med par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6505: de la e ma'o sems nyid stong pa chen po'i
NK087(shu)002:6506: ye shes la zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te
NK087(shu)002:6507: / ye nas ma bcos pa'i dbyings nyid la ni
NK087(shu)002:6508: gnas dang ston pa 'khor zhes gar yod ces gsungs
NK087(shu)002:6510: ston pa zhes bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6511: bstan pa zhes bya ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin te /
NK087(shu)002:6512: don dam pa'i bden pa la ni ga la yod de med do //
NK087(shu)002:6513: ting nge 'dzin dang yig 'bru phyag mtshan dang /
NK087(shu)002:6514: rdzogs pa dang bzhugs thabs rim du bsgrang du med ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6515: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum dang lha rnams bskyed pa'i yig 'bru dang /
NK087(shu)002:6516: yig 'bru las gyur pa'i phyag mtshan dang /
NK087(shu)002:6517: phyag mtshan de la sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang
NK087(shu)002:6518: rdzogs nas gdan la bzhugs pa'i thabs rnams rim du
NK087(shu)002:6519: bgrang ba de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste
NK087(shu)002:6520: / rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa la mi bslu bas bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6521: bcos ma ma yin pa'i don dam pa la ni bsgrang du'ang med pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6522: stong nyid snying rje byang chub sems bskyed med ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6523: stong pa nyid bsgom zhes bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6524: de'i ngang las khams gsum gyi sems can snying rje bskyed ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6525: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis bskyed ces gsungs pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:6527: bcos ma ma yin pa'i don dam pa la ni bskye ba la sogs pa yang med do //
NK087(shu)002:6528: gzugs brnyan med cing ting 'dzin bsam dang bral /
NK087(shu)002:6530: gzugs brnyan de brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6531: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa rnams ni /
NK087(shu)002:6533: bcos ma ma yin pa'i don dam pa la ni bsam par bya ba dang /
