NK087(shu)002:6534: bsam par byed pa med pas ting nge 'dzin bsam dang bral zhes gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:6535: sngags dang phyag rgya med cing thugs rjes 'dul ba'ang med ces pa ni /
NK087(shu)002:6536: sngags ni so so'i sngags kyis las bstan pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6537: lha so so'i phyag rgya dang /
NK087(shu)002:6538: phyag rgya'i las bstan pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6539: khams gsum gyi sems can so so'i 'dul tshad bstan pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6540: ma bcos pa'i don gyi ngo bo la ni /
NK087(shu)002:6541: thugs rjes 'dul ba yang med do //
NK087(shu)002:6542: ma rungs gdul du med cing drag po'i dkyil 'khor med /
NK087(shu)002:6543: snying po bstang tshul med cing rgyun gyi ting 'dzin med /
NK087(shu)002:6544: bya ba med cing sdom pa kun las 'das //
NK087(shu)002:6546: ma rung ba log par blta ba'i dreg pa can gdul ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6547: drag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bye brag gsungs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6548: so sor drag po'i snying po gsungs pa dang khro bo so so'i stangs thabs gsungs pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6549: rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa gsungs pa rnams ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6550: ma bcos pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa la ni
NK087(shu)002:6551: de ltar gong du gsungs pa'i rim par bya ba
NK087(shu)002:6552: med cing sdom kun las 'das pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6553: gong du gsungs pa'i rnam grangs de kun cig tshig
NK087(shu)002:6554: gi tha snyad yin te don dam par med do
NK087(shu)002:6555: // 'o na dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ji snyed pa gsungs pa de yis ci bya zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:6556: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6557: 'khrul pa bzlog phyir kun rdzob tsam du bstan //
NK087(shu)002:6559: 'o na lha'i dkyil 'khor la kun rdzob tsam du
NK087(shu)002:6560: bstan pa 'di dor bar bya ba ma yin nam
NK087(shu)002:6561: zhe na / de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6562: de bas bstan pa 'di la rab bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6563: don dam bden pa nges par rigs par bya zhes gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6564: kun rdzob tsam du lha'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa
NK087(shu)002:6565: 'di la rnal 'byor pa las dang po pas sems
NK087(shu)002:6567: sgyu ma tsam du bstan pa 'di la brtan par
NK087(shu)002:6568: bya ba ni de bas na bstan pa sgyu ma
NK087(shu)002:6569: 'di la rab tu bstan te sbyangs la don dam
NK087(shu)002:6570: pa'i bden pa kho na rigs par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6571: de nas ma rtogs pa'i dus na lha'i dkyil 'khor
NK087(shu)002:6572: la sogs pa thams cad don dam pa'i bden pa
NK087(shu)002:6574: don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs pa'i dus na /
NK087(shu)002:6575: brjod par bya ba kun sgrib pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6576: sems las 'das pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK087(shu)002:6577: tshig dang yi ge tha snyad kun las 'das //
NK087(shu)002:6578: mthun pa'i dpes kyang de la mtshan du med //
NK087(shu)002:6580: dang po sgyu ma tsam du bstan pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor la /
NK087(shu)002:6582: sems las su rung bar byas pa las su rung
NK087(shu)002:6583: ba'i sems de yang don dam par rang bzhin med
NK087(shu)002:6584: pa ste / rang bzhin med pa'i sems de las 'das pa'i chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK087(shu)002:6585: tshig gis brjod pa dang yi ges mtshan pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6586: tha snyad kyis 'di ltar yod bya ba med do //
NK087(shu)002:6587: tha snyad kun las 'das pa yi /
NK087(shu)002:6588: de la ni mthun pa'i dpe nam mkha' ste nam
NK087(shu)002:6589: mkha' des kyang mtshon du nus pa ma yin te
NK087(shu)002:6590: / mtshon du med de mtshon par mi nus pa'i
NK087(shu)002:6591: gtan tshigs de las gang du bstan pa'i rim pa
NK087(shu)002:6592: de kun don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs pa'i dus
NK087(shu)002:6593: na kun sgrib pa yin pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6594: mtshon med blo ldan de la dad mi 'gyur bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6595: mtshon du med pa'i blo dang ldan pa de ni sgrib pa dang bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6596: rnam par byang ba dang zhes bya ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6597: don dam kun rdzob ces bya ba de la dad par mi 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:6599: chos thams cad gang gi ngo bor yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:6600: 'o na bden pa gnyis gang gi ngo la snang zhe na /
NK087(shu)002:6601: bden gnyis blo ldan de la snang bar zad //
NK087(shu)002:6603: sems can gyi bsam pa la bden pa rnam pa gnyis snang bar zad de /
NK087(shu)002:6604: rgyu dang 'bras bu yin pas so //
NK087(shu)002:6605: zhes ston pas gsungs pas 'khor rnams ston pa'i bka'
NK087(shu)002:6606: bsam pa rang nas rab tu dga' ston pa'i 'khor
NK087(shu)002:6607: du 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma lus pa rnams bcos
NK087(shu)002:6608: ma ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid don la
NK087(shu)002:6609: sems shing gnas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te
NK087(shu)002:6610: gnas so // de nas yang bsdud pa po la dbang bskur bar bstan pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6611: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des zhes pa la sogs gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6612: sdud po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po'i lce
NK087(shu)002:6613: la pad+mo'i steng du ston pas yi ge h'u de
NK087(shu)002:6615: las kyi rdo rje rgya gram gcig tu gyur //
NK087(shu)002:6616: las kyi rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las //
NK087(shu)002:6617: lce pad+ma de la thim ste /
NK087(shu)002:6618: don bsdus pa'i nus mthu dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs shing /
NK087(shu)002:6619: dbang bskur zhing dus de nyid du ming rdo rje chos su btags pa de'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6620: rdo rje chos su dbang bskur te /
NK087(shu)002:6621: don bsdu bar byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK087(shu)002:6622: 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig 'di ston pas bka' stsal pas /
NK087(shu)002:6623: sems dpa' chen po zhes bos nas /
NK087(shu)002:6624: dang por mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mjug mdor
NK087(shu)002:6625: bshad kyi bar du sems can gyi don du tshig
NK087(shu)002:6626: cig tsam yang bshad cing brjod pa med do //
NK087(shu)002:6628: dris pa dang chos thams cad ni bshad cing brjod pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)002:6629: bshad cing brjod pa dang bral ba'i don de ltar sus rtogs par 'gyur zhes bris pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6630: lan du phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
NK087(shu)002:6631: bshad cing brjod pa dang bral ba'i don thugs su
NK087(shu)002:6632: chud nas / mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK087(shu)002:6633: sngar sangs rgyas pa de bas na da yang ma
NK087(shu)002:6634: 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor dad pa can rnams kyis kyang
NK087(shu)002:6635: / brjod pa dang bral ba'i don de bde blag
NK087(shu)002:6636: tu rtogs shing thugs su chud par bya ba'i phyir
NK087(shu)002:6638: rnal 'byor pa phyi ma'i don du ngas brjod de sems dpa' chen po zhes bos nas /
NK087(shu)002:6639: bsgo ba bya ba'i tshig 'di gsungs so //
NK087(shu)002:6640: da sdud pa po khyod kyang ma 'ongs pa'i rnal
NK087(shu)002:6641: 'byor pa'i don du ngas bshad pa'i mdo 'di'i don
NK087(shu)002:6642: bsdus la / rnal 'byor phyi ma la mi nus
NK087(shu)002:6643: par bya ba'i ngo bo gsung chos kyi yi ge
NK087(shu)002:6644: snang zhing mi nus par gyis shig /nga yis gsungs
NK087(shu)002:6645: pa'i mdo 'di yang dag pa'i lam de /
NK087(shu)002:6646: rnal 'byor phyi mas lam 'di la brten nas chos
NK087(shu)002:6647: nyid ma bcos par de kho na nyid rnal 'byor
NK087(shu)002:6648: phyi ma de dag gis khong du chud pa bsdud
NK087(shu)002:6649: pa po khyod kyi gyis shig /de ltar khyod kyis
NK087(shu)002:6650: ngas bshad pa'i dom 'di rnal 'byor phyi ma dad
NK087(shu)002:6651: pa can gyi don du gsung chos kyi yi ger
NK087(shu)002:6653: 'on tang na dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa
NK087(shu)002:6654: phyi ma de dag gi ni gsang ba rdo rje
NK087(shu)002:6655: theg pa'i don la yid ches nas /
NK087(shu)002:6656: gting 'jug shing rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i rgyud 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
NK087(shu)002:6657: sems dpa' chen po zhes bos nas gong du gsungs pa'i gtan tshigs de bas na /
NK087(shu)002:6658: ngas bshad pa'i mdo 'di ni rnal 'byor phyi ma
NK087(shu)002:6659: rnams kyi yang dag pa'i nye lam chen mo nyid
NK087(shu)002:6660: yin par khyod kyis shes par bya'o //
NK087(shu)002:6662: bsgo ba med pa'i tshul gyis bsdud pa po la bsgo ba dang /
NK087(shu)002:6663: de'i tshe sdud pa pos kyang ston pa la stod cing bsdud par khas blangs pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6664: rdo rje yid kun tu bzang pos zhes pa la sogs pas bstan te /
NK087(shu)002:6665: rdo rje chos rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i yid kyis so //
NK087(shu)002:6666: rang gi rdo rje gnas su gsol zhing zhes bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6668: rdo rje ni gsang ba'i rdo rje ste /
NK087(shu)002:6669: de'i gnas ni yum gyi b+ha ga ste /
NK087(shu)002:6670: btsun mo bya ba mo dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis /
NK087(shu)002:6671: bcom ldan 'das la byang sems kyi mchod pa phul
NK087(shu)002:6672: nas 'og nas 'byung ba 'di skad ces bstod do
NK087(shu)002:6673: // e ma'o bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa che /
NK087(shu)002:6674: mi nub rgyal mtshan yongs kyi bdag /bder gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi thugs //
NK087(shu)002:6675: byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod ces bya ba ni /
NK087(shu)002:6676: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la bstod pa ste /
NK087(shu)002:6677: 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi dang dga' ba rnam pa
NK087(shu)002:6678: bzhis ji ltar byang chub kyi sems phabs cing rang
NK087(shu)002:6680: de la phyag 'tshal zhing bstod nas don zhu ba'o //
NK087(shu)002:6681: don bsdu bar byed pa'i phyir /
NK087(shu)002:6682: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6683: bcom ldan 'das zhes bsdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bos nas /
NK087(shu)002:6684: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sngar 'das pa dang /
NK087(shu)002:6686: phyis ma 'ongs pa'i lam chen mo lta bur ston pas gsungs te /
NK087(shu)002:6687: bcom ldan 'das zhes sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bos na /
NK087(shu)002:6688: mdo chen po 'di bdag la snang ba lag pas na /
NK087(shu)002:6689: de bdag cag gis kyang mdo 'di mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan chen por gnas par bagyi'o //
NK087(shu)002:6690: rnal 'byor phyi ma'i don du bdag gis gsung chos kyi yi ger yang gnas par bagyi'o //
NK087(shu)002:6691: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag nyid du yang bdag gi gnas par bagyi'o //
NK087(shu)002:6692: mdo 'di'i don 'tshal zhing ston pa'i gang zag skyes
NK087(shu)002:6693: bu dam pa des gzhan la phan 'dogs par yang
NK087(shu)002:6695: mdo 'di'i don 'chad cing ston pa'i gang zag skyes
NK087(shu)002:6696: bu dam pa des gzhan la phan 'dog par yang
NK087(shu)002:6698: rnal 'byor pa'i dgos pa bskong bas yid bzhin gyi
NK087(shu)002:6699: nor bu rgyal po lta bu yang bdag gi gnas
NK087(shu)002:6700: par bagyi'o // mu stegs la sogs pa gzhan gyi
NK087(shu)002:6701: sde pas rab tu mi chod pa yang bdag gis
NK087(shu)002:6702: par bagyi'o // bagyi'o // zhes sdud pa po rdo
NK087(shu)002:6703: rje chos kyis khas blangs shing ston pa la gsol
NK087(shu)002:6704: par bagyi'o // bagyi'o // to // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po /
NK087(shu)002:6705: gnyis su med pa'i ngang la rnal te /
NK087(shu)002:6706: cang mi gsungs bar gyur to //
NK087(shu)002:6707: rgyud yongs su gtod cing snga ma bzhin du gong dang 'dra ba'i phyir na /
NK087(shu)002:6709: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang gsum ston pa'i rab zab rgyud /
NK087(shu)002:6710: bden gnyis don rtogs bshad tshul yang dag shes //
NK087(shu)002:6711: tshul des nyon mongs pa la bdud rtsi'i thigs pa ltar //
NK087(shu)002:6712: bdag gi rgyud kyi don nyid mthar thug bshad byas pas //
NK087(shu)002:6713: bdag gi dge ba gang thob thob de ni bdud rtsi'i thigs pa ltar //
NK087(shu)002:6714: 'gro ba rtog pa'i nad kyis gdung ba rnams las
NK087(shu)002:6715: rgyas par shog /bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba'i
NK087(shu)002:6716: rgya cher bshad pa las le'u bcu gsum pa'i bden
NK087(shu)002:6718: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
NK087(shu)002:6719: dang thugs gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i
NK087(shu)002:6721: bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mtsho skyes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so //
NK087(shu)002:6722: rgya gar ni mkhan po pad+ma'i thod phreng gi zhal snga nas /
NK087(shu)002:6723: zhu chen gyi lo ts+aa ba dz+ny+aa na ku ma
